h4.p: [21] vanditvaa ^a^M1.0001^ea^ ^a^V1.0001^ea^ ^a^P0.0001^ea^ sirasaa se.t.tha.m, buddhamappa.tipuggala.m.
[22] ~neyyasaagaramutti.n.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa.msaarasaagara.m..
[21] tatheva parama.m santa.m, gambhiira.m duddasa.m a.nu.m.
[22] bhavaabhavakara.m suddha.m, dhamma.m sambuddhapuujita.m..
[21] tatheva anagha.m sa"ngha.m, asa"nga.m sa"nghamuttama.m.
[22] uttama.m dakkhi.neyyaana.m, santindriyamanaasava.m..
[21] katena ^a^V1.0002^ea^ tassa etassa, pa.naamena visesato.
[22] ratanattaye visesena, visesassaadarena me..
[21] therehi dhiiradhiirehi, aagama~n~nuuhi vi~n~nubhi.
[21] ``apadaana.t.thakathaa bhante, kaatabbaa''ti visesato..
[21] punappunaadareneva, yaacitoha.m yasassibhi.
[22] tasmaaha.m saapadaanassa, apadaanassasesato..
[21] visesanayadiipassa, diipissa.m pi.takattaye.
[22] yathaa paa.linayeneva, atthasa.mva.n.nana.m subha.m..
[21] kena ^a^M1.0002^ea^ kattha kadaa ceta.m, bhaasita.m dhammamuttama.m.
[22] kimattha.m bhaasita~nceta.m, eta.m vatvaa vidhi.m tato..
[21] nidaanesu kosallattha.m, sukhuggaha.nadhaara.na.m.
[22] tasmaa ta.m ta.m vidhi.m vatvaa, pubbaaparavisesita.m..
[21] puraa ^a^P0.0002^ea^ siiha.labhaasaaya, poraa.na.t.thakathaaya ca.
[22] .thapita.m ta.m na saadheti, saadhuuna.m icchiticchita.m..
[21] tasmaa tamupanissaaya, poraa.na.t.thakathaanaya.m.
[21] vivajjetvaa viruddhattha.m, visesattha.m pakaasaya.m.
[22] visesava.n.nana.m se.t.tha.m, karissaamatthava.n.nananti..

[03] ^b^``kena^eb^ ^a^V1.0003^ea^ ^b^kattha kadaa ceta.m, bhaasita.m dhammamuttama''^eb^nti ca, ^b^``karissaamatthava.n.nana''^eb^nti ca pa.ti~n~naatattaa saa panaaya.m apadaanassatthava.n.nanaa duurenidaana.m, aviduurenidaana.m, santikenidaananti imaani tii.ni nidaanaani dassetvaa va.n.niyamaanaa ye na.m su.nanti, tehi samudaagamato pa.t.thaaya vi~n~naatattaa yasmaa su.t.thu vi~n~naataa naama hoti, tasmaa na.m taani nidaanaani dassetvaava va.n.nayissaama.

[01] tattha aadito taava tesa.m nidaanaana.m paricchedo veditabbo. diipa"nkarapaadamuulasmi~nhi kataabhiniihaarassa mahaasattassa yaava vessantarattabhaavaa cavitvaa tusitapure nibbatti, taava pavatto kathaamaggo ^b^duurenidaana.m^eb^ naama. tusitabhavanato pana cavitvaa yaava bodhima.n.de sabba~n~nutappatti, taava pavatto kathaamaggo ^b^aviduurenidaana.m^eb^ naama. ^b^santikenidaana.m^eb^ pana tesu tesu .thaanesu viharato tasmi.m tasmi.myeva .thaane labbhatiiti.

[03] tatrida.m ^b^duurenidaana.m^eb^ naama -- ito kira kappasatasahassaadhikaana.m catunna.m asa"nkhyeyyaana.m matthake ^b^amaravatii^eb^ naama nagara.m ahosi. tattha ^b^sumedho^eb^ ^a^M1.0003^ea^ naama braahma.no pa.tivasati, ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa kulapariva.t.taa, akkhitto anupaku.t.tho jaativaadena, abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato. so a~n~na.m kamma.m akatvaa braahma.nasippameva ugga.nhi. tassa daharakaaleyeva maataapitaro kaalamaka.msu. athassa raasiva.d.dhako amacco aayapotthaka.m aaharitvaa suva.n.narajatama.nimuttaadibharite gabbhe vivaritvaa ``ettaka.m te, kumaara, maatu santaka.m, ettaka.m pitu santaka.m, ettaka.m ayyakapayyakaana''nti yaava sattamaa kulapariva.t.taa dhana.m aacikkhitvaa ``eta.m pa.tipajjaahii''ti aaha. ^b^sumedhapa.n.dito^eb^ cintesi -- ``ima.m dhana.m sa.mharitvaa mayha.m pitupitaamahaadayo paraloka.m gacchantaa ekakahaapa.nampi gahetvaa na gataa, mayaa pana gahetvaa gamanakaara.na.m kaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti, so ra~n~no aarocetvaa ^a^P0.0003^ea^ nagare bheri.m caraapetvaa mahaajanassa daana.m datvaa taapasapabbajja.m pabbaji. imassa panatthassa aavibhaavattha.m imasmi.m .thaane sumedhakathaa kathetabbaa ^a^V1.0004^ea^. saa panesaa ki~ncaapi buddhava.mse nirantara.m aagataayeva, gaathaabandhena pana aagatattaa na su.t.thu paaka.taa, tasmaa ta.m antarantaraa gaathaasambandhadiipakehi vacanehi saddhi.m kathessaama.

[03] kappasatasahassaadhikaana~nhi catunna.m asa"nkhyeyyaana.m matthake dasahi saddehi avivitta.m ``amaravatii''ti ca ``amara''nti ca laddhanaama.m nagara.m ahosi, ya.m sandhaaya ^b^buddhava.mse^eb^ vutta.m --
[21] ``kappe ca satasahasse, caturo ca asa"nkhiye.
[27] amara.m naama nagara.m, dassaneyya.m manorama.m.
[22] dasahi saddehi avivitta.m, annapaanasamaayuta''nti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.1-2).

[03] tattha ^b^dasahi saddehi avivitta^eb^nti hatthisaddena assasaddena rathasaddena bherisaddena mudi"ngasaddena vii.naasaddena giitasaddena sa"nkhasaddena sammasaddena taa.lasaddena ``asnaatha pivatha khaadathaa''ti dasamena saddenaati ^a^M1.0004^ea^ imehi dasahi saddehi avivitta.m ahosi. tesa.m pana saddaana.m ekadesameva gahetvaa --
[21] ``hatthisadda.m assasadda.m, bherisa"nkharathaani ca.
[22] khaadatha pivatha ceva, annapaanena ghosita''nti.. --
[25] buddhava.mse (bu0 va.m0 2.3-5) ima.m gaatha.m vatvaa --
[21] ``nagara.m sabba"ngasampanna.m, sabbakammamupaagata.m.
[21] sattaratanasampanna.m, naanaajanasamaakula.m.
[22] samiddha.m devanagara.mva, aavaasa.m pu~n~nakammina.m..
[21] ``nagare amaravatiyaa, sumedho naama braahma.no.
[22] anekako.tisannicayo, pahuutadhanadha~n~navaa..
[21] ``ajjhaayako ^a^V1.0005^ea^ mantadharo, ti.n.na.m vedaana paaraguu.
[22] lakkha.ne itihaase ca, sadhamme paarami.m gato''ti.. -- vutta.m.

[01] athekadivasa.m ^a^P0.0004^ea^ so sumedhapa.n.dito uparipaasaadavaratale rahogato hutvaa palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa nisinno eva.m cintesi -- ``punabbhave, pa.n.dita, pa.tisandhiggaha.na.m naama dukkha.m, tathaa nibbattanibbatta.t.thaane sariirassa bhedana.m, aha~nca jaatidhammo, jaraadhammo, byaadhidhammo, mara.nadhammo, eva.mbhuutena mayaa ajaati.m ajara.m abyaadhi.m amara.na.m adukkha.m sukha.m siitala.m amatamahaanibbaana.m pariyesitu.m va.t.tati. avassa.m bhavato muccitvaa nibbaanagaaminaa ekena maggena bhavitabba''nti. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``rahogato nisiiditvaa, eva.m cintesaha.m tadaa.
[22] dukkho punabbhavo naama, sariirassa ca bhedana.m..
[21] ``jaatidhammo jaraadhammo, byaadhidhammo saha.m tadaa.
[22] ajara.m amara.m khema.m, pariyesissaami nibbuti.m..
[21] ``ya.mnuunima.m puutikaaya.m, naanaaku.napapuurita.m.
[22] cha.d.dayitvaana gaccheyya.m, anapekkho anatthiko..
[21] ``atthi hehiti so maggo, na so sakkaa na hetuye.
[22] pariyesissaami ta.m magga.m, bhavato parimuttiyaa''ti..

[03] tato ^a^M1.0005^ea^ uttaripi eva.m cintesi -- ``yathaa hi loke dukkhassa pa.tipakkhabhuuta.m sukha.m naama atthi, eva.m bhave sati tappa.tipakkhena vibhavenaapi bhavitabba.m. yathaa ca u.nhe sati tassa vuupasamabhuuta.m siitalampi atthi, eva.m raagaggiaadiina.m vuupasamena nibbaanenaapi bhavitabba.m. yathaa naama paapassa laamakassa dhammassa pa.tipakkhabhuuto kalyaa.no anavajjabhuuto dhammopi atthiyeva, evameva paapikaaya jaatiyaa sati sabbajaatikhepanato ajaatisa"nkhaatena nibbaanenaapi bhavitabbamevaa''ti. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``yathaapi dukkhe vijjante, sukha.m naamapi vijjati.
[22] eva.m bhave vijjamaane, vibhavopicchitabbako..
[21] ``yathaapi ^a^V1.0006^ea^ u.nhe vijjante, apara.m vijjati siitala.m.
[22] eva.m tividhaggi vijjante, nibbaanampicchitabbaka.m..
[21] ``yathaapi paape vijjante, kalyaa.namapi vijjati.
[22] evameva jaati vijjante, ajaatipicchitabbaka''nti..

[03] aparampi ^a^P0.0005^ea^ cintesi -- ``yathaa naama guutharaasimhi nimuggena purisena duuratova pa~ncava.n.napadumasa~nchanna.m mahaata.laaka.m disvaa `katarena nu kho maggena ettha gantabba'nti ta.m ta.laaka.m gavesitu.m yutta.m. ya.m tassa agavesana.m, na so ta.laakassa doso, purisasseva doso. eva.m kilesamaladhovane amatamahaanibbaanata.laake vijjante ya.m tassa agavesana.m, na so amatamahaanibbaanata.laakassa doso, purisasseva doso. yathaa ca corehi samparivaarito puriso palaayanamagge vijjamaanepi sace na palaayati, na so maggassa doso, purisasseva doso. evameva kilesehi parivaaretvaa gahitassa purisassa vijjamaaneyeva nibbaanagaamimhi sive magge maggassa agavesana.m naama na maggassa doso, purisasseva doso. yathaa ca byaadhipii.lito puriso vijjamaane byaadhitikicchake vejje sace ta.m vejja.m gavesitvaa byaadhi.m na tikicchaapeti, na so vejjassa doso, purisasseva doso. evameva yo kilesabyaadhipii.lito kilesavuupasamamaggakovida.m vijjamaanameva aacariya.m na gavesati, tasseva doso, na kilesavinaasakassa aacariyassa doso''ti. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``yathaa ^a^M1.0006^ea^ guuthagato puriso, ta.laaka.m disvaana puurita.m.
[22] na gavesati ta.m ta.laaka.m, na doso ta.laakassa so..
[21] ``eva.m kilesamaladhove, vijjante amatanta.le.
[22] na gavesati ta.m ta.laaka.m, na doso amatanta.le..
[21] ``yathaa ariihi pariruddho, vijjante gamanampathe.
[22] na palaayati so puriso, na doso a~njasassa so..
[21] ``eva.m kilesapariruddho, vijjamaane sive pathe.
[22] na gavesati ta.m magga.m, na doso sivama~njase..
[21] ``yathaapi ^a^V1.0007^ea^ byaadhito puriso, vijjamaane tikicchake.
[22] na tikicchaapeti ta.m byaadhi.m, na doso so tikicchake..
[21] ``eva.m kilesabyaadhiihi, dukkhito paripii.lito.
[22] na gavesati ta.m aacariya.m, na doso so vinaayake''ti..

[03] aparampi ^a^P0.0006^ea^ cintesi -- ``yathaa ma.n.danakajaatiko puriso ka.n.the aasatta.m ku.napa.m cha.d.detvaa sukha.m gaccheyya, eva.m mayaapi ima.m puutikaaya.m cha.d.detvaa anapekkhena nibbaananagara.m pavisitabba.m. yathaa ca naranaariyo ukkaarabhuumiya.m uccaarapassaava.m katvaa na ta.m uccha"ngena vaa aadaaya, dussantena vaa ve.thetvaa gacchanti, jigucchamaanaa pana anapekkhaava, cha.d.detvaa gacchanti, eva.m mayaapi ima.m puutikaaya.m anapekkhena cha.d.detvaa amatanibbaananagara.m pavisitu.m va.t.tati. yathaa ca naavikaa naama jajjara.m naava.m anapekkhaava cha.d.detvaa gacchanti, eva.m ahampi ima.m navahi va.namukhehi paggharanta.m kaaya.m cha.d.detvaa anapekkho nibbaanapura.m pavisissaami. yathaa ca puriso naanaaratanaani aadaaya corehi saddhi.m magga.m gacchanto attano ratananaasabhayena te cha.d.detvaa khema.m magga.m ga.nhaati, eva.m ayampi karajakaayo ratanavilopakacorasadiso. sacaaha.m ettha ta.nha.m karissaami, ariyamaggakusaladhammaratana.m me nassissati, tasmaa mayaa ima.m corasadisa.m kaaya.m cha.d.detvaa amatamahaanibbaananagara.m pavisitu.m va.t.tatii''ti. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``yathaapi ^a^M1.0007^ea^ ku.napa.m puriso, ka.n.the baddha.m jigucchiya.
[22] mocayitvaana gaccheyya, sukhii serii saya.mvasii..
[21] ``tathevima.m puutikaaya.m, naanaaku.napasa~ncaya.m.
[22] cha.d.dayitvaana gaccheyya.m, anapekkho anatthiko..
[21] ``yathaa uccaara.t.thaanamhi, kariisa.m naranaariyo.
[22] cha.d.dayitvaana gacchanti, anapekkhaa anatthikaa..
[21] ``evamevaaha.m ima.m kaaya.m, naanaaku.napapuurita.m.
[22] cha.d.dayitvaana gacchissa.m, vacca.m katvaa yathaa ku.ti.m..
[21] ``yathaapi ^a^V1.0008^ea^ jajjara.m naava.m, palugga.m udagaahini.m.
[22] saamii cha.d.detvaa gacchanti, anapekkhaa anatthikaa..
[21] ``evamevaaha.m ima.m kaaya.m, navacchidda.m dhuvassava.m.
[22] cha.d.dayitvaana gacchissa.m, ji.n.nanaava.mva saamikaa..
[21] ``yathaapi ^a^P0.0007^ea^ puriso corehi, gacchanto bha.n.damaadiya.
[22] bha.n.dacchedabhaya.m disvaa, cha.d.dayitvaana gacchati..
[21] ``evameva aya.m kaayo, mahaacorasamo viya.
[22] pahaayima.m gamissaami, kusalacchedanaa bhayaa''ti..

[03] eva.m sumedhapa.n.dito naanaavidhaahi upamaahi ima.m nekkhammuupasa.mhita.m attha.m cintetvaa sakanivesane aparimitabhogakkhandha.m he.t.thaa vuttanayena kapa.naddhikaadiina.m vissajjetvaa mahaadaana.m datvaa vatthukaame ca kilesakaame ca pahaaya amaranagarato nikkhamitvaa ekakova himavante ^b^dhammika.m^eb^ naama pabbata.m nissaaya assama.m katvaa tattha pa.n.nasaala~nca ca"nkama~nca maapetvaa pa~ncahi niivara.nadosehi vajjita.m ``eva.m samaahite citte''tiaadinaa nayena vuttehi a.t.thahi kaara.nagu.nehi samupeta.m abhi~n~naasa"nkhaata.m bala.m aaharitu.m tasmi.m assamapade navadosasamannaagata.m saa.taka.m pajahitvaa, dvaadasagu.nasamannaagata.m vaakaciira.m nivaasetvaa, isipabbajja.m pabbaji. eva.m pabbajito a.t.thadosasamaaki.n.na.m ta.m pa.n.nasaala.m pahaaya dasagu.nasamannaagata.m rukkhamuula.m upagantvaa sabba.m dha~n~navikati.m pahaaya pavattaphalabhojano hutvaa nisajja.t.thaanaca"nkamanavaseneva ^a^M1.0008^ea^ padhaana.m padahanto sattaahabbhantareyeva a.t.thanna.m samaapattiina.m pa~ncanna~nca abhi~n~naana.m laabhii ahosi. eva.m ta.m yathaapatthita.m abhi~n~naabala.m paapu.ni. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``evaaha.m cintayitvaana, nekako.tisata.m dhana.m.
[22] naathaanaathaana.m datvaana, himavantamupaagami.m..
[21] ``himavantassaaviduure, dhammiko naama pabbato.
[22] assamo sukato mayha.m, pa.n.nasaalaa sumaapitaa..
[21] ``ca"nkama.m ^a^V1.0009^ea^ tattha maapesi.m, pa~ncadosavivajjita.m.
[22] a.t.thagu.nasamupeta.m, abhi~n~naabalamaahari.m..
[21] ``saa.taka.m pajahi.m tattha, navadosamupaagata.m.
[22] vaakaciira.m nivaasesi.m, dvaadasagu.namupaagata.m..
[21] ``a.t.thadosasamaaki.n.na.m, pajahi.m pa.n.nasaalaka.m.
[22] upaagami.m rukkhamuula.m, gu.ne dasahupaagata.m..
[21] ``vaapita.m ^a^P0.0008^ea^ ropita.m dha~n~na.m, pajahi.m niravasesato.
[22] anekagu.nasampanna.m, pavattaphalamaadiyi.m..
[21] ``tatthappadhaana.m padahi.m, nisajja.t.thaanaca"nkame.
[22] abbhantaramhi sattaahe, abhi~n~naabala paapu.ni''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^``assamo sukato mayha.m, pa.n.nasaalaa sumaapitaa''^eb^ti imaaya pana paa.liyaa sumedhapa.n.ditena assamapa.n.nasaalaca"nkamaa sahatthaa maapitaa viya vuttaa. aya.m panettha attho -- mahaasatta~nhi ``himavanta.m ajjhogaahetvaa ajja dhammikapabbata.m pavisissatii''ti disvaa sakko vissakammadevaputta.m aamantesi -- ``taata, aya.m sumedhapa.n.dito `pabbajissaamii'ti nikkhanto, etassa vasana.t.thaana.m maapehii''ti. so tassa vacana.m sampa.ticchitvaa rama.niiya.m assama.m, sugutta.m pa.n.nasaala.m, manorama.m ca"nkama~nca maapesi. bhagavaa pana tadaa attano pu~n~naanubhaavena nipphanna.m ta.m assamapada.m sandhaaya ``saariputta, tasmi.m dhammikapabbate --
[21] ``assamo ^a^M1.0009^ea^ sukato mayha.m, pa.n.nasaalaa sumaapitaa.
[22] ca"nkama.m tattha maapesi.m, pa~ncadosavivajjita'''nti.. --
[25] aaha. tattha ^b^sukato mayha^eb^nti su.t.thu kato mayaa. ^b^pa.n.nasaalaa sumaapitaa^eb^ti pa.n.nacchadanasaalaapi me sumaapitaa ahosi.

[01] ^b^pa~ncadosavivajjita^eb^nti pa~ncime ca"nkamadosaa naama thaddhavisamataa, antorukkhataa, gahanacchannataa ^a^V1.0010^ea^, atisambaadhataa, ativisaalataati. thaddhavisamabhuumibhaagasmi~nhi ca"nkame ca"nkamantassa paadaa rujjanti, pho.taa u.t.thahanti, citta.m ekaggata.m na labhati, kamma.t.thaana.m vipajjati. mudusamatale pana phaasuvihaara.m aagamma kamma.t.thaana.m sampajjati. tasmaa thaddhavisamabhuumibhaagataa eko dosoti veditabbo. ca"nkamassa anto vaa majjhe vaa ko.tiya.m vaa rukkhe sati pamaadamaagamma ca"nkamantassa nalaa.ta.m vaa siisa.m vaa pa.tiha~n~natiiti antorukkhataa dutiyo doso. ti.nalataadigahanacchanne ca"nkame ca"nkamanto andhakaaravelaaya.m uragaadike paa.ne akkamitvaa vaa maareti, tehi vaa da.t.tho dukkha.m aapajjatiiti gahanacchannataa tatiyo doso. atisambaadhe ca"nkame vitthaarato ratanike vaa a.d.dharatanike vaa ca"nkamantassa paricchede pakkhalitvaa nakhaapi a"nguliyopi bhijjantiiti atisambaadhataa catuttho doso. ativisaale ca"nkame ca"nkamantassa citta.m ^a^P0.0009^ea^ vidhaavati, ekaggata.m na labhatiiti ativisaalataa pa~ncamo doso. puthulato pana diya.d.dharatana.m dviisu passesu ratanamatta.m anuca"nkama.m diighato sa.t.thihattha.m mudutala.m samavippaki.n.navaaluka.m ca"nkama.m va.t.tati ^b^cetiyagiri^eb^mhi diipappasaadakamahaa^b^mahinda^eb^ttherassa ca"nkama.m viya, taadisa.m ta.m ahosi. tenaaha -- ``ca"nkama.m tattha maapesi.m, pa~ncadosavivajjita''nti.

[03] ^b^a.t.thagu.nasamupeta^eb^nti a.t.thahi sama.nasukhehi upeta.m. a.t.thimaani sama.nasukhaani naama dhanadha~n~napariggahaabhaavo, anavajjapi.n.dapaatapariyesanabhaavo, nibbutapi.n.dapaatabhu~njanabhaavo, ra.t.tha.m pii.letvaa dhanasaara.m vaa siisakahaapa.naadiini vaa ga.nhantesu raajakulesu ra.t.thapii.lanakilesaabhaavo, upakara.nesu nicchandaraagabhaavo, coravilope nibbhayabhaavo, raajaraajamahaamattehi asa.msa.t.thabhaavo, catuusu disaasu appa.tihatabhaavoti ^a^M1.0010^ea^. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- ``yathaa tasmi.m assame vasantena sakkaa honti imaani a.t.tha sukhaani vinditu.m, eva.m a.t.thagu.nasamupeta.m ta.m assama.m maapesi''nti.

[03] ^b^abhi~n~naabalamaahari^eb^nti pacchaa tasmi.m assame vasanto kasi.naparikamma.m katvaa abhi~n~naana~nca samaapattiina~nca uppaadanatthaaya aniccato ca dukkhato ca vipassana.m aarabhitvaa thaamappatta.m vipassanaabala.m aahari.m. yathaa tasmi.m vasanto ta.m bala.m aaharitu.m sakkomi, eva.m ta.m assama.m abhi~n~natthaaya vipassanaabalassa anucchavika.m katvaa maapesinti attho.

[03] ^b^saa.taka.m pajahi.m tattha, navadosamupaagata^eb^nti etthaaya.m anupubbikathaa. tadaa kira ku.tile.naca"nkamaadipa.tima.n.dita.m pupphuupagaphaluupagarukkhasa~nchanna.m rama.niiya.m madhurasalilaasaya.m apagatavaa.lamigabhi.msanakasaku.na.m pavivekakkhama.m assama.m maapetvaa ala"nkataca"nkamassa ubhosu antesu aalambanaphalaka.m sa.mvidhaaya nisiidanatthaaya ca"nkamavemajjhe samatala.m muggava.n.nasila.m maapetvaa anto pa.n.nasaalaaya ^a^V1.0011^ea^ ja.taama.n.dalavaakaciiratida.n.daku.n.dikaadike taapasaparikkhaare ma.n.dape paaniiyagha.tapaaniiyasa"nkhapaaniiyasaraavaani, aggisaalaaya.m a"ngaarakapalladaaruaadiiniiti eva.m ya.m ya.m pabbajitaana.m upakaaraaya sa.mvattati, ta.m sabba.m maapetvaa pa.n.nasaalaaya bhittiya.m -- ``ye keci pabbajitukaamaa ime parikkhaare gahetvaa pabbajantuu''ti akkharaani chinditvaa devalokameva gate vissakammadevaputte sumedhapa.n.dito himavantapaade girikandaraanusaarena attano nivaasaanuruupa.m phaasuka.t.thaana.m olokento nadiinivattane vissakammanimmita.m sakkadattiya.m rama.niiya.m assama.m disvaa ca"nkamanako.ti.m gantvaa padava.la~nja.m apassanto ``dhuva.m pabbajitaa dhuragaame bhikkha.m pariyesitvaa kilantaruupaa aagantvaa pa.n.nasaala.m ^a^P0.0010^ea^ pavisitvaa nisinnaa bhavissantii''ti cintetvaa thoka.m aagametvaa ``ativiya ciraayanti, jaanissaamii''ti pa.n.nasaaladvaara.m vivaritvaa anto pavisitvaa ito cito ca olokento mahaabhittiya.m akkharaani vaacetvaa ``mayha.m kappiyaparikkhaaraa ete, ime gahetvaa pabbajissaamii''ti attanaa nivatthapaaruta.m saa.takayuga.m pajahi. tenaaha ``saa.taka.m pajahi.m tatthaa''ti. eva.m pavi.t.tho aha.m, saariputta, tassa.m pa.n.nasaalaaya.m saa.taka.m pajahi.m.

[03] ^b^navadosamupaagata^eb^nti ^a^M1.0011^ea^ saa.taka.m pajahanto nava dose disvaa pajahinti diipeti. taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitaana~nhi saa.takasmi.m nava dosaa upa.t.thahanti. mahagghabhaavo eko doso, parapa.tibaddhataaya uppajjanabhaavo eko, paribhogena lahu.m kilissanabhaavo eko, kili.t.tho hi dhovitabbo ca rajitabbo ca hoti, paribhogena jiira.nabhaavo eko, ji.n.nassa hi tunna.m vaa agga.ladaana.m vaa kaatabba.m hoti, puna pariyesanaaya durabhisambhavabhaavo eko, taapasapabbajjaaya asaaruppabhaavo eko, paccatthikaana.m saadhaara.nabhaavo eko, yathaa hi na.m paccatthikaa na ga.nhanti, eva.m gopetabbo hoti, paribhu~njantassa vibhuusana.t.thaanabhaavo eko, gahetvaa vicarantassa khandhabhaaramahicchabhaavo ekoti.

[03] ^b^vaakaciira.m nivaasesi^eb^nti tadaaha.m, saariputta, ime nava dose disvaa saa.taka.m pahaaya vaakaciira.m nivaasesi.m, mu~njati.na.m hiira.m hiira.m katvaa ganthetvaa kata.m vaakaciira.m nivaasanapaarupanatthaaya aadiyinti attho.

[03] ^b^dvaadasa gu.namupaagata^eb^nti dvaadasahi aanisa.msehi samannaagata.m. vaakaciirasmi~nhi dvaadasa aanisa.msaa -- appaggha.m sundara.m kappiyanti aya.m taava eko aanisa.mso, sahatthaa kaatu.m sakkaati aya.m dutiyo, paribhogena sa.nika.m kilissati, dhoviyamaanepi papa~nco natthiiti aya.m tatiyo, paribhogena ji.n.nepi sibbitabbaabhaavo catuttho, puna pariyesantassa sukhena kara.nabhaavo ^a^V1.0012^ea^ pa~ncamo, taapasapabbajjaaya saaruppabhaavo cha.t.tho, paccatthikaana.m nirupabhogabhaavo sattamo, paribhu~njantassa vibhuusana.t.thaanaabhaavo a.t.thamo, dhaara.ne sallahukabhaavo navamo, ciivarapaccaye appicchabhaavo dasamo, vaakuppattiyaa dhammikaanavajjabhaavo ekaadasamo, vaakaciire na.t.thepi anapekkhabhaavo dvaadasamoti.

[03] ^b^a.t.thadosasamaaki.n.na.m, pajahi.m pa.n.nasaalaka^eb^nti katha.m pajahi.m? so kira varasaa.takayuga.m omu~ncanto ciivarava.mse laggita.m anojapupphadaamasadisa.m ratta.m vaakaciira.m gahetvaa nivaasetvaa tassuupari apara.m suva.n.nava.n.na.m vaakaciira.m paridahitvaa punnaagapupphasantharasadisa.m sakhura.m ajinacamma.m eka.msa.m katvaa ja.taama.n.dala.m ^a^M1.0012^ea^ pa.timu~ncitvaa cuu.laaya ^a^P0.0011^ea^ saddhi.m niccalabhaavakara.nattha.m saarasuuci.m pavesetvaa muttaajaalasadisaaya sikkaaya pavaa.lava.n.na.m ku.n.dika.m odahitvaa tiisu .thaanesu va"nka.m kaaja.m aadaaya ekissaa kaajako.tiyaa ku.n.dika.m, ekissaa a"nkusapacchitida.n.dakaadiini olaggetvaa khaarikaaja.m a.mse katvaa dakkhi.nena hatthena kattarada.n.da.m gahetvaa pa.n.nasaalato nikkhamitvaa sa.t.thihatthe mahaaca"nkame aparaapara.m ca"nkamanto attano vesa.m oloketvaa -- ``mayha.m manoratho matthaka.m patto, sobhati vata me pabbajjaa, buddhapaccekabuddhaadiihi sabbehi dhiirapurisehi va.n.nitaa thomitaa aya.m pabbajjaa naama, pahiina.m me gihibandhana.m, nikkhantosmi nekkhamma.m, laddhaa me uttamapabbajjaa, karissaami sama.nadhamma.m, labhissaami maggaphalasukha''nti ussaahajaato khaarikaaja.m otaaretvaa ca"nkamavemajjhe muggava.n.nasilaapa.t.te suva.n.napa.timaa viya nisinno divasabhaaga.m viitinaametvaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.n.nasaala.m pavisitvaa bidalama~ncakapasse ka.t.thattharikaaya nipanno sariira.m utu.m gaahaapetvaa balavapaccuuse pabujjhitvaa attano aagamana.m aavajjesi -- ``aha.m gharaavaase aadiinava.m disvaa amitabhoga.m anantayasa.m pahaaya ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa nekkhammagavesako hutvaa pabbajito. ito daani pa.t.thaaya pamaadacaara.m caritu.m na va.t.tati, paviveka~nhi pahaaya vicaranta.m micchaavitakkamakkhikaa khaadanti, idaani mayaa vivekamanubruuhetu.m va.t.tati, aha~nhi gharaavaasa.m palibodhato disvaa nikkhanto, aya~nca manaapaa pa.n.nasaalaa, beluvapakkava.n.naa paribha.n.dakataa bhuumi, rajatava.n.naa setabhittiyo, kapotapaadava.n.na.m pa.n.nacchadana.m, vicittatthara.nava.n.no bidalama~ncako, nivaasaphaasuka.m vasana.t.thaana.m, na etto atirekataraa viya me gehasampadaa pa~n~naayatii''ti pa.n.nasaalaaya dose vicinanto a.t.tha dose passi.

[03] pa.n.nasaalaparibhogasmi~nhi a.t.tha aadiinavaa -- mahaasamaarambhena dabbasambhaare samodhaanetvaa kara.napariyesanabhaavo eko aadiinavo, ti.napa.n.namattikaasu patitaasu taasa.m punappuna.m .thapetabbataaya nibaddhajagganabhaavo dutiyo, senaasana.m naama mahallakassa paapu.naati, avelaaya vu.t.thaapiyamaanassa ^a^V1.0013^ea^ cittekaggataa na hotiiti u.t.thaapaniiyabhaavo tatiyo, siitu.nhaadipa.tighaatena kaayassa sukhumaalakara.nabhaavo catuttho ^a^M1.0013^ea^, geha.m pavi.t.thena ya.mki~nci paapa.m sakkaa kaatunti garahaapa.ticchaadanabhaavo pa~ncamo, ``mayha''nti pariggahakara.nabhaavo cha.t.tho, gehassa atthibhaavo naamesa sadutiyakavaaso viyaati sattamo, uukaama"ngulagharago.likaadiina.m saadhaara.nataaya bahusaadhaara.nabhaavo a.t.thamo. iti ^a^P0.0012^ea^ ime a.t.tha aadiinave disvaa mahaasatto pa.n.nasaala.m pajahi. tenaaha -- ``a.t.thadosasamaaki.n.na.m, pajahi.m pa.n.nasaalaka''nti.

[03] ^b^upaagami.m rukkhamuula.m, gu.ne dasahupaagata^eb^nti channa.m pa.tikkhipitvaa dasahi gu.nehi upeta.m rukkhamuula.m upagatosmiiti vadati. tatrime dasa gu.naa -- appasamaarambhataa eko gu.no, upagamanamattakameva hi tattha hotiiti. appa.tijagganataa dutiyo, ta~nhi samma.t.thampi asamma.t.thampi paribhogaphaasuka.m hotiyeva. anu.t.thaapaniiyabhaavo tatiyo. garaha.m nappa.ticchaadeti, tattha hi paapa.m karonto lajjatiiti garahaaya appa.ticchannabhaavo catuttho. abbhokaasavaaso viya kaaya.m na santhambhetiiti kaayassa asanthambhanabhaavo pa~ncamo, pariggahakara.naabhaavo cha.t.tho, gehaalayapa.tikkhepo sattamo. bahusaadhaara.ne gehe viya ``pa.tijaggissaami na.m, nikkhamathaa''ti niihara.nakaabhaavo a.t.thamo, vasantassa sappiitikabhaavo navamo, rukkhamuulasenaasanassa gatagata.t.thaane sulabhataaya anapekkhabhaavo dasamoti ime dasagu.ne disvaa rukkhamuula.m upagatosmiiti vadati.

[03] imaani hi ettakaani kaara.naani sallakkhetvaa mahaasatto punadivase bhikkhaaya gaama.m paavisi. athassa sampattagaame manussaa mahantena ussaahena bhikkha.m ada.msu. so bhattakicca.m ni.t.thaapetvaa assama.m aagamma nisiiditvaa cintesi -- ``naaha.m `aahaara.m labhaamii'ti pabbajito, siniddhaahaaro naamesa maanamadapurisamade va.d.dheti, aahaaramuulakassa ca dukkhassa anto natthi, ya.mnuunaaha.m vaapitaropitadha~n~nanibbattaka.m aahaara.m pajahitvaa pavattaphalabhojano bhaveyya''nti. so tato pa.t.thaaya tathaa katvaa gha.tento vaayamanto sattaahabbhantareyeva a.t.tha samaapattiyo pa~nca ca abhi~n~naayo nibbattesi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``vaapita.m ropita.m dha~n~na.m, pajahi.m niravasesato.
[22] anekagu.nasampanna.m, pavattaphalamaadiyi.m..
[21] ``tatthappadhaana.m ^a^M1.0014^ea^ padahi.m, nisajja.t.thaanaca"nkame.
[22] abbhantaramhi sattaahe, abhi~n~naabala paapu.ni''nti..

[03] eva.m ^a^V1.0014^ea^ abhi~n~naabala.m patvaa sumedhataapase samaapattisukhena viitinaamente ^b^diipa"nkaro^eb^ naama satthaa loke udapaadi. tassa pa.tisandhijaatibodhi dhammacakkappavattanesu sakalaapi dasasahassilokadhaatu ^a^P0.0013^ea^ sa"nkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, mahaavirava.m ravi, dvatti.msa pubbanimittaani paaturahesu.m. sumedhataapaso samaapattisukhena viitinaamento neva ta.m saddamassosi, na ca taani nimittaani addasa. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``eva.m me siddhippattassa, vasiibhuutassa saasane.
[22] diipa"nkaro naama jino, uppajji lokanaayako..
[21] ``uppajjante ca jaayante, bujjhante dhammadesane.
[22] caturo nimitte naaddasa.m, jhaanaratisamappito''ti..

[03] tasmi.m kaale ^b^diipa"nkara^eb^dasabalo catuuhi khii.naasavasatasahassehi parivuto anupubbena caarika.m caramaano ^b^ramma.m^eb^ naama nagara.m patvaa ^b^sudassana^eb^mahaavihaare pa.tivasati. rammanagaravaasino ``diipa"nkaro kira sama.nissaro paramaabhisambodhi.m patvaa pavattavaradhammacakko anupubbena caarika.m caramaano amhaaka.m rammanagara.m patvaa sudassanamahaavihaare pa.tivasatii''ti sutvaa sappinavaniitaadiini ceva bhesajjaani vatthacchaadanaani ca gaahaapetvaa gandhamaalaadihatthaa yena buddho, yena dhammo, yena sa"ngho, tanninnaa tappo.naa tappabbhaaraa hutvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa gandhamaalaadiihi puujetvaa ekamanta.m nisinnaa dhammadesana.m sutvaa svaatanaaya nimantetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.msu.

[03] te punadivase mahaadaana.m sajjetvaa nagara.m ala"nkaritvaa dasabalassa aagamanamagga.m ala"nkarontaa udakabhinna.t.thaanesu pa.msu.m pakkhipitvaa sama.m bhuumitala.m katvaa rajatapa.t.tava.n.na.m vaaluka.m aakiranti, laaje ceva pupphaani ca vikiranti, naanaaviraagehi vatthehi dhajapa.taake ussaapenti, kadaliyo ceva pu.n.nagha.tapantiyo ca pati.t.thaapenti. tasmi.m kaale sumedhataapaso attano assamapadaa aakaasa.m uggantvaa, tesa.m manussaana.m uparibhaagena aakaasena gacchanto te ha.t.thatu.t.the manusse disvaa ``ki.m nu kho kaara.na''nti ^a^M1.0015^ea^ aakaasato oruyha ekamanta.m .thito manusse pucchi -- ``ambho, kassa tumhe idha visama.m magga.m ala"nkarothaa''ti? tena vutta.m --
[21] ``paccantadesavisaye ^a^V1.0015^ea^, nimantetvaa tathaagata.m.
[22] tassa aagamana.m magga.m, sodhenti tu.t.thamaanasaa..
[21] ``aha.m tena samayena, nikkhamitvaa sakassamaa.
[22] dhunanto vaakaciiraani, gacchaami ambare tadaa..
[21] ``vedajaata.m ^a^P0.0014^ea^ jana.m disvaa, tu.t.thaha.t.tha.m pamodita.m.
[22] orohitvaana gaganaa, manusse pucchi taavade..
[21] ```tu.t.thaha.t.tho pamudito, vedajaato mahaajano.
[22] kassa sodhiiyati maggo, a~njasa.m va.tumaayana'''nti..

[03] manussaa aaha.msu -- ``bhante sumedha, na tva.m jaanaasi, diipa"nkaro dasabalo sammaasambuddho sambodhi.m patvaa pavattavaradhammacakko caarika.m caramaano amhaaka.m nagara.m patvaa sudassanamahaavihaare pa.tivasati. maya.m ta.m bhagavanta.m nimantayimha, tasseta.m buddhassa bhagavato aagamanamagga.m ala"nkaromaa''ti. atha sumedhataapaso cintesi -- ``buddhoti kho ghosamattakampi loke dullabha.m, pageva buddhuppaado, mayaapi imehi manussehi saddhi.m dasabalassa magga.m ala"nkaritu.m va.t.tatii''ti. so te manusse aaha -- ``sace, bho, tumhe eta.m magga.m buddhassa ala"nkarotha, mayhampi eka.m okaasa.m detha, ahampi tumhehi saddhi.m magga.m ala"nkarissaamii''ti. te ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa ``sumedhataapaso iddhimaa''ti jaanantaa udakabhinnokaasa.m sallakkhetvaa -- ``tva.m ima.m .thaana.m ala"nkarohii''ti ada.msu. sumedho buddhaaramma.na.m piiti.m gahetvaa cintesi -- ``aha.m ima.m okaasa.m iddhiyaa ala"nkaritu.m pahomi, eva.m ala"nkato na ma.m paritosessati, ajja mayaa kaayaveyyaavacca.m kaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti pa.msu.m aaharitvaa tasmi.m padese pakkhipi.

[03] tassa tasmi.m padese ani.t.thiteyeva diipa"nkaradasabalo mahaanubhaavaana.m cha.labhi~n~naana.m khii.naasavaana.m catuuhi satasahassehi parivuto devataasu dibbagandhamaalaadiihi puujayantaasu dibbaturiyehi vajjantaasu dibbasa"ngiitesu pavattentesu manussesu maanusakehi gandhamaalaadiihi ceva turiyehi ^a^M1.0016^ea^ ca puujayantesu anopamaaya buddhaliilaaya manosilaatale vijambhamaano siiho viya ta.m ala"nkatapa.tiyatta.m magga.m pa.tipajji. sumedhataapaso akkhiini ummiiletvaa ala"nkatamaggena aagacchantassa dasabalassa dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.napa.tima.n.dita.m asiitiyaa anubya~njanehi ^a^V1.0016^ea^ anura~njita.m byaamappabhaaya samparivaarita.m ma.niva.n.nagaganatale naanappakaaraa vijjulataa viya aave.laave.labhuutaa ceva yuga.layuga.labhuutaa ca chabba.n.naghanabuddharasmiyo vissajjenta.m ruupasobhaggappatta.m attabhaava.m oloketvaa -- ``ajja mayaa dasabalassa jiivitapariccaaga.m kaatu.m va.t.tati, maa bhagavaa kalala.m akkami, ma.niphalakasetu.m ^a^P0.0015^ea^ pana akkamanto viya saddhi.m catuuhi khii.naasavasatasahassehi mama pi.t.thi.m maddamaano gacchatu, ta.m me bhavissati diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti kese mocetvaa ajinacammaja.taama.n.dalavaakaciiraani kaa.lava.n.ne kalale pattharitvaa ma.niphalakasetu viya kalalapi.t.the nipajji. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``te me pu.t.thaa viyaaka.msu, `buddho loke anuttaro.
[27] diipa"nkaro naama jino, uppajji lokanaayako.
[22] tassa sodhiiyati maggo, a~njasa.m va.tumaayana.m'..
[21] ``buddhotivacana.m sutvaana, piiti uppajji taavade.
[22] buddho buddhoti kathayanto, somanassa.m pavedayi.m..
[21] ``tattha .thatvaa vicintesi.m, tu.t.tho sa.mviggamaanaso.
[22] `idha biijaani ropissa.m, kha.no ve maa upaccagaa'..
[21] ``yadi buddhassa sodhetha, ekokaasa.m dadaatha me.
[22] ahampi sodhayissaami, a~njasa.m va.tumaayana.m..
[21] ``ada.msu te mamokaasa.m, sodhetu.m a~njasa.m tadaa.
[22] buddho buddhoti cintento, magga.m sodhemaha.m tadaa..
[21] ``ani.t.thite mamokaase, diipa"nkaro mahaamuni.
[27] catuuhi satasahassehi, cha.labhi~n~nehi taadihi.
[22] khii.naasavehi vimalehi, pa.tipajji a~njasa.m jino..
[21] ``paccuggamanaa ^a^M1.0017^ea^ vattanti, vajjanti bheriyo bahuu.
[22] aamoditaa naramaruu, saadhukaara.m pavattayu.m..
[21] ``devaa ^a^V1.0017^ea^ manusse passanti, manussaapi ca devataa.
[22] ubhopi te pa~njalikaa, anuyanti tathaagata.m..
[21] ``devaa dibbehi turiyehi, manussaa maanusehi ca.
[22] ubhopi te vajjayantaa, anuyanti tathaagata.m..
[21] ``dibba.m mandaarava.m puppha.m, paduma.m paarichattaka.m.
[22] disodisa.m okiranti, aakaasanabhagataa maruu..
[21] ``dibba.m candanacu.n.na~nca, varagandha~nca kevala.m.
[22] disodisa.m okiranti, aakaasanabhagataa maruu..
[21] ``campaka.m salala.m niipa.m, naagapunnaagaketaka.m.
[22] disodisa.m ukkhipanti, bhuumitalagataa naraa..
[21] ``kese mu~ncitvaaha.m tattha, vaakaciira~nca cammaka.m.
[22] kalale pattharitvaana, avakujjo nipajjaha.m..
[21] ``akkamitvaana ma.m buddho, saha sissehi gacchatu.
[22] maa na.m kalale akkamittha, hitaaya me bhavissatii''ti..

[03] so ^a^P0.0016^ea^ pana kalalapi.t.the nipannakova puna akkhiini ummiiletvaa diipa"nkaradasabalassa buddhasiri.m sampassamaano eva.m cintesi -- ``sace aha.m iccheyya.m, sabbakilese jhaapetvaa sa"nghanavako hutvaa rammanagara.m paviseyya.m, a~n~naatakavesena pana me kilese jhaapetvaa nibbaanappattiyaa kicca.m natthi, ya.mnuunaaha.m diipa"nkaradasabalo viya paramaabhisambodhi.m patvaa dhammanaava.m aaropetvaa mahaajana.m sa.msaarasaagaraa uttaaretvaa pacchaa parinibbaayeyya.m, ida.m mayha.m patiruupa''nti. tato a.t.tha dhamme samodhaanetvaa buddhabhaavaaya abhiniihaara.m katvaa nipajji. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``pathaviya.m nipannassa, eva.m me aasi cetaso.
[22] `icchamaano aha.m ajja, kilese jhaapaye mama..
[21] ```ki.m ^a^M1.0018^ea^ ^a^V1.0018^ea^ me a~n~naatavesena, dhamma.m sacchikatenidha.
[22] sabba~n~nuta.m paapu.nitvaa, buddho hessa.m sadevake..
[21] ```ki.m me ekena ti.n.nena, purisena thaamadassinaa.
[22] sabba~n~nuta.m paapu.nitvaa, santaaressa.m sadevaka.m..
[21] ```iminaa me adhikaarena, katena purisuttame.
[22] sabba~n~nuta.m paapu.nitvaa, taaremi janata.m bahu.m..
[21] ```sa.msaarasota.m chinditvaa, viddha.msetvaa tayo bhave.
[22] dhammanaava.m samaaruyha, santaaressa.m sadevaka'''nti..
[03] yasmaa pana buddhatta.m patthentassa --
[21] ``manussatta.m li"ngasampatti, hetu satthaaradassana.m.
[27] pabbajjaa gu.nasampatti, adhikaaro ca chandataa.
[22] a.t.thadhammasamodhaanaa, abhiniihaaro samijjhatii''ti..

[03] manussattabhaavasmi.myeva hi .thatvaa buddhatta.m patthentassa patthanaa samijjhati, naagassa vaa supa.n.nassa vaa devataaya vaa sakkassa vaa patthanaa no samijjhati. manussattabhaavepi purisali"nge .thitasseva patthanaa samijjhati, itthiyaa vaa pa.n.dakanapu.msakaubhatobya~njanakaana.m vaa no samijjhati. purisassapi tasmi.m attabhaave arahattappattiyaa hetusampannasseva patthanaa samijjhati, no itarassa. hetusampannassaapi jiivamaanabuddhasseva santike patthentasseva patthanaa samijjhati, parinibbute buddhe cetiyasantike vaa bodhimuule vaa patthentassa na samijjhati. buddhaana.m santike patthentassapi pabbajjaali"nge .thitasseva samijjhati, no gihili"nge .thitassa. pabbajitassapi ^a^P0.0017^ea^ pa~ncaabhi~n~naaa.t.thasamaapattilaabhinoyeva samijjhati, na imaaya gu.nasampattiyaa virahitassa. gu.nasampannenapi yena attano jiivita.m buddhaana.m pariccatta.m hoti, tasseva iminaa adhikaarena adhikaarasampannassa samijjhati, na itarassa. adhikaarasampannassaapi yassa buddhakaarakadhammaana.m atthaaya mahanto chando ca ussaaho ca vaayaamo ca pariye.t.thi ca, tasseva samijjhati, na itarassa.

[03] tatrida.m ^a^M1.0019^ea^ ^a^V1.0019^ea^ chandamahantataaya opamma.m -- sace hi evamassa yo sakalacakkavaa.lagabbha.m ekodakiibhuuta.m attano baahubalena uttaritvaa paara.m gantu.m samattho, so buddhatta.m paapu.naati. yo vaa pana sakalacakkavaa.lagabbha.m ve.lugumbasa~nchanna.m viyuuhitvaa madditvaa padasaa gacchanto paara.m gantu.m samattho, so buddhatta.m paapu.naati. yo vaa pana sakalacakkavaa.lagabbha.m sattiyo aako.tetvaa nirantara.m sattiphalasamaaki.n.na.m padasaa akkamamaano paara.m gantu.m samattho, so buddhatta.m paapu.naati. yo vaa pana sakalacakkavaa.lagabbha.m viitaccita"ngaarabharita.m paadehi maddamaano paara.m gantu.m samattho, so buddhatta.m paapu.naatiiti. yo etesu ekampi attano dukkara.m na ma~n~nati, ``aha.m etampi taritvaa vaa gantvaa vaa paara.m gamissaamii''ti eva.m mahantena chandena ca ussaahena ca vaayaamena ca pariye.t.thiyaa ca samannaagato hoti, etasseva patthanaa samijjhati, na itarassa. tasmaa sumedhataapaso ime a.t.tha dhamme samodhaanetvaava buddhabhaavaaya abhiniihaara.m katvaa nipajji.

[03] diipa"nkaropi bhagavaa aagantvaa sumedhataapasassa siisabhaage .thatvaa ma.nisiihapa~njara.m ugghaa.tento viya pa~ncava.n.napasaadasampannaani akkhiini ummiiletvaa kalalapi.t.the nipanna.m sumedhataapasa.m disvaa ``aya.m taapaso buddhattaaya abhiniihaara.m katvaa nipanno, samijjhissati nu kho etassa patthanaa, udaahu no''ti anaagata.msa~naa.na.m pesetvaa upadhaarento -- ``ito kappasatasahassaadhikaani cattaari asa"nkhyeyyaani atikkamitvaa aya.m gotamo naama buddho bhavissatii''ti ~natvaa .thitakova parisamajjhe byaakaasi -- ``passatha no tumhe ima.m uggatapa.m taapasa.m kalalapi.t.the nipanna''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''ti. aya.m buddhattaaya abhiniihaara.m katvaa nipanno, samijjhissati imassa patthanaa. aya~nhi ito kappasatasahassaadhikaana.m catunna.m asa"nkhayeyyaana.m matthake gotamo naama buddho bhavissati. tasmi.m panassa attabhaave kapilavatthu naama nagara.m nivaaso bhavissati, maayaa ^a^P0.0018^ea^ naama devii maataa, suddhodano naama raajaa pitaa, aggasaavako upatisso naama thero, dutiyasaavako kolito naama, buddhupa.t.thaako aanando naama, aggasaavikaa khemaa naama therii, dutiyasaavikaa uppalava.n.naa ^a^M1.0020^ea^ naama therii bhavissati. aya.m paripakka~naa.no mahaabhinikkhamana.m katvaa mahaapadhaana.m padahitvaa nigrodharukkhamuule paayaasa.m pa.tiggahetvaa nera~njaraaya tiire paribhu~njitvaa bodhima.n.da.m aaruyha assattharukkhamuule abhisambujjhissatiiti. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``diipa"nkaro lokaviduu, aahutiina.m pa.tiggaho.
[22] ussiisake ma.m .thatvaana, ida.m vacanamabravi..
[21] ```passatha ^a^V1.0020^ea^ ima.m taapasa.m, ja.tila.m uggataapana.m.
[22] aparimeyye ito kappe, buddho loke bhavissati..
[21] ```ahu kapilavhayaa rammaa, nikkhamitvaa tathaagato.
[22] padhaana.m padahitvaana, katvaa dukkarakaarika.m..
[21] ```ajapaalarukkhamuule, nisiiditvaa tathaagato.
[22] tattha paayaasa.m paggayha, nera~njaramupehiti..
[21] ```nera~njaraaya tiiramhi, paayaasa.m ada so jino.
[22] pa.tiyattavaramaggena, bodhimuulamupehiti..
[21] ```tato padakkhi.na.m katvaa, bodhima.n.da.m anuttaro.
[22] assattharukkhamuulamhi, bujjhissati mahaayaso..
[21] ```imassa janikaa maataa, maayaa naama bhavissati.
[22] pitaa suddhodano naama, aya.m hessati gotamo..
[21] ```anaasavaa viitaraagaa, santacittaa samaahitaa.
[27] kolito upatisso ca, aggaa hessanti saavakaa.
[22] aanando naamupa.t.thaako, upa.t.thissati ta.m jina.m..
[21] ```khemaa uppalava.n.naa ca, aggaa hessanti saavikaa.
[27] anaasavaa viitaraagaa, santacittaa samaahitaa.
[22] bodhi tassa bhagavato, assatthoti pavuccatii'''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.60-68).

[03] ta.m sutvaa sumedhataapaso -- ``mayha.m kira patthanaa samijjhissatii''ti somanassappatto ahosi. mahaajano diipa"nkaradasabalassa vacana.m sutvaa ``sumedhataapaso kira buddhabiija.m buddha"nkuro''ti ha.t.thatu.t.tho ^a^M1.0021^ea^ ahosi. eva~ncassa ahosi -- ``yathaa naama manussaa nadi.m tarantaa ujukena ^a^V1.0021^ea^ titthena uttaritu.m asakkontaa he.t.thaatitthena ^a^P0.0019^ea^ uttaranti, evameva mayampi diipa"nkaradasabalassa saasane maggaphala.m alabhamaanaa anaagate yadaa tva.m buddho bhavissasi, tadaa tava sammukhaa maggaphala.m sacchikaatu.m samatthaa bhaveyyaamaa''ti patthana.m .thapayi.msu. diipa"nkaradasabalopi bodhisatta.m pasa.msitvaa a.t.thapupphamu.t.thiihi puujetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. tepi catusatasahassasa"nkhaa khii.naasavaa bodhisatta.m gandhehi ca maalaahi ca puujetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkami.msu. devamanussaa pana tatheva puujetvaa vanditvaa pakkantaa.

[03] bodhisatto sabbesa.m pa.tikkantakaale sayanaa vu.t.thaaya ``paaramiyo vicinissaamii''ti puppharaasimatthake palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa nisiidi. eva.m nisinne bodhisatte sakaladasasahassacakkavaa.le devataa saadhukaara.m datvaa ``ayya sumedhataapasa, poraa.nakabodhisattaana.m palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa `paaramiyo vicinissaamaa'ti nisinnakaale yaani pubbanimittaani naama pa~n~naayanti, taani sabbaanipi ajja paatubhuutaani, nissa.msayena tva.m buddho bhavissasi. mayameta.m jaanaama `yassetaani nimittaani pa~n~naayanti, ekantena so buddho hoti', tva.m attano viiriya.m da.lha.m katvaa pagga.nhaa''ti bodhisatta.m naanappakaaraahi thutiihi abhitthavi.msu. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``ida.m sutvaana vacana.m, asamassa mahesino.
[22] aamoditaa naramaruu, buddhabiija.m kira aya.m..
[21] ``ukku.t.thisaddaa vattanti, appho.tenti hasanti ca.
[22] kata~njalii namassanti, dasasahassii sadevakaa..
[21] ``yadimassa lokanaathassa, virajjhissaama saasana.m.
[22] anaagatamhi addhaane, hessaama sammukhaa ima.m..
[21] ``yathaa manussaa nadi.m tarantaa, pa.titittha.m virajjhiya.
[22] he.t.thaa titthe gahetvaana, uttaranti mahaanadi.m..
[21] ``evameva maya.m sabbe, yadi mu~ncaamima.m jina.m.
[22] anaagatamhi addhaane, hessaama sammukhaa ima.m..
[21] ``diipa"nkaro ^a^M1.0022^ea^ ^a^V1.0022^ea^ lokaviduu, aahutiina.m pa.tiggaho.
[22] mama kamma.m pakittetvaa, dakkhi.na.m paadamuddhari..
[21] ``ye tatthaasu.m jinaputtaa, sabbe padakkhi.namaka.msu ma.m.
[22] naraa naagaa ca gandhabbaa, abhivaadetvaana pakkamu.m..
[21] ``dassana.m ^a^P0.0020^ea^ me atikkante, sasa"nghe lokanaayake.
[22] ha.t.thatu.t.thena cittena, aasanaa vu.t.thahi.m tadaa..
[21] ``sukhena sukhito homi, paamojjena pamodito.
[22] piitiyaa ca abhissanno, palla"nka.m aabhuji.m tadaa..
[21] ``palla"nkena nisiiditvaa, eva.m cintesaha.m tadaa.
[22] `vasiibhuuto aha.m jhaane, abhi~n~naapaarami.m gato..
[21] ```dasasahassilokamhi, isayo natthi me samaa.
[22] asamo iddhidhammesu, alabhi.m iidisa.m sukha.m'..
[21] ``palla"nkaabhujane mayha.m, dasasahassaadhivaasino.
[22] mahaanaada.m pavattesu.m, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``yaa pubbe bodhisattaana.m, palla"nkavaramaabhuje.
[22] nimittaani padissanti, taani ajja padissare..
[21] ``siita.m byaapagata.m hoti, u.nha~nca upasammati.
[22] taani ajja padissanti, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``dasasahassii lokadhaatuu, nissaddaa honti niraakulaa.
[22] taani ajja padissanti, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``mahaavaataa ^a^V1.0023^ea^ na vaayanti, na sandanti savantiyo.
[22] taani ajja padissanti, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``thalajaa dakajaa pupphaa, sabbe pupphanti taavade.
[22] tepajja pupphitaa sabbe, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``lataa vaa yadi vaa rukkhaa, phalabhaaraa honti taavade.
[22] tepajja phalitaa sabbe, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``aakaasa.t.thaa ^a^M1.0023^ea^ ca bhuuma.t.thaa, ratanaa jotanti taavade.
[22] tepajja ratanaa jotanti, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``maanusakaa ca dibbaa ca, turiyaa vajjanti taavade.
[22] tepajjubho abhiravanti, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``vicittapupphaa gaganaa, abhivassanti taavade.
[22] tepi ajja pavassanti, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``mahaasamuddo aabhujati, dasasahassii pakampati.
[22] tepajjubho abhiravanti, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``nirayepi dasasahasse, aggii nibbanti taavade.
[22] tepajja nibbutaa aggii, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``vimalo hoti suuriyo, sabbaa dissanti taarakaa.
[22] tepi ajja padissanti, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``anova.t.thena udaka.m, mahiyaa ubbhijji taavade.
[22] tampajjubbhijjate mahiyaa, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``taaraaga.naa ^a^V1.0024^ea^ virocanti, nakkhattaa gaganama.n.dale.
[22] visaakhaa ^a^P0.0021^ea^ candimaayuttaa, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``bilaasayaa dariisayaa, nikkhamanti sakaasayaa.
[22] tepajja aasayaa chuddhaa, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``na hoti arati sattaana.m, santu.t.thaa honti taavade.
[22] tepajja sabbe santu.t.thaa, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``rogaa tadupasammanti, jighacchaa ca vinassati.
[22] taanipajja padissanti, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``raago tadaa tanu hoti, doso moho vinassati.
[22] tepajja vigataa sabbe, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``bhaya.m tadaa na bhavati, ajjapeta.m padissati.
[22] tena li"ngena jaanaama, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``rajo ^a^M1.0024^ea^ nuddha.msati uddha.m, ajjapeta.m padissati.
[22] tena li"ngena jaanaama, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``ani.t.thagandho pakkamati, dibbagandho pavaayati.
[22] sopajja vaayati gandho, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``sabbe devaa padissanti, .thapayitvaa aruupino.
[22] tepajja sabbe dissanti, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``yaavataa nirayaa naama, sabbe dissanti taavade.
[22] tepajja sabbe dissanti, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``ku.t.taa ^a^V1.0025^ea^ kavaa.taa selaa ca, na hontaavara.naa tadaa.
[22] aakaasabhuutaa tepajja, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``cutii ca upapatti ca, kha.ne tasmi.m na vijjati.
[22] taanipajja padissanti, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasi..
[21] ``da.lha.m pagga.nha viiriya.m, maa nivatta abhikkama.
[22] mayampeta.m vijaanaama, dhuva.m buddho bhavissasii''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.70-107).

[03] bodhisatto diipa"nkaradasabalassa ca dasasahassacakkavaa.ladevataana~nca vacana.m sutvaa bhiyyosomattaaya sa~njaatussaaho hutvaa cintesi -- ``buddhaa naama amoghavacanaa, natthi buddhaana.m kathaaya a~n~nathatta.m. yathaa hi aakaase khittale.d.dussa patana.m dhuva.m, jaatassa mara.na.m, rattikkhaye suuriyuggamana.m, aasayaa nikkhantasiihassa siihanaadanadana.m, garugabbhaaya itthiyaa bhaaramoropana.m dhuva.m avassambhaavii, evameva buddhaana.m vacana.m naama dhuva.m amogha.m, addhaa aha.m buddho bhavissaamii''ti. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``buddhassa ^a^P0.0022^ea^ vacana.m sutvaa, dasasahassiina cuubhaya.m.
[22] tu.t.thaha.t.tho pamodito, eva.m cintesaha.m tadaa..
[21] ``advejjhavacanaa buddhaa, amoghavacanaa jinaa.
[22] vitatha.m natthi buddhaana.m, dhuva.m buddho bhavaamaha.m..
[21] ``yathaa khitta.m nabhe le.d.du, dhuva.m patati bhuumiya.m.
[21] tatheva buddhase.t.thaana.m, vacana.m dhuvasassata.m.
[22] vitatha.m natthi buddhaana.m, dhuva.m buddho bhavaamaha.m..
[21] ``yathaapi ^a^M1.0025^ea^ sabbasattaana.m, mara.na.m dhuvasassata.m.
[22] tatheva buddhase.t.thaana.m, vacana.m dhuvasassata.m..
[21] ``yathaa ^a^V1.0026^ea^ rattikkhaye patte, suuriyuggamana.m dhuva.m.
[22] tatheva buddhase.t.thaana.m, vacana.m dhuvasassata.m..
[21] ``yathaa nikkhantasayanassa, siihassa nadana.m dhuva.m.
[22] tatheva buddhase.t.thaana.m, vacana.m dhuvasassata.m..
[21] ``yathaa aapannasattaana.m, bhaaramoropana.m dhuva.m.
[22] tatheva buddhase.t.thaana.m, vacana.m dhuvasassata''nti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.108-114).

[03] so ``dhuvaaha.m buddho bhavissaamii''ti eva.m katasanni.t.thaano buddhakaarake dhamme upadhaaretu.m -- ``kaha.m nu kho buddhakaarakaa dhammaa, ki.m uddha.m, udaahu adho, disaavidisaasuu''ti anukkamena sakala.m dhammadhaatu.m vicinanto poraa.nakabodhisattehi aasevitanisevita.m pa.thama.m daanapaarami.m disvaa eva.m attaana.m ovadi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya pa.thama.m daanapaarami.m puureyyaasi. yathaa hi nikkujjito udakakumbho nissesa.m katvaa udaka.m vamatiyeva, na paccaaharati, evameva dhana.m vaa yasa.m vaa puttadaara.m vaa a"ngapacca"nga.m vaa anoloketvaa sampattayaacakaana.m sabba.m icchiticchita.m nissesa.m katvaa dadamaano bodhimuule nisiiditvaa buddho bhavissasii''ti pa.thama.m daanapaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``handa buddhakare dhamme, vicinaami ito cito.
[22] uddha.m adho dasa disaa, yaavataa dhammadhaatuyaa..
[21] ``vicinanto tadaa dakkhi.m, pa.thama.m daanapaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, anuci.n.na.m mahaapatha.m..
[21] ``ima.m tva.m pa.thama.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] daanapaaramita.m gaccha, yadi bodhi.m pattumicchasi..
[21] ``yathaapi kumbho sampu.n.no, yassa kassaci adhokato.
[22] vamatevudaka.m nissesa.m, na tattha parirakkhati..
[21] ``tatheva ^a^M1.0026^ea^ ^a^V1.0027^ea^ yaacake disvaa, hiinamukka.t.thamajjhime.
[22] dadaahi daana.m nissesa.m, kumbho viya adhokato''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.115-119).

[03] athassa ^a^P0.0023^ea^ ``na ettakeheva buddhakaarakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhaarayato dutiya.m siilapaarami.m disvaa etadahosi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya siilapaaramimpi puureyyaasi. yathaa hi camarii migo naama jiivita.m anoloketvaa attano vaalameva rakkhati, eva.m tvampi ito pa.t.thaaya jiivitampi anoloketvaa siilameva rakkhamaano buddho bhavissasii''ti dutiya.m siilapaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``na hete ettakaayeva, buddhadhammaa bhavissare.
[22] a~n~nepi vicinissaami, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa..
[21] ``vicinanto tadaa dakkhi.m, dutiya.m siilapaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, aasevitanisevita.m..
[21] ``ima.m tva.m dutiya.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] siilapaaramita.m gaccha, yadi bodhi.m pattumicchasi..
[21] ``yathaapi camarii vaala.m, kismi~nci pa.tilaggita.m.
[22] upeti mara.na.m tattha, na vikopeti vaaladhi.m..
[21] ``tatheva catuusu bhuumiisu, siilaani paripuuraya.
[22] parirakkha sadaa siila.m, camarii viya vaaladhi''nti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.120-124).

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakaarakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhaarayato tatiya.m nekkhammapaarami.m disvaa etadahosi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya nekkhammapaaramimpi puureyyaasi. yathaa hi cira.m bandhanaagaare vasamaano puriso na tattha sineha.m karoti, atha kho ukka.n.thatiyeva, avasitukaamo hoti, evameva tvampi sabbabhave bandhanaagaarasadise katvaa sabbabhavehi ^a^V1.0028^ea^ ukka.n.thito muccitukaamo hutvaa nekkhammaabhimukhova hohi. eva.m buddho bhavissasii''ti tatiya.m nekkhammapaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``na ^a^M1.0027^ea^ hete ettakaayeva, buddhadhammaa bhavissare.
[22] a~n~nepi vicinissaami, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa..
[21] ``vicinanto tadaa dakkhi.m, tatiya.m nekkhammapaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, aasevitanisevita.m..
[21] ``ima.m tva.m tatiya.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] nekkhammapaaramita.m gaccha, yadi bodhi.m pattumicchasi..
[21] ``yathaa andughare puriso, ciravuttho dukha.t.tito.
[22] na tattha raaga.m janeti, muttimeva gavesati..
[21] ``tatheva tva.m sabbabhave, passa andughara.m viya.
[22] nekkhammaabhimukho hohi, bhavato parimuttiyaa''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.125-129).

[03] athassa ^a^P0.0024^ea^ ``na ettakeheva buddhakaarakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhaarayato catuttha.m pa~n~naapaarami.m disvaa etadahosi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya pa~n~naapaaramimpi puureyyaasi. hiinamajjhimukka.t.thesu ka~nci avajjetvaa sabbepi pa.n.dite upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m puccheyyaasi. yathaa hi pi.n.dapaatiko bhikkhu hiinaadibhedesu kulesu ki~nci avajjetvaa pa.tipaa.tiyaa pi.n.daaya caranto khippa.m yaapana.m labhati, eva.m tvampi sabbapa.n.dite upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m pucchanto buddho bhavissasii''ti catuttha.m pa~n~naapaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``na hete ettakaayeva, buddhadhammaa bhavissare.
[22] a~n~nepi vicinissaami, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa..
[21] ``vicinanto ^a^V1.0029^ea^ tadaa dakkhi.m, catuttha.m pa~n~naapaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, aasevitanisevita.m..
[21] ``ima.m tva.m catuttha.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] pa~n~naapaaramita.m gaccha, yadi bodhi.m pattumicchasi..
[21] ``yathaapi bhikkhu bhikkhanto, hiinamukka.t.thamajjhime.
[22] kulaani na vivajjento, eva.m labhati yaapana.m..
[21] ``tatheva ^a^M1.0028^ea^ tva.m sabbakaala.m, paripuccha.m budha.m jana.m.
[22] pa~n~naapaaramita.m gantvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasii''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.130-134).

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakaarakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhaarayato pa~ncama.m viiriyapaarami.m disvaa etadahosi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya viiriyapaaramimpi puureyyaasi, yathaa hi siiho migaraajaa sabbiriyaapathesu da.lhaviiriyo hoti, eva.m tvampi sabbabhavesu sabbiriyaapathesu da.lhaviiriyo anoliinaviiriyo samaano buddho bhavissasii''ti pa~ncama.m viiriyapaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``na hete ettakaayeva, buddhadhammaa bhavissare.
[22] a~n~nepi vicinissaami, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa..
[21] ``vicinanto tadaa dakkhi.m, pa~ncama.m viiriyapaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, aasevitanisevita.m..
[21] ``ima.m tva.m pa~ncama.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] viiriyapaaramita.m gaccha, yadi bodhi.m pattumicchasi..
[21] ``yathaapi ^a^P0.0025^ea^ siiho migaraajaa, nisajja.t.thaanaca"nkame.
[22] aliinaviiriyo hoti, paggahitamano sadaa..
[21] ``tatheva ^a^V1.0030^ea^ tva.m sabbabhave, pagga.nha viiriya.m da.lha.m.
[22] viiriyapaaramita.m gantvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasii''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.135-139).

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakaarakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhaarayato cha.t.tha.m khantipaarami.m disvaa etadahosi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya khantipaaramimpi puureyyaasi, sammaananepi avamaananepi khamova bhaveyyaasi. yathaa hi pathaviya.m naama sucimpi nikkhipanti asucimpi, na tena pathavii sineha.m pa.tigha.m karoti, khamati sahati adhivaasetiyeva, evameva tvampi sammaananepi avamaananepi khamova samaano buddho bhavissasii''ti cha.t.tha.m khantipaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``na hete ettakaayeva, buddhadhammaa bhavissare.
[22] a~n~nepi vicinissaami, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa..
[21] ``vicinanto ^a^M1.0029^ea^ tadaa dakkhi.m, cha.t.thama.m khantipaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, aasevitanisevita.m..
[21] ``ima.m tva.m cha.t.thama.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] tattha advejjhamaanaso, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasi..
[21] ``yathaapi pathavii naama, sucimpi asucimpi ca.
[22] sabba.m sahati nikkhepa.m, na karoti pa.tigha.m tayaa..
[21] ``tatheva tvampi sabbesa.m, sammaanaavamaanakkhamo.
[22] khantipaaramita.m gantvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasii''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.140-144).

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakaarakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhaarayato sattama.m saccapaarami.m disvaa etadahosi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya saccapaaramimpi puureyyaasi, asaniyaa matthake patamaanaayapi dhanaadiina.m atthaaya chandaadiina.m vasena sampajaanamusaavaada.m naama maa bhaasi. yathaa hi osadhii taarakaa naama sabbautuusu attano gamanaviithi.m jahitvaa a~n~naaya viithiyaa ^a^V1.0031^ea^ na gacchati, sakaviithiyaava gacchati, evameva tvampi sacca.m pahaaya musaavaada.m naama avadantoyeva buddho bhavissasii''ti sattama.m saccapaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``na ^a^P0.0026^ea^ hete ettakaayeva, buddhadhammaa bhavissare.
[22] a~n~nepi vicinissaami, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa..
[21] ``vicinanto tadaa dakkhi.m, sattama.m saccapaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, aasevitanisevita.m..
[21] ``ima.m tva.m sattama.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] tattha advejjhavacano, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasi..
[21] ``yathaapi osadhii naama, tulaabhuutaa sadevake.
[22] samaye utuvasse vaa, na vokkamati viithito..
[21] ``tatheva tvampi saccesu, maa vokkamasi viithito.
[22] saccapaaramita.m gantvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasii''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.145-149).

[03] athassa ^a^M1.0030^ea^ ``na ettakeheva buddhakaarakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhaarayato a.t.thama.m adhi.t.thaanapaarami.m disvaa etadahosi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya adhi.t.thaanapaaramimpi puureyyaasi, ya.m adhi.t.thaasi, tasmi.m adhi.t.thaane niccalova bhaveyyaasi. yathaa hi pabbato naama sabbaasu disaasu vaatehi paha.to na kampati na calati, attano .thaaneyeva ti.t.thati, evameva tvampi attano adhi.t.thaane niccalo hontova buddho bhavissasii''ti a.t.thama.m adhi.t.thaanapaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``na hete ettakaayeva, buddhadhammaa bhavissare.
[22] a~n~nepi vicinissaami, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa..
[21] ``vicinanto ^a^V1.0032^ea^ tadaa dakkhi.m, a.t.thama.m adhi.t.thaanapaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, aasevitanisevita.m..
[21] ``ima.m tva.m a.t.thama.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] tattha tva.m acalo hutvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasi..
[21] ``yathaapi pabbato selo, acalo suppati.t.thito.
[22] na kampati bhusavaatehi, saka.t.thaaneva ti.t.thati..
[21] ``tatheva tvampi adhi.t.thaane, sabbadaa acalo bhava.
[22] adhi.t.thaanapaaramita.m gantvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasii''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.150-154).

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakaarakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhaarayato navama.m mettaapaarami.m disvaa etadahosi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya mettaapaaramimpi puureyyaasi, hitesupi ahitesupi ekacitto bhaveyyaasi. yathaa hi udaka.m naama paapajanassapi kalyaa.najanassapi siitabhaava.m ekasadisa.m katvaa ^a^P0.0027^ea^ pharati, evameva tvampi sabbesu sattesu mettacittena ekacittova honto buddho bhavissasii''ti navama.m mettaapaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``na hete ettakaayeva, buddhadhammaa bhavissare.
[22] a~n~nepi vicinissaami, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa..
[21] ``vicinanto tadaa dakkhi.m, navama.m mettaapaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, aasevitanisevita.m..
[21] ``ima.m ^a^M1.0031^ea^ tva.m navama.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] mettaaya asamo hohi, yadi bodhi.m pattumicchasi..
[21] ``yathaapi ^a^V1.0033^ea^ udaka.m naama, kalyaa.ne paapake jane.
[22] sama.m pharati siitena, pavaaheti rajomala.m..
[21] ``tatheva tvampi hitaahite, sama.m mettaaya bhaavaya.
[22] mettaapaaramita.m gantvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasii''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.155-159).

[03] athassa ``na ettakeheva buddhakaarakadhammehi bhavitabba''nti uttarimpi upadhaarayato dasama.m upekkhaapaarami.m disvaa etadahosi -- ``sumedhapa.n.dita, tva.m ito pa.t.thaaya upekkhaapaaramimpi puureyyaasi, sukhepi dukkhepi majjhattova bhaveyyaasi. yathaa hi pathavii naama sucimpi asucimpi pakkhipamaane majjhattaava hoti, evameva tvampi sukhadukkhesu majjhattova honto buddho bhavissasii''ti dasama.m upekkhaapaarami.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``na hete ettakaayeva, buddhadhammaa bhavissare.
[22] a~n~nepi vicinissaami, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa..
[21] ``vicinanto tadaa dakkhi.m, dasama.m upekkhaapaarami.m.
[22] pubbakehi mahesiihi, aasevitanisevita.m..
[21] ``ima.m tva.m dasama.m taava, da.lha.m katvaa samaadiya.
[22] tulaabhuuto da.lho hutvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasi..
[21] ``yathaapi pathavii naama, nikkhitta.m asuci.m suci.m.
[22] upekkhati ubhopete, kopaanunayavajjitaa..
[21] ``tatheva tvampi sukhadukkhe, tulaabhuuto sadaa bhava.
[22] upekkhaapaaramita.m gantvaa, sambodhi.m paapu.nissasii''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.160-164).

[01] tato ^a^P0.0028^ea^ cintesi -- ``imasmi.m loke bodhisattehi puuretabbaa bodhiparipaacanaa buddhakaarakadhammaa ettakaayeva ^a^V1.0034^ea^, dasa paaramiyo .thapetvaa a~n~ne natthi. imaapi dasa paaramiyo uddha.m aakaasepi natthi, he.t.thaa pathaviyampi, puratthimaadiisu disaasupi natthi, mayha.myeva pana hadayabbhantare pati.t.thitaa''ti. eva.m taasa.m hadaye pati.t.thitabhaava.m disvaa sabbaapi taa da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaaya ^a^M1.0032^ea^ punappuna.m sammasanto anulomapa.tiloma.m sammasati, pariyante gahetvaa aadi.m paapeti, aadimhi gahetvaa pariyanta.m paapeti, majjhe gahetvaa ubhato ko.ti.m paapetvaa osaapeti, ubhato ko.tiisu gahetvaa majjha.m paapetvaa osaapeti. baahirakabha.n.dapariccaago ^b^daanapaaramii^eb^ naama, a"ngapariccaago ^b^daanaupapaaramii^eb^ naama, jiivitapariccaago ^b^daanaparamatthapaaramii^eb^ naamaati dasa paaramiyo dasa upapaaramiyo dasa paramatthapaaramiyoti samatti.msa paaramiyo telayanta.m viniva.t.tento viya mahaameru.m mattha.m katvaa cakkavaa.lamahaasamudda.m aalu.lento viya ca sammasati. tasseva.m dasa paaramiyo sammasantassa dhammatejena catunahutaadhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalaa aya.m mahaapathavii hatthinaa akkantana.lakalaapo viya, pii.liyamaana.m ucchuyanta.m viya ca mahaavirava.m viravamaanaa sa"nkampi sampakampi sampavedhi. kulaalacakka.m viya telayantacakka.m viya ca paribbhami. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``ettakaayeva te loke, ye dhammaa bodhipaacanaa.
[22] taduddha.m natthi a~n~natra, da.lha.m tattha pati.t.thaha..
[21] ``ime dhamme sammasato, sabhaavarasalakkha.ne.
[22] dhammatejena vasudhaa, dasasahassii pakampatha..
[21] ``calati ravati pathavii, ucchuyanta.mva pii.lita.m.
[22] telayante yathaa cakka.m, eva.m kampati medanii''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.165-167).

[03] mahaapathaviyaa kampamaanaaya rammanagaravaasino sa.n.thaatu.m asakkontaa yugantavaatabbhaahataa mahaasaalaa viya mucchitaa papati.msu. gha.taadiini kulaalabhaajanaani pava.t.tantaani a~n~nama~n~na.m paharantaani cu.n.navicu.n.naani ahesu.m. mahaajano bhiitatasito satthaara.m ^a^P0.0029^ea^ upasa"nkamitvaa ``ki.m nu kho bhagavaa naagaava.t.to aya.m, bhuutayakkhadevataasu a~n~nataraava.t.to vaati na hi maya.m eta.m jaanaama, apica kho sabbopi aya.m mahaajano upadduto, ki.m nu kho imassa lokassa paapaka.m bhavissati, udaahu kalyaa.na.m, kathetha no eta.m kaara.na''nti aaha. atha satthaa tesa.m katha.m sutvaa ``tumhe ^a^M1.0033^ea^ maa bhaayatha, maa cintayittha, natthi vo itonidaana.m bhaya.m. yo so mayaa ajja `sumedhapa.n.dito ^a^V1.0035^ea^ anaagate gotamo naama buddho bhavissatii'ti byaakato, so idaani dasa paaramiyo sammasati, tassa sammasantassa vilo.lentassa dhammatejena sakaladasasahassii lokadhaatu ekappahaarena kampati ceva ravati caa''ti aaha. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``yaavataa parisaa aasi, buddhassa parivesane.
[22] pavedhamaanaa saa tattha, mucchitaa sesi bhuumiyaa..
[21] ``gha.taanekasahassaani, kumbhiina~nca sataa bahuu.
[22] sa~ncu.n.namathitaa tattha, a~n~nama~n~na.m pagha.t.titaa..
[21] ``ubbiggaa tasitaa bhiitaa, bhantaa byathitamaanasaa.
[22] mahaajanaa samaagamma, diipa"nkaramupaagamu.m..
[21] ``ki.m bhavissati lokassa, kalyaa.namatha paapaka.m.
[22] sabbo upadduto loko, ta.m vinodehi cakkhuma..
[21] ``tesa.m tadaa sa~n~naapesi, diipa"nkaro mahaamuni.
[22] vissatthaa hotha maa bhaatha, imasmi.m pathavikampane..
[21] ``yamaha.m ajja byaakaasi.m, `buddho loke bhavissati'.
[22] eso sammasati dhamma.m, pubbaka.m jinasevita.m..
[21] ``tassa sammasato dhamma.m, buddhabhuumi.m asesato.
[22] tenaaya.m kampitaa pathavii, dasasahassii sadevake''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.168-174).

[03] mahaajano tathaagatassa vacana.m sutvaa ha.t.thatu.t.tho maalaagandhavilepana.m aadaaya rammanagaraa nikkhamitvaa bodhisatta.m upasa"nkamitvaa maalaagandhaadiihi puujetvaa vanditvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa rammanagarameva paavisi. bodhisattopi dasa paaramiyo sammasitvaa viiriya.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaaya nisinnaasanaa vu.t.thaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``buddhassa ^a^V1.0036^ea^ vacana.m sutvaa, mano nibbaayi taavade.
[22] sabbe ma.m upasa"nkamma, punaapi abhivandisu.m..
[21] ``samaadiyitvaa ^a^M1.0034^ea^ buddhagu.na.m, da.lha.m katvaana maanasa.m.
[22] diipa"nkara.m namassitvaa, aasanaa vu.t.thahi.m tadaa''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.175-176).

[03] atha ^a^P0.0030^ea^ bodhisatta.m aasanaa vu.t.thahanta.m sakaladasasahassacakkavaa.ladevataa sannipatitvaa dibbehi maalaagandhehi puujetvaa vanditvaa ``ayya sumedhataapasa, tayaa ajja diipa"nkaradasabalassa paadamuule mahatii patthanaa patthitaa, saa te anantaraayena samijjhatu, maa te bhaya.m vaa chambhitatta.m vaa ahosi, sariire appamattakopi rogo maa uppajjatu, khippa.m paaramiyo puuretvaa sammaasambodhi.m pa.tivijjha. yathaa pupphuupagaphaluupagarukkhaa samaye pupphanti ceva phalanti ca, tatheva tvampi ta.m samaya.m anatikkamitvaa khippa.m sambodhimuttama.m phusassuu''tiaadiini thutima"ngalaani payirudaaha.msu. eva~nca payirudaahitvaa attano attano deva.t.thaanameva agama.msu. bodhisattopi devataahi abhitthavito -- ``aha.m dasa paaramiyo puuretvaa kappasatasahassaadhikaana.m catunna.m asa"nkhyeyyaana.m matthake buddho bhavissaamii''ti viiriya.m da.lha.m katvaa adhi.t.thaaya nabha.m abbhuggantvaa himavantameva agamaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``dibba.m maanusaka.m puppha.m, devaa maanusakaa ubho.
[22] samokiranti pupphehi, vu.t.thahantassa aasanaa..
[21] ``vedayanti ca te sotthi.m, devaa maanusakaa ubho.
[22] mahanta.m patthita.m tuyha.m, ta.m labhassu yathicchita.m..
[21] ``sabbiitiyo vivajjantu, soko rogo vinassatu.
[22] maa te bhavantvantaraayaa, phusa khippa.m bodhimuttama.m..
[21] ``yathaapi samaye patte, pupphanti pupphino dumaa.
[22] tatheva tva.m mahaaviira, buddha~naa.nena pupphasu..
[21] ``yathaa ^a^V1.0037^ea^ ye keci sambuddhaa, puurayu.m dasa paaramii.
[22] tatheva tva.m mahaaviira, puuraya dasa paaramii..
[21] ``yathaa ye keci sambuddhaa, bodhima.n.damhi bujjhare.
[22] tatheva tva.m mahaaviira, bujjhassu jinabodhiya.m..
[21] ``yathaa ^a^M1.0035^ea^ ye keci sambuddhaa, dhammacakka.m pavattayu.m.
[22] tatheva tva.m mahaaviira, dhammacakka.m pavattaya..
[21] ``pu.n.namaaye yathaa cando, parisuddho virocati.
[22] tatheva tva.m pu.n.namano, viroca dasasahassiya.m..
[21] ``raahumutto yathaa suuriyo, taapena atirocati.
[22] tatheva lokaa muccitvaa, viroca siriyaa tuva.m..
[21] ``yathaa ^a^P0.0031^ea^ yaa kaaci nadiyo, osaranti mahodadhi.m.
[22] eva.m sadevakaa lokaa, osarantu tavantike..
[21] ``tehi thutappasattho so, dasa dhamme samaadiya.
[22] te dhamme paripuurento, pavana.m paavisii tadaa''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.177-187).
[06] sumedhakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] rammanagaravaasinopi kho nagara.m pavisitvaa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m ada.msu. satthaa tesa.m dhamma.m desetvaa mahaajana.m sara.naadiisu pati.t.thapetvaa rammanagaraa nikkhami. tato uddhampi yaavataayuka.m ti.t.thanto sabba.m buddhakicca.m katvaa anukkamena anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayi. tattha ya.m vattabba.m, ta.m sabba.m buddhava.mse vuttanayeneva vitthaaretabba.m. vutta~nhi tattha --
[21] ``tadaa ^a^V1.0038^ea^ te bhojayitvaana, sasa"ngha.m lokanaayaka.m.
[22] upagacchu.m sara.na.m tassa, ^b^diipa"nkarassa^eb^ satthuno..
[21] ``sara.nagamane ka~nci, nivesesi tathaagato.
[22] ka~nci pa~ncasu siilesu, siile dasavidhe para.m..
[21] ``kassaci deti saama~n~na.m, caturo phalamuttame.
[22] kassaci asame dhamme, deti so pa.tisambhidaa..
[21] ``kassaci ^a^M1.0036^ea^ varasamaapattiyo, a.t.tha deti naraasabho.
[22] tisso kassaci vijjaayo, cha.labhi~n~naa pavecchati..
[21] ``tena yogena janakaaya.m, ovadati mahaamuni.
[22] tena vitthaarika.m aasi, lokanaathassa saasana.m..
[21] ``mahaahanuusabhakkhandho, diipa"nkarasanaamako.
[22] bahuu jane taarayati, parimoceti duggati.m..
[21] ``bodhaneyya.m jana.m disvaa, satasahassepi yojane.
[22] kha.nena upagantvaana, bodheti ta.m mahaamuni..
[21] ``pa.thamaabhisamaye buddho, ko.tisatamabodhayi.
[22] dutiyaabhisamaye naatho, navutiko.timabodhayi..
[21] ``yadaa ca devabhavanamhi, buddho dhammamadesayi.
[22] navutiko.tisahassaana.m, tatiyaabhisamayo ahu..
[21] ``sannipaataa tayo aasu.m, diipa"nkarassa satthuno.
[22] ko.tisatasahassaana.m, pa.thamo aasi samaagamo..
[21] ``puna ^a^V1.0039^ea^ ^a^P0.0032^ea^ naaradakuu.tamhi, pavivekagate jine.
[22] khii.naasavaa viitamalaa, sami.msu satako.tiyo..
[21] ``yamhi kaale mahaaviiro, sudassanasiluccaye.
[22] navutiko.tisahassehi, pavaaresi mahaamuni..
[21] ``aha.m tena samayena, ja.tilo uggataapano.
[22] antalikkhamhi cara.no, pa~ncaabhi~n~naasu paaraguu..
[21] ``dasaviisasahassaana.m, dhammaabhisamayo ahu.
[22] ekadvinna.m abhisamayaa, ga.nanato asa"nkhiyaa..
[21] ``vitthaarika.m baahuja~n~na.m, iddha.m phiita.m ahuu tadaa.
[22] diipa"nkarassa bhagavato, saasara.m suvisodhita.m..
[21] ``cattaari ^a^M1.0037^ea^ satasahassaani, cha.labhi~n~naa mahiddhikaa.
[22] diipa"nkara.m lokavidu.m parivaarenti sabbadaa..
[21] ``ye keci tena samayena, jahanti maanusa.m bhava.m.
[22] appattamaanasaa sekhaa, garahitaa bhavanti te..
[21] ``supupphita.m paavacana.m, arahantehi taadibhi.
[22] khii.naasavehi vimalehi, upasobhati sabbadaa..
[21] ``nagara.m rammavatii naama, sudevo naama khattiyo.
[22] sumedhaa naama janikaa, diipa"nkarassa satthuno..
[21] ``dasavassasahassaani, agaara.m ajjha so vasi.
[22] ha.msaa ko~ncaa mayuuraa ca, tayo paasaadamuttamaa..
[21] ``tii.ni ^a^V1.0040^ea^ satasahassaani, naariyo samala"nkataa.
[22] padumaa naama saa naarii, usabhakkhandho atrajo..
[21] ``nimitte caturo disvaa, hatthiyaanena nikkhami.
[22] anuunadasamaasaani, padhaane padahii jino..
[21] ``padhaanacaara.m caritvaana, abujjhi maanasa.m muni.
[22] brahmunaa yaacito santo, diipa"nkaro mahaamuni..
[21] ``vatti cakka.m mahaaviiro, nandaaraame siriighare.
[22] nisinno siriisamuulamhi, akaasi titthiyamaddana.m..
[21] ``suma"ngalo ca tisso ca, ahesu.m aggasaavakaa.
[22] saagato naamupa.t.thaako, diipa"nkarassa satthuno..
[21] sunandaa ca``nandaa ceva sunandaa ca, ahesu.m aggasaavikaa.
[22] bodhi tassa bhagavato, pipphaliiti pavuccati..
[21] ``tapussabhallikaa naama, ahesu.m aggupa.t.thakaa.
[22] sirimaa ko.naa upa.t.thikaa, diipa"nkarassa satthuno..
[21] ``asiitihatthamubbedho, diipa"nkaro mahaamuni.
[22] sobhati diiparukkhova, saalaraajaava phullito..
[21] ``pabhaa ^a^M1.0038^ea^ vidhaavati tassa, samantaa dvaadasa yojane.
[21] satasahassavassaani, aayu tassa mahesino.
[22] taavataa ti.t.thamaano so, taaresi janata.m bahu.m..
[21] ``jotayitvaana saddhamma.m, santaaretvaa mahaajana.m.
[22] jalitvaa aggikhandhova, nibbuto so sasaavako..
[21] ``saa ^a^V1.0041^ea^ ca iddhi so ca yaso, taani ca paadesu cakkaratanaani.
[22] sabba.m tamantarahita.m, nanu rittaa sabbasa"nkhaaraati..
[21] ``diipa"nkaro jino satthaa, nandaaraamamhi nibbuto.
[22] tatthetassa jinathuupo, chatti.msubbedhayojano''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 3.1-31).

[01] diipa"nkarassa pana bhagavato aparabhaage eka.m asa"nkhyeyya.m atikkamitvaa ^b^ko.n.da~n~no^eb^ naama satthaa udapaadi. tassaapi tayo saavakasannipaataa ahesu.m. pa.thamasannipaate ko.tisatasahassa.m, dutiye ko.tisahassa.m ^a^P0.0033^ea^, tatiye navutiko.tiyo. tadaa bodhisatto vijitaavii naama cakkavattii hutvaa ko.tisatasahassassa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m adaasi. satthaa bodhisatta.m ``buddho bhavissatii''ti byaakaritvaa dhamma.m desesi. so satthu dhammakatha.m sutvaa rajja.m niyyaatetvaa pabbaji. so tii.ni pi.takaani uggahetvaa a.t.tha samaapattiyo ca pa~nca abhi~n~naayo ca uppaadetvaa aparihiinajjhaano brahmaloke nibbatti. ko.n.da~n~nabuddhassa pana rammavatii naama nagara.m, sunando naama khattiyo pitaa, sujaataa naama devii maataa, bhaddo ca subhaddo ca dve aggasaavakaa, anuruddho naamupa.t.thaako, tissaa ca upatissaa ca dve aggasaavikaa, saalakalyaa.nirukkho bodhi, a.t.thaasiitihatthubbedha.m sariira.m, vassasatasahassa.m aayuppamaa.na.m ahosi.
[21] ``diipa"nkarassa aparena, ko.n.da~n~no naama naayako.
[22] anantatejo amitayaso, appameyyo duraasado''..

[03] tassa aparabhaage eka.m asa"nkhyeyya.m atikkamitvaa ekasmi.m kappeyeva cattaaro buddhaa nibbatti.msu -- ^bma"ngalo, sumano, revato, ^bb^sobhitob^ti. ^b^ma"ngalassa^eb^ bhagavato tiisu saavakasannipaatesu pa.thamasannipaate ko.tisatasahassa.m ^a^M1.0039^ea^ bhikkhuu ahesu.m, dutiye ko.tisatasahassa.m, tatiye navu.tiko.tiyo. vemaatikabhaataa kirassa aanandakumaaro naama navutiko.tisa"nkhaaya parisaaya saddhi.m dhammassavanatthaaya satthu santika.m agamaasi. satthaa tassa anupubbikatha.m kathesi. so saddhi.m parisaaya saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni. satthaa tesa.m kulaputtaana.m pubbacarita.m olokento iddhimayapattaciivarassa ^a^V1.0042^ea^ upanissaya.m disvaa dakkhi.nahattha.m pasaaretvaa ``etha bhikkhavo''ti aaha. sabbe ta"nkha.na~n~neva iddhimayapattaciivaradharaa sa.t.thivassikatheraa viya aakappasampannaa hutvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa parivaarayi.msu. ayamassa tatiyo saavakasannipaato ahosi.

[03] yathaa pana a~n~nesa.m buddhaana.m samantaa asiitihatthappamaa.naayeva sariirappabhaa ahosi, na eva.m tassa. tassa pana bhagavato sariirappabhaa niccakaala.m dasasahassilokadhaatu.m pharitvaa a.t.thaasi. rukkhapathaviipabbatasamuddaadayo antamaso ukkhaliyaadiini upaadaaya suva.n.napa.t.tapariyonaddhaa viya ahesu.m. aayuppamaa.na.m panassa navutivassasahassaani ahosi. ettaka.m kaala.m candimasuuriyaadayo attano pabhaaya virocitu.m naasakkhi.msu, rattindivaparicchedo na pa~n~naayittha. divaa suuriyaalokena viya sattaa nicca.m buddhaalokeneva vicari.msu. saaya.m pupphitakusumaana.m paato ca ravanakasaku.naadiina~nca vasena loko rattindivapariccheda.m sallakkhesi.

[03] ki.m pana a~n~nesa.m buddhaana.m ayamaanubhaavo natthiiti? no natthi. tepi hi aaka"nkhamaanaa dasasahassilokadhaatu.m ^a^P0.0034^ea^ vaa tato vaa bhiyyo aabhaaya phareyyu.m. ma"ngalassa pana bhagavato pubbapatthanaavasena a~n~nesa.m byaamappabhaa viya sariirappabhaa niccameva dasasahassilokadhaatu.m pharitvaa a.t.thaasi. so kira bodhisattacariyacara.nakaale vessantarasadise attabhaave.thito saputtadaaro va"nkapabbatasadise pabbate vasi. atheko kharadaa.thiko naama yakkho mahaapurisassa daanajjhaasayata.m sutvaa braahma.nava.n.nena upasa"nkamitvaa mahaasatta.m dve daarake yaaci. mahaasatto ``dadaami, braahma.na, puttake''ti vatvaa ha.t.thapaha.t.tho udakapariyanta.m mahaapathavi.m kampento dvepi daarake adaasi. yakkho ca"nkamanako.tiya.m aalambanaphalaka.m nissaaya .thatvaa passantasseva mahaasattassa mulaalakalaapa.m viya daarake ^a^M1.0040^ea^ khaadi. mahaapurisassa yakkha.m oloketvaa mukhe viva.tamatte aggijaala.m viya lohitadhaara.m uggiramaana.m tassa mukha.m disvaapi kesaggamattampi domanassa.m na uppajji. ``sudinna.m vata me daana''nti cintayato panassa sariire mahanta.m piitisomanassa.m udapaadi. so ``imassa me daanassa nissandena anaagate iminaava niihaarena sariirato rasmiyo nikkhamantuu''ti patthana.m akaasi. tassa ta.m patthana.m nissaaya buddhabhuutassa sariirato rasmiyo nikkhamitvaa ettaka.m .thaana.m phari.msu.

[03] aparampissa pubbacariya.m atthi. so kira bodhisattakaale ekassa buddhassa cetiya.m disvaa ``imassa buddhassa mayaa jiivita.m pariccajitu.m va.t.tatii''ti da.n.dakadiipikaave.thananiyaamena sakalasariira.m ve.thaapetvaa ratanamattamaku.la.m satasahassagghanika.m suva.n.napaati.m sappissa puuraapetvaa tattha sahassava.t.tiyo jaaletvaa ta.m siisenaadaaya sakalasariira.m jaalaapetvaa cetiya.m padakkhi.na.m karonto sakalaratti.m ^a^V1.0043^ea^ viitinaameti. eva.m yaava aru.nuggamanaa vaayamantassaapissa lomakuupamattampi usuma.m na ga.nhi. padumagabbha.m pavi.t.thakaalo viya ahosi. dhammo hi naamesa attaana.m rakkhanta.m rakkhati. tenaaha bhagavaa --
[21] ``dhammo have rakkhati dhammacaari.m, dhammo suci.n.no sukhamaavahaati.
[22] esaanisa.mso dhamme suci.n.ne, na duggati.m gacchati dhammacaarii''ti.. (theragaa0 303; jaa0 1.10.102) --
[25] imassapi ^a^P0.0035^ea^ kammassa nissandena tassa bhagavato sariirobhaaso dasasahassilokadhaatu.m pharitvaa a.t.thaasi.

[03] tadaa amhaaka.m bodhisatto suruci naama braahma.no hutvaa ``satthaara.m nimantessaamii''ti upasa"nkamitvaa madhuradhammakatha.m sutvaa ``sve mayha.m bhikkha.m ga.nhatha, bhante''ti aaha. ``braahma.na, kittakehi te bhikkhuuhi attho''ti? ``kittakaa pana vo, bhante, parivaarabhikkhuu''ti aaha. tadaa satthu pa.thamasannipaatoyeva hoti, tasmaa ``ko.tisatasahassa''nti aaha. ``bhante, sabbehipi saddhi.m mayha.m bhikkha.m ga.nhathaa''ti. satthaa adhivaasesi. braahma.no svaatanaaya nimantetvaa geha.m gacchanto cintesi -- ``aha.m ettakaana.m ^a^M1.0041^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m yaagubhattavatthaadiini daatu.m sakkomi, nisiidana.t.thaana.m pana katha.m bhavissatii''ti?

[03] tassa saa cintaa caturaasiitiyojanasahassamatthake .thitassa devara~n~no pa.n.dukambalasilaasanassa u.nhabhaava.m janesi. sakko ``ko nu kho ma.m imamhaa .thaanaa caavetukaamo''ti dibbacakkhunaa olokento mahaapurisa.m disvaa ``suruci naama braahma.no buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m nimantetvaa nisiidana.t.thaanatthaaya cintesi, mayaapi tattha gantvaa pu~n~nako.t.thaasa.m gahetu.m va.t.tatii''ti va.d.dhakiva.n.na.m nimminitvaa vaasipharasuhattho mahaapurisassa purato paaturahosi. ``atthi nu kho kassaci bhatiyaa kattabbakicca''nti aaha. mahaapuriso ta.m disvaa ``ki.m kamma.m karissasii''ti aaha. ``mama ajaananasippa.m naama natthi, geha.m vaa ma.n.dapa.m vaa yo ya.m kaareti, tassa ta.m kaatu.m jaanaamii''ti. ``tena hi mayha.m kamma.m atthii''ti. ``ki.m, ayyaa''ti? ``svaatanaaya me ko.tisatasahassabhikkhuu nimantitaa. tesa.m nisiidanama.n.dapa.m karissasii''ti? ``aha.m naama kareyya.m sace me bhati.m daatu.m sakkhissathaa''ti. ``sakkhissaami, taataa''ti. ``saadhu karissaamii''ti gantvaa eka.m padesa.m olokesi. dvaadasaterasayojanappamaa.no padeso ^a^V1.0044^ea^ kasi.nama.n.dala.m viya samatalo ahosi. so ``ettake .thaane sattaratanamayo ma.n.dapo u.t.thahatuu''ti cintetvaa olokesi. taavadeva pathavi.m bhinditvaa ma.n.dapo u.t.thahi. tassa sova.n.namayesu thambhesu rajatamayaa gha.takaa ahesu.m, rajatamayesu sova.n.namayaa, ma.nimayesu thambhesu pavaa.lamayaa, pavaa.lamayesu ma.nimayaa, sattaratanamayesu thambhesu sattaratanamayaa gha.takaa ahesu.m. tato ``ma.n.dapassa antarantare ki"nka.nikajaala.m olambatuu''ti olokesi. saha olokaneneva ^a^P0.0036^ea^ jaala.m olambi. yassa mandavaateritassa pa~nca"ngikasseva tuuriyassa madhurasaddo niccharati. dibbasa"ngiitivattanakaalo viya ahosi. ``antarantaraa gandhadaamamaalaadaamaani olambantuu''ti cintentassa maalaadaamaani olambi.msu. ``ko.tisatasahassasa"nkhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m aasanaani ca aadhaarakaani ca pathavi.m bhinditvaa u.t.thahantuu''ti cintesi, taavadeva u.t.thahi.msu. ``ko.ne ko.ne ekekaa udakacaa.tiyo u.t.thahantuu''ti cintesi, udakacaa.tiyo u.t.thahi.msu.

[03] so ^a^M1.0042^ea^ ettaka.m maapetvaa braahma.nassa santika.m gantvaa ``ehi, ayya, tava ma.n.dapa.m oloketvaa mayha.m bhati.m dehii''ti aaha. mahaapuriso gantvaa ma.n.dapa.m olokesi. olokentasseva ca sakalasariira.m pa~ncava.n.naaya piitiyaa nirantara.m phu.ta.m ahosi. athassa ma.n.dapa.m oloketvaa etadahosi -- ``naaya.m ma.n.dapo manussabhuutena kato, mayha.m pana ajjhaasaya.m mayha.m gu.na.m aagamma addhaa sakkabhavana.m u.nha.m bhavissati. tato sakkena devara~n~naa aya.m ma.n.dapo kaarito bhavissatii''ti. ``na kho pana me yutta.m evaruupe ma.n.dape ekadivasa.myeva daana.m daatu.m, sattaaha.m dassaamii''ti cintesi. baahirakadaana~nhi tattakampi samaana.m bodhisattaana.m tu.t.thi.m kaatu.m na sakkoti, ala"nkatasiisa.m pana chinditvaa a~njitaakkhiini uppaa.tetvaa hadayama.msa.m vaa ubba.t.tetvaa dinnakaale bodhisattaana.m caaga.m nissaaya tu.t.thi naama hoti. amhaakampi hi bodhisattassa siviraajajaatake devasika.m pa~ncakahaapa.nasatasahassaani vissajjetvaa catuusu dvaaresu nagaramajjhe ca daana.m dentassa ta.m daana.m caagatu.t.thi.m uppaadetu.m naasakkhi. yadaa panassa braahma.nava.n.nena aagantvaa sakko devaraajaa akkhiini yaaci, tadaa taani uppaa.tetvaa dadamaanasseva haaso uppajji, kesaggamattampi citta.m a~n~nathatta.m naahosi. eva.m dinnadaana.m nissaaya bodhisattaana.m titti naama natthi. tasmaa sopi mahaapuriso ``sattaaha.m mayaa ko.tisatasahassasa"nkhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m daana.m daatu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa tasmi.m ma.n.dape nisiidaapetvaa sattaaha.m gavapaana.m naama adaasi. ^b^gavapaana^eb^nti mahante mahante kolambe khiirassa puuretvaa uddhanesu aaropetvaa ghanapaakapakke khiire thoke ta.n.dule pakkhipitvaa pakkamadhusakkaracu.n.nasappiihi abhisa"nkhatabhojana.m vuccati. manussaayeva pana parivisitu.m naasakkhi.msu. devaapi ekantarikaa hutvaa parivisi.msu. dvaadasaterasayojanappamaa.na.m .thaanampi bhikkhuu ga.nhitu.m nappahosiyeva ^a^P0.0037^ea^, te pana ^a^V1.0045^ea^ bhikkhuu attano aanubhaavena nisiidi.msu. pariyosaanadivase pana sabbabhikkhuuna.m pattaani dhovaapetvaa bhesajjatthaaya sappinavaniitatelamadhuphaa.nitaana.m puuretvaa ticiivarehi saddhi.m adaasi, sa"nghanavakabhikkhunaa laddhaciivarasaa.takaa satasahassagghanikaa ahesu.m.

[03] satthaa anumodana.m karonto -- ``aya.m puriso evaruupa.m mahaadaana.m adaasi, ko nu kho bhavissatii''ti upadhaarento -- ``anaagate kappasatasahassaadhikaana.m ^a^M1.0043^ea^ dvinna.m asa"nkhyeyyaana.m matthake gotamo naama buddho bhavissatii''ti disvaa mahaapurisa.m aamantetvaa ``tva.m ettaka.m naama kaala.m atikkamitvaa gotamo naama buddho bhavissasii''ti byaakaasi. mahaapuriso byaakara.na.m sutvaa ``aha.m kira buddho bhavissaami, ko me gharaavaasena attho, pabbajissaamii''ti cintetvaa tathaaruupa.m sampatti.m khe.lapi.n.da.m viya pahaaya satthu santike pabbajitvaa buddhavacana.m ugga.nhitvaa abhi~n~naayo ca samaapattiyo ca nibbattetvaa aayupariyosaane brahmaloke nibbatti.

[03] ^b^ma"ngalassa^eb^ pana bhagavato nagara.m uttara.m naama ahosi, pitaapi uttaro naama khattiyo, maataapi uttaraa naama devii, sudevo ca dhammaseno ca dve aggasaavakaa, paalito naamupa.t.thaako, siivalii ca asokaa ca dve aggasaavikaa, naagarukkho bodhi, a.t.thaasiitihatthubbedha.m sariira.m ahosi. navuti vassasahassaani .thatvaa parinibbute pana tasmi.m ekappahaareneva dasa cakkavaa.lasahassaani ekandhakaaraani ahesu.m. sabbacakkavaa.lesu manussaana.m mahanta.m aarodanaparidevana.m ahosi.
[21] ``ko.n.da~n~nassa aparena, ma"ngalo naama naayako.
[22] tama.m loke nihantvaana, dhammokkamabhidhaarayii''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 5.1).

[03] eva.m dasasahassilokadhaatu.m andhakaara.m katvaa parinibbutassa tassa bhagavato aparabhaage ^b^sumano^eb^ naama satthaa loke udapaadi. tassaapi tayo saavakasannipaataa. pa.thamasannipaate ko.tisatasahassabhikkhuu ahesu.m. dutiye ka~ncanapabbatamhi navutiko.tisahassaani, tatiye asiitiko.tisahassaani. tadaa mahaasatto atulo naama naagaraajaa ahosi mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo. so ``buddho uppanno''ti sutvaa ~naatisa"nghaparivuto naagabhavanaa nikkhamitvaa ko.tisatasahassabhikkhuparivaarassa ^a^V1.0046^ea^ tassa bhagavato dibbatuuriyehi upahaara.m kaaretvaa ^a^P0.0038^ea^ mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa pacceka.m dussayugaani datvaa sara.nesu pati.t.thaasi. sopi na.m satthaa ``anaagate buddho bhavissatii''ti byaakaasi. tassa bhagavato nagara.m mekhala.m naama ahosi, sudatto naama ^a^M1.0044^ea^ raajaa pitaa, sirimaa naama maataa devii, sara.no ca bhaavitatto ca dve aggasaavakaa, udeno naamupa.t.thaako, so.naa ca upaso.naa ca dve aggasaavikaa, naagarukkho bodhi, navutihatthubbedha.m sariira.m ahosi, navutiyeva vassasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m ahosi.
[21] ``ma"ngalassa aparena, sumano naama naayako.
[22] sabbadhammehi asamo, sabbasattaanamuttamo''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 6.1).
