[03] 32^b^.^eb^ ^b^a~n~ne^eb^ ekacce ^b^abhi~n~naa^eb^ pa~nca abhi~n~naayo ^b^vasibhaavitaa^eb^ vasiikari.msu, pa~ncasu abhi~n~naasu aavajjanasamaapajjanavu.t.thaanaadhi.t.thaanapaccavekkha.nasa"nkhaataahi pa~ncavasitaahi vasiibhaava.m itaa gataa pattaa abhi~n~naayo ^a^M1.0121^ea^, ^b^appenti^eb^ samaapajjanti. ^b^a~n~ne^eb^ ekacce ^b^anekasahassiyo vikubbanaani^eb^ ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hotiiti evamaadiini iddhivikubbanaani ^b^vikubbanti^eb^ karontiiti attho.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ ^b^buddhaapi buddhe^eb^ti eva.m sannipatitesu paccekabuddhesu sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nassa ^b^visaya.m^eb^ aaramma.nabhuuta.m pa~nha.m buddhaa buddhe ^b^pucchantii^eb^ti attho. te buddhaa atthagambhiirataaya ^b^gambhiira.m nipu.na.m^eb^ sukhuma.m, ^b^.thaana.m^eb^ kaara.na.m, ^b^pa~n~naaya vinibujjhare^eb^ visesena niravasesato bujjhanti.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ tadaa mama paasaade sannipatitaa ^b^saavakaa^eb^pi ^b^buddhe^eb^ pa~nha.m ^b^pucchanti, buddhaa saavake^eb^ sisse pa~nha.m ^b^pucchanti, te^eb^ buddhaa ca saavakaa ca ^b^a~n~nama~n~na.m^eb^ pa~nha.m ^b^pucchitvaa^eb^ a~n~nama~n~na.m ^b^byaakaronti^eb^ vissajjenti.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ puna te sabbe ekato dassento ^b^``buddhaa paccekabuddhaa caa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^buddhaa^eb^ sammaasambuddhaa, ^b^paccekabuddhaa^eb^ ca ^b^saavakaa^eb^ ca sissaa ^b^paricaarakaa^eb^ nissitakaa ete sabbe, ^b^sakaaya^eb^ sakaaya ^b^ratiyaa^eb^ ramamaanaa salliinaa mama ^b^paasaade abhiramantii^eb^ti attho.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ eva.m tasmi.m vejayantapaasaade paccekabuddhaana.m aacaarasampatti.m dassetvaa idaani attano aanubhaava.m dassento so tilokavijayo cakkavattiraajaa ^b^``chattaa ti.t.thantu ratanaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^ratanaa^eb^ sattaratanamayaa, ^b^chattaa ka~ncanaave.lapantikaa^eb^ suva.n.najaalehi olambitaa ^b^ti.t.thantu. muttaajaalaparikkhittaa^eb^ muttaajaalehi parivaaritaa, ^b^sabbe^eb^ chattaa mama ^b^matthake^eb^ muddhani, ^b^dhaarentuu^eb^ti cintitamatteyeva chattaa paatubhuutaa hontiiti attho.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ ^b^so.n.nataarakacittitaa^eb^ suva.n.nataarakaahi daddallamaanaa ^b^celavitaanaa bhavantu^eb^ nibbattantu ^a^V1.0117^ea^. ^b^vicittaa^eb^ anekava.n.naa, ^b^malyavitataa^eb^ pupphapattha.taa, ^b^sabbe^eb^ anekavitaanaa, ^b^matthake^eb^ nisiidana.t.thaanassa uparibhaage ^b^dhaarentuu^eb^ti attho.

[03] 38-40^b^.^eb^ ^b^malyadaamehi^eb^ anekasugandhapupphadaamehi ^b^vitataa^eb^ pariki.n.naa, ^b^gandhadaamehi^eb^ candanaku"nkumatagaraadisugandhadaamehi, ^b^sobhitaa^eb^ pokkhara.niiti sambandho ^a^M1.0122^ea^. ^b^dussadaamehi^eb^ pattu.n.naciinaadianagghadussadaamehi, ^b^pariki.n.naa^eb^ sattaratanadaamehi bhuusitaa ala"nkataa pokkhara.nii, ^b^pupphaabhiki.n.naa^eb^ ^a^P0.0109^ea^ campakasa.lalasogandhikaadisugandhapupphehi ^b^abhiki.n.naa^eb^ su.t.thu vicittaa sobhitaa. punarapi ki.m bhuutaa pokkhara.nii? surabhigandhasugandhehi bhuusitaa vaasitaa. samantato ^b^gandhapa~nca"ngulala"nkataa^eb^ pa~ncahi a"ngulehi limpitagandhehi ala"nkataa, ^b^hemacchadanachaaditaa^eb^ suva.n.nachadanehi suva.n.navitaanehi chaaditaa, paasaadassa ^b^caatuddisaa^eb^ pokkhara.niyo padumehi ca uppalehi ca su.t.thu santhataa pattha.taa suva.n.naruupe suva.n.nava.n.naa, ^b^khaayantu, padmare.nurajuggataa^eb^ padumare.nuuhi dhuuliihi ca aaki.n.naa pokkhara.niyo sobhantuuti attho.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ mama vejayanta^b^paasaadassa samantato paadapaa^eb^ campakaadayo rukkhaa ^b^sabbe pupphantu^eb^ ete puppharukkhaa. ^b^saya^eb^meva ^b^pupphaa mu~ncitvaa^eb^ viga.litvaa ^b^gantvaa bhavana.m okiru.m,^eb^ oki.n.naa paasaadassa upari karontuuti attho.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ ^b^tattha^eb^ tasmi.m mama vejayantapaasaade ^b^sikhino^eb^ mayuuraa ^b^naccantuu, dibbaha.msaa^eb^ devataaha.msaa, ^b^pakuujare^eb^ sadda.m karontu, ^b^karaviikaa ca^eb^ madhurasaddaa kokilaa ^b^gaayantu^eb^ giitavaakya.m karontu, apare anuttaa ca ^b^dijasa"nghaa^eb^ pakkhino samuuhaa paasaadassa ^b^samantato^eb^ madhurarava.m ravantuuti attho.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ ^b^paasaadassa samantako sabbaa^eb^ aatatavitataadayo ^b^bheriyo vajjantu^eb^ ha~n~nantu, ^b^sabbaa taa^eb^ anekatantiyo ^b^vii.naa rasantu^eb^ sadda.m karontu, ^b^sabbaa^eb^ anekappakaaraa ^b^sa"ngiitiyo^eb^ paasaadassa samantato ^b^vattantu^eb^ pavattantu gaayantuuti attho.

[03] 44-5^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaavataa^eb^ yattake .thaane ^b^buddhakhettamhi^eb^ dasasahassicakkavaa.le ^b^tato pare cakkavaa.le, jotisampannaa^eb^ pabhaasampannaa ^b^acchinnaa mahantaa^eb^ samantato ^b^ratanaamayaa^eb^ sattahi ratanehi kataa khacitaa ^b^so.n.napalla"nkaa^eb^ suva.n.napalla"nkaa ^b^ti.t.thantu,^eb^ paasaadassa samantato ^b^diiparukkhaa^eb^ padiipadhaara.naa telarukkhaa ^b^jalantu^eb^ ^a^V1.0118^ea^, padiipehi pajjalantu, ^b^dasasahassiparamparaa^eb^ dasasahassiina.m paramparaa dasasahassiyo ^b^ekapajjotaa^eb^ ekapadiipaa viya ^b^bhavantu^eb^ ujjotantuuti attho.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ naccagiitesu ^a^M1.0123^ea^ ^a^P0.0110^ea^ chekaa ^b^ga.nikaa^eb^ naccitthiyo ca ^b^laasikaa^eb^ mukhena saddakaarikaa ca ^b^paasaadassa samantato naccantu, accharaaga.naa^eb^ devitthisamuuhaa naccantu, ^b^naanaara"ngaa^eb^ anekava.n.naa naanaara"ngama.n.dalaa paasaadassa samantato naccantu, ^b^padissantu^eb^ paaka.taa hontuuti attho.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ tadaa aha.m tilokavijayo naama cakkavattiraajaa hutvaa sakalacakkavaa.le ^b^dumagge^eb^ rukkhagge ^b^pabbatagge^eb^ himavantacakkavaa.lapabbataadiina.m agge sineruupabbatamuddhani ca sabba.t.thaanesu ^b^vicitta.m^eb^ anekava.n.navicitta.m ^b^pa~ncava.n.nika.m^eb^ niilapiitaadipa~ncava.n.na.m ^b^sabba.m dhaja.m ussaapemii^eb^ti attho.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ ^b^naraa^eb^ lokantaraa naraa ca naagalokato ^b^naagaa ca^eb^ devalokato ^b^gandhabbaa^eb^ ca ^b^devaa^eb^ ca ^b^sabbe upentu^eb^ upagacchantu, ^b^te^eb^ naraadayo ^b^namassantaa^eb^ mama namakkaara.m karontaa ^b^pa~njalikaa^eb^ katahatthapu.taa mama vejayanta.m ^b^paasaada.m parivaarayu^eb^nti attho.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ eva.m so tilokavijayo cakkavattiraajaa paasaadassa ca attano ca aanubhaava.m va.n.netvaa idaani attanaa sampattikatapu~n~naphala.m samaadapento ^b^``ya.m ki~nci kusala.m kamma''^eb^ntiaadimaaha. ^b^ya.m ki~nci kusalakamma^eb^sa"nkhaata.m ^b^kiriya.m kattabba.m^eb^ atthi, ta.m sabba.m ^b^mama^eb^ mayaa ^b^kaayena^eb^ vaa ^b^vaacaaya^eb^ vaa ^b^manasaa^eb^ vaa tiihi dvaarehi ^b^kata.m tidase sukata.m^eb^ su.t.thu kata.m, taavati.msabhavane uppajjanaaraha.m katanti attho.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ puna samaadapento ^b^``ye sattaa sa~n~nino''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^ye sattaa^eb^ manussaa vaa devaa vaa brahmaano vaa ^b^sa~n~nino^eb^ sa~n~naasahitaa ^b^atthi, ye ca sattaa asa~n~nino^eb^ sa~n~naarahitaa asa~n~naa sattaa santi, ^b^te sabbe^eb^ sattaa ^b^mayha.m^eb^ mayaa ^b^kata.m pu~n~naphala.m, bhaagii bhavantu^eb^ pu~n~navantaa hontuuti attho.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ punapi samaadapento bodhisatto ^b^``yesa.m kata''^eb^ntiaadimaaha. mayaa ^b^kata.m^eb^ pu~n~na.m yehi naranaagagandhabbadevehi ^b^suvidita.m^eb^ ~naata.m, tesa.m ^b^mayaa dinna.m pu~n~naphala.m,^eb^ tasmi.m mayaa kate pu~n~ne dinnabhaava.m ^b^ye^eb^ naraadayo ^b^na jaananti, devaa gantvaa^eb^ tesa.m ta.m ^b^nivedayu.m^eb^ aarocayunti attho.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbalokamhi^eb^ ^a^M1.0124^ea^ ^a^V1.0119^ea^ ^b^ye sattaa^eb^ aahaaranissitaa ^b^jiivanti,^eb^ te sabbe sattaa ^b^manu~n~na.m bhojana.m sabba.m mama cetasaa^eb^ mama cittena ^b^labhantu,^eb^ mama pu~n~niddhiyaa labhantuuti attho.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ ^b^manasaa^eb^ pasannena cittena ya.m ^b^daana.m mayaa dinna.m^eb^ tasmi.m daane cittena ^b^pasaada.m aavahi.m^eb^ uppaadesi.m. ^b^sabbasambuddhaa^eb^ ca ^a^P0.0111^ea^ ^b^paccekaa^eb^ pa.tiekkaa ^b^jinasaavakaa^eb^ ca mayaa cakkavattira~n~naa ^b^puujitaa^eb^.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ ^b^sukatena tena kammena^eb^ saddahitvaa katena kusalakammena, ^b^cetanaapa.nidhiihi ca^eb^ cittena katapatthanaahi ca, ^b^maanusa.m deha.m^eb^ manussasariira.m, ^b^jahitvaa^eb^ cha.d.detvaa, ^b^aha.m taavati.msa.m^eb^ devaloka.m ^b^agacchi.m^eb^ agamaasi.m, suttappabuddho viya tattha uppajjinti attho.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ tato tilokavijayo cakkavattiraajaa kaala"nkato, tato pa.t.thaaya aagate ^b^duve bhave^eb^ dve jaatiyo ^b^pajaanaami devatte^eb^ devattabhaave ^b^maanuse^eb^ manussattabhaave ca, tato jaatidvayato ^b^a~n~na.m gati.m^eb^ a~n~na.m upapatti.m ^b^na jaanaami^eb^ na passaami, ^b^manasaa^eb^ cittena ^b^patthanaaphala.m^eb^ patthitapatthanaaphalanti attho.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ ^b^devaana.m adhiko homii^eb^ti yadi devesu jaato, aayuva.n.nabalatejehi devaana.m adhiko je.t.tho se.t.tho ahosinti attho. yadi manussesu jaato, ^b^manujaadhipo^eb^ manussaana.m adhipati issaro ^b^bhavaami,^eb^ tathaa raajabhuuto abhiruupena ruupasampattiyaa ca lakkha.nena aarohapari.naahaadilakkha.nena ca ^b^sampanno^eb^ sampu.n.no uppannuppanna^b^bhave pa~n~naaya^eb^ paramatthajaananapa~n~naaya ^b^asamo^eb^ samarahito, mayaa sadiso koci natthiiti attho.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ mayaa katapu~n~nasambhaarena pu~n~naphalena uppannuppannabhave ^b^se.t.tha.m^eb^ pasa.t.tha.m madhura.m ^b^vividha.m^eb^ anekappakaara.m ^b^bhojana^eb^~nca ^b^anappaka.m^eb^ bahusatta^b^ratana~nca vividhaani,^eb^ anekappakaaraani pattu.n.nakoseyyaadi^b^vatthaani^eb^ ca ^b^nabhaa^eb^ aakaasato ^b^ma.m^eb^ mama santika.m ^b^khippa.m^eb^ siigha.m ^b^upenti^eb^ upagacchanti.

[03] 58-66^b^.^eb^ ^b^pathabyaa^eb^ ^a^M1.0125^ea^ pathaviyaa ^b^pabbate^eb^ ca ^b^aakaase^eb^ ca ^b^udake^eb^ ca ^b^vane^eb^ ca ^b^ya.m ya.m^eb^ yattha yattha ^b^hattha.m pasaaremi^eb^ nikkhipaami, tato tato ^b^dibbaa bhakkhaa^eb^ dibbaa aahaaraa ^b^ma.m^eb^ mama santika.m ^b^upenti^eb^ upagacchanti, paatubhavantiiti attho. tathaa yathaakkama.m ^b^sabbe ratanaa. sabbe^eb^ candanaadayo ^b^gandhaa^eb^ ^a^V1.0120^ea^. sabbe ^b^yaanaa^eb^ vaahanaa. ^b^sabbe^eb^ campakanaagapunnaagaadayo ^b^maalaa^eb^ pupphaa. sabbe ^b^ala"nkaaraa^eb^ aabhara.naa. ^b^sabbaa^eb^ dibbaka~n~naa. sabbe ^b^madhusakkharaa^eb^. ^b^sabbe^eb^ puupaadayo ^b^khajjaa^eb^ khaaditabbaa ^b^ma.m^eb^ mama santika.m ^b^upenti^eb^ upagacchanti.

[03] 67-68^b^.^eb^ ^b^sambodhivarapattiyaa^eb^ti uttamacatumagga~naa.napattiyaa paapu.nanatthaaya. mayaa ya.m uttamadaana.m kata.m puurita.m, tena uttamadaanena ^a^P0.0112^ea^ selasa"nkhaata.m ^b^pabbata.m^eb^ sakala.m ekaninnaada.m karonto ^b^bahala.m gira.m^eb^ puthula.m ghosa.m ^b^gajjento, sadevaka.m^eb^ loka.m sakala.m manussadevaloka.m ^b^haasayanto^eb^ somanassappatta.m karonto ^b^loke^eb^ sakalalokattaye viva.t.tacchado ^b^buddho aha.m bhavaamii^eb^ti attho.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ ^b^disaa dasavidhaa loke^eb^ti cakkavaa.laloke dasavidhaa dasako.t.thaasaa disaa honti, tattha ko.t.thaase ^b^yaayato^eb^ yaayantassa gacchantassa ^b^antaka.m natthii^eb^ti attho, cakkavattikaale ^b^tasmi.m^eb^ mayaa gatagata.t.thaane disaabhaage vaa ^b^buddhakhettaa^eb^ buddhavisayaa ^b^asa"nkhiyaa^eb^ sa"nkhaarahitaa.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ ^b^pabhaa pakittitaa^eb^ti tadaa cakkavattiraajakaale ^b^mayha.m^eb^ pabhaa cakkaratanama.niratanaadiina.m pabhaa aalokaa ^b^yamakaa^eb^ yuga.layuga.laa hutvaa ^b^ra.msivaahanaa^eb^ ra.msi.m mu~ncamaanaa pakittitaa paaka.taa, ^b^etthantare^eb^ dasasahassicakkavaa.lantare ^b^ra.msijaala.m^eb^ ra.msisamuuha.m, ^b^aaloko vipulo^eb^ bahutaro ^b^bhave^eb^ ahosiiti attho.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ ^b^ettake lokadhaatumhii^eb^ti dasasahassicakkavaa.lesu ^b^sabbe janaa ma.m passantu^eb^ dakkhantuuti attho. ^b^sabbe^eb^ devaa ^b^yaava brahmanivesanaa^eb^ yaava brahmalokaa ^b^ma.m anuvattantu^eb^ anukuulaa bhavantu.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ ^b^visi.t.thamadhunaadenaa^eb^ti ^a^M1.0126^ea^ visa.t.thena madhurena naadena, ^b^amatabherimaahani^eb^nti amatabheri.m devadundubhi.m pahari.m, ^b^etthantare^eb^ etasmi.m dasasahassicakkavaa.labbhantare ^b^sabbe janaa^eb^ mana ^b^madhura.m gira.m^eb^ sadda.m ^b^su.nantu^eb^ manasi karontu.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ ^b^dhammameghena vassante^eb^ dhammadesanaamayena naadena tabbohaaraparamatthagambhiiramadhurasukhumatthavasse vassante vassamaane sammaasambuddhaanubhaavena ^b^sabbe^eb^ bhikkhubhikkhuniiaadayo ^b^anaasavaa^eb^ nikkilesaa ^b^hontu^eb^ bhavantu. ^b^yettha pacchimakaa sattaa^eb^ti ettha etesu raasibhuutesu catuusu parisasattesu ye sattaa pacchimakaa gu.navasena he.t.thimakaa, ^b^te^eb^ sabbe ^b^sotaapannaa bhavantuu^eb^ti adhippaayo.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ tadaa ^a^V1.0121^ea^ tilokavijayacakkavattiraajakaale ^b^daatabbaka.m^eb^ daatabbayuttaka.m, ^b^daana.m^eb^ katvaa, ^b^asesato^eb^ nissesena, ^b^siila.m^eb^ siilapaarami.m, ^b^puuretvaa nekkhamme^eb^ nekkhammapaaramitaaya, ^b^paarami.m^eb^ ko.ti.m patvaa, ^b^uttama.m sambodhi.m^eb^ catumagga~naa.na.m, ^b^patto^eb^ bhavaami bhaveyya.m.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ ^b^pa.n.dite^eb^ pa~n~navante medhaavino ^b^paripucchitvaa^eb^ ``ki.m, bhante, kattabba.m? ki.m na kattabba.m? ki.m kusala.m? ki.m akusala.m? ki.m katvaa saggamokkhadvayassa bhaagii hotii''ti pucchitvaa, eva.m pa~n~naapaarami.m puuretvaati ^a^P0.0113^ea^ attho. ^b^katvaa viiriyamuttama^eb^nti uttama.m se.t.tha.m .thaananisajjaadiisu avicchinna.m viiriya.m katvaa, viiriyapaarami.m puuretvaati attho. sakalaviruddhajanehi kataanaadaraadhivaasanaa^b^khantiyaa paarami.m^eb^ ko.ti.m ^b^gantvaa^eb^ khantipaarami.m puuretvaa ^b^uttama.m sambodhi.m^eb^ uttama.m sambuddhatta.m ^b^patto^eb^ bhavaami bhaveyya.m.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ ^b^katvaa da.lhamadhi.t.thaana^eb^nti ``mama sariirajiivitesu vinassantesupi pu~n~nakammato na viramissaamii''ti acalavasena da.lha.m adhi.t.thaanapaarami.m katvaa ``siise chijjamaanepi musaavaada.m na kathessaamii''ti saccapaaramitaaya ko.ti.m ^b^puuriya^eb^ puuretvaa ``sabbe sattaa sukhii averaa''tiaadinaa mettaapaaramitaaya ko.ti.m patvaa ^b^uttama.m sambodhi.m patto^eb^ti attho.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ sajiivakaajiivakavatthuuna.m ^b^laabhe^eb^ ca tesa.m ^b^alaabhe^eb^ ca kaayikacetasika^b^sukhe^eb^ ceva tathaa ^b^dukkhe^eb^ ca saadarajanehi kate, ^b^sammaane^eb^ ^a^M1.0127^ea^ ceva omaane, ^b^ca sabbattha samako^eb^ samaanamaanaso upekkhaapaarami.m puuretvaa ^b^uttama.m sambodhi.m patto^eb^ paapu.neyyanti attho.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ ^b^kosajja.m^eb^ kusiitabhaava.m, ^b^bhayato^eb^ bhayavasena ``apaayadukkhabhaagii''ti ^b^disvaa^eb^ ~natvaa akosajja.m akusiitabhaava.m aliinavutti.m, ^b^viiriya.m khemato^eb^ khemavasena ``nibbaanagaamii''ti ^b^disvaa^eb^ ~natvaa ^b^aaraddhaviiriyaa hotha^eb^ bhavatha. ^b^esaa buddhaanusaasanii^eb^ esaa buddhaana.m anusi.t.thi.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ ^b^vivaada.m bhayato disvaa^eb^ti vivaada.m kalaha.m bhayato disvaa ``apaayabhaagii''ti disvaa ~natvaa ^b^avivaada.m^eb^ vivaadato virama.na.m ``nibbaanappattii''ti, ^b^khemato disvaa^eb^ ~natvaa ^b^samaggaa^eb^ ekaggacittaa ^b^sakhilaa^eb^ sili.t.thaa mettaaya dhuragataaya sobhamaanaa ^b^hothaa^eb^ti attho. ^b^esaa^eb^ kathaa mantanaa udiira.naa buddhaana.m ^b^anusaasanii^eb^ ovaadadaana.m.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ ^b^pamaada.m^eb^ .thaananisajjaadiisu sativippavaasena vihara.na.m ^b^bhayato^eb^ ``nibbattanibbatta.t.thaanesu dukkhitaduruupaappannapaanataadisa.mvattanaka.m ^a^V1.0122^ea^ apaayaadigamana~ncaa''ti ^b^disvaa^eb^ ~natvaa, ^b^appamaada.m^eb^ sabbakiriyaasu satiyaa vihara.na.m, ^b^khemato^eb^ va.d.dhito ``nibbaanasampaapu.nana''nti ^b^disvaa^eb^ paccakkhato ~natvaa ^b^a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m^eb^ sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhiiti a.t.thaavayava.m sammaasambodhiyaa ^a^P0.0114^ea^ magga.m adhigamuupaaya.m ^b^bhaavetha^eb^ va.d.dhetha manasi karotha, ^b^esaa^eb^ kathaa bhaasanaa udiira.naa ^b^buddhaanusaasanii^eb^ buddhaana.m anusi.t.thiiti attho.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ^b^samaagataa bahuu buddhaa^eb^ti anekasatasahassasa"nkhyaa paccekabuddhaa samaagataa raasibhuutaa, ^b^sabbaso^eb^ sabbappakaarena ^b^arahantaa^eb^ ca khii.naasavaa anekasatasahassaa samaagataa raasibhuutaa. tasmaa te buddhe ca ^b^arahante^eb^ ca ^b^vandamaane^eb^ vandanaarahe ^b^namassatha^eb^ a"ngapacca"nganamakkaarena namassatha vandatha.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ ^b^eva.m^eb^ iminaa mayaa vuttappakaarena ^b^acintiyaa^eb^ cintetu.m asakku.neyyaa, ^b^buddhaa, buddhadhammaa^eb^ti buddhehi desitaa cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa...pe0... a.t.tha"ngiko ^a^M1.0128^ea^ maggo, pa~ncakkhandhaa, hetupaccayo aaramma.napaccayotiaadayo dhammaa, buddhaana.m vaa sabhaavaa acintiyaa cintetu.m asakku.neyyaa, ^b^acintiye^eb^ cintaavisayaatikkante ^b^pasannaana.m^eb^ devamanussaana.m ^b^vipaako^eb^ devamanussasampattinibbaanasampattisa"nkhaato cintetu.m asakku.neyyo sa"nkhyaatikkanto ^b^hoti^eb^ bhavati.

[03] iti ettaavataa ca yathaa addhaanagaamino ``magga.m no aacikkhaa''ti pu.t.thena ``vaama.m mu~ncitvaa dakkhi.na.m ga.nhathaa''ti vutte tena maggena gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu kattabbakicca.m ni.t.thaapetvaa puna mu~ncitena aparena vaamamaggena gataapi gaamanigamaadiisu kattabbakicca.m ni.t.thaapenti, evameva buddhaapadaana.m kusalaapadaanavasena ni.t.thaapetvaa tadeva akusalaapadaanavasena vitthaaretu.m ida.m pa~nhakamma.m --
[21] ``dukkara~nca abbhakkhaana.m, abbhakkhaana.m punaapara.m.
[22] abbhakkhaana.m silaavedho, sakalikaapi ca vedanaa..
[21] ``naa.laagiri sattacchedo, siisadukkha.m yavakhaadana.m.
[22] pi.t.thidukkhamatiisaaro, ime akusalakaara.naa''ti..

[03] attha pa.thamapa~nhe -- ^b^dukkara^eb^nti chabbassaani dukkarakaarikaa. atiite kassapasammaasambuddhakaale ^a^V1.0123^ea^ bodhisatto jotipaalo naama braahma.namaa.navo hutvaa nibbatto braahma.najaativasena saasane appasanno tassa bhagavato pilotikakammanissandena ``kassapo bhagavaa''ti sutvaa ``kuto mu.n.dakassa sama.nassa bodhi, bodhi paramadullabhaa''ti ^a^P0.0115^ea^ aaha. so tena kammanissandena anekajaatisatesu narakaadidukkhamanubhavitvaa tasseva bhagavato anantara.m teneva laddhabyaakara.nena kammena jaatisa.msaara.m khepetvaa pariyosaane vessantarattabhaava.m patvaa tato cuto tusitabhavane nibbatto. devataayaacanena tato cavitvaa sakyakule nibbatto ~naa.nassa paripaakattaa sakalajambudiiparajja.m pahaaya anomaanadiitiire sunisitenaasinaa samaku.takesakalaapa.m chinditvaa brahmunaa aaniite iddhimaye kappassa sa.n.thaanakaale padumagabbhe nibbatte a.t.tha parikkhaare pa.tiggahetvaa pabbajitvaa bodhi~naa.nadassanassa taava aparipakkattaa ^a^M1.0129^ea^ buddhabhaavaaya maggaamagga.m ajaanitvaa chabbassaani uruvelajanapade ekaahaaraekaalopaekapuggalaekamaggaekaasanabhojanavasena a.t.thicammanahaarusesa.m nimma.msarudhirapetaruupasadisasariiro ^b^padhaanasutte^eb^ (su0 ni0 427 aadayo) vuttanayeneva padhaana.m mahaaviiriya.m dukkarakaarika.m akaasi. so ima.m dukkarakaarika.m ``sambodhiyaa magga.m na hotii''ti cintetvaa gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu pa.niitaahaara.m paribhu~njitvaa pii.nindriyo paripu.n.nadvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.no kamena bodhima.n.damupagantvaa pa~nca maare jinitvaa buddho jaatoti.
[21] ``avacaaha.m jotipaalo, sugata.m kassapa.m tadaa.
[22] kuto nu bodhi mu.n.dassa, bodhi paramadullabhaa..
[21] ``tena kammavipaakena, acari.m dukkara.m bahu.m.
[22] chabbassaanuruvelaaya.m, tato bodhimapaapu.ni.m..
[21] ``naaha.m etena maggena, paapu.ni.m bodhimuttama.m.
[22] kummaggena gavesissa.m, pubbakammena vaarito..
[21] ``pu~n~napaapaparikkhii.no, sabbasantaapavajjito.
[22] asoko anupaayaaso, nibbaayissamanaasavo''ti.. (apa0 thera 1.39.92-95).

[03] dutiyapa~nhe -- ^b^abbhakkhaana^eb^nti abhi akkhaana.m paribhaasana.m. atiite kira bodhisatto suddakule ^a^V1.0124^ea^ jaato apaaka.to appasiddho munaa.li naama dhutto hutvaa pa.tivasati. tadaa mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo surabhi ^a^P0.0116^ea^ naama paccekabuddho kenaci kara.niiyena tassa samiipa.t.thaana.m paapu.ni. so ta.m disvaava ``dussiilo paapadhammo aya.m sama.no''tiaadinaa abbhaacikkhi. so tena akusalanissandena narakaadiisu anekavassasahassaani dukkhamanubhavitvaa imasmi.m pacchimattabhaave yadaa titthiyaa pa.thamatara.m bhagavato tusitabhavane vasanasamaye ca paaka.taa hutvaa sakalajana.m va~ncetvaa dvaasa.t.thidi.t.thiyo diipetvaa vicaranti, tadaa tusitapuraa cavitvaa sakyaraajakule nibbattitvaa kamena buddho jaato. titthiyaa suuriyuggamane khajjopanakaa viya vihatalaabhasakkaaraa bhagavati aaghaata.m bandhitvaa vicaranti. tasmi.m samaye raajagahase.t.thi ga"ngaaya jaala.m bandhitvaa kii.lanto rattacandanagha.tika.m disvaa amhaaka.m gehe candanaani bahuuni, ima.m bhama.m aaropetvaa tena bhamakaarehi ^a^M1.0130^ea^ patta.m likhaapetvaa ve.luparamparaaya laggetvaa ``ye ima.m patta.m iddhiyaa aagantvaa ga.nhanti, tesa.m bhattiko bhavissaamii''ti bheri.m caraapesi.

[03] tadaa titthiyaa ``na.t.thamhaa daani na.t.thamhaa daanii''ti mantetvaa niga.n.tho naa.taputto sakaparisa.m evamaaha -- ``aha.m ve.lusamiipa.m gantvaa aakaase ulla"nganaakaara.m karomi, `tumhe chavadaarumaya.m patta.m pa.ticca maa iddhi.m karothaa'ti ma.m khandhe gahetvaa vaarethaa''ti, te tathaa gantvaa tathaa aka.msu.

[03] tadaa pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajo ca moggallaano ca tigaavute selapabbatamatthake .thatvaa pi.n.dapaataga.nhanatthaaya ciivara.m paarupantaa ta.m kolaahala.m su.ni.msu. tesu moggallaano pi.n.dolabhaaradvaaja.m ``tva.m aakaasena gantvaa ta.m patta.m ga.nhaahii''ti aaha. so ``bhante, tumheyeva bhagavataa iddhimantaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapitaa, tumheva ga.nhathaa''ti aaha. tathaapi ``mayaa aa.natto tvameva ga.nhaahii''ti aa.natto attanaa .thita.m tigaavuta.m selapabbata.m paadatale laggetvaa ukkhaliyaa pidhaana.m viya sakalaraajagahanagara.m chaadesi, tadaa nagaravaasino pha.likapabbate aavuta.m rattasuttamiva ta.m thera.m passitvaa ``bhante bhaaradvaaja, amhe rakkhathaa''ti ugghosayi.msu, bhiitaa suppaadiini siise aka.msu. tadaa thero ta.m pabbata.m .thita.t.thaane vissajjetvaa iddhiyaa gantvaa ta.m patta.m aggahesi, tadaa nagaravaasino mahaakolaahalamaka.msu.

[03] bhagavaa ve.luvanaaraame nisinno ta.m sadda.m sutvaa ``ki.m eso saddo''ti aananda.m pucchi. ``bhaaradvaajena, bhante, pattassa gahitattaa santu.t.thaa nagaravaasino ukku.t.thisaddamaka.msuu''ti ^a^P0.0117^ea^ aaha. tadaa bhagavaa aayati.m paruupavaadamocanattha.m ta.m patta.m aaharaapetvaa bhedaapetvaa a~njanupapisana.m katvaa ^a^V1.0125^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m daapesi, daapetvaa ca pana ``na, bhikkhave, iddhivikubbanaa kaatabbaa, yo kareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti (cuu.lava0 252 thoka.m visadisa.m) sikkhaapada.m pa~n~naapesi.

[03] tato titthiyaa ``sama.nena kira gotamena saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m, te jiivitahetupi ta.m naatikkamanti, maya.m iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissaamaa''ti tattha tattha raasibhuutaa kolaahalamaka.msu. atha raajaa bimbisaaro ta.m sutvaa bhagavato santika.m gantvaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisinno bhagavantamevamaaha ^a^M1.0131^ea^ -- ``titthiyaa, bhante, `iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissaamaa'ti ugghosentii''ti. ``ahampi, mahaaraaja, karissaamii''ti. ``nanu, bhante, bhagavataa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta''nti. ``tameva, mahaaraaja, pucchissaami, tavuyyaane ambaphalaadiini khaadantaana.m `ettako da.n.do'ti da.n.da.m .thapento tavaapi ekato katvaa .thapesii''ti. ``na mayha.m, bhante, da.n.do''ti. ``eva.m, mahaaraaja, na mayha.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m atthii''ti. ``kattha, bhante, paa.tihaariya.m bhavissatii''ti? ``saavatthiyaa samiipe ka.n.dambarukkhamuule, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``saadhu, bhante, ta.m passissaamaa''ti. tato titthiyaa ``ka.n.dambarukkhamuule kira paa.tihaariya.m bhavissatii''ti sutvaa nagarassa saamantaa ambarukkhe chedaapesu.m, naagaraa mahaaa"nga.na.t.thaane ma~ncaatima~nca.m a.t.taadayo bandhi.msu, sakalajambudiipavaasino raasibhuutaa puratthimadisaayameva dvaadasayojanaani pharitvaa a.t.tha.msu. sesadisaasupi tadanuruupenaakaarena sannipati.msu.

[03] bhagavaapi kaale sampatte aasaa.lhipu.n.namaasiya.m paatova kattabbakicca.m ni.t.thaapetvaa ta.m .thaana.m gantvaa nisiidi. tasmi.m kha.ne ka.n.do naama uyyaanapaalo kipillikapu.te supakka.m ambaphala.m disvaa ``sacaaha.m ima.m ra~n~no dadeyya.m, kahaapa.naadisaara.m labheyya.m, bhagavato upanaamite pana idhalokaparalokesu sampatti bhavissatii''ti bhagavato upanaamesi. bhagavaa ta.m pa.tiggahetvaa aanandatthera.m aa.naapesi -- ``ima.m phala.m madditvaa paana.m dehii''ti. thero tathaa akaasi. bhagavaa ambarasa.m pivitvaa amba.t.thi.m uyyaanapaalassa datvaa ``ima.m ropehii''ti aaha. so vaaluka.m viyuuhitvaa ta.m ropesi, aanandatthero ku.n.dikaaya udaka.m aasi~nci. tasmi.m kha.ne amba"nkuro u.t.thahitvaa mahaajanassa passantasseva saakhaavi.tapapupphaphalapallavabharito ^a^P0.0118^ea^ pa~n~naayittha. patita.m ambaphala.m khaadantaa sakalajambudiipavaasino khaya.m paapetu.m naasakkhi.msu.

[03] atha bhagavaa puratthimacakkavaa.lato yaava pacchimacakkavaa.la.m, taava imasmi.m cakkavaa.le mahaamerumuddhani ratanaca"nkama.m maapetvaa anekaparisaahi siihanaada.m nadaapento ^b^dhammapada.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ vuttanayena mahaaiddhipaa.tihaariya.m katvaa titthiye madditvaa te vippakaara.m paapetvaa paa.tihiiraavasaane purimabuddhaaci.n.navasena ^a^V1.0126^ea^ taavati.msabhavana.m gantvaa tattha vassa.mvu.t.tho nirantara.m temaasa.m ^a^M1.0132^ea^ abhidhamma.m desetvaa maatuppamukhaana.m anekadevataana.m sotaapattimaggaadhigamana.m katvaa, vu.t.thavasso devorohana.m katvaa anekadevabrahmaga.naparivuto sa"nkassapuradvaara.m oruyha lokaanuggaha.m akaasi. tadaa bhagavato laabhasakkaaro jambudiipamajjhottharamaano pa~ncamahaaga"ngaa viya ahosi.

[03] atha titthiyaa parihiinalaabhasakkaaraa dukkhii dummanaa pattakkhandhaa adhomukhaa nisiidi.msu. tadaa tesa.m upaasikaa ci~ncamaa.navikaa naama ativiya ruupaggappattaa te tathaa nisinne disvaa ``ki.m, bhante, eva.mdukkhii dummanaa nisinnaa''ti pucchi. ``ki.m pana tva.m, bhagini, appossukkaasii''ti? ``ki.m, bhante''ti? ``bhagini, sama.nassa gotamassa uppaadakaalato pa.t.thaaya maya.m hatalaabhasakkaaraa, nagaravaasino amhe na ki~nci ma~n~nantii''ti. ``mayaa ettha ki.m kaatabba''nti? ``tayaa sama.nassa gotamassa ava.n.na.m uppaadetu.m va.t.tatii''ti. saa ``na mayha.m bhaaro''ti vatvaa tattha ussaaha.m karontii vikaale jetavanavihaara.m gantvaa titthiyaana.m upassaye vasitvaa paato nagaravaasiina.m gandhaadiini gahetvaa bhagavanta.m vandanatthaaya gamanasamaye jetavanaa viya nikkhantaa, ``kattha sayitaa''ti pu.t.thaa ``ki.m tumhaaka.m mama sayita.t.thaanenaa''ti vatvaa pakkaami. saa kamena gacchante kaale pucchitaa ``sama.nenaaha.m gotamena ekagandhaku.tiya.m sayitvaa nikkhantaa''ti aaha. ta.m baalaputhujjanaa saddahi.msu, pa.n.ditaa sotaapannaadayo na saddahi.msu. ekadivasa.m saa daaruma.n.dala.m udare bandhitvaa upari rattapa.ta.m paridahitvaa gantvaa saraajikaaya parisaaya dhammadesanatthaaya nisinna.m bhagavanta.m evamaaha -- ``bho sama.na, tva.m dhamma.m desesi, tuyha.m pa.ticca uppannadaarakagabbhiniyaa mayha.m lasu.namaricaadiini na vicaaresii''ti? ``tathaabhaava.m, bhagini, tva~nceva pajaanaasi, aha~ncaa''ti. saa ``evameva methunasa.msaggasamaya.m dveyeva jaananti, na a~n~ne''ti aaha.

[03] tasmi.m kha.ne sakkassa pa.n.dukambalasilaasana.m u.nhaakaara.m dassesi. sakko aavajjento ^a^P0.0119^ea^ ta.m kaara.na.m ~natvaa dve devaputte aa.naapesi -- ``tumhesu eko muusikava.n.na.m maapetvaa tassaa daaruma.n.dalassa bandhana.m chindatu, eko vaatama.n.dala.m samu.t.thaapetvaa paarutapa.ta.m uddha.m khipatuu''ti. te gantvaa tathaa aka.msu. daaruma.n.dala.m patamaana.m tassaa paadapi.t.thi.m bhindi. dhammasabhaaya.m sannipatitaa puthujjanaa sabbe ``are, du.t.thacori, tva.m evaruupassa lokattayasaamino ^a^M1.0133^ea^ evaruupa.m abbhakkhaana.m akaasii''ti u.t.thahitvaa ekekamu.t.thipahaara.m datvaa sabhaaya niihari.msu, dassanaatikkantaaya pathavii vivaramadaasi. tasmi.m kha.ne aviicito jaalaa u.t.thahitvaa kuladattikena ^a^V1.0127^ea^ rattakambaleneva ta.m acchaadetvaa aviicimhi pakkhipi, bhagavato laabhasakkaaro atirekataro ahosi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``sabbaabhibhussa buddhassa, nando naamaasi saavako.
[22] ta.m abbhakkhaaya niraye, cira.m sa.msarita.m mayaa..
[21] ``dasavassasahassaani, niraye sa.msari.m cira.m.
[22] manussabhaava.m laddhaaha.m, abbhakkhaana.m bahu.m labhi.m..
[21] ``tena kammaavasesena, ci~ncamaa.navikaa mama.m.
[22] abbhaacikkhi abhuutena, janakaayassa aggato''ti.. (apa0 thera 1.39.70-72).

[03] tatiyapa~nhe -- ^b^abbhakkhaana^eb^nti abhi akkhaana.m akkosana.m. atiite kira bodhisatto apaaka.tajaatiya.m uppanno munaa.li naama dhutto hutvaa dujjanasa.msaggabalena surabhi.m naama paccekabuddha.m ``dussiilo paapadhammo aya.m bhikkhuu''ti akkosi. so tena akusalena vaciikammena bahuuni vassasahassaani niraye paccitvaa imasmi.m pacchimattabhaave dasapaaramitaasa.msiddhibalena buddho jaato laabhaggayasaggappatto ahosi. puna titthiyaa ussaahajaataa -- ``katha.m nu kho sama.nassa gotamassa ayasa.m uppaadessaamaa''ti dukkhii dummanaa nisiidi.msu. tadaa sundarii naamekaa paribbaajikaa te upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa .thitaa tu.nhiibhuute ki~nci avadante disvaa ``ki.m mayha.m doso''ti pucchi. ``sama.nena gotamena amhe vihe.thiyamaane tva.m appossukkaa viharissasi, ida.m tava doso''ti. ``evamaha.m tattha ki.m karissaamii''ti? ``tva.m sama.nassa gotamassa ava.n.na.m uppaadetu.m sakkhissasii''ti? ``sakkhissaami, ayyaa''ti vatvaa tato pa.t.thaaya vuttanayena di.t.thadi.t.thaana.m ``sama.nena gotamena ekagandhaku.tiya.m sayitvaa nikkhantaa''ti vatvaa akkosati paribhaasati. titthiyaapi ``passatha, bho, sama.nassa gotamassa kamma''nti akkosanti paribhaasanti. vutta~nheta.m --
[21] ``munaa.li ^a^P0.0120^ea^ naamaha.m dhutto, pubbe a~n~naasu jaatisu.
[22] paccekabuddha.m surabhi.m, abbhaacikkhi.m aduusaka.m..
[21] ``tena ^a^M1.0134^ea^ ^a^V1.0128^ea^ kammavipaakena, niraye sa.msari.m cira.m.
[22] bahuu vassasahassaani, dukkha.m vedesi vedana.m..
[21] ``tena kammaavasesena, idha pacchimake bhave.
[22] abbhakkhaana.m mayaa laddha.m, sundarikaaya kaara.naa''ti.. (apa0 thera 1.39.67-69).

[03] catutthapa~nhe -- ^b^abbhakkhaana.m^eb^ abhi visesena akkosana.m paribhaasana.m. atiite kira bodhisatto braahma.nakule uppanno bahussuto bahuuhi sakkato puujito taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa himavante vanamuulaphalaahaaro bahumaa.nave mante vaacento vaasa.m kappesi. eko pa~ncaabhi~n~naaa.t.thasamaapattilaabhii taapaso tassa santika.m agamaasi. so ta.m disvaava issaapakato ta.m aduusaka.m isi.m ``kaamabhogii kuhako aya.m isii''ti abbhaacikkhi, attano sisse ca aaha -- ``aya.m isi evaruupo anaacaarako''ti. tepi tatheva akkosi.msu paribhaasi.msu. so tena akusalakammavipaakena vassasahassaani niraye dukkhamanubhavitvaa imasmi.m pacchimattabhaave buddho hutvaa laabhaggayasaggappatto aakaase pu.n.nacando viya paaka.to jaato. tatheva titthiyaa abbhakkhaanenapi asantu.t.thaa punapi sundariyaa abbhakkhaana.m kaaretvaa suraadhutte pakkosaapetvaa la~nja.m datvaa ``tumhe sundari.m maaretvaa jetavanadvaarasamiipe maalaakacavarena chaadethaa''ti aa.naapesu.m. te tathaa kari.msu. tato titthiyaa ``sundari.m na passaamaa''ti ra~n~no aarocesu.m. raajaa ``pariyesathaa''ti aaha. te attanaa paatita.t.thaanato gahetvaa ma~ncaka.m aaropetvaa ra~n~no dassetvaa ``passatha, bho, sama.nassa gotamassa saavakaana.m kamma''nti bhagavato bhikkhusa"nghassa ca sakalanagare ava.n.na.m ugghosentaa vicari.msu. sundari.m aamakasusaane a.t.take .thapesu.m. raajaa ``sundarimaarake pariyesathaa''ti aa.naapesi. tadaa dhuttaa sura.m pivitvaa ``tva.m sundari.m maaresi, tva.m maaresii''ti kalaha.m kari.msu. raajapurisaa te dhutte gahetvaa ra~n~no dassesu.m. raajaa ``ki.m, bha.ne, tumhehi sundarii maaritaa''ti? ``aama, devaa''ti. ``kehi aa.nattaa''ti? ``titthiyehi, devaa''ti. raajaa titthiye aaharaapetvaa bandhaapetvaa ``gacchatha, bha.ne, `buddhassa ava.n.natthaaya amhehi sayameva sundarii maaraapitaa, bhagavaa tassa saavakaa ca akaarakaa'ti ugghosathaa''ti aaha. te tathaa aka.msu ^a^M1.0135^ea^. sakalanagaravaasino nikka"nkhaa ahesu.m. raajaa titthiye ca dhutte ca maaraapetvaa cha.d.daapeti ^a^P0.0121^ea^. tato bhagavato bhiyyosomattaaya laabhasakkaaro va.d.dhi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``braahma.no ^a^V1.0129^ea^ sutavaa aasi.m, aha.m sakkatapuujito.
[22] mahaavane pa~ncasate, mante vaacemi maa.nave..
[21] ``tatthaagato isi bhiimo, pa~ncaabhi~n~no mahiddhiko.
[22] ta~ncaaha.m aagata.m disvaa, abbhaacikkhi.m aduusaka.m..
[21] ``tatoha.m avaca.m sisse, kaamabhogii aya.m isi.
[22] mayhampi bhaasamaanassa, anumodi.msu maa.navaa..
[21] ``tato maa.navakaa sabbe, bhikkhamaana.m kule kule.
[22] mahaajanassa aaha.msu, kaamabhogii aya.m isi..
[21] ``tena kammavipaakena, pa~ncabhikkhusataa ime.
[22] abbhakkhaana.m labhu.m sabbe, sundarikaaya kaara.naa''ti.. (apa0 thera 1.39.73-77).

[03] pa~ncame pa~nhe -- ^b^silaavedho^eb^ti aahatacitto sila.m pavijjhi. atiite kira bodhisatto ca kani.t.thabhaataa ca ekapituputtaa ahesu.m. te pitu accayena daase pa.ticca kalaha.m karontaa a~n~nama~n~na.m viruddhaa ahesu.m. bodhisatto attano balavabhaavena kani.t.thabhaatara.m ajjhottharitvaa tassupari paasaa.na.m pavijjhesi. so tena kammavipaakena narakaadiisu anekavassasahassaani dukkhamanubhavitvaa imasmi.m pacchimattabhaave buddho jaato. devadatto raahulakumaarassa maatulo pubbe serivaa.nijakaale bodhisattena saddhi.m vaa.nijo ahosi, te eka.m pa.t.tanagaama.m patvaa ``tva.m ekaviithi.m ga.nhaahi, ahampi ekaviithi.m ga.nhaamii''ti dvepi pavi.t.thaa. tesu devadattassa pavi.t.thaviithiya.m ji.n.nase.t.thibhariyaa ca nattaa ca dveyeva ahesu.m, tesa.m mahanta.m suva.n.nathaalaka.m malaggahita.m bhaajanantare .thapita.m hoti, ta.m suva.n.nathaalakabhaava.m ajaanantii ``ima.m thaalaka.m gahetvaa pi.landhana.m dethaa''ti aaha. so ta.m gahetvaa suuciyaa lekha.m ka.d.dhitvaa suva.n.nathaalakabhaava.m ~natvaa ``thoka.m datvaa ga.nhissaamii''ti cintetvaa gato. atha bodhisatta.m dvaarasamiipa.m aagata.m disvaa ``nattaa, ayye ^a^M1.0136^ea^, mayha.m kacchapu.ta.m ^a^P0.0122^ea^ pi.landhana.m dethaa''ti. saa ta.m pakkosaapetvaa nisiidaapetvaa ta.m thaalaka.m datvaa ``ima.m gahetvaa mayha.m nattaaya kacchapu.ta.m pi.landhana.m dethaa''ti. bodhisatto ta.m gahetvaa suva.n.nathaalakabhaava.m ~natvaa ``tena va~ncitaa''ti ~natvaa attano pasibbakaaya .thapitaa.t.thakahaapa.ne avasesabha.n.da~nca ^a^V1.0130^ea^ datvaa kacchapu.ta.m pi.landhana.m kumaarikaaya hatthe pi.landhaapetvaa agamaasi. so vaa.nijo punaagantvaa pucchi. ``taata, tva.m na ga.nhittha, mayha.m putto ida~ncida~nca datvaa ta.m gahetvaa gato''ti. so ta.m sutvaava hadayena phaalitena viya dhaavitvaa anubandhi. bodhisatto naava.m aaruyha pakkhandi. so ``ti.t.tha, maa palaayi maa palaayii''ti vatvaa ``nibbattanibbattabhave ta.m naasetu.m samattho bhaveyya''nti patthana.m akaasi.

[03] so patthanaavasena anekesu jaatisatasahassesu a~n~nama~n~na.m vihe.thetvaa imasmi.m attabhaave sakyakule nibbattitvaa kamena bhagavati sabba~n~nuta.m patvaa raajagahe viharante anuruddhaadiihi saddhi.m bhagavato santika.m gantvaa pabbajitvaa jhaanalaabhii hutvaa paaka.to bhagavanta.m vara.m yaaci -- ``bhante, sabbo bhikkhusa"ngho pi.n.dapaatikaadiini terasa dhuta"ngaani samaadiyatu, sakalo bhikkhusa"ngho mama bhaaro hotuu''ti. bhagavaa na anujaani. devadatto vera.m bandhitvaa parihiinajjhaano bhagavanta.m maaretukaamo ekadivasa.m vebhaarapabbatapaade .thitassa bhagavato upari .thito pabbatakuu.ta.m paviddhesi. bhagavato aanubhaavena aparo pabbatakuu.to ta.m patamaana.m sampa.ticchi. tesa.m gha.t.tanena u.t.thitaa papa.tikaa aagantvaa bhagavato paadapi.t.thiya.m pahari. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``vemaatubhaatara.m pubbe, dhanahetu hani.m aha.m.
[22] pakkhipi.m giriduggasmi.m, silaaya ca api.msayi.m..
[21] ``tena kammavipaakena, devadatto sila.m khipi.
[22] a"ngu.t.tha.m pi.msayii paade, mama paasaa.nasakkharaa''ti.. (apa0 thera 1.39.78-79).

[03] cha.t.thapa~nhe -- ^b^sakalikaavedho^eb^ti sakalikaaya gha.t.tana.m. atiite kira bodhisatto ekasmi.m kule nibbatto daharakaale mahaaviithiya.m kii.lamaano viithiya.m pi.n.daaya caramaana.m paccekabuddha.m disvaa ``aya.m mu.n.dako sama.no kuhi.m gacchatii''ti paasaa.nasakalika.m gahetvaa tassa paadapi.t.thiya.m khipi ^a^M1.0137^ea^. paadapi.t.thicamma.m chinditvaa ruhira.m nikkhami. so tena paapakammena anekavassasahassaani niraye mahaadukkha.m anubhavitvaa buddhabhuutopi kammapilotikavasena ^a^P0.0123^ea^ paadapi.t.thiya.m paasaa.nasakalikagha.t.tanena ruhiruppaada.m labhi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``pureha.m ^a^V1.0131^ea^ daarako hutvaa, kii.lamaano mahaapathe.
[22] paccekabuddha.m disvaana, magge sakalika.m khipi.m..
[21] ``tena kammavipaakena, idha pacchimake bhave.
[22] vadhattha.m ma.m devadatto, abhimaare payyojayii''ti.. (apa0 thera 1.39.80-81).

[03] sattamapa~nhe -- ^b^naa.laagirii^eb^ti dhanapaalako hatthii maara.natthaaya pesito. atiite kira bodhisatto hatthigopako hutvaa nibbatto hatthi.m aaruyha vicaramaano mahaapathe paccekabuddha.m disvaa ``kuto aagacchati aya.m mu.n.dako''ti aahatacitto khilajaato hatthinaa aasaadesi. so tena kammena apaayesu anekavassasahassaani dukkha.m anubhavitvaa pacchimattabhaave buddho jaato. devadatto ajaatasatturaajaana.m sahaaya.m katvaa ``tva.m, mahaaraaja, pitara.m ghaatetvaa raajaa hohi, aha.m buddha.m maaretvaa buddho bhavissaamii''ti sa~n~naapetvaa ekadivasa.m ra~n~no anu~n~naataaya hatthisaala.m gantvaa -- ``sve tumhe naa.laagiri.m so.lasasuraagha.te paayetvaa bhagavato pi.n.daaya cara.navelaaya.m pesethaa''ti hatthigopake aa.naapesi. sakalanagara.m mahaakolaahala.m ahosi, ``buddhanaagena hatthinaagassa yuddha.m passissaamaa''ti ubhato raajaviithiya.m ma~ncaatima~nca.m bandhitvaa paatova sannipati.msu. bhagavaapi katasariirapa.tijaggano bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. tasmi.m kha.ne vuttaniyaameneva naa.laagiri.m vissajjesu.m. so viithicaccaraadayo vidhamento aagacchati. tadaa ekaa itthii daaraka.m gahetvaa viithito viithi.m gacchati, hatthii ta.m itthi.m disvaa anubandhi. bhagavaa ``naa.laagiri, na ta.m hanatthaaya pesito, idhaagacchaahii''ti aaha. so ta.m sadda.m sutvaa bhagavantaabhimukho dhaavi. bhagavaa aparimaa.nesu cakkavaa.lesu anantasattesu phara.naaraha.m metta.m ekasmi.myeva naa.laagirimhi phari. so bhagavato mettaaya phu.to ^a^M1.0138^ea^ nibbhayo hutvaa bhagavato paadamuule nipati. bhagavaa tassa matthake hattha.m .thapesi. tadaa devabrahmaadayo acchariyabbhutajaatacittaa pupphaparaagaadiihi puujesu.m. sakalanagare ja.n.nukamattaa dhanaraasayo ahesu.m. raajaa ``pacchimadvaare dhanaani nagaravaasiina.m hontu, puratthimadvaare dhanaani raajabha.n.daagaare hontuu''ti bheri.m caraapesi. sabbe tathaa kari.msu. tadaa ^a^P0.0124^ea^ naa.laagiri dhanapaalo naama ahosi. bhagavaa ve.luvanaaraama.m agamaasi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``hatthaaroho pure aasi.m, paccekamunimuttama.m.
[22] pi.n.daaya vicaranta.m ta.m, aasaadesi.m gajenaha.m..
[21] ``tena ^a^V1.0132^ea^ kammavipaakena, bhanto naa.laagirii gajo.
[22] giribbaje puravare, daaru.no samupaagamii''ti.. (apa0 thera 1.39.82-83).

[03] a.t.thamapa~nhe -- ^b^satthacchedo^eb^ti satthena ga.n.daphaalana.m ku.thaaraaya satthena chedo. atiite kira bodhisatto paccantadese raajaa ahosi. so dujjanasa.msaggavasena paccantadese vaasavasena ca dhutto saahasiko ekadivasa.m khaggahattho pattikova nagare vicaranto niraaparaadhe jane khaggena phaalento agamaasi. so tena paapakammavipaakena bahuuni vassasahassaani niraye paccitvaa tiracchaanaadiisu dukkhamanubhavitvaa pakkaavasesena pacchimattabhaave buddhabhuutopi he.t.thaa vuttanayena devadattena khittapaasaa.nasakkhalikapahaarena u.t.thitaga.n.do ahosi. jiivako mettacittena ta.m ga.n.da.m phaalesi. vericittassa devadattassa ruhiruppaadakamma.m anantarika.m ahosi, mettacittassa jiivakassa ga.n.daphaalana.m pu~n~nameva ahosi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``raajaaha.m pattiko aasi.m, sattiyaa purise hani.m.
[22] tena kammavipaakena, niraye paccisa.m bhusa.m..
[21] ``kammuno tassa sesena, idaani sakala.m mama.
[22] paade chavi.m pakappesi, na hi kamma.m vinassatii''ti.. (apa0 thera 1.39.84-85).

[03] navame pa~nhe -- ^b^``siisadukkha^eb^nti siisaabaadho siisavedanaa. atiite kira bodhisatto keva.t.tagaame keva.t.to hutvaa nibbatti. so ekadivasa.m keva.t.tapurisehi ^a^M1.0139^ea^ saddhi.m macchamaara.na.t.thaana.m gantvaa macche maarente disvaa tattha somanassa.m uppaadesi, sahagataapi tatheva somanassa.m uppaadayi.msu. so tena akusalakammena caturaapaaye dukkhamanubhavitvaa imasmi.m pacchimattabhaave tehi purisehi saddhi.m sakyaraajakule nibbattitvaa kamena buddhatta.m pattopi saya.m siisaabaadha.m paccanubhosi. te ca sakyaraajaano ^b^dhammapada.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ ^a^P0.0125^ea^ (dha0 pa0 a.t.tha0 1.vi.da.duubhavatthu) vuttanayena vi.da.duubhasa"ngaame sabbe vinaasa.m paapu.ni.msu. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``aha.m keva.t.tagaamasmi.m, ahu.m keva.t.tadaarako.
[22] macchake ghaatite disvaa, janayi.m somanassaka.m..
[21] ``tena ^a^V1.0133^ea^ kammavipaakena, siisadukkha.m ahuu mama.
[22] sabbe sakkaa ca ha~n~ni.msu, yadaa hani vi.ta.tuubho''ti.. (apa0 thera 1.39.86-87).

[03] dasamapa~nhe -- ^b^yavakhaadana^eb^nti vera~njaaya.m yavata.n.dulakhaadana.m. atiite kira bodhisatto a~n~natarasmi.m kule nibbatto jaativasena ca andhabaalabhaavena ca phussassa bhagavato saavake madhurannapaane saalibhojanaadayo ca bhu~njamaane disvaa ``are mu.n.dakasama.naa, yava.m khaadatha, maa saalibhojana.m bhu~njathaa''ti akkosi. so tena akusalakammavipaakena anekavassasahassaani caturaapaaye dukkhamanubhavitvaa imasmi.m pacchimattabhaave kamena buddhatta.m patvaa lokasa"ngaha.m karonto gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu caritvaa ekasmi.m samaye vera~njabraahma.nagaamasamiipe saakhaavi.tapasampanna.m pucimandarukkhamuula.m paapu.ni. vera~njabraahma.no bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa anekapariyaayena bhagavanta.m jinitu.m asakkonto sotaapanno hutvaa ``bhante, idheva vassa.m upagantu.m va.t.tatii''ti aarocesi. bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena adhivaasesi. atha punadivasato pa.t.thaaya maaro paapimaa sakalavera~njabraahma.nagaamavaasiina.m maaraava.t.tana.m akaasi. pi.n.daaya pavi.t.thassa bhagavato maaraava.t.tanavasena ekopi ka.tacchubhikkhaamatta.m daataa naahosi. bhagavaa tucchapattova bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto punaaga~nchi. tasmi.m eva.m aagate tattheva nivu.t.thaa assavaa.nijaa ta.m divasa.m daana.m datvaa tato pa.t.thaaya bhagavanta.m pa~ncasatabhikkhuparivaara.m nimantetvaa pa~ncanna.m assasataana.m bhattato vibhaaga.m katvaa yava.m ko.t.tetvaa bhikkhuuna.m pattesu pakkhipi.msu ^a^M1.0140^ea^. sakalassa sahassacakkavaa.ladevataa sujaataaya paayaasapacanadivase viya dibboja.m pakkhipi.msu. bhagavaa paribhu~nji ^a^P0.0126^ea^, eva.m temaasa.m yava.m paribhu~nji. temaasaccayena maaraava.t.tane vigate pavaara.naadivase vera~njo braahma.no saritvaa mahaasa.mvegappatto buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m datvaa vanditvaa khamaapesi. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``phussassaaha.m paavacane, saavake paribhaasayi.m.
[22] yava.m khaadatha bhu~njatha, maa ca bhu~njatha saalayo..
[21] ``tena kammavipaakena, temaasa.m khaadita.m yava.m.
[22] nimantito braahma.nena, vera~njaaya.m vasi.m tadaa''ti.. (apa0 thera 1.39.88-89).

[03] ekaadasamapa~nhe ^a^V1.0134^ea^ -- ^b^pi.t.thidukkha^eb^nti pi.t.thiaabaadho. atiite kira bodhisatto gahapatikule nibbatto thaamasampanno ki~nci rassadhaatuko ahosi. tena samayena eko mallayuddhayodho sakalajambudiipe gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu mallayuddhe vattamaane purise paatetvaa jayappatto kamena bodhisattassa vasananagara.m patvaa tasmimpi jane paatetvaa gantumaaraddho. tadaa bodhisatto ``mayha.m vasana.t.thaane esa jaya.m patvaa gacchatii''ti tattha nagarama.n.dalamaagamma appo.tetvaa aagaccha mayaa saddhi.m yujjhitvaa gacchaati. so hasitvaa ``aha.m mahante purise paatesi.m, aya.m rassadhaatuko vaamanako mama ekahatthassaapi nappahotii''ti appo.tetvaa naditvaa aagacchi. te ubhopi a~n~nama~n~na.m hattha.m paraamasi.msu, bodhisatto ta.m ukkhipitvaa aakaase bhamitvaa bhuumiya.m paatento khandha.t.thi.m bhinditvaa paatesi. sakalanagaravaasino ukku.t.thi.m karontaa appo.tetvaa vatthaabhara.naadiihi bodhisatta.m puujesu.m. bodhisatto ta.m mallayodha.m uju.m sayaapetvaa khandha.t.thi.m ujuka.m katvaa ``gaccha ito pa.t.thaaya evaruupa.m maa karosii''ti vatvaa uyyojesi. so tena kammavipaakena nibbattanibbattabhave sariirasiisaadi dukkhamanubhavitvaa imasmi.m pacchimattabhaave buddhabhuutopi pi.t.thirujaadidukkhamanubhosi. tasmaa kadaaci pi.t.thidukkhe uppanne saariputtamoggallaane ``ito pa.t.thaaya dhamma.m desethaa''ti vatvaa saya.m sugataciivara.m pa~n~naapetvaa sayati, kammapilotika.m naama buddhamapi na mu~ncati. vutta~nheta.m --
[21] ``nibbuddhe ^a^M1.0141^ea^ vattamaanamhi, mallaputta.m nihe.thayi.m.
[22] tena kammavipaakena, pi.t.thidukkha.m ahuu mamaa''ti.. (apa0 thera 1.39.90).

[03] dvaadasamapa~nhe ^a^P0.0127^ea^ -- ^b^atisaaro^eb^ti lohitapakkhandikaavirecana.m. atiite kira bodhisatto gahapatikule nibbatto vejjakammena jiivika.m kappesi. so eka.m se.t.thiputta.m rogena vicchita.m tikicchanto bhesajja.m katvaa tikicchitvaa tassa deyyadhammadaane pamaadamaagamma apara.m osadha.m datvaa vamanavirecana.m akaasi. se.t.thi bahudhana.m adaasi. so tena kammavipaakena nibbattanibbattabhave lohitapakkhandikaabaadhena vicchito ahosi. imasmimpi pacchimattabhaave parinibbaanasamaye cundena kammaaraputtena pacitasuukaramaddavassa sakalacakkavaa.ladevataahi pakkhittadibbojena aahaarena saha bhuttakkha.ne lohitapakkhandikaavirecana.m ahosi. ko.tisatasahassaana.m hatthiina.m bala.m khayamagamaasi. bhagavaa visaakhapu.n.namaaya.m kusinaaraaya.m parinibbaanatthaaya gacchanto anekesu .thaanesu nisiidanto pipaasito paaniiya.m pivitvaa mahaadukkhena ^a^V1.0135^ea^ kusinaara.m patvaa paccuusasamaye parinibbaayi. kammapilotika.m evaruupa.m lokattayasaamimpi na vijahati. tena vutta.m --
[21] ``tikicchako aha.m aasi.m, se.t.thiputta.m virecayi.m.
[22] tena kammavipaakena, hoti pakkhandikaa mamaati..
[21] ``eva.m jino viyaakaasi, bhikkhusa"nghassa aggato.
[22] sabbaabhi~n~naabalappatto, anotatte mahaasare''ti.. (apa0 thera 1.39.91, 96).

[03] eva.m pa.ti~n~naatapa~nhaana.m, maatikaa.thapanavasena akusalaapadaana.m samatta.m naama hotiiti vutta.m ^b^ittha.m suda^eb^nti ittha.m iminaa pakaarena he.t.thaa vuttanayena. sudanti nipaato padapuura.natthe aagato. ^b^bhagavaa^eb^ bhaagyasampanno puuritapaaramimahaasatto --
[21] ``bhaagyavaa bhaggavaa yutto, bhagehi ca vibhattavaa.
[22] bhattavaa vantagamano, bhavesu bhagavaa tato''ti.. --

[25] evamaadigu.nayutto devaatidevo sakkaatisakko brahmaatibrahmaa buddhaatibuddho so mahaakaaru.niko bhagavaa ^b^attano buddhacariya.m^eb^ buddhakaara.na.m ^a^M1.0142^ea^ ^b^sambhaavayamaano^eb^ paaka.ta.m kurumaano ^b^buddhaapadaaniya.m naama^eb^ buddhakaara.napakaasaka.m naama ^b^dhammapariyaaya.m^eb^ dhammadesana.m sutta.m ^b^abhaasittha^eb^ kathesiiti.
[06] iti visuddhajanavilaasiniyaa apadaana-a.t.thakathaaya
[06] buddhaapadaanasa.mva.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] tato ^a^V1.0136^ea^ ^a^P0.0128^ea^ anantara.m apadaana.m sa"ngaayanto ``paccekabuddhaapadaana.m, aavuso aananda, bhagavataa kattha pa~n~natta''nti pu.t.tho ^b^``atha paccekabuddhaapadaana.m su.naathaa''^eb^ti aaha. tesa.m apadaanattho he.t.thaa vuttoyeva.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ ``su.naathaa''ti vuttapada.m uppattinibbattivasena pakaasento ^b^``tathaagata.m jetavane vasanta''^eb^ntiaadimaaha. tattha jetakumaarassa naamavasena tathaasa~n~nite vihaare catuuhi iriyaapathavihaarehi dibbabrahmaariyavihaarehi vaa ^b^vasanta.m^eb^ viharanta.m yathaa purimakaa vipassiaadayo buddhaa samatti.msapaaramiyo puuretvaa aagataa, tathaa amhaakampi bhagavaa aagatoti tathaagato. ta.m ^b^tathaagata.m^eb^ jetavane vasantanti sambandho. ^b^vedehamunii^eb^ti vedehara.t.the jaataa vedehii, vedehiyaa putto vedehiputto. mona.m vuccati ~naa.na.m, tena ito gato pavattoti muni. vedehiputto ca so muni ceti ``vedehiputtamunii''ti vattabbe ``va.n.naagamo''tiaadinaa niruttinayena i-kaarassa atta.m putta-saddassa ca lopa.m katvaa ``vedehamunii''ti vutta.m. ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m satimantaana.m dhitimantaana.m gatimantaana.m bahussutaana.m upa.t.thaakaana.m yadida.m aanando''ti (a0 ni0 1.219-223) etadagge .thapito aayasmaa aanando ^b^nata"ngo^eb^ namanakaaya"ngo a~njaliko hutvaa ``bhante, ^b^paccekabuddhaa naama^eb^ kiidisaa ^b^hontii''^eb^ti ^b^apucchii^eb^ti sambandho. ^b^te^eb^ paccekabuddhaa ^b^kehi hetubhi^eb^ kehi kaara.nehi ^b^bhavanti^eb^ uppajjanti. ^b^viiraa^eb^ti bhagavanta.m aalapati.

[03] 84-85^b^.^eb^ tato para.m vissajjitaakaara.m dassento ^b^``tadaaha sabba~n~nuvaro mahesii''^eb^tiaadimaaha. sabba.m atiitaadibheda.m hatthaamalaka.m viya jaanaatiiti ^a^M1.0143^ea^ sabba~n~nuu, sabba~n~nuu ca so varo uttamo ceti ^b^sabba~n~nuvaro^eb^. mahanta.m siilakkhandha.m, samaadhikkhandha.m, pa~n~naakkhandha.m, vimuttikkhandha.m, mahanta.m vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandha.m esati gavesatiiti ^b^mahesi. aanandabhadda.m^eb^ madhurena sarena ^b^tadaa^eb^ tasmi.m pucchitakaale ^b^aaha^eb^ kathesiiti sambandho. bho aananda, ^b^ye^eb^ paccekabuddhaa ^b^pubbabuddhesu^eb^ pubbesu atiitabuddhesu ^b^kataadhikaaraa^eb^ katapu~n~nasambhaaraa ^b^jinasaasanesu aladdhamokkhaa^eb^ appattanibbaanaa. ^b^te^eb^ sabbe paccekabuddhaa ^b^dhiiraa idha^eb^ imasmi.m loke ^b^sa.mvegamukhena^eb^ ekapuggala.m padhaana.m katvaa paccekabuddhaa jaataati attho. ^b^sutikkhapa~n~naa^eb^ su.t.thu tikkhapa~n~naa. ^b^vinaapi buddhehi^eb^ buddhaana.m ovaadaanusaasaniihi rahitaa api. ^b^parittakenapi^eb^ appamattakenapi ^b^aaramma.nena^eb^ ^a^P0.0129^ea^ ^b^paccekabodhi.m^eb^ pa.tiekka.m bodhi.m sammaasambuddhaanantara.m bodhi.m ^b^anupaapu.nanti^eb^ pa.tivijjhanti.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbamhi^eb^ ^a^V1.0137^ea^ ^b^lokamhi^eb^ sakalasmi.m lokattaye ^b^mama.m .thapetvaa^eb^ ma.m vihaaya ^b^pacekabuddhehi samova^eb^ sadiso eva ^b^natthi, tesa.m mahaamuniina.m^eb^ paccekabuddhaana.m ^b^ima.m va.n.na.m^eb^ ima.m gu.na.m ^b^padesamatta.m^eb^ sa"nkhepamatta.m ^b^aha.m^eb^ tumhaaka.m ^b^saadhu^eb^ saadhuka.m ^b^vakkhaami^eb^ kathessaamiiti attho.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ anaacariyakaa hutvaa ^b^sayameva buddhaana.m^eb^ attanaava pa.tividdhaana.m isiina.m antare ^b^mahaaisiina.m madhuuvakhudda.m^eb^ khuddakamadhupa.tala.m iva ^b^saadhuuni^eb^ madhuraani ^b^vaakyaani^eb^ udaanavacanaani ^b^anuttara.m^eb^ uttaravirahita.m ^b^bhesaja.m^eb^ osadha.m nibbaana.m ^b^patthayantaa^eb^ icchantaa ^b^sabbe^eb^ tumhe ^b^supasannacittaa^eb^ suppasannamanaa ^b^su.naatha^eb^ manasi karothaati attho.

[03] 88-89^b^.^eb^ ^b^paccekabuddhaana.m samaagataana^eb^nti raasibhuutaana.m uppannaana.m paccekabuddhaana.m. ari.t.tho, upari.t.tho, tagarasikhi, yasassii, sudassano, piyadassii, gandhaaro, pi.n.dolo, upaasabho, nitho, tatho, sutavaa, bhaavitatto, sumbho, subho, methulo, a.t.thamo, sumedho, aniigho, sudaa.tho, hi"ngu, hi"ngo, dvejaalino, a.t.thako, kosalo, subaahu, upanemiso, nemiso, santacitto, sacco, tatho, virajo, pa.n.dito, kaalo, upakaalo, vijito, jito, a"ngo, pa"ngo, guttijjito, passii, jahii, upadhi.m, dukkhamuula.m, aparaajito, sarabha"ngo, lomaha.mso ^a^M1.0144^ea^, ucca"ngamaayo, asito, anaasavo, manomayo, maanacchido, bandhumaa, tadaadhimutto, vimalo, ketumaa, kotumbara"ngo, maata"ngo, ariyo, accuto, accutagaami, byaamako, suma"ngalo, dibbilo caatiaadiina.m paccekabuddhasataana.m ^b^yaani^eb^ apadaanaani ^b^parampara.m^eb^ pacceka.m ^b^byaakara.naani^eb^ yo ca ^b^aadiinavo ya~nca viraagavatthu.m^eb^ analliiyanakaara.na.m ^b^yathaa ca^eb^ yena kaara.nena ^b^bodhi.m anupaapu.ni.msu^eb^ catumagga~naa.na.m paccakkha.m kari.msu. ^b^saraagavatthusuu^eb^ti su.t.thu alliiyitabbavatthuusu vatthukaamakilesakaamesu ^b^viraagasa~n~nii^eb^ virattasa~n~navanto ^b^rattamhi lokamhi^eb^ alliiyanasabhaavaloke ^b^viratacittaa^eb^ analliiyanamanaa ^b^hitvaa papa~nce^eb^ti raago papa~nca.m doso papa~nca.m sabbakilesaa papa~ncaati papa~ncasa"nkhaate kilese hitvaa ^b^jiya phanditaanii^eb^ti phanditaani dvaasa.t.thi di.t.thigataani ^a^P0.0130^ea^ jinitvaa ^b^tatheva^eb^ tena kaara.nena eva.m ^b^bodhi.m anupaapu.ni.msu^eb^ paccekabodhi~naa.na.m paccakkha.m kari.msuuti attho.

[03] 90-91^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbesu bhuutesu nidhaaya da.n.da^eb^nti tajjanaphaalanavadhabandhana.m nidhaaya .thapetvaa ^b^tesa.m^eb^ sabbasattaana.m antare ^b^a~n~natara.m^eb^ ka~nci eka^b^mpi^eb^ satta.m ^b^avihe.thaya.m^eb^ avihe.thayanto adukkhaapento ^b^mettena cittena^eb^ ``sabbe sattaa sukhitaa hontuu''ti mettaasahagatena cetasaa ^b^hitaanukampii^eb^ hitena anukampanasabhaavo. atha vaa ^b^sabbesu bhuutesu nidhaaya da.n.da^eb^nti ^b^sabbesuu^eb^ti sabbena sabba.m sabbathaa sabba.m asesa.m nissesa.m pariyaadiyanavacanameta.m. ^b^bhuutesuu^eb^ti bhuutaa vuccanti tasaa ca thaavaraa ca. yesa.m ^a^V1.0138^ea^ tasi.naa ta.nhaa appahiinaa, yesa~nca bhayabheravaa appahiinaa, te tasaa. ki.m kaara.naa vuccanti tasaa? tasanti uttasanti paritasanti bhaayanti santaasa.m aapajjanti, ta.m kaara.naa vuccanti tasaa. yesa.m tasi.naa ta.nhaa pahiinaa, yesa~nca bhayabheravaa pahiinaa, te thaavaraa. ki.m kaara.naa vuccanti thaavaraa? thiranti na tasanti na uttasanti na paritasanti na bhaayanti na santaasa.m aapajjanti, ta.m kaara.naa vuccanti thaavaraa.

[03] tayo da.n.daa -- kaayada.n.do, vaciida.n.do, manoda.n.doti. tividha.m kaayaduccarita.m kaayada.n.do, catubbidha.m vaciiduccarita.m vaciida.n.do, tividha.m manoduccarita.m manoda.n.do. sabbesu sakalesu bhuutesu sattesu ta.m tividha.m da.n.da.m nidhaaya nidahitvaa oropayitvaa samoropayitvaa nikkhipitvaa ^a^M1.0145^ea^ pa.tippassambhetvaa hi.msanattha.m agahetvaati sabbesu bhuutesu nidhaaya da.n.da.m. ^b^avihe.thaya.m a~n~natarampi tesa^eb^nti ekamekampi satta.m paa.ninaa vaa le.d.dunaa vaa da.n.dena vaa satthena vaa anduyaa vaa rajjuyaa vaa avihe.thayanto, sabbepi satte paa.ninaa vaa le.d.dunaa vaa da.n.dena vaa satthena vaa anduyaa vaa rajjuyaa vaa avihe.thaya.m avihe.thayanto a~n~natarampi tesa.m. ^b^na puttamiccheyya kuto sahaaya^eb^nti ^b^naa^eb^ti pa.tikkhepo. ^b^putta^eb^nti cattaaro puttaa atrajo putto, khettajo, dinnako, antevaasiko putto. ^b^sahaaya^eb^nti sahaayo vuccati yena saha aagamana.m phaasu, gamana.m phaasu, .thaana.m phaasu, nisajjaa phaasu, aalapana.m phaasu, sallapana.m phaasu, samullapana.m phaasu. na puttamiccheyya kuto sahaayanti puttampi na iccheyya na saadiyeyya na pattheyya na pihayeyya naabhijappeyya, kuto mitta.m vaa sandi.t.tha.m vaa sambhatta.m vaa sahaaya.m vaa iccheyya saadiyeyya pattheyya pihayeyya abhijappeyyaati na puttamiccheyya kuto sahaaya.m. ^b^eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo^eb^ti ^a^P0.0131^ea^ so paccekasambuddho pabbajjaasa"nkhaatena eko, adutiya.t.thena eko, ta.nhaaya pahaana.t.thena eko, ekantaviitaraagoti eko, ekantaviitadosoti eko, ekantaviitamohoti eko, ekantanikkilesoti eko, ekaayanamagga.m gatoti eko, eko anuttara.m paccekasambodhi.m abhisambuddhoti eko.

[03] katha.m so paccekasambuddho pabbajjaasa"nkhaatena eko? so hi paccekasambuddho sabba.m gharaavaasapalibodha.m chinditvaa, puttadaarapalibodha.m chinditvaa, ~naatipalibodha.m, mittaamaccapalibodha.m, sannidhipalibodha.m chinditvaa kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa nikkhamma anagaariya.m pabbajitvaa aki~ncanabhaava.m upagantvaa ekova carati viharati iriyati vattati paaleti yapeti yaapetiiti eva.m so paccekasambuddho pabbajjaasa"nkhaatena eko.

[03] katha.m ^a^V1.0139^ea^ so paccekasambuddho adutiya.t.thena eko? so eva.m pabbajito samaano eko ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevati appasaddaani appanigghosaani vijanavaataani manussaraahasseyyakaani pa.tisallaanasaaruppaani. so eko ti.t.thati, eko gacchati, eko nisiidati, eko seyya.m kappeti, eko gaama.m pi.n.daaya pavisati, eko pa.tikkamati, eko raho ^a^M1.0146^ea^ nisiidati, eko ca"nkamati, eko carati viharati iriyati vattati paaleti yapeti yaapetiiti eva.m so adutiya.t.thena eko.

[03] katha.m so paccekasambuddho ta.nhaaya pahaana.t.thena eko? so eko adutiyo appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto mahaapadhaana.m padahanto maara.m sasenaka.m namuci.m ka.nha.m pamattabandhu.m vidhametvaa ca ta.nhaajaalini.m visarita.m visattika.m pajahi vinodesi byanti.m akaasi anabhaava.m gamesi.
[21] ``ta.nhaadutiyo puriso, diighamaddhaana sa.msara.m.
[22] itthabhaava~n~nathaabhaava.m, sa.msaara.m naativattati..
[21] ``etamaadiinava.m ~natvaa, ta.nha.m dukkhassa sambhava.m.
[22] viitata.nho anaadaano, sato bhikkhu paribbaje''ti.. (itivu0 15, 105; mahaani0 191) --
[25] eva.m so paccekasambuddho ta.nhaaya pahaana.t.thena eko.

[03] katha.m so paccekasambuddho ekantaviitaraagoti eko? raagassa pahiinattaa ekantaviitaraagoti eko, dosassa pahiinattaa ekantaviitadosoti eko, mohassa pahiinattaa ekantaviitamohoti eko, kilesaana.m pahiinattaa ekantanikkilesoti eko, eva.m so paccekasambuddho ekantaviitaraagoti eko.

[03] katha.m so paccekasambuddho ekaayanamagga.m gatoti ^a^P0.0132^ea^ eko? ekaayanamaggo vuccati cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa, cattaaro sammappadhaanaa, cattaaro iddhipaadaa, pa~ncindriyaani, pa~nca balaani, satta bojjha"ngaa, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo.
[21] ``ekaayana.m ^a^V1.0140^ea^ jaatikhayantadassii, magga.m pajaanaati hitaanukampii.
[22] etena maggena tari.msu pubbe, tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha''nti.. (sa.m0 ni0 5.384; mahaani0 191) --
[25] eva.m so ekaayanamagga.m gatoti eko.

[03] katha.m so paccekasambuddho eko anuttara.m paccekasambodhi.m abhisambuddhoti eko? bodhi vuccati catuusu maggesu ~naa.na.m (mahaani0 191; cuu.lani0 khaggavisaa.nasuttaniddesa 121). pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m ^a^M1.0147^ea^ dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo viima.msaa vipassanaa sammaadi.t.thi. so paccekasambuddho tena paccekabodhi~naa.nena ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa''ti bujjhi, ``sabbe sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaa''ti bujjhi, ``sabbe dhammaa anattaa''ti bujjhi. ``avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa''ti bujjhi, ``sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na''nti bujjhi, ``vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa''nti bujjhi, ``naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana''nti bujjhi, ``sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso''ti bujjhi, ``phassapaccayaa vedanaa''ti bujjhi, ``vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa''ti bujjhi, ``ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana''nti bujjhi, ``upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo''ti bujjhi, ``bhavapaccayaa jaatii''ti bujjhi, ``jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na''nti bujjhi. ``avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho''ti bujjhi, ``sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho''ti bujjhi...pe0... ``bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho''ti bujjhi, ``jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.nanirodho''ti bujjhi. ``ida.m dukkha''nti bujjhi, ``aya.m dukkhasamudayo''ti bujjhi, ``aya.m dukkhanirodho''ti bujjhi, ``aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminipa.tipadaa''ti bujjhi. ``ime aasavaa''ti bujjhi, ``aya.m aasavasamudayo''ti bujjhi...pe0... ``pa.tipadaa''ti bujjhi, ``ime dhammaa abhi~n~neyyaa''ti bujjhi, ``ime dhammaa pahaatabbaa''ti bujjhi, ``ime dhammaa sacchikaatabbaa''ti bujjhi, ``ime dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti bujjhi. channa.m phassaayatanaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca bujjhi, pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m samudaya~nca...pe0... nissara.na~nca bujjhi, catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca bujjhi, ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti ^a^P0.0133^ea^ bujjhi.

[03] atha vaa ya.m bujjhitabba.m anubujjhitabba.m pa.tibujjhitabba.m sambujjhitabba.m adhigantabba.m phassitabba.m sacchikaatabba.m, sabba.m ta.m tena paccekabodhi~naa.nena bujjhi anubujjhi pa.tibujjhi sambujjhi ^a^V1.0141^ea^ adhiga~nchi phassesi sacchaakaasiiti, eva.m so paccekasambuddho eko anuttara.m paccekasambodhi.m abhisambuddhoti eko.

[03] ^b^care^eb^ti a.t.tha cariyaayo (cuu.lani0 khaggavisaa.nasuttaniddesa 121) -- iriyaapathacariyaa, aayatanacariyaa, saticariyaa, samaadhicariyaa, ~naa.nacariyaa, maggacariyaa, patticariyaa, lokatthacariyaa. iriyaapathacariyaati catuusu iriyaapathesu, aayatanacariyaati chasu ajjhattikabaahiresu aayatanesu, saticariyaati catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu, samaadhicariyaati catuusu jhaanesu, ~naa.nacariyaati catuusu ariyasaccesu, maggacariyaati catuusu ariyamaggesu, patticariyaati catuusu ^a^M1.0148^ea^ saama~n~naphalesu, lokatthacariyaati tathaagatesu arahantesu sammaasambuddhesu, padesato paccekasambuddhesu, padesato saavakesu.

[03] iriyaapathacariyaa ca pa.nidhisampannaana.m, aayatanacariyaa ca indriyesu guttadvaaraana.m, saticariyaa ca appamaadavihaariina.m, samaadhicariyaa ca adhicittamanuyuttaana.m, ~naa.nacariyaa ca buddhisampannaana.m, maggacariyaa ca sammaapa.tipannaana.m, patticariyaa ca adhigataphalaana.m, lokatthacariyaa ca tathaagataana.m arahantaana.m sammaasambuddhaana.m, padesato paccekasambuddhaana.m, padesato saavakaana.m. imaa a.t.tha cariyaayo.

[03] aparaapi a.t.tha cariyaayo -- adhimuccanto saddhaaya carati, pagga.nhanto viiriyena carati, upa.t.thapento satiyaa carati, avikkhepa.m karonto samaadhinaa carati, pajaananto pa~n~naaya carati, vijaananto vi~n~naa.nacariyaaya carati, eva.m pa.tipannassa kusalaa dhammaa aayatananti aayatanacariyaaya carati. eva.m pa.tipanno visesamadhigacchatiiti visesacariyaaya carati. imaa a.t.tha cariyaayo.

[03] aparaapi a.t.tha cariyaayo -- dassanacariyaa ca sammaadi.t.thiyaa, abhiniropanacariyaa ca sammaasa"nkappassa, pariggahacariyaa ca sammaavaacaaya, samu.t.thaanacariyaa ca sammaakammantassa, vodaanacariyaa ca sammaaaajiivassa, paggahacariyaa ca sammaavaayaamassa, upa.t.thaanacariyaa ca sammaasatiyaa, avikkhepacariyaa ca sammaasamaadhissa. imaa a.t.tha cariyaayo.

[03] ^b^khaggavisaa.nakappo^eb^ti yathaa khaggassa naama visaa.na.m ekameva hoti, adutiya.m, evameva so paccekasambuddho takkappo tassadiso tappa.tibhaago. yathaa atilo.na.m vuccati lo.nakappo, atitittaka.m ^a^V1.0142^ea^ vuccati tittakappo, atimadhura.m vuccati madhurakappo, atiu.nha.m vuccati aggikappo, atisiita.m vuccati himakappo, mahaaudakakkhandho ^a^P0.0134^ea^ vuccati samuddakappo, mahaabhi~n~naabalappatto saavako vuccati satthukappoti. evameva so paccekasambuddho khaggavisaa.nakappo, khaggavisaa.nasadiso khaggavisaa.napa.tibhaago eko adutiyo muttabandhano sammaa loke carati viharati iriyati vattati paaleti yapeti yaapetiiti eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo. tenaahu paccekasambuddhaa --
[21] ``sabbesu ^a^M1.0149^ea^ bhuutesu nidhaaya da.n.da.m, avihe.thaya.m a~n~natarampi tesa.m.
[22] na puttamiccheyya kuto sahaaya.m, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``sa.msaggajaatassa bhavanti snehaa, snehanvaya.m dukkhamida.m pahoti.
[22] aadiinava.m snehaja.m pekkhamaano. eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``mitte suhajje anukampamaano, haapeti attha.m pa.tibaddhacitto.
[22] eta.m bhaya.m santhave pekkhamaano, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``va.mso visaalova yathaa visatto, puttesu daaresu ca yaa apekkhaa.
[22] va.mse ka.liirova asajjamaano, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``migo ara~n~namhi yathaa abaddho, yenicchaka.m gacchati gocaraaya.
[22] vi~n~nuu naro serita.m pekkhamaano, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``aamantanaa hoti sahaayamajjhe, vaase ca .thaane gamane caarikaaya.
[22] anabhijjhita.m serita.m pekkhamaano, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``khi.d.daa ratii hoti sahaayamajjhe, puttesu pema.m vipula~nca hoti.
[22] piyavippayoga.m vijigucchamaano, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``caatuddiso ^a^M1.0150^ea^ ^a^P0.0135^ea^ appa.tigho ca hoti, santussamaano itariitarena.
[22] parissayaana.m sahitaa achambhii, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``dussa"ngahaa ^a^V1.0143^ea^ pabbajitaapi eke, atho gaha.t.thaa gharamaavasantaa.
[22] appossukko paraputtesu hutvaa, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``oropayitvaa gihibya~njanaani, sa~nchinnapatto yathaa kovi.laaro.
[22] chetvaana viiro gihibandhanaani, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``sace labhetha nipaka.m sahaaya.m, saddhi.m cara.m saadhuvihaaridhiira.m.
[22] abhibhuyya sabbaani parissayaani, careyya tenattamano satiimaa..
[21] ``no ce labhetha nipaka.m sahaaya.m, saddhi.m cara.m saadhuvihaaridhiira.m.
[22] raajaava ra.t.tha.m vijita.m pahaaya, eko care maata"ngara~n~neva naago..
[21] ``addhaa pasa.msaama sahaayasampada.m, se.t.thaa samaa sevitabbaa sahaayaa.
[22] ete aladdhaa anavajjabhojii, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``disvaa suva.n.nassa pabhassaraani, kammaaraputtena suni.t.thitaani.
[22] sa"ngha.t.tamaanaani duve bhujasmi.m, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``eva.m ^a^M1.0151^ea^ dutiiyena sahaa mamassa, vaacaabhilaapo abhisajjanaa vaa.
[22] eta.m bhaya.m aayati.m pekkhamaano, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``kaamaa hi citraa madhuraa manoramaa, viruuparuupena mathenti citta.m.
[22] aadiinava.m kaamagu.nesu disvaa, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``iitii ^a^P0.0136^ea^ ca ga.n.do ca upaddavo ca, rogo ca salla~nca bhaya~nca meta.m.
[22] eta.m bhaya.m kaamagu.nesu disvaa, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``siita~nca u.nha~nca khuda.m pipaasa.m, vaataatape .da.msasariisape ca.
[22] sabbaanipetaani abhibbhavitvaa, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``naagova ^a^V1.0144^ea^ yuuthaani vivajjayitvaa, sa~njaatakhandho padumii u.laaro.
[22] yathaabhiranta.m vihara.m ara~n~ne, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``a.t.thaanata.m sa"nga.nikaaratassa, ya.m phassaye saamayika.m vimutti.m.
[22] aadiccabandhussa vaco nisamma, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``di.t.thiivisuukaani upaativatto, patto niyaama.m pa.tiladdhamaggo.
[22] uppanna~naa.nomhi ana~n~naneyyo, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``nillolupo ^a^M1.0152^ea^ nikkuho nippipaaso, nimmakkha niddhantakasaavamoho.
[22] niraasayo sabbaloke bhavitvaa, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``paapa.m sahaaya.m parivajjayetha, anatthadassi.m visame nivi.t.tha.m.
[22] saya.m na seve pasuta.m pamatta.m, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``bahussuta.m dhammadhara.m bhajetha, mitta.m u.laara.m pa.tibhaanavanta.m.
[22] a~n~naaya atthaani vineyya ka"nkha.m, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``khi.d.da.m rati.m kaamasukha~nca loke, anala"nkaritvaa anapekkhamaano.
[22] vibhuusa.t.thaanaa virato saccavaadii, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``putta~nca ^a^P0.0137^ea^ daara.m pitara~nca maatara.m, dhanaani dha~n~naani ca bandhavaani.
[22] hitvaana kaamaani yathodhikaani, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``sa"ngo eso parittamettha sokhya.m, appassaado dukkhamevettha bhiyyo.
[22] ga.lo eso iti ~natvaa matimaa, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``sandaalayitvaana sa.myojanaani, jaala.mva bhetvaa salilambucaarii,
[22] aggiiva da.d.dha.m anivattamaano, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``okkhittacakkhuu ^a^M1.0153^ea^ ^a^V1.0145^ea^ na ca paadalolo, guttindriyo rakkhitamaanasaano.
[22] anavassuto apari.dayhamaano, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``ohaarayitvaa gihibya~njanaani, sa~nchannapatto yathaa paarichatto.
[22] kaasaayavattho abhinikkhamitvaa, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``rasesu gedha.m akara.m alolo, ana~n~naposii sapadaanacaarii.
[22] kule kule appa.tibaddhacitto, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``pahaaya pa~ncaavara.naani cetaso, upakkilese byapanujja sabbe.
[22] anissito chejja sinehadosa.m, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``vipi.t.thikatvaana sukha~nca dukkha.m, pubbeva somanassadomanassa.m.
[22] laddhaanupekkha.m samatha.m visuddha.m, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``aaraddhaviiriyo paramatthapattiyaa, aliinacitto akusiitavutti.
[22] da.lhanikkamo thaamabaluupapanno, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``pa.tisallaana.m ^a^P0.0138^ea^ jhaanamari~ncamaano, dhammesu nicca.m anudhammacaarii.
[22] aadiinava.m sammasitaa bhavesu, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``ta.nhakkhaya.m ^a^M1.0154^ea^ patthayamappamatto, ane.lamuugo sutavaa satiimaa.
[22] sa"nkhaatadhammo niyato padhaanavaa, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``siihova saddesu asantasanto, vaatova jaalamhi asajjamaano.
[22] paduma.mva toyena alimpamaano, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``siiho yathaa daa.thabalii pasayha, raajaa migaana.m abhibhuyya caarii.
[22] sevetha pantaani senaasanaani, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``metta.m ^a^V1.0146^ea^ upekkha.m karu.na.m vimutti.m, aasevamaano mudita~nca kaale.
[22] sabbena lokena avirujjhamaano, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``raaga~nca dosa~nca pahaaya moha.m, sandaalayitvaana sa.myojanaani.
[22] asantasa.m jiivitasa"nkhayamhi, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo..
[21] ``bhajanti sevanti ca kaara.natthaa, nikkaara.naa dullabhaa ajja mittaa.
[22] attatthapa~n~naa asuciimanussaa, eko care khaggavisaa.nakappo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^sabbesu bhuutesuu^eb^ti khaggavisaa.napaccekabuddhaapadaanasutta.m. kaa uppatti? sabbasuttaana.m catubbidhaa uppatti -- attajjhaasayato, parajjhaasayato, a.t.thuppattito, pucchaavasitoti. tattha khaggavisaa.nasuttassa avisesena pucchaavasito uppatti. visesena pana yasmaa ettha kaaci gaathaa tena ^a^M1.0155^ea^ tena paccekabuddhena pu.t.thena vuttaa, kaaci apu.t.thena attanaa adhigatamagganayaanuruupa.m ^a^P0.0139^ea^ udaana.myeva udaanentena, tasmaa kaayaci gaathaaya pucchaavasito, kaayaci attajjhaasayato uppatti. tattha yaa aya.m avisesena pucchaavasito uppatti, saa aadito pabhuti eva.m veditabbaa --

[03] eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati. atha kho aayasmato aanandassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``buddhaana.m patthanaa ca abhiniihaaro ca dissati, tathaa saavakaana.m, paccekabuddhaana.m na dissati, ya.mnuunaaha.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa puccheyya''nti? so pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa yathaakkamena etamattha.m pucchi. athassa bhagavaa pubbayogaavacarasutta.m abhaasi --

[02] ``pa~ncime, aananda, aanisa.msaa pubbayogaavacare di.t.theva dhamme pa.tikacceva a~n~na.m aaraadheti. no ce di.t.theva dhamme pa.tikacceva a~n~na.m aaraadheti, atha mara.nakaale a~n~na.m aaraadheti. atha devaputto samaano a~n~na.m aaraadheti. atha buddhaana.m sammukhiibhaave khippaabhi~n~no hoti. atha pacchime kaale paccekasambuddho hotii''ti.
[25] eva.m vatvaa puna aaha --
[02] ``paccekasambuddhaa ^a^V1.0147^ea^ naama, aananda, abhiniihaarasampannaa pubbayogaavacaraa honti, tasmaa paccekabuddhabuddhasaavakaana.m sabbesa.m patthanaa ca abhiniihaaro ca icchitabbo''ti.

[03] so aaha -- ``buddhaana.m, bhante, patthanaa kiiva cira.m va.t.tatii''ti. buddhaana.m, aananda, he.t.thimaparicchedena cattaari asa"nkhyeyyaani kappasatasahassa~nca, majjhimaparicchedena a.t.tha asa"nkhyeyyaani kappasatasahassa~nca, uparimaparicchedena so.lasa asa"nkhyeyyaani kappasatasahassa~nca. ete ca bhedaa pa~n~naadhikasaddhaadhikaviiriyaadhikaana.m vasena ~naatabbaa. pa~n~naadhikaana~nhi saddhaa mandaa hoti, pa~n~naa tikkhaa. saddhaadhikaana.m pa~n~naa majjhimaa hoti, saddhaa tikkhaa. viiriyaadhikaana.m saddhaa pa~n~naa mandaa hoti, viiriya.m tikkhanti. appatvaa pana cattaari asa"nkhyeyyaani kappasatasahassa~nca divase divase vessantaradaanasadisa.m daana.m dentopi tadanuruupe siilaadipaaramidhamme aacinantopi antaraa ^a^M1.0156^ea^ buddho bhavissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. kasmaa? ~naa.na.m gabbha.m na ga.nhaati, vepulla.m naapajjati, paripaaka.m na gacchatiiti. yathaa naama timaasacatumaasapa~ncamaasaccayena nipphajjanaka.m sassa.m ta.m ta.m kaala.m appatvaa divase divase satakkhattu.m sahassakkhattu.m ke.laayantopi udakena si~ncantopi antaraa pakkhena vaa maasena vaa nipphaadessatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. kasmaa? sassa.m gabbha.m na ga.nhaati, vepulla.m naapajjati, paripaaka.m na gacchatiiti. evameva.m appatvaa cattaari asa"nkhyeyyaani kappasatasahassa~nca antaraa buddho bhavissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. tasmaa yathaavuttameva ^a^P0.0140^ea^ kaala.m paaramipuura.na.m kaatabba.m ~naa.naparipaakatthaaya. ettakenaapi ca kaalena buddhatta.m patthayato abhiniihaarakara.ne a.t.tha sampattiyo icchitabbaa. aya~nhi --
[21] ``manussatta.m li"ngasampatti, hetu satthaaradassana.m.
[27] pabbajjaa gu.nasampatti, adhikaaro ca chandataa.
[22] a.t.thadhammasamodhaanaa, abhiniihaaro samijjhati''.. (bu0 va.m0 2.59).

[03] ^b^abhiniihaaro^eb^ti muulapa.nidhaanasseta.m adhivacana.m. tattha ^b^manussatta^eb^nti manussajaati. a~n~natra hi manussajaatiyaa avasesajaatiisu devajaatiyampi .thitassa pa.nidhi na ijjhati, tattha .thitena pana buddhatta.m patthayantena daanaadiini pu~n~nakammaani katvaa manussatta.myeva patthetabba.m, tattha .thatvaa pa.nidhi kaatabbo. eva~nhi samijjhati. ^b^li"ngasampattii^eb^ti purisabhaavo. maatugaamanapu.msakaubhatobya~njanakaana~nhi manussajaatiya.m .thitaanampi pa.nidhi na ijjhati. tattha .thitena pana buddhatta.m patthentena daanaadiini pu~n~nakammaani katvaa purisabhaavoyeva patthetabbo, tattha .thatvaa ^a^V1.0148^ea^ pa.nidhi kaatabbo. eva~nhi samijjhati. ^b^hetuu^eb^ti arahattassa upanissayasampatti. yo hi tasmi.m attabhaave vaayamanto arahatta.m paapu.nitu.m samattho, tassa pa.nidhi samijjhati, no itarassa yathaa sumedhapa.n.ditassa. so hi diipa"nkarapaadamuule pabbajitvaa tenattabhaavena arahatta.m paapu.nitu.m samattho ahosi. ^b^satthaaradassana^eb^nti buddhaana.m sammukhaadassana.m. eva~nhi ijjhati, no a~n~nathaa yathaa sumedhapa.n.ditassa. so hi diipa"nkara.m sammukhaa disvaa pa.nidhi.m akaasi. ^b^pabbajjaa^eb^ti anagaariyabhaavo. so ca kho saasane vaa kammavaadikiriyavaaditaapasaparibbaajakanikaaye vaa va.t.tati yathaa sumedhapa.n.ditassa. so hi sumedho naama taapaso hutvaa pa.nidhi.m akaasi. ^b^gu.nasampattii^eb^ti jhaanaadigu.napa.tilaabho ^a^M1.0157^ea^. pabbajitassapi hi gu.nasampannasseva ijjhati, no itarassa yathaa sumedhapa.n.ditassa. so hi pa~ncaabhi~n~no ca a.t.thasamaapattilaabhii ca hutvaa pa.nidhesi. ^b^adhikaaro^eb^ti adhikakaaro, pariccaagoti attho. jiivitaadipariccaaga~nhi katvaa pa.nidahatoyeva ijjhati, no itarassa yathaa sumedhapa.n.ditassa. so hi --
[21] ``akkamitvaana ma.m buddho, saha sissehi gacchatu.
[22] maa na.m kalale akkamittha, hitaaya me bhavissatii''ti.. (bu0 va.m0 2.53).

[03] eva.m ^a^P0.0141^ea^ attapariccaaga.m katvaa pa.nidhesi. ^b^chandataa^eb^ti kattukamyataa. saa yassa balavatii hoti, tassa ijjhati pa.nidhi. saa ca sace koci vadeyya ``ko cattaari asa"nkhyeyyaani kappasatasahassa~nca niraye paccitvaa buddhatta.m icchatii''ti. ta.m sutvaa yo ``aha''nti vattu.m ussahati, tassa balavatiiti veditabbaa. tathaa yadi koci vadeyya ``ko sakalacakkavaa.la.m viitaccikaana.m a"ngaaraana.m puura.m akkamitvaa buddhatta.m icchati, ko sakalacakkavaa.la.m sattisuulehi aaki.n.na.m akkamanto atikkamitvaa buddhatta.m icchati, ko sakalacakkavaa.la.m samatittika.m udakapu.n.na.m uttaritvaa buddhatta.m icchati, ko sakalacakkavaa.la.m nirantara.m ve.lugumbasa~nchanna.m maddanto atikkamitvaa buddhatta.m icchatii''ti, ta.m sutvaa yo ``aha''nti vattu.m ussahati, tassa balavatiiti veditabbaa. evaruupena ca kattukamyataachandena samannaagato sumedhapa.n.dito pa.nidhesiiti.

[03] eva.m samiddhaabhiniihaaro ca bodhisatto imaani a.t.thaarasa abhabba.t.thaanaani na upeti. so hi tato pabhuti na jaccandho hoti na jaccapadhiro, na ummattako, na e.lamugo, na pii.thasappi ^a^V1.0149^ea^, na milakkhesu uppajjati, na daasiyaa kucchimhi nibbattati, na niyatamicchaadi.t.thiko hoti, naassa li"nga.m parivattati, na pa~ncaanantariyakammaani karoti, na ku.t.thii hoti, na tiracchaanayoniya.m va.t.takato pacchimattabhaavo hatthito adhikattabhaavo hoti, na khuppipaasikanijjhaamata.nhikapetesu uppajjati, na kaalaka~ncikaasuresu, na aviiciniraye, na lokantarikesu uppajjati. kaamaavacaresu pana na maaro hoti, ruupaavacaresu na asa~n~niibhave, na suddhaavaasesu uppajjati, na aruupabhavesu, na a~n~na.m cakkavaa.la.m sa"nkamati.
[03] yaa ^a^M1.0158^ea^ cimaa ussaaho ca umma"ngo ca avatthaana~nca hitacariyaa caati catasso buddhabhuumiyo, taahi samannaagato hoti. tattha --
[21] ``ussaaho viiriya.m vutta.m, umma"ngo pa~n~naa pavuccati.
[22] avatthaana.m adhi.t.thaana.m, hitacariyaa mettaabhaavanaa''ti.. --

[25] veditabbaa. ye ca ime nekkhammajjhaasayo, pavivekajjhaasayo, alobhajjhaasayo, adosajjhaasayo, amohajjhaasayo, nissara.najjhaasayoti cha ajjhaasayaa bodhiparipaakaaya sa.mvattanti, yehi samannaagatattaa nekkhammajjhaasayaa ^a^P0.0142^ea^ ca bodhisattaa kaamesu dosadassaavino, pavivekajjhaasayaa ca bodhisattaa sa"nga.nikaaya dosadassaavino, alobhajjhaasayaa ca bodhisattaa lobhe dosadassaavino, adosajjhaasayaa ca bodhisattaa dose dosadassaavino, amohajjhaasayaa ca bodhisattaa mohe dosadassaavino, nissara.najjhaasayaa ca bodhisattaa sabbabhavesu dosadassaavinoti vuccanti, tehi ca samannaagato hoti.

[03] paccekabuddhaana.m pana kiiva cira.m patthanaa va.t.tatiiti? paccekabuddhaana.m dve asa"nkhyeyyaani kappasatasahassa~nca, tato ora.m na sakkaa, pubbe vuttanayenevettha kaara.na.m veditabba.m. ettakenaapi ca kaalena paccekabuddhatta.m patthayato abhiniihaarakara.ne pa~nca sampattiyo icchitabbaa. tesa~nhi --
[21] ``manussatta.m li"ngasampatti, vigataasavadassana.m.
[22] adhikaaro ca chandataa, ete abhiniihaarakaara.naa''..
[03] tattha ^a^V1.0150^ea^ ^b^vigataasavadassana^eb^nti buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasaavakaana.m yassa kassaci dassananti attho. sesa.m vuttanayameva.

[03] atha ``saavakaana.m patthanaa kittaka.m va.t.tatii''ti? dvinna.m aggasaavakaana.m eka.m asa"nkhyeyya.m kappasatasahassa~nca, asiitimahaasaavakaana.m kappasatasahassameva. tathaa buddhassa maataapituuna.m upa.t.thaakassa puttassa caati, tato ora.m na sakkaa, tattha kaara.na.m vuttanayameva. imesa.m pana sabbesampi adhikaaro ca chandataati dva"ngasamannaagatoyeva abhiniihaaro hoti.

[03] eva.m imaaya patthanaaya iminaa ca abhiniihaarena yathaavuttappabheda.m kaala.m paaramiyo puuretvaa buddhaa loke uppajjantaa khattiyakule vaa braahma.nakule vaa uppajjanti, paccekabuddhaa khattiyabraahma.nagahapatikulaana.m a~n~natarasmi.m, aggasaavakaa ^a^M1.0159^ea^ pana buddhaa viya khattiyabraahma.nakulesveva. sabbabuddhaa sa.mva.t.tamaane kappe na uppajjanti, viva.t.tamaane kappe uppajjanti, tathaa paccekabuddhaa. te pana buddhaana.m uppajjanakaale na uppajjanti. buddhaa saya~nca bujjhanti, pare ca bodhenti. paccekabuddhaa sayameva bujjhanti, na pare bodhenti. attharasameva pa.tivijjhanti, na dhammarasa.m. na hi te lokuttaradhamma.m pa~n~natti.m aaropetvaa desetu.m sakkonti, muugena di.t.thasupino viya vanacarakena nagare saayitabya~njanaraso viya ca nesa.m dhammaabhisamayo ^a^P0.0143^ea^ hoti. sabba.m iddhisamaapattipa.tisambhidaapabheda.m paapu.nanti. gu.navisi.t.thataaya buddhaana.m he.t.thaa saavakaana.m upari honti, na a~n~ne pabbaajetvaa aabhisamaacaarika.m sikkhaapenti, ``cittasallekho kaatabbo, vosaana.m naapajjitabba''nti iminaa uddesena uposatha.m karonti, ajja uposathoti vacanamattena vaa, uposatha.m karontaa ca gandhamaadane ma~njuusakarukkhamuule ratanamaa.le sannipatitvaa karontiiti. eva.m bhagavaa aayasmato aanandassa paccekabuddhaana.m sabbaakaaraparipuura.m patthana~nca abhiniihaara~nca kathetvaa idaani imaaya patthanaaya iminaa ca abhiniihaarena samudaagate te te paccekabuddhe kathetu.m ^b^``sabbesu bhuutesu nidhaaya da.n.da''^eb^ntiaadinaa nayena ima.m khaggavisaa.nasutta.m abhaasi. aya.m taava avisesena pucchaavasito khaggavisaa.nasuttassa uppatti.

[03] idaani visesena vattabbaa. tattha imissaa taava gaathaaya eva.m uppatti veditabbaa -- aya.m kira paccekabuddho paccekabodhisattabhuumi.m ogaahanto dve asa"nkhyeyyaani kappasatasahassa~nca paaramiyo puuretvaa kassapassa bhagavato saasane pabbajitvaa aara~n~niko hutvaa gatapaccaagatavatta.m puurento sama.nadhamma.m akaasi. eta.m kira vatta.m aparipuuretvaa paccekabodhi.m paapu.nanto naama natthi ^a^V1.0151^ea^. ki.m paneta.m ^b^gatapaccaagatavatta.m^eb^ naama? hara.napaccaahara.nanti. ta.m yathaa vibhuuta.m hoti, tathaa kathessaama.

[03] idha ekacco bhikkhu harati na paccaaharati, ekacco paccaaharati na harati, ekacco neva harati na paccaaharati, ekacco harati ca paccaaharati ca. tattha yo bhikkhu pageva vu.t.thaaya cetiya"nga.nabodhiya"nga.navatta.m katvaa bodhirukkhe udaka.m aasi~ncitvaa paaniiyagha.ta.m puuretvaa paaniiyamaa.le .thapetvaa aacariyavatta.m upajjhaayavatta.m katvaa dveasiiti khandhakavattaani ca cuddasa mahaavattaani samaadaaya vattati. so sariiraparikamma.m katvaa senaasana.m pavisitvaa yaava bhikkhaacaaravelaa, taava vivittaasane viitinaametvaa vela.m ^a^M1.0160^ea^ ~natvaa nivaasetvaa kaayabandhana.m bandhitvaa uttaraasa"nga.m katvaa sa"nghaa.ti.m khandhe karitvaa patta.m a.mse aalaggetvaa kamma.t.thaana.m manasi karonto cetiya"nga.na.m gantvaa cetiya~nca bodhi~nca vanditvaa gaamasamiipe ciivara.m paarupitvaa patta.m aadaaya gaama.m pi.n.daaya ^a^P0.0144^ea^ pavisati. eva.m pavi.t.tho ca laabhii bhikkhu pu~n~navaa upaasakehi sakkato garukato upa.t.thaakakule vaa pa.tikkamanasaalaaya.m vaa pa.tikkamitvaa upaasakehi ta.m ta.m pa~nha.m pucchiyamaano tesa.m pa~nhavissajjanena dhammadesanaavikkhepena ca ta.m manasikaara.m cha.d.detvaa nikkhamati. vihaara.m aagatopi bhikkhuuhi pa~nha.m pu.t.tho katheti, dhamma.m bha.nati, ta.m ta.m byaapaara~nca aapajjati. pacchaabhattampi purimayaamampi majjhimayaamampi eva.m bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m papa~ncetvaa kaayadu.t.thullaabhibhuuto pacchimayaamepi sayati, neva kamma.t.thaana.m manasi karoti. aya.m vuccati ^b^``harati na paccaaharatii''^eb^ti.
