[03] 457^b^.^eb^ ^b^sutvaana munino vaca^eb^nti tassa sammaasambuddhassa vaaca.m, gaathaabandhasukhattha.m aa-kaarassa rassa.m katvaa ``vaca''nti vutta.m. ``anaagatamhi addhaane gotamo naama naamena satthaa loke bhavissatii''ti ima.m munino vacana.m sutvaa ^b^yathaa^eb^ yena pakaarena gotama.m bhagavanta.m passaami, tathaa tena pakaarena ^b^kaara.m^eb^ adhikakicca.m pu~n~nasambhaara.m ^b^kassaami^eb^ karissaamiiti ^b^me^eb^ mayha.m ^b^sa"nkappo^eb^ cetanaamanasikaaro ^b^ahu^eb^ ahosiiti sambandho.

[03] 458^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaaha.m cintayitvaanaa^eb^ti ``aha.m kaara.m karissaamii''ti eva.m cintetvaa. ^b^kiriya.m cintayi.m mamaa^eb^ti ``mayaa kiidisa.m pu~n~na.m kattabba.m nu kho''ti kiriya.m kattabbakicca.m cintayinti attho. ^b^kyaaha.m kamma.m aacaraamii^eb^ti aha.m ^a^M1.0311^ea^ kiidisa.m pu~n~nakamma.m aacaraami puuremi nu khoti ^a^P0.0277^ea^ attho. ^b^pu~n~nakkhette anuttare^eb^ti uttaravirahite sakalapu~n~nassa bhaajanabhuute ratanattayeti attho.

[03] 459^b^.^eb^ ^b^aya~nca paa.thiko bhikkhuu^eb^ti aya.m bhikkhu sarabha~n~navasena ganthapaa.thapa.thanato vaacanato ``paa.thiko''ti laddhanaamo bhikkhu. buddhasaasane sabbesa.m paa.thiina.m paa.thakavaacakaana.m antare vinaye ca ^b^agganikkhitto^eb^ aggo iti .thapito. ta.m .thaana.m tena bhikkhunaa patta.t.thaanantara.m aha.m ^b^patthaye^eb^ patthemiiti attho.

[03] 460^b^.^eb^ tato para.m attano pu~n~nakara.nuupaaya.m dassento ^b^ida.m me amita.m bhoga^eb^ntiaadimaaha. ^b^me^eb^ mayha.m ^b^amita.m^eb^ pamaa.navirahita.m bhogaraasi.m ^b^akkhobha.m^eb^ khobhetu.m asakku.neyya.m ^b^saagaruupama.m^eb^ saagarasadisa.m ^b^tena bhogena^eb^ taadisena dhanena buddhassa aaraama.m maapayeti sambandho. sesa.m uttaanatthameva.

[03] 474^b^.^eb^ bhikkhusa"nghe nisiiditvaa sambuddho tena su.t.thu maapita.m kaarita.m sa"nghaaraama.m pa.tiggahetvaa tassaaraamassaanisa.msadiipaka.m ida.m vacana.m ^b^abravi^eb^ kathesiiti sambandho.

[03] 475^b^.^eb^ katha.m? ^b^yo so^eb^ti yo sa"nghaaraamadaayako taapaso ^b^sumaapita.m^eb^ ku.tile.nama.n.dapapaasaadahammiyapaakaaraadinaa su.t.thu sajjita.m sa"nghaaraama.m buddhassa ^b^paadaasi^eb^ pa-kaarena somanassasampayuttacittena ^a^V1.0286^ea^ adaasi. ^b^tamaha.m kittayissaamii^eb^ti ta.m taapasa.m aha.m paaka.ta.m karissaami, uttaani.m karissaamiiti attho. ^b^su.naatha mama bhaasato^eb^ti bhaasantassa mayha.m vacana.m su.naatha, ohitasotaa avikkhittacittaa manasi karothaati attho.
[03] 476^b^.^eb^ tena dinnaaraamassa phala.m dassento ^b^hatthii assaa rathaa pattii^eb^tiaadimaaha. ta.m suvi~n~neyyameva.
[03] 477^b^.^eb^ ^b^sa"nghaaraamassida.m phala^eb^nti ida.m aayati.m anubhavitabbasampattisa"nkhaata.m i.t.thaphala.m sa"nghaaraamadaanassa phala.m vipaakanti attho.

[03] 478^b^.^eb^ ^b^cha.laasiitisahassaanii^eb^ti ^a^M1.0312^ea^ chasahassaani asiitisahassaani ^b^samala"nkataa^eb^ su.t.thu ala"nkataa sajjitaa ^b^naariyo^eb^ itthiyo ^b^vicittavatthaabhara.naa^eb^ti vicittehi anekaruupehi vatthehi aabhara.nehi ca samannaagataa. ^b^aamuttama.niku.n.dalaa^eb^ti olambitamuttaahaarama.nika~ncitaka.n.naati attho.

[03] 479^b^.^eb^ taasa.m itthiina.m ruupasobhaatisaya.m va.n.nento ^b^aa.laarapamhaa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha aa.laaraani mahantaani akkhiini ma.nigu.lasadisaani yaasa.m itthiina.m taa aa.laarapamhaa bhamaraanamiva mandalocanaati attho. ^b^hasulaa^eb^ haasapakati, liilaavilaasaati attho. ^b^susa~n~naa^eb^ti sundarasa~n~nitabbasariiraavayavaa. ^b^tanumajjhimaa^eb^ti khuddakaudarapadesaa. sesa.m uttaanameva.

[03] 484^b^.^eb^ ^b^tassa^eb^ ^a^P0.0278^ea^ ^b^dhammesu daayaado^eb^ti tassa gotamassa bhagavato dhammesu daayaado dhammako.t.thaasabhaagii. ^b^oraso^eb^ti urasi jaato, sithiladhanitaadidasavidhabya~njanabuddhisampanna.m ka.n.thataaluo.t.thaadipa~nca.t.thaane gha.t.tetvaa desitadhamma.m sutvaa sotaapattimaggaadimaggapa.tipaa.tiyaa sabbakilese khepetvaa arahatte .thitabhaavena urasi jaataputtoti attho. ^b^dhammanimmito^eb^ti dhammena samena ada.n.dena asatthena nimmito paaka.to bhavissasiiti attho. ^b^upaali naama naamenaa^eb^ti ki~ncaapi so maatu naamena mantaa.niputtanaamo, anuruddhaadiihi pana saha gantvaa pabbajitattaa khattiyaana.m upasamiipe alliino yutto kaayacittehi sama"ngiibhuutoti upaaliiti naamena satthu saavako ^b^hessati^eb^ bhavissatiiti attho.

[03] 485^b^.^eb^ ^b^vinaye paarami.m patvaa^eb^ti vinayapi.take ko.ti.m pariyosaana.m patvaa paapu.nitvaa. ^b^.thaanaa.t.thaane ca kovido^eb^ti kaara.naakaara.ne ca dakkho chekoti attho. ^b^jinasaasana.m dhaarento^eb^ti jinena ^a^V1.0287^ea^ vuttaanusaasani.m jinassa pi.takattaya.m vaacanasavanacintanadhaara.naadivasena dhaarento, sallakkhentoti attho. ^b^viharissatinaasavo^eb^ti nikkileso catuuhi iriyaapathehi aparipatanta.m attabhaava.m harissati pavattessatiiti attho.

[03] 487^b^.^eb^ ^b^aparimeyyupaadaayaa^eb^ti ^a^M1.0313^ea^ anekasatasahasse aadi.m katvaa. ^b^patthemi tava saasana^eb^nti ``gotamassa bhagavato saasane vinayadharaana.m aggo bhaveyya''nti tuyha.m saasana.m patthemi icchaamiiti attho. ^b^so me attho^eb^ti so etadagga.t.thaanantarasa"nkhaato attho me mayaa anuppattoti attho. ^b^sabbasa.myojanakkhayo^eb^ti sabbesa.m sa.myojanaana.m khayo mayaa anuppattoti sambandho, nibbaana.m adhigatanti attho.

[03] 488^b^.^eb^ raajada.n.dena ^b^tajjito^eb^ pii.lito ^b^suulaavuto^eb^ suule aavuto aavu.nito ^b^poso^eb^ puriso suule ^b^saata.m^eb^ madhurasukha.m ^b^avindanto^eb^ naanubhavanto ^b^parimutti.mva^eb^ parimocanameva icchati yathaati sambandho.

[03] 489-90^b^.^eb^ ^b^mahaaviira^eb^ viiraanamantare viiruttama aha.m ^b^bhavada.n.dena^eb^ jaatida.n.dena, ^b^tajjito^eb^ pii.lito ^b^kammasuulaavuto^eb^ kusalaakusalakammasuulasmi.m aavuto ^b^santo^eb^ sa.mvijjamaano, ^b^pipaasaavedanaaya^eb^ pipaasaaturabhaavena ^b^a.t.tito^eb^ abhibhuuto dukkhaapito ^b^bhave saata.m^eb^ sa.msaare madhura.m sukha.m ^b^na vindaami^eb^ na labhaami. raagaggidosaggimohaggisa"nkhaatehi, narakaggikappu.t.thaanaggidukkhaggisa"nkhaatehi vaa tiihi aggiihi .dayhanto ^b^parimutti.m^eb^ parimuccanupaaya.m ^b^gavesaami^eb^ pariyesaami tathevaati sambandho. yathaa raajada.n.da.m ito gato patto parimutti.m gavesati, tathaa aha.m bhavada.n.dappatto parimutti.m gavesaamiiti sambandho.

[03] 491-2^b^.^eb^ puna sa.msaarato mocana.m upamopameyyavasena dassento ^b^yathaa^eb^ ^a^P0.0279^ea^ ^b^visaado^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha visena sappavisena aa samantato da.msiiyittha da.t.tho hotiiti ^b^visaado,^eb^ sappada.t.thoti attho. atha vaa visa.m halaahalavisa.m adati gilatiiti ^b^visaado,^eb^ visakhaadakoti attho. yo puriso visaado, tena taadisena visena paripii.lito, tassa visassa vighaataaya vinaasaaya upaayana.m upaayabhuuta.m ^b^agada.m^eb^ osadha.m ^b^gaveseyya^eb^ pariyeseyya, ta.m gavesamaano ^b^visaghaataka.m^eb^ visanaasaka.m ^b^agada.m^eb^ osadha.m ^b^passeyya^eb^ dakkheyya. so ta.m attano di.t.tha.m osadha.m pivitvaa ^b^visamhaa^eb^ visato ^b^parimuttiyaa^eb^ parimocanakaara.naa sukhii ^b^assa^eb^ bhaveyya yathaati sambandho.

[03] 493^b^.^eb^ ^b^tathevaaha^eb^nti ^a^M1.0314^ea^ yathaa yena pakaarena so naro visahato, savisena sappena da.t.tho visakhaadako ^a^V1.0288^ea^ vaa osadha.m pivitvaa sukhii bhaveyya, tatheva tena pakaarena aha.m avijjaaya mohena ^b^sa.m^eb^ su.t.thu pii.lito. ^b^saddhammaagadamesaha^eb^nti aha.m saddhammasa"nkhaata.m osadha.m esa.m pariyesantoti attho.

[03] 494-5^b^.^eb^ ^b^dhammaagada.m gavesanto^eb^ti sa.msaaradukkhavisassa vinaasaaya dhammosadha.m gavesanto. ^b^addakkhi.m sakyasaasana^eb^nti sakyava.msapabhavassa gotamassa saasana.m saddakkhinti attho. ^b^agga.m sabbosadhaana.m ta^eb^nti sabbesa.m osadhaana.m antare ta.m sakyasaasanasa"nkhaata.m dhammosadha.m agga.m uttamanti attho. ^b^sabbasallavinodana^eb^nti raagasallaadiina.m sabbesa.m sallaana.m vinodana.m vuupasamakara.m ^b^dhammosadha.m^eb^ dhammasa"nkhaata.m osadha.m pivitvaa ^b^sabba.m visa.m^eb^ sakalasa.msaaradukkhavisa.m ^b^samuuhani.m^eb^ naasesinti sambandho. ^b^ajaraamara^eb^nti ta.m dukkhavisa.m samuuhanitvaa ajara.m jaraavirahita.m amara.m mara.navirahita.m ^b^siitibhaava.m^eb^ raagapari.laahaadivirahitattaa siitalabhuuta.m nibbaana.m aha.m ^b^phassayi.m^eb^ paccakkhamakaasinti sambandho.

[03] 496^b^.^eb^ puna kilesatamassa upama.m dassento ^b^yathaa bhuuta.t.tito^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^yathaa^eb^ yena pakaarena ^b^bhuuta.t.tito^eb^ bhuutena yakkhena a.t.tito pii.lito ^b^poso^eb^ puriso ^b^bhuutaggaahena^eb^ yakkhaggaahena ^b^pii.lito^eb^ dukkhito ^b^bhuutasmaa^eb^ yakkhaggaahato ^b^parimuttiyaa^eb^ mocanatthaaya bhuutavejja.m gaveseyya.

[03] 497^b^.^eb^ ta.m gavesamaano ca bhuutavijjaaya su.t.thu ^b^kovida.m^eb^ cheka.m bhuutavejja.m passeyya, ^b^so^eb^ bhuutavejjo ^b^tassa^eb^ yakkhaggahitassa purisassa aavesabhuuta.m ^b^vihane^eb^ vinaaseyya, ^b^samuula~nca^eb^ muulena saha aayati.m anaasevaka.m katvaa ^b^vinaasaye^eb^ viddha.mseyyaati sambandho.

[03] 498^b^.^eb^ ^b^mahaaviira^eb^ viiruttama ^b^tamaggaahena^eb^ kilesandhakaaraggaahena pii.lito aha.m ^b^tatheva^eb^ tena pakaareneva ^b^tamato^eb^ kilesandhakaarato ^b^parimuttiyaa^eb^ mocanatthaaya ^b^~naa.naaloka.m^eb^ pa~n~naaaaloka.m gavesaamiiti sambandho.

[03] 499^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M1.0315^ea^ ^a^P0.0280^ea^ tadanantara.m ^b^kilesatamasodhana.m^eb^ kilesandhakaaranaasaka.m sakyamuni.m addasanti attho. ^b^so^eb^ sakyamuni ^b^me^eb^ mayha.m ^b^tama.m^eb^ andhakaara.m kilesatimira.m bhuutavejjova ^b^bhuutaka.m^eb^ yakkhaggahita.m iva ^b^vinodesi^eb^ duurii akaasiiti sambandho.

[03] 500^b^.^eb^ so aha.m eva.m vimutto ^b^sa.msaarasota.m^eb^ sa.msaarapavaaha.m ^b^sa.m^eb^ su.t.thu ^b^chindi.m^eb^ chedesi.m, ^b^ta.nhaasota.m^eb^ ta.nhaamahogha.m ^b^nivaarayi.m^eb^ niravasesa.m appavatti.m akaasinti attho. ^b^bhava.m ugghaa.tayi.m sabba^eb^nti ^a^V1.0289^ea^ kaamabhavaadika.m sabba.m navabhava.m ugghaa.tayi.m vinaasesinti attho. muulato vinaasento bhuutavejjo iva muulato ugghaa.tayinti sambandho.

[03] 501^b^.^eb^ tato nibbaanapariyesanaaya upama.m dassento ^b^yathaa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha garu.m bhaariya.m naaga.m gilatiiti ^b^garu.lo^eb^. garu.m vaa naaga.m laati aadadaatiiti ^b^garu.lo,^eb^ garu.laraajaa. attano bhakkha.m sakagocara.m pannaga.m pakaarena parahattha.m na gacchatiiti ^b^pannago^eb^ti laddhanaama.m naaga.m gaha.natthaaya ^b^opatati^eb^ avapatati, ^b^samantaa^eb^ samantato ^b^yojanasata.m^eb^ satayojanappamaa.na.m ^b^mahaasara.m^eb^ mahaasamudda.m attano pakkhavaatehi ^b^vikkhobheti^eb^ aalo.leti yathaati sambandho.

[03] 502^b^.^eb^ ^b^so^eb^ supa.n.no viha"ngamo vehaasagamanasiilo ^b^pannaga.m^eb^ naama.m gahetvaa adhosiisa.m olambetvaa ^b^vihe.thaya.m^eb^ tattha tattha vividhena he.thanena he.thento ^b^aadaaya^eb^ da.lha.m gahetvaa ^b^yena kaama.m^eb^ yattha gantukaamo, tattha ^b^pakkamati^eb^ gacchatiiti sambandho.

[03] 503^b^.^eb^ bhante mahaaviira, yathaa garu.lo ^b^balii^eb^ balavaa pannaga.m gahetvaa pakkamati, tathaa eva aha.m ^b^asa"nkhata.m^eb^ paccayehi akata.m nibbaana.m ^b^gavesanto^eb^ pa.tipattipuura.navasena pariyesanto ^b^dose^eb^ sakaladiya.d.dhakilesasahasse ^b^vikkhaalayi.m^eb^ visesena samucchedappahaanena sodhesi.m ahanti sambandho.

[03] 504^b^.^eb^ yathaa garu.lo pannaga.m gahetvaa bhu~njitvaa viharati, tathaa aha.m ^b^dhammavara.m^eb^ uttamadhamma.m ^b^di.t.tho^eb^ passanto eta.m ^b^santipada.m^eb^ nibbaanapada.m ^b^anuttara.m^eb^ uttaravirahita.m maggaphalehi ^b^aadaaya^eb^ gahetvaa va.la~njetvaa viharaamiiti sambandho.

[03] 505^b^.^eb^ idaani ^a^M1.0316^ea^ nibbaanassa dullabhabhaava.m dassento ^b^aasaavatii naama lataa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha sabbesa.m devaana.m aasaa icchaa etissa.m lataaya.m atthiiti ^b^aasaavatii^eb^ naama lataa, ^b^cittalataavane^eb^ anekavicittaahi lataahi gahaniibhuute vane uyyaane ^b^jaataa^eb^ nibbattaati attho. ^b^tassaa^eb^ lataaya ^b^vassasahassena^eb^ vassasahassaccayena ^b^eka.m phala.m nibbattate^eb^ eka.m phala.m ga.nhaati.

[03] 506^b^.^eb^ ^b^ta.m devaa^eb^ti ta.m aasaavati.m lata.m ^b^taava duuraphala.m^eb^ tattaka.m cirakaala.m atikkamitvaa phala.m ga.nhanta.m sa.mvijjamaana.m ^a^P0.0281^ea^ ^b^devaa^eb^ taavati.msadevataa ^b^payirupaasanti^eb^ bhajanti, saa aasaavatii naama ^b^latuttamaa^eb^ lataana.m antare uttamalataa eva.m devaana.m piyaa ahosiiti sambandho.

[03] 507^b^.^eb^ ^b^satasahassupaadaayaa^eb^ti ^a^V1.0290^ea^ satasahassasa.mvacchara.m aadi.m katvaa. ^b^taaha.m paricare munii^eb^ti mona.m vuccati ~naa.na.m, bhante, muni ~naa.navanta sabba~n~nu, aha.m ta.m bhagavanta.m paricare payirupaasaami. ^b^saaya.mpaata.m namassaamii^eb^ti saayanhasamaya~nca pubba.nhasamaya~ncaati dvikkhattu.m namassaami pa.naama.m karomi. ^b^yathaa devaa^eb^ taavati.msaa devaa viya aasaavatiilata.m saaya.mpaata~nca payirupaasantiiti sambandho.

[03] 508^b^.^eb^ ^b^ava~njhaa paaricariyaa^eb^ti yasmaa buddhadassanahetu nibbaanappatti ahosi, tasmaa buddhapaaricariyaa vattapa.tipattikiriyaa ava~njhaa atucchaa ^b^namassanaa^eb^ pa.naamakiriyaa ca ^b^amoghaa^eb^ atucchaa. tathaa hi ^b^duuraagata.m^eb^ duurato sa.msaaraddhaanato aagatampi, ^b^santa.m^eb^ sa.mvijjamaana.m ^b^kha.noya.m^eb^ aya.m buddhuppaadakkha.no ^b^na viraadhayi^eb^ naatikkami, ma.m atikkamitvaa na gatoti attho.

[03] 509^b^.^eb^ buddhadassanahetu nibbaanappatto aha.m aayati.m uppajjanakabhave mama pa.tisandhi.m ^b^vicinanto^eb^ upaparikkhanto na passaamiiti sambandho. ^b^niruupadhi^eb^ khandhuupadhikilesuupadhiihi virahito ^b^vippamutto^eb^ sabbakilesehi vinaabhuuto ^b^upasanto^eb^ kilesapari.laahaabhaavena santamaanaso caraami ahanti sambandho.

[03] 510^b^.^eb^ puna attano buddhadassanaaya upama.m dassento ^b^yathaapi paduma.m naamaa^eb^tiaadimaaha. ^b^suuriyara.msena^eb^ suuriyara.msisamphassena yathaa paduma.m naama ^a^M1.0317^ea^ api ^b^pupphati^eb^ vikasati ^b^mahaaviira^eb^ viiruttama aha.m tathaa eva ^b^buddhara.msena^eb^ buddhena bhagavataa desitadhammara.msippabhaavena pupphitoti attho.

[03] 511-12^b^.^eb^ puna buddhadassanena nibbaanadassana.m diipento ^b^yathaa balaakaa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^balaakayonimhi^eb^ balaakajaatiya.m ^b^sadaa^eb^ sabbasmi.m kaale ^b^pumaa^eb^ puriso yathaa na vijjati. pume avijjamaane katha.m balaakaana.m gabbhaggaha.na.m hotiiti ce? meghesu ^b^gajjamaanesu^eb^ sadda.m karontesu meghagajjana.m sutvaa ^b^taa^eb^ balaakiniyo ^b^sadaa^eb^ sabbakaale ^b^gabbha.m ga.nhanti^eb^ a.n.da.m dhaarentiiti attho. ^b^yaava^eb^ yattaka.m kaala.m^b^ megho na gajjati^eb^ megho sadda.m na karoti, taava tattaka.m kaala.m ^b^cira.m^eb^ cirakaalena ^b^gabbha.m^eb^ a.n.da.m dhaarenti. ^b^yadaa^eb^ yasmi.m kaale megho ^b^pavassati^eb^ pakaarena gajjitvaa vassati vu.t.thidhaara.m paggharati, tadaa tasmi.m kaale ^b^bhaarato^eb^ gabbhadhaara.nato ^b^parimuccanti^eb^ a.n.da.m paatentiiti attho.

[03] 513^b^.^eb^ tato para.m upameyyasampada.m dassento ^b^padumuttarabuddhassaa^eb^tiaadimaaha. padumuttarassa buddhassa ^b^dhammameghena^eb^ vohaaraparamatthadesanaasa"nkhaatameghena ^b^gajjato^eb^ gajjantassa desentassa ^a^P0.0282^ea^ ^b^dhammameghassa saddena^eb^ ^a^V1.0291^ea^ ghosaanusaarena aha.m tadaa ^b^dhammagabbha.m^eb^ viva.t.tuupanissaya.m daanasiilaadipu~n~nasambhaaragabbha.m ^b^aga.nhi.m^eb^ gahesi.m tathaati sambandho.

[03] 514^b^.^eb^ ^b^satasahassupaadaaya^eb^ kappasatasahassa.m aadi.m katvaa ^b^pu~n~nagabbha.m^eb^ daanasiilaadipu~n~nasambhaara.m aha.m ^b^dharemi^eb^ puuremi. yaava ^b^dhammamegho^eb^ dhammadesanaa ^b^na gajjati^eb^ buddhena na desiiyati, taava aha.m ^b^bhaarato^eb^ sa.msaaragabbhabhaarato ^b^nappamuccaami^eb^ na mocemi na visu.m bhavaamiiti sambandho.

[03] 515^b^.^eb^ bhante, ^b^sakyamuni^eb^ sakyava.msappabhava ^b^yadaa^eb^ yasmi.m kaale suddhodanamahaaraajassa tava pitu ^b^ramme^eb^ rama.niiye ^b^kapilavatthave^eb^ kapilavatthunaamake nagare tuva.m dhammameghena ^b^gajjati^eb^ ghoseti, tadaa tasmi.m kaale aha.m ^b^bhaarato^eb^ sa.msaaragabbhabhaarato ^b^parimucci.m^eb^ mutto ahosinti sambandho.

[03] 516^b^.^eb^ tato para.m attanaa adhigate maggaphale dassento ^b^su~n~nata^eb^ntiaadimaaha. tattha attaattaniyaadiina.m abhaavato ^b^su~n~nata.m^eb^ vimokkha~nca raagadosamohasabbakilesanimittaana.m abhaavato, ^b^animitta.m^eb^ vimokkha~nca ^a^M1.0318^ea^ ta.nhaapa.nidhissa abhaavato, ^b^appa.nihita.m^eb^ vimokkha~nca ariyamagga.m adhiga~nchi.m bhaavesinti sambandho. ^b^caturo ca phale sabbe^eb^ti cattaari saama~n~naphalaani sabbaani sacchi akaasinti attho. ^b^dhammeva.m vija.tayi.m aha^eb^nti aha.m eva.m sabbadhamme ja.ta.m gahana.m vija.tayi.m viddha.msesinti attho.
[06] dutiyabhaa.navaarava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] 517^b^.^eb^ tato para.m attanaa adhigatavisesameva dassento ^b^aparimeyyupaadaayaa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha na parimeyyoti ^b^aparimeyyo,^eb^ sa.mvaccharaga.nanavasena pametu.m sa"nkhaatu.m asakku.neyyoti attho. ta.m aparimeyya.m kappa.m ^b^upaadaaya^eb^ aadi.m katvaa ^b^tava saasana.m^eb^ tuyha.m saasana.m ``anaagate gotamassa bhagavato saasane vinayadharaana.m aggo bhaveyya''nti eva.m patthemi. atiitatthe vattamaanavacana.m, patthesinti attho. ^b^so me attho^eb^ti so patthanaasa"nkhaato attho ^b^me^eb^ mayaa ^b^anuppatto^eb^ nipphaaditoti attho. anuttara.m ^b^santipada.m^eb^ nibbaana.m anuppatta.m adhigatanti sambandho.

[03] 518^b^.^eb^ so aha.m adhigatattaa ^b^vinaye^eb^ vinayapi.take ^b^paarami.m patto^eb^ pariyosaanappatto. ^b^yathaapi paa.thiko isii^eb^ti yathaa padumuttarassa bhagavato saasane vinayadharaana.m aggo isi bhikkhu paa.thiko paaka.to ^a^V1.0292^ea^ ahosi, tathevaahanti attho. ^b^na me samasamo atthii^eb^ti vinayadhaaritaaya ^a^P0.0283^ea^ me mayaa samasamo samaano a~n~no na atthiiti attho. ^b^saasana.m^eb^ ovaadaanusaasaniisa"nkhaata.m saasana.m ^b^dhaaremi^eb^ puuremiiti attho.

[03] 519^b^.^eb^ punapi attano visesa.m dassento ^b^vinaye khandhake caapii^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^vinaye^eb^ti ubhatovibha"nge. ^b^khandhake^eb^ti mahaavaggacuu.lavagge. ^b^tikacchede caa^eb^ti tikasa"nghaadisesatikapaacittiyaadike ca. ^b^pa~ncame^eb^ti parivaare ca. ^b^ettha^eb^ etasmi.m sakale vinayapi.take mayha.m ^b^vimati^eb^ dve.lhaka.m ^b^natthi^eb^ na sa.mvijjati. ^b^akkhare^eb^ti vinayapi.takapariyaapanne a-kaaraadike akkhare. ^b^bya~njane^eb^ti ka-kaaraadike bya~njane vaa me ^b^vimati^eb^ sa.msayo natthiiti sambandho.

[03] 520^b^.^eb^ ^b^niggahe^eb^ ^a^M1.0319^ea^ ^b^pa.tikamme caa^eb^ti paapabhikkhuuna.m niggahe ca saapattikaana.m bhikkhuuna.m parivaasadaanaadike pa.tikamme ca ^b^.thaanaa.t.thaane^eb^ ca kaara.ne ca akaara.ne ca ^b^kovido^eb^ chekoti attho. ^b^osaara.ne^eb^ ca tajjaniiyaadikammassa pa.tippassaddhivasena osaara.ne pavesane ca. ^b^vu.t.thaapane^eb^ ca aapattito vu.t.thaapane niraapattikara.ne ca chekoti sambandho. ^b^sabbattha paarami.m gato^eb^ti sabbasmi.m vinayakamme pariyosaana.m patto, dakkho chekoti attho.

[03] 521^b^.^eb^ ^b^vinaye khandhake caapii^eb^ti vuttappakaare vinaye ca khandhake ca, ^b^pada.m^eb^ suttapada.m ^b^nikkhipitvaa^eb^ pa.t.thapetvaa. ^b^ubhato vinive.thetvaa^eb^ti vinayato khandhakato caati ubhayato nibbattetvaa vija.tetvaa naya.m aaharitvaa. ^b^rasato^eb^ti kiccato. ^b^osareyya.m^eb^ osaara.na.m karomiiti attho.

[03] 522^b^.^eb^ ^b^niruttiyaa ca kusalo^eb^ti ``rukkho pa.to kumbho maalaa citta''ntiaadiisu vohaaresu cheko. ^b^atthaanatthe ca kovido^eb^ti atthe va.d.dhiya.m anatthe haaniya~nca kovido dakkhoti attho. ^b^ana~n~naata.m mayaa natthii^eb^ti vinayapi.take sakale vaa pi.takattaye mayaa ana~n~naata.m avidita.m apaaka.ta.m ki~nci natthiiti attho. ^b^ekaggo satthu saasane^eb^ti buddhasaasane ahameva eko vinayadharaana.m aggo se.t.tho uttamoti attho.

[03] 523^b^.^eb^ ^b^ruupadakkhe aha.m ajjaa^eb^ti ajja etarahi kaale ^b^sakyaputtassa^eb^ bhagavato ^b^saasane^eb^ paavacane aha.m ruupadakkhe ruupadassane vinayavinicchayadassane ^b^sabba.m ka"nkha.m^eb^ sakala.m sa.msaya.m ^b^vinodemi^eb^ vinaasemiiti sambandho. ^b^chindaami sabbasa.msaya^eb^nti ``ahosi.m nu kho ahamatiitamaddhaana''ntiaadika.m (ma0 ni0 1.18; sa.m0 ni0 2.20; mahaani0 174) ^a^V1.0293^ea^ kaalattaya.m aarabbha uppanna.m sabba.m so.lasavidha.m ka"nkha.m chindaami vuupasamemi sabbaso viddha.msemiiti attho.

[03] 524^b^.^eb^ ^b^pada.m anupada~ncaapii^eb^ti pada.m pubbapada~nca anupada.m parapada~nca ^b^akkhara.m^eb^ ekekamakkhara~nca ^b^bya~njana.m^eb^ sithiladhanitaadidasavidha.m ^a^P0.0284^ea^ bya~njanavidhaana~nca. ^b^nidaane^eb^ti tena samayenaatiaadike nidaane ca. ^b^pariyosaane^eb^ti nigamane. ^b^sabbattha kovido^eb^ti sabbesu chasu .thaanesu chekoti attho.

[03] 525^b^.^eb^ tato ^a^M1.0320^ea^ para.m bhagavatoyeva gu.ne pakaasento ^b^yathaapi raajaa balavaa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha yathaa ^b^balavaa^eb^ thaamabalasampanno senaabalasampanno vaa raajaa, ^b^para.m^eb^ paresa.m pa.tiraajuuna.m sena.m ^b^nigga.nhitvaa^eb^ nissesato gahetvaa palaapetvaa vaa, ^b^tape^eb^ tapeyya santapeyya dukkhaapeyya. ^b^vijinitvaana sa"ngaama^eb^nti sa"ngaama.m parasenaaya samaagama.m yuddha.m vijinitvaa visesena jinitvaa jaya.m patvaa. ^b^nagara.m tattha maapaye^eb^ti tattha tasmi.m vijita.t.thaane nagara.m paasaadahammiyaadivibhuusita.m vasana.t.thaana.m maapaye kaaraapeyyaati attho.

[03] 526^b^.^eb^ ^b^paakaara.m parikha~ncaapii^eb^ti tattha maapitanagare paakaara.m sudhaadhavalai.t.thakaamayapaakaara~nca kaarayeti sambandho. ^b^parikha~ncaapi^eb^ kaddamaparikha.m, udakaparikha.m, sukkhaparikha~nca api kaaraye. ^b^esika.m dvaarako.t.thaka^eb^nti nagarasobhanattha.m ussaapitaesikaathambha~nca mahanta.m ko.t.thaka~nca catubhuumakaadidvaarako.t.thaka~nca kaaraye. ^b^a.t.taalake ca vividhe^eb^ti catubhuumakaadibhede atiuccaa.t.taalake ca vividhe naanappakaarake bahuu ^b^kaaraye^eb^ kaaraapeyyaati sambandho.

[03] 527^b^.^eb^ ^b^si"nghaa.taka.m caccara~ncaa^eb^ti na kevala.m paakaaraadayo kaaraye, si"nghaa.taka.m catumaggasandhi~nca caccara.m antaraaviithi~nca kaarayeti sambandho. ^b^suvibhattantaraapa.na^eb^nti su.t.thu vibhatta.m vibhaagato ko.t.thaasavanta.m antaraapa.na.m anekaapa.nasahassa.m kaaraapeyyaati attho. ^b^kaarayeyya sabha.m tatthaa^eb^ti tasmi.m maapitanagare sabha.m dhammaadhikara.nasaala.m kaaraye. ^b^atthaanatthavinicchaya.m^eb^ va.d.dhi~nca ava.d.dhi~nca vinicchayakara.nattha.m vinicchayasaala.m kaarayeti sambandho.

[03] 528^b^.^eb^ ^b^nigghaatattha.m amittaana^eb^nti pa.tiraajuuna.m pa.tibaahanattha.m. ^b^chiddaachidda~nca jaanitu^eb^nti dosa~nca adosa~nca jaanitu.m. ^b^balakaayassa rakkhaayaa^eb^ti hatthiassarathapattisa"nkhaatassa balakaayassa senaasamuuhassa ^a^V1.0294^ea^ aarakkha.natthaaya ^b^so^eb^ nagarasaamiko raajaa, ^b^senaapacca.m^eb^ senaapati.m senaanaayaka.m mahaamatta.m ^b^.thapeti^eb^ .thaanantare pati.t.thapetiiti attho.

[03] 529^b^.^eb^ ^b^aarakkhatthaaya^eb^ ^a^M1.0321^ea^ ^b^bha.n.dassaa^eb^ti jaataruuparajatamuttaama.niaadiraajabha.n.dassa aarakkha.natthaaya samantato gopanatthaaya ^b^me^eb^ mayha.m ^b^bha.n.da.m maa vinassii^eb^ti ^b^nidhaanakusala.m^eb^ rakkha.ne kusala.m cheka.m ^b^nara.m^eb^ ^a^P0.0285^ea^ purisa.m ^b^bha.n.darakkha.m^eb^ bha.n.darakkhanta.m so raajaa bha.n.daagaare .thapetiiti sambandho.

[03] 530^b^.^eb^ ^b^mamatto hoti yo ra~n~no^eb^ti yo pa.n.dito ra~n~no mamatto maamako pakkhapaato hoti. ^b^vuddhi.m yassa ca icchatii^eb^ti assa ra~n~no vuddhi~nca viruu.lhi.m yo icchati kaameti, ^b^tassa^eb^ itthambhuutassa pa.n.ditassa raajaa ^b^adhikara.na.m^eb^ vinicchayaadhipacca.m deti ^b^mittassa^eb^ mittabhaavassa pa.tipajjitunti sambandho.

[03] 531^b^.^eb^ ^b^uppaatesuu^eb^ti ukkaapaatadisaa.daahaadiuppaatesu ca. ^b^nimittesuu^eb^ti muusikacchinnaadiisu ``ida.m nimitta.m subha.m, ida.m nimitta.m asubha''nti eva.m nimittajaananasatthesu ca. ^b^lakkha.nesu caa^eb^ti itthipurisaana.m hatthapaadalakkha.najaananasatthesu ca ^b^kovida.m^eb^ cheka.m ^b^ajjhaayaka.m^eb^ anekesa.m sissaana.m byaakara.navaacaka.m ^b^mantadhara.m^eb^ vedattayasa"nkhaatamantadhaaraka.m pa.n.dita.m so raajaa ^b^porohicce^eb^ purohita.t.thaanantare .thapetiiti sambandho.

[03] 532^b^.^eb^ ^b^eteha"ngehi sampanno^eb^ti etehi vuttappakaarehi a"ngehi avayavehi sampanno sama"ngiibhuuto so raajaa ``khattiyo''ti ^b^pavuccati^eb^ kathiiyatiiti sambandho. ^b^sadaa rakkhanti raajaana^eb^nti ete senaapaccaadayo amaccaa sadaa sabbakaala.m ta.m raajaana.m rakkhanti gopenti. kimiva? ^b^cakkavaakova dukkhita.m^eb^ dukkhappatta.m saka~naati.m rakkhanto cakkavaako pakkhii ivaati attho.

[03] 533^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatheva tva.m mahaaviiraa^eb^ti viiruttama, yathaa so raajaa senaapaccaadia"ngasampanno nagaradvaara.m thaketvaa pa.tivasati, tatheva tuva.m ^b^hataamitto^eb^ nihatapaccatthiko khattiyo iva ^b^sadevakassa lokassa^eb^ saha devehi pavattamaanassa lokassa ^b^dhammaraajaa^eb^ dhammena samena raajaa dasapaaramitaadhammaparipuura.nena raajabhuutattaa ``dhammaraajaa''ti ^b^pavuccati^eb^ kathiiyatiiti sambandho.

[03] 534^b^.^eb^ ^b^titthiye niiharitvaanaa^eb^ti dhammaraajabhaavena pa.tipakkhabhuute sakalatitthiye niiharitvaa nissesena haritvaa nibbisevana.m katvaa ^b^sasenaka.m dhaara~ncaapi^eb^ senaaya saha vasavattimaarampi niiharitvaa ^a^V1.0295^ea^. ^b^tamandhakaara.m^eb^ ^b^vidhamitvaa^eb^ti ^a^M1.0322^ea^ tamasa"nkhaata.m mohandhakaara.m vidhamitvaa viddha.msetvaa. ^b^dhammanagara.m^eb^ sattati.msabodhipakkhiyadhammasa"nkhaata.m, khandhaayatanadhaatupa.ticcasamuppaadabalabojjha"ngagambhiiranayasamantapa.t.thaanadhammasa"nkhaata.m vaa nagara.m ^b^amaapayi^eb^ nimmini pati.t.thaapesiiti attho.

[03] 535^b^.^eb^ ^b^siila.m paakaaraka.m tatthaa^eb^ti tasmi.m pati.t.thaapite dhammanagare catupaarisuddhisiila.m paakaara.m. ^b^~naa.na.m te dvaarako.t.thaka^eb^nti te tuyha.m sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.naaasayaanusaya~naa.naanaagata.msa~naa.naatiita.msa~naa.naadikameva ~naa.na.m dvaarako.t.thakanti attho. ^b^saddhaa te esikaa viiraa^eb^ti, bhante, asithilaparakkama te tuyha.m diipa"nkarapaadamuulato pabhuti sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nakaara.naa saddahanasaddhaa ussaapitaala"nkaaraala"nkatathambhoti ^a^P0.0286^ea^ attho. ^b^dvaarapaalo ca sa.mvaro^eb^ti te tuyha.m chadvaarikasa.mvaro rakkhaavara.nagutti dvaarapaalo dvaararakkhakoti attho.

[03] 536^b^.^eb^ ^b^satipa.t.thaanama.t.taala^eb^nti te tuyha.m catusatipa.t.thaanaa.t.taalamu.n.dacchadana.m. ^b^pa~n~naa te caccara.m mune^eb^ti, bhante, mune ~naa.navanta te tuyha.m paa.tihaariyaadianekavidhaa pa~n~naa caccara.m maggasamodhaana.m nagaraviithiiti attho. ^b^iddhipaada~nca si"nghaa.ta^eb^nti tuyha.m chandaviiriyacittaviima.msasa"nkhaataa cattaaro iddhipaadaa si"nghaa.ta.m catumaggasanti. ^b^dhammaviithi sumaapita^eb^nti sattati.msabodhipakkhiyadhammasa"nkhaataaya viithiyaa su.t.thu maapita.m sajjita.m, ta.m dhammanagaranti attho.

[03] 537^b^.^eb^ ^b^suttanta.m abhidhamma~ncaa^eb^ti tava tuyha.m ettha dhammanagare suttanta.m abhidhamma.m vinaya~nca ^b^kevala.m^eb^ sakala.m suttageyyaadika.m nava"nga.m buddhavacana.m ^b^dhammasabhaa^eb^ dhammaadhikara.nasaalaati attho.

[03] 538^b^.^eb^ ^b^su~n~nata.m animitta~ncaa^eb^ti anattaanupassanaavasena pa.tiladdha.m su~n~natavihaara~nca, aniccaanupassanaavasena pa.tiladdha.m animittavihaara~nca. ^b^vihaara~ncappa.nihita^eb^nti dukkhaanupassanaavasena pa.tiladdha.m appa.nihitavihaara~nca. ^b^aane~nja~ncaa^eb^ti acala.m aphandita.m catusaama~n~naphalasa"nkhaata.m aane~njavihaara~nca. ^b^nirodho caa^eb^ti sabbadukkhanirodha.m nibbaana~nca. ^b^esaa dhammaku.tii tavaa^eb^ti esaa sabbanavalokuttaradhammasa"nkhaataa tava tuyha.m dhammaku.ti vasanagehanti attho.

[03] 539^b^.^eb^ ^b^pa~n~naaya^eb^ ^a^M1.0323^ea^ ^b^aggo nikkhitto^eb^ti pa~n~naavasena pa~n~navantaana.m aggo. iti bhagavataa nikkhitto .thapito thero ^b^pa.tibhaane^eb^ ca pa~n~naaya kattabbe kicce, yuttamuttapa.tibhaane vaa ^b^kovido^eb^ cheko ^b^naamena saariputto^eb^ti paaka.to ^b^tava^eb^ tuyha.m dhammasenaapati tayaa desitassa pi.takattayadhammasamuuhassa dhaara.nato pati padhaano hutvaa senaakicca.m karotiiti attho.

[03] 540^b^.^eb^ ^b^cutuupapaatakusalo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0296^ea^ bhante muni, ^b^cutuupapaate^eb^ cutiyaa upapattiyaa ca ^b^kusalo^eb^ cheko. ^b^iddhiyaa paarami.m gato^eb^ti ``ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hotii''tiaadinaa (dii0 ni0 1.238; pa.ti0 ma0 1.102) vuttaaya iddhippabhedaaya paarami.m pariyosaana.m gato patto naamena kolito naama moggallaanatthero ^b^porohicco^eb^ tava tuyha.m purohitoti sambandho.

[03] 541^b^.^eb^ ^b^poraa.nakava.msadharo^eb^ti bhante mune, ~naa.navanta.m poraa.nassa va.msassa dhaarako, paramparajaananako vaa ^b^uggatejo^eb^ paaka.tatejo, ^b^duraasado^eb^ ^a^P0.0287^ea^ aasaadetu.m gha.t.tetu.m dukkho asakku.neyyoti attho. ^b^dhutavaadigu.nenaggo^eb^ti teciivarika"ngaadiini terasa dhuta"ngaani vadati ovadatiiti dhutavaadiigu.nena dhuta"ngagu.nena aggo se.t.tho mahaakassapatthero ^b^tava^eb^ tuyha.m ^b^akkhadasso^eb^ vohaarakara.ne padhaanoti attho.

[03] 542^b^.^eb^ ^b^bahussuto dhammadharo^eb^ti bhante mune, bahuuna.m caturaasiitidhammakkhandhasahassaana.m sutattaa bhagavataa bhikkhusa"nghato ca uggahitattaa bahussuto anekesa.m chasatasahassasa"nkhyaana.m aagamadhammaana.m satipa.t.thaanaadiina~nca paramatthadhammaana.m dhaara.nato dhammadharo aanando. ^b^sabbapaa.thii ca saasane^eb^ti buddhasaasane sabbesa.m paa.thiina.m pa.thantaana.m sajjhaayantaana.m bhikkhuuna.m aggo se.t.thoti sabbapaa.thii naamena aanando naama thero. ^b^dhammaarakkho tavaa^eb^ti tava tuyha.m dhammassa pi.takattayadhammabha.n.dassa aarakkho rakkhako paalako, dhammabha.n.daagaarikoti attho.

[03] 543^b^.^eb^ ^b^ete^eb^ ^a^M1.0324^ea^ sabbe atikkammaab^ti ^b^bhagavaa^eb^ bhagyavaa sammaasambuddho ete saariputtaadayo mahaanubhaavepi there atikkamma vajjetvaa mama.myeva ^b^pamesi^eb^ pamaa.na.m akaasi, manasi akaasiiti attho. ^b^vinicchaya.m me paadaasii^eb^ti vinaya~n~nuuhi pa.n.ditehi desita.m pakaasita.m vinaye vinicchaya.m dosavicaara.na.m me mayha.m bhagavaa ^b^paadaasi^eb^ pakaarena adaasi, mayhameva bhaara.m akaasiiti sambandho.

[03] 544^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo koci vinaye pa~nha^eb^nti yo koci bhikkhu buddhasaavako vinayanissita.m pa~nha.m ma.m pucchati, ^b^tattha^eb^ tasmi.m pucchitapa~nhe ^b^me^eb^ mayha.m ^b^cintanaa^eb^ vimati ka"nkhaa natthi. ^b^ta~nhevattha.m^eb^ ta.m eva pucchita.m attha.m aha.m kathemiiti sambandho.

[03] 545^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaavataa buddhakhettamhii^eb^ti yaavataa yattake .thaane buddhassa aa.naakhette ta.m mahaamuni.m ^a^V1.0297^ea^ sammaasambuddha.m .thapetvaa ^b^vinaye^eb^ vinayapi.take vinayavinicchayakara.ne vaa ^b^maadiso^eb^ mayaa sadiso natthi, ahameva aggo, ^b^bhiyyo^eb^ mamaadhiko kuto bhavissatiiti sambandho.

[03] 546^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhikkhusa"nghe nisiiditvaa^eb^ bhikkhusa"nghamajjhe nisinno gotamo bhagavaa ^b^eva.m gajjati^eb^ siihanaada.m karoti. katha.m? ^b^vinaye^eb^ ubhatovibha"nge, ^b^khandhakesu^eb^ mahaavaggacuu.lavaggesu, ca-saddena parivaare, ^b^upaalissa^eb^ upaalinaa ^b^samo^eb^ sadiso natthiiti eva.m gajjati.

[03] 547^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaavataa^eb^ti yattaka.m ^b^buddhabha.nita.m^eb^ buddhena desita.m ^b^nava"nga.m^eb^ suttageyyaadisatthusaasana.m satthunaa pakaasita.m sabba.m ^b^vinayogadha.m^eb^ ta.m vinaye antopavi.t.tha.m vinayamuulaka.m icceva.m ^b^passino^eb^ passantassa.

[03] 548^b^.^eb^ ^b^mama kamma.m saritvaanaa^eb^ti gotamo ^b^sakyapu"ngavo^eb^ sakyava.msappadhaano, ^b^mama kamma.m^eb^ mayha.m pubbapatthanaakamma.m atiita.msa~naa.nena ^b^saritvaana^eb^ paccakkhato ~natvaa bhikkhusa"nghamajjhe ^a^P0.0288^ea^ gato ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vinayadharaana.m yadida.m upaalii''ti (a0 ni0 1.219, 228) ma.m etadagge .thaane .thapesiiti sambandho.

[03] 549^b^.^eb^ ^b^satasahassupaadaayaa^eb^ti satasahassakappe aadi.m katvaa ya.m ima.m .thaana.m ^b^apatthayi.m^eb^ patthesi.m, so ^b^me^eb^ attho mayaa ^b^anuppatto^eb^ adhigato pa.tiladdho vinaye ^b^paarami.m gato^eb^ ko.ti.m pattoti attho.

[03] 550^b^.^eb^ ^b^sakyaana.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0325^ea^ sakyava.msaraajuuna.m ^b^nandijanano^eb^ somanassakaarako aha.m ^b^pure^eb^ pubbe kappako ^b^aasi.m^eb^ ahosi.m, ^b^ta.m jaati.m^eb^ ta.m kula.m ta.m yoni.m ^b^vijahitvaa^eb^ visesena jahitvaa cha.d.detvaa ^b^mahesino^eb^ sammaasambuddhassa ^b^putto jaato^eb^ sakyaputtoti sa"nkhya.m gato saasanadhaara.natoti attho.

[03] 551^b^.^eb^ tato para.m attano daasakule nibbattanaapadaana.m dassento ^b^ito dutiyake kappe^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^ito^eb^ bhaddakappato he.t.thaa dutiye kappe naamena a~njaso naama khattiyo eko raajaa ^b^anantatejo^eb^ sa"nkhyaatikkantatejo ^b^amitayaso^eb^ pamaa.naatikkantaparivaaro ^b^mahaddhano^eb^ anekako.tisatasahassadhanavaa ^b^bhuumipaalo^eb^ pathaviipaalako rakkhako ahosiiti sambandho.

[03] 552^b^.^eb^ ^b^tassa ra~n~no^eb^ti tassa taadisassa raajino putto aha.m candano naama ^b^khattiyo^eb^ khattiyakumaaro ahosinti sambandho. so aha.m jaatimadena ca yasamadena ca bhogamadena ca ^b^upatthaddho^eb^ thambhito unnatoti attho.

[03] 553^b^.^eb^ ^b^naagasatasahassaanii^eb^ti ^a^V1.0298^ea^ satasahassahatthino ^b^maata"ngaa^eb^ maata"ngakule jaataa ^b^tidhaa pabhinnaa^eb^ akkhika.n.nakosasa"nkhaatehi tiihi .thaanehi pabhinnaa madaga.litaa ^b^sabbaala"nkaarabhuusitaa^eb^ sabbehi hatthaala"nkaarehi ala"nkataa ^b^sadaa^eb^ sabbakaala.m ma.m parivaarentiiti sambandho.

[03] 554^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabalehi paretoha^eb^nti tadaa tasmi.m kaale aha.m sabalehi attano senaabalehi ^b^pareto^eb^ parivaarito uyyaana.m ^b^gantukaamako^eb^ icchanto sirika.m naama ^b^naaga.m^eb^ hatthi.m ^b^aaruyha^eb^ abhiruhitvaa nagarato nikkhaminti sambandho.

[03] 555^b^.^eb^ ^b^cara.nena ca sampanno^eb^ti siilasa.mvaraadipannarasacara.nadhammena samannaagato ^b^guttadvaaro pihitacakkhaadichadvaaro susa.mvuto^eb^ su.t.thu rakkhitakaayacitto devalo naama^b^ sambuddho^eb^ paccekasambuddho, ^b^mama^eb^ mayha.m ^b^purato^eb^ sammukhe ^b^aagacchi^eb^ paapu.niiti attho.

[03] 556^b^.^eb^ ^b^pesetvaa^eb^ ^a^M1.0326^ea^ ^b^sirika.m naaga^eb^nti ta.m aagata.m paccekabuddha.m disvaa aha.m sirika.m naama naaga.m abhimukha.m pesetvaa buddha.m ^b^aasaadayi.m^eb^ gha.t.tesi.m padussesinti attho. ^b^tato sa~njaatakopo so^eb^ti tato tasmaa mayaa atiiva pii.letvaa pesitattaa so hatthinaago mayi sa~njaatakopo ^a^P0.0289^ea^ ^b^pada.m^eb^ attano paada.m ^b^nuddharate^eb^ na uddharati, niccalova hotiiti attho.

[03] 557^b^.^eb^ ^b^naaga.m du.t.thamana.m disvaa^eb^ti du.t.thamana.m kuddhacitta.m naada.m disvaa aha.m ^b^buddhe^eb^ paccekabuddhe ^b^kopa.m akaasi.m^eb^ dosa.m uppaadesinti attho. ^b^vihesayitvaa sambuddha^eb^nti devala.m paccekasambuddha.m vihesayitvaa vihe.thetvaa aha.m uyyaana.m agamaasinti sambandho.

[03] 558^b^.^eb^ ^b^saata.m tattha na vindaamii^eb^ti tasmi.m aasaadane saata.m na vindaami. aasaadananimitta.m madhura.m sukha.m na labhaamiiti attho. ^b^siro pajjalito yathaa^eb^ti siro mama siisa.m pajjalito yathaa pajjalamaana.m viya hotiiti attho. ^b^pari.laahena .dayhaamii^eb^ti paccekabuddhe kopassa katattaa pacchaanutaapapari.laahena .dayhaami u.nhacitto homiiti attho.

[03] 559^b^.^eb^ ^b^sasaagarantaa^eb^ti teneva paapakammabalena sasaagarantaa saagarapariyosaanaa sakalamahaapathavii ^b^me^eb^ mayha.m ^b^aadittaa viya^eb^ jalitaa viya hoti khaayatiiti attho. ^b^pitu santikupaagammaa^eb^ti eva.m bhaye uppanne aha.m attano pitu ra~n~no santika.m ^b^upaagamma^eb^ upagantvaa ida.m vacana.m ^b^abravi.m^eb^ kathesinti attho.

[03] 560^b^.^eb^ ^b^aasiivisa.mva^eb^ ^a^V1.0299^ea^ ^b^kupita^eb^nti aasiivisa.m sabba.m kupita.m kuddha.m iva jalamaana.m aggikkhandha.m iva ^b^matta.m^eb^ tidhaa pabhinna.m ^b^danti.m^eb^ dantavanta.m ^b^ku~njara.m^eb^ uttama.m hatthi.m iva ca aagata.m ya.m paccekabuddha.m ^b^sayambhu.m^eb^ sayameva buddhabhuuta.m aha.m ^b^aasaadayi.m^eb^ gha.t.tesinti sambandho.

[03] 561^b^.^eb^ ^b^aasaadito mayaa buddho^eb^ti so paccekabuddho mayaa aasaadito gha.t.tito ^b^ghoro^eb^ a~n~nehi gha.t.tetu.m asakku.neyyattaa ghoro, ^b^uggatapo^eb^ paaka.tatapo ^b^jino^eb^ pa~nca maare jitavaa eva.mgu.nasampanno ^a^M1.0327^ea^ paccekabuddho mayaa gha.t.titoti attho. ^b^puraa sabbe vinassaamaa^eb^ti tasmi.m paccekabuddhe kataanaadarena sabbe maya.m vinassaama vividhenaakaarena nassaama, bhasmaa viya bhavaamaati attho. ^b^khamaapessaama ta.m muni^eb^nti ta.m paccekabuddha.m muni.m yaava na vinassaama, taava khamaapessaamaati sambandho.

[03] 562^b^.^eb^ ^b^no ce ta.m nijjhaapessaamaa^eb^ti ^b^attadanta.m^eb^ damitacitta.m ^b^samaahita.m^eb^ ekaggacitta.m ta.m paccekabuddha.m no ce nijjhaapessaama khamaapessaama. ^b^orena sattadivasaa^eb^ sattadivasato orabhaage sattadivase anatikkamitvaa sampu.n.na.m ra.t.tha.m me sabba.m ^b^vidhamissati^eb^ vinassissati.

[03] 563^b^.^eb^ ^b^sumekhalo kosiyo caa^eb^ti ete sumekhalaadayo cattaaro raajaano isayo ^b^aasaadayitvaa^eb^ gha.t.tetvaa anaadara.m katvaa ^b^sara.t.thakaa^eb^ saha ra.t.thajanapadavaasiihi duggataa vinaasa.m gataati attho.

[03] 564^b^.^eb^ ^b^yadaa^eb^ ^a^P0.0290^ea^ ^b^kuppanti isayo^eb^ti yadaa yasmi.m kaale ^b^sa~n~nataa^eb^ kaayasa~n~namaadiihi sa~n~nataa santaa ^b^brahmacaarino^eb^ uttamacaarino se.t.thacaarino isayo ^b^kuppanti^eb^ domanassaa bhavanti, tadaa sasaagara.m sapabbata.m sadevaka.m loka.m vinaasentiiti sambandho.

[03] 565^b^.^eb^ ^b^tiyojanasahassamhii^eb^ti tesa.m isiina.m aanubhaava.m ~natvaa te khamaapetu.m ^b^accaya.m^eb^ aparaadha.m ^b^desanatthaaya^eb^ pakaasanatthaaya tiyojanasahassappamaa.ne padese purise sannipaatayinti sambandho. ^b^sayambhu.m upasa"nkami^eb^nti sayambhu.m paccekabuddha.m upasa"nkami.m samiipa.m agamaasinti attho.

[03] 566^b^.^eb^ ^b^allavatthaa^eb^ti mayaa saddhi.m raasibhuutaa sabbe janaa allavatthaa udakena tintavatthauttaraasa"ngaa ^b^allasiraa^eb^ tintakesaa ^b^pa~njaliikataa^eb^ muddhani kataa~njalipu.taa ^b^buddhassa^eb^ paccekamunino ^a^V1.0300^ea^ ^b^paade^eb^ paadasamiipe ^b^nipatitvaa^eb^ nipajjitvaa ^b^ida.m vacanamabravu^eb^nti ``khamassu tva.m, mahaaviiraa''tiaadika.m vacana.m abravu.m kathesunti attho.

[03] 567^b^.^eb^ ^b^mahaaviira^eb^ viiruttama bhante paccekabuddha, mayaa tumhesu a~n~naa.nena kata.m aparaadha.m khamassu tva.m vinodehi, maa manasi karohiiti attho ^a^M1.0328^ea^. ^b^jano^eb^ janasamuuho ^b^ta.m^eb^ bhagavanta.m ^b^abhi^eb^ visesena yaacati. ^b^pari.laaha.m^eb^ dosamohehi katacittadukkhapari.laaha.m amhaaka.m ^b^vinodehi^eb^ tanu.m karohi, ^b^no^eb^ amhaaka.m ^b^ra.t.tha.m^eb^ sakalara.t.thajanapadavaasino ^b^maa vinaasaya^eb^ maa vinaasehiiti attho.

[03] 568^b^.^eb^ ^b^sadevamaanusaa sabbe^eb^ti sabbe maanusaa sadevaa ^b^sadaanavaa^eb^ pahaaraadaadiihi asurehi saha ^b^sarakkhasaa ayomayena kuu.tena^eb^ mahaamuggarena ^b^sadaa^eb^ sabbakaala.m ^b^me sira.m^eb^ mayha.m matthaka.m ^b^bhindeyyu.m^eb^ padaaleyyu.m.

[03] 569^b^.^eb^ tato para.m buddhaana.m khamitabhaava~nca kopaabhaava~nca pakaasento ^b^dake aggi na sa.n.thaatii^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha yathaa udake aggi ^b^na sa.n.thaati^eb^ na pati.t.thaati, yathaa biija.m ^b^sele^eb^ silaamaye pabbate na viruhati, yathaa ^b^agade^eb^ osadhe ^b^kimi^eb^ paa.nako na sa.n.thaati. tathaa ^b^kopo^eb^ cittappakopo dummanataa ^b^buddhe^eb^ pa.tividdhasacce paccekabuddhe ^b^na jaayati^eb^ na uppajjatiiti attho.

[03] 570^b^.^eb^ punapi buddhaana.m aanubhaava.m pakaasento ^b^yathaa ca bhuumii^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha yathaa ca ^b^bhuumi^eb^ pathavii ^b^acalaa^eb^ niccalaa, tathaa buddho acaloti attho. yathaa ^b^saagaro^eb^ mahaasamuddo ^b^appameyyo^eb^ pametu.m pamaa.na.m gahetu.m asakku.neyyo, tathaa buddho appameyyoti attho. yathaa ^b^aakaaso^eb^ aphu.t.thaakaaso ^b^anantako^eb^ pariyosaanarahito, ^b^eva.m^eb^ tathaa buddho ^b^akkhobhiyo^eb^ khobhetu.m aalo.letu.m asakku.neyyoti attho.

[03] 571^b^.^eb^ tato para.m paccekabuddhassa khamanavacana.m dassento ^b^sadaa^eb^ ^a^P0.0291^ea^ ^b^khantaa mahaaviiraa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^mahaaviiraa^eb^ uttamaviiriyavantaa buddhaa ^b^tapassino^eb^ paapaana.m tapanato ``tapo''ti laddhanaamena viiriyena samannaagataa ^b^khantaa^eb^ ca khantiyaa ca sampannaa ^b^khamitaa^eb^ ca paresa.m aparaadha.m khamitaa sahitaa ^b^sadaa^eb^ sabbakaala.m bhavantiiti sambandho. ^b^khantaana.m khamitaana~ncaa^eb^ti tesa.m buddhaana.m khantaana.m khantiyaa yuttaana.m khamitaana.m paraaparaadhakhamitaana.m sahitaana~nca ^b^gamana.m^eb^ chandaadiihi agatigamana.m na vijjatiiti attho.

[03] 572^b^.^eb^ iti ^a^M1.0329^ea^ ^a^V1.0301^ea^ ida.m vacana.m vatvaa ^b^sambuddho^eb^ paccekasambuddho ^b^pari.laaha.m^eb^ sattaana.m uppannadaaha.m ^b^vinodaya.m^eb^ vinodayanto ^b^mahaajanassa purato^eb^ sannipatitassa saraajakassa mahato janakaayassa sammukhato ^b^tadaa^eb^ tasmi.m kaale ^b^nabha.m^eb^ aakaasa.m ^b^abbhuggami^eb^ ugga~nchiiti attho.

[03] 573^b^.^eb^ ^b^tena kammenaha.m dhiiraa^eb^ti dhiira dhitisampanna aha.m ^b^tena kammena^eb^ paccekabuddhe katena anaadarakammena imasmi.m pacchimattabhave ^b^hiinatta.m^eb^ laamakabhaava.m raajuuna.m kappakakammakara.najaati.m ^b^ajjhupaagato^eb^ sampattoti attho. ^b^samatikkamma ta.m jaati^eb^nti ta.m paraayattajaati.m ^b^sa.m^eb^ su.t.thu atikkamma atikkamitvaa. ^b^paavisi.m abhaya.m pura^eb^nti bhayarahita.m nibbaanapura.m nibbaanamahaanagara.m paavisi.m pavi.t.tho aasinti attho.

[03] 574^b^.^eb^ ^b^tadaapi ma.m mahaaviiraa^eb^ti viiruttama ^b^tadaapi^eb^ tasmi.m paccekabuddhassa aasaadanasamaye api sayambhuu paccekabuddho ^b^pari.laaha.m^eb^ aasaadanahetu uppanna.m kaayacittadaratha.m vinodesi duuriiakaasi. ^b^.dayhamaana.m^eb^ tato eva pacchaanutaapena kukkuccena .dayhamaana.m santapanta.m ma.m ^b^susa.n.thita.m^eb^ dosa.m dosato dassane su.t.thu sa.n.thita.m disvaa khamaapayi ta.m aparaadha.m adhivaasesiiti sambandho.

[03] 575^b^.^eb^ ^b^ajjaapi ma.m mahaaviiraa^eb^ti viiruttama, ajjaapi tuyha.m samaagamakaale api, ^b^tihaggiibhi^eb^ raagaggidosaggimohaggisa"nkhaatehi vaa nirayaggipetaggisa.msaaraggisa"nkhaatehi vaa tiihi aggiihi ^b^.dayhamaana.m^eb^ dukkhamanubhavanta.m ma.m bhagavaa ^b^siitibhaava.m^eb^ domanassavinaasena santakaayacittasa"nkhaata.m siitibhaava.m nibbaanameva vaa ^b^apaapayi^eb^ sampaapesi. ^b^tayo aggii^eb^ vuttappakaare te tayo aggii ^b^nibbaapesi^eb^ vuupasamesiiti sambandho.

[03] 576^b^.^eb^ eva.m attano hiinaapadaana.m bhagavato dassetvaa idaani a~n~nepi tassa savane niyojetvaa ovadanto ``yesa.m sotaavadhaanatthii''tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^yesa.m^eb^ tumhaaka.m ^b^sotaavadhaana.m^eb^ sotassa avadhaana.m .thapana.m ^b^atthi^eb^ vijjati, te tumhe ^b^bhaasato^eb^ saasantassa mama vacana.m ^a^P0.0292^ea^ ^b^su.naatha^eb^ manasi karotha. ^b^attha.m tumha.m pavakkhaamii^eb^ti ^b^yathaa^eb^ yena pakaarena ^b^mama^eb^ mayaa di.t.tha.m ^b^pada.m^eb^ nibbaana.m, tathaa tena pakaarena nibbaanasa"nkhaata.m paramattha.m tumhaaka.m pavakkhaamiiti sambandho.

[03] 577^b^.^eb^ ta.m ^a^M1.0330^ea^ dassento ^b^sayambhu.m ta.m vimaanetvaa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^sayambhu.m^eb^ sayameva bhuuta.m ariyaaya jaatiyaa jaata.m santacitta.m samaahita.m paccekabuddha.m vimaanetvaa anaadara.m katvaa ^b^tena kammena^eb^ ^a^V1.0302^ea^ katenaakusalena ^b^ajja^eb^ imasmi.m vattamaanakaale aha.m ^b^niicayoniya.m^eb^ paraayattajaatiya.m kappakajaatiya.m ^b^jaato^eb^ nibbatto ^b^amhi^eb^ bhavaami.

[03] 578^b^.^eb^ ^b^maa vo kha.na.m viraadhethaa^eb^ti buddhuppaadakkha.na.m vo tumhe maa viraadhetha ga.lita.m maa karotha, ^b^hi^eb^ sacca.m ^b^kha.naatiitaa^eb^ buddhuppaadakkha.na.m atiitaa atikkantaa sattaa ^b^socare^eb^ socanti, ``maya.m alakkhikaa dummedhaa bhavaamaa''ti eva.m socantiiti attho. ^b^sadatthe^eb^ attano atthe vu.d.dhiya.m ^b^vaayameyyaatha^eb^ viiriya.m karotha. ^b^vo^eb^ tumhehi ^b^kha.no^eb^ buddhuppaadakkha.no samayo ^b^pa.tipaadito^eb^ nipphaadito pattoti attho.

[03] 579^b^.^eb^ tato para.m sa.msaaragataana.m aadiinava.m upamaaupameyyavasena dassento ^b^ekaccaana~nca vamana^eb^ntiaadimaaha. ^b^ekaccaana.m^eb^ kesa~nci puggalaana.m ^b^vamana.m^eb^ uddha.m uggira.na.m ekaccaana.m ^b^virecana.m^eb^ adhopagghara.na.m ^b^eke^eb^ ekaccaana.m halaahala.m ^b^visa.m^eb^ mucchaakara.navisa.m, ekaccaana.m puggalaana.m ^b^osadha.m^eb^ rakkhanupaaya.m bhagavaa eva.m pa.tipaa.tiyaa akkhaasiiti sambandho.

[03] 580^b^.^eb^ ^b^vamana.m pa.tipannaana^eb^nti pa.tipannaana.m maggasama"ngiina.m vamana.m sa.msaaracha.d.dana.m sa.msaaramocana.m bhagavaa akkhaasiiti sambandho. ^b^phala.t.thaana.m^eb^ phale .thitaana.m virecana.m sa.msaarapagghara.na.m akkhaasi. ^b^phalalaabhiina.m^eb^ phala.m labhitvaa .thitaana.m nibbaanaosadha.m akkhaasi. ^b^gavesiina.m^eb^ manussadevanibbaanasampatti.m gavesiina.m pariyesantaana.m pu~n~nakhettabhuuta.m sa"ngha.m akkhaasiiti sambandho.

[03] 581^b^.^eb^ ^b^saasanena viruddhaana^eb^nti saasanassa pa.tipakkhaana.m halaahala.m kutuuhala.m paapa.m akusala.m akkhaasiiti sambandho. ^b^yathaa aasiiviso^eb^ti assaddhaana.m katapaapaana.m puggalaana.m sa.msaare dukkhaavahanato aasiivisasadisa.m yathaa aasiiviso di.t.thamattena bhasmakara.nato ^b^di.t.thaviso^eb^ sappo attanaa da.t.tha.m nara.m ^b^jhaapeti^eb^ .dayhati dukkhaapeti. ^b^ta.m nara.m^eb^ ta.m assaddha.m katapaapa.m nara.m halaahalavisa.m eva.m jhaapeti catuusu apaayesu .dayhati sosesiiti sambandho.

[03] 582^b^.^eb^ ^b^saki.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0331^ea^ ^b^piita.m halaahala^eb^nti visa.m halaahala.m piita.m saki.m ekavaara.m ^a^P0.0293^ea^ jiivita.m ^b^uparundhati^eb^ naaseti. ^b^saasanena^eb^ saasanamhi ^b^virajjhitvaa^eb^ aparaadha.m katvaa puggalo ^b^kappako.timhi^eb^ ko.tisa"nkhye kappepi ^b^.dayhati^eb^ nijjhaayatiiti attho.

[03] 583^b^.^eb^ eva.m assaddhaana.m puggalaana.m phalavipaaka.m dassetvaa idaani buddhaana.m aanubhaava.m dassento ^a^V1.0303^ea^ ^b^khantiyaa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha yo buddho vamanaadiini akkhaasi, ^b^so^eb^ buddho ^b^khantiyaa^eb^ khamanena ca ^b^avihi.msaaya^eb^ sattaana.m avihi.msanena ca ^b^mettacittavataaya^eb^ ca mettacittavantabhaavena ca ^b^sadevaka.m^eb^ saha devehi vattamaana.m loka.m ^b^taareti^eb^ atikkamaapeti nibbaapeti, ^b^tasmaa^eb^ kaara.naa buddhaa vo tumhehi ^b^aviraadhiyaa^eb^ virujjhitu.m na sakku.neyyaa, buddhasaasane pa.tipajjeyyaathaati attho.

[03] 584^b^.^eb^ laabhe ca alaabhe ca ^b^na sajjanti^eb^ na bhajanti na lagganti. ^b^sammaanane^eb^ aadarakara.ne ca ^b^vimaanane^eb^ anaadarakara.ne ca acalaa pathaviisadisaa buddhaa bhavanti, ^b^tasmaa^eb^ kaara.naa ^b^te^eb^ buddhaa tumhehi ^b^na virodhiyaa^eb^ na virodhetabbaa virujjhitu.m asakku.neyyaati attho.
[03] 585^b^.^eb^ buddhaana.m majjhattata.m dassento ^b^devadatte^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha vadhakaavadhakesu sabbesu sattesu ^b^samako^eb^ samamaanaso ^b^muni^eb^ buddhamuniiti attho.

[03] 586^b^.^eb^ ^b^etesa.m pa.tigho natthii^eb^ti etesa.m buddhaana.m pa.tigho ca.n.dikka.m dosacittata.m natthi na sa.mvijjati. ^b^raagomesa.m na vijjatii^eb^ti imesa.m buddhaana.m raagopi rajjana.m alliiyana.m na vijjati, na upalabbhati, tasmaa kaara.naa, vadhakassa ca orasassa caati sabbesa.m ^b^samako^eb^ samacitto buddho hotiiti sambandho.

[03] 587^b^.^eb^ punapi buddhaana.myeva aanubhaava.m dassento ^b^panthe disvaana kaasaava^eb^ntiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^mii.lhamakkhita.m^eb^ guuthasammissa.m ^b^kaasaava.m^eb^ kasaavena rajita.m ciivara.m ^b^isiddhaja.m^eb^ ariyaana.m dhaja.m parikkhaara.m, ^b^panthe^eb^ magge cha.d.dita.m ^b^disvaana^eb^ passitvaa ^b^a~njali.m katvaa^eb^ dasa"ngulisamodhaana.m a~njalipu.ta.m sirasi katvaa ^a^M1.0332^ea^ ^b^sirasaa^eb^ sirena ^b^vanditabba.m isiddhaja.m^eb^ arahattaddhaja.m buddhapaccekabuddhasaavakadiipaka.m ciivara.m namassitabba.m maanetabba.m puujetabbanti attho.

[03] 588^b^.^eb^ ^b^abbhatiitaa^eb^ti abhi attha"ngataa nibbutaa. ^b^ye ca buddhaa vattamaanaa^eb^ idaani jaataa ca ye buddhaa ^b^anaagataa^eb^ ajaataa abhuutaa anibbattaa apaatubhuutaa ca ye buddhaa. ^b^dhajenaanena sujjhantii^eb^ti anena isiddhajena ciivarena ete buddhaa sujjhanti visuddhaa bhavanti sobhanti. ^b^tasmaa^eb^ tena kaara.nena ^b^ete^eb^ buddhaa ^b^namassiyaa namassitabbaa^eb^ vanditabbaati attho. ``eta.m namassiya''ntipi paa.tho, tassa eta.m isiddhaja.m namassitabbanti attho.

[03] 589^b^.^eb^ tato ^a^P0.0294^ea^ para.m attano gu.na.m dassento ^b^satthukappa^eb^ntiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^satthukappa.m^eb^ buddhasadisa.m ^a^V1.0304^ea^ ^b^suvinaya.m^eb^ sundaravinaya.m sundaraakaarena dvaarattayadamana.m ^b^hadayena^eb^ cittena aha.m ^b^dhaaremi^eb^ savanadhaara.naadinaa paccavekkhaamiiti attho. ^b^vinaya.m^eb^ vinayapi.taka.m ^b^namassamaano^eb^ vandamaano vinaye aadara.m kurumaano ^b^viharissaami sabbadaa^eb^ sabbasmi.m kaale vaasa.m kappemiiti attho.

[03] 590^b^.^eb^ ^b^vinayo aasayo mayha^eb^nti vinayapi.taka.m mayha.m okaasabhuuta.m savanadhaara.namanasikara.nauggahaparipucchaapavattanavasena okaasabhuuta.m gehabhuutanti attho. ^b^vinayo .thaanaca"nkama^eb^nti vinayo mayha.m savanaadikiccakara.nena .thita.t.thaana~nca ca"nkamana.t.thaana~nca. ^b^kappemi vinaye vaasa^eb^nti vinayapi.take vinayatantiyaa savanadhaara.napavattanavasena vaasa.m sayana.m kappemi karomi. ^b^vinayo mama gocaro^eb^ti vinayapi.taka.m mayha.m gocaro aahaaro bhojana.m nicca.m dhaara.namanasikara.navasenaati attho.

[03] 591^b^.^eb^ ^b^vinaye paaramippatto^eb^ti sakale vinayapi.take paarami.m pariyosaana.m patto. ^b^samathe caapi kovido^eb^ti paaraajikaadisattaapattikkhandhaana.m samathe vuupasame ca vu.t.thaane ca kovido cheko, adhikara.nasamathe vaa --
[21] ``vivaada.m anuvaada~nca, aapattaadhikara.na.m tathaa.
[22] kiccaadhikara.na~nceva, caturaadhikara.naa mataa''ti.. --
[25] vuttaadhikara.nesu ca --
[21] ``sammukhaa ^a^M1.0333^ea^ sativinayo, amuu.lhapa.ti~n~naakara.na.m.
[22] yebhuyya tassapaapiyya, ti.navatthaarako tathaa''ti.. --

[25] eva.m vuttesu ca sattasu adhikara.nasamathesu atikovido chekoti attho. ^b^upaali ta.m mahaaviiraa^eb^ti bhante mahaaviira, catuusu asa"nkhyeyyesu kappasatasahassesu sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.naadhigamaaya viiriyavanta ^b^satthuno^eb^ devamanussaana.m anusaasakassa ^b^ta.m^eb^ tava ^b^paade^eb^ paadayuge upaali bhikkhu ^b^vandati^eb^ pa.naama.m karotiiti attho.

[03] 592^b^.^eb^ so aha.m pabbajitvaa sambuddha.m ^b^namassamaano^eb^ pa.naama.m kurumaano ^b^dhammassa ca^eb^ tena bhagavataa desitassa navalokuttaradhammassa ^b^sudhammata.m^eb^ sundaradhammabhaava.m jaanitvaa dhamma~nca namassamaano gaamato gaama.m ^b^purato puna.m^eb^ nagarato nagara.m vicarissaamiiti sambandho.

[03] 593^b^.^eb^ ^b^kilesaa^eb^ ^a^V1.0305^ea^ ^b^jhaapitaa mayha^eb^nti mayaa pa.tividdhaarahattamagga~naa.nena mayha.m cittasantaanagataa sabbe diya.d.dhasahassasa"nkhaa kilesaa ^a^P0.0295^ea^ jhaapitaa sositaa visositaa viddha.msitaa. ^b^bhavaa sabbe samuuhataa^eb^ti kaamabhavaadayo sabbe nava bhavaa mayaa samuuhataa ^b^sa.m^eb^ su.t.thu uuhataa khepitaa viddha.msitaa. ^b^sabbaasavaa parikkhii.naa^eb^ti kaamaasavo, bhavaasavo, di.t.thaasavo, avijjaasavoti sabbe cattaaro aasavaa parikkhii.naa parisamantato khaya.m paapitaa. ^b^idaani^eb^ imasmi.m arahattappattakaale ^b^punabbhavo^eb^ punuppattisa"nkhaato bhavo bhavana.m jaati natthiiti attho.

[03] 594^b^.^eb^ uttari somanassavasena udaana.m udaanento ^b^svaagata^eb^ntiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^buddhase.t.thassa^eb^ uttamabuddhassa ^b^santike^eb^ samiipe ekanagare vaa mama aagamana.m ^b^svaagata.m^eb^ su.t.thu aagamana.m sundaraagamana.m ^b^vata^eb^ ekantena ^b^aasi^eb^ ahosiiti sambandho. ^b^tisso vijjaa^eb^ti pubbenivaasadibbacakkhuaasavakkhayavijjaa ^b^anuppattaa^eb^ sampattaa, paccakkha.m kataati attho. ^b^kata.m buddhassa saasana^eb^nti buddhena bhagavataa desita.m anusi.t.thi saasana.m kata.m nipphaadita.m vattapa.tipatti.m puuretvaa kamma.t.thaana.m manasi karitvaa arahattamagga~naa.naadhigamena sampaaditanti attho.

[03] 595^b^.^eb^ ^b^pa.tisambhidaa catasso^eb^ti atthapa.tisambhidaadayo catasso pa~n~naayo sacchikataa paccakkha.m kataa. ^b^vimokkhaapi ca a.t.thime^eb^ti cattaari ^a^M1.0334^ea^ magga~naa.naani cattaari phala~naa.naaniiti ime a.t.tha vimokkhaa sa.msaarato muccanuupaayaa sacchikataati sambandho. ^b^cha.labhi~n~naa sacchikataa^eb^ti --
[21] ``iddhividha.m dibbasota.m, cetopariya~naa.naka.m.
[22] pubbenivaasa~naa.na~nca, dibbacakkhaasavakkhaya''nti.. --
[25] imaa cha abhi~n~naa sacchikataa paccakkha.m kataa. imesa.m ~naa.naana.m sacchikara.nena buddhassa saasana.m katanti attho.

[03] ^b^ittha^eb^nti iminaa he.t.thaa vuttappakaarena. ^b^suda^eb^nti padapuura.namatte nipaato. aayasmaa upaali ^b^thero^eb^ti thirasiilaadigu.nayutto saavako imaa pubbacaritaapadaanadiipikaa gaathaayo ^b^abhaasittha^eb^ kathayitthaati attho.
[06] upaalittheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] ^b^padumuttarasambuddha^eb^ntiaadika.m ^a^V1.0306^ea^ aayasmato a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~nattherassa apadaana.m. aya.m kira purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare gahapatimahaasaalakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patvaa ekadivasa.m satthu santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m attano saasane pa.thama.m ^a^P0.0296^ea^ pa.tividdhadhammaratta~n~nuuna.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa sayampi ta.m .thaanantara.m patthento satasahassabhikkhuparivaarassa bhagavato sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa pa.nidhaana.m akaasi. satthaapissa anantaraayata.m disvaa bhaavini.m sampatti.m byaakaasi. so yaavajiiva.m pu~n~naani karonto satthari parinibbute cetiye pati.t.thaapiyamaane antocetiye ratanaghara.m kaaraapesi, cetiya.m parivaaretvaa sahassaratanagghikaani ca kaaresi.

[03] so eva.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato cavitvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto vipassissa bhagavato kaale mahaakaalo naama ku.tumbiko hutvaa a.t.thakariisamatte khette saaligabbha.m phaaletvaa gahitasaalita.n.dulehi asambhinnakhiirapaayaasa.m sampaadetvaa tattha madhusappisakkaraadayo pakkhipitvaa buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa adaasi. saaligabbha.m phaaletvaa gahitagahita.t.thaana.m ^a^M1.0335^ea^ puna puurati. puthukakaale puthukagga.m naama adaasi. laayane laayanagga.m, ve.nikara.ne ve.nagga.m, kalaapaadikara.ne kalaapagga.m, khalagga.m, bha.n.dagga.m, minagga.m ko.t.thagganti eva.m ekasasse nava vaare aggadaana.m adaasi, tampi sassa.m atirekatara.m sampanna.m ahosi.

[03] eva.m yaavajiiva.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvaa devesu ca manussesu ca sa.msaranto amhaaka.m bhagavato uppattito puretarameva kapilavatthunagarassa aviduure do.navatthunaamake braahma.nagaame braahma.namahaasaalakule nibbatti. tassa ^b^ko.n.da~n~no^eb^ti gottato aagata.m naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvaa lakkha.namantesu ca paara.m agamaasi. tena samayena amhaaka.m bodhisatto tusitapurato cavitvaa kapilavatthupure suddhodanamahaaraajassa gehe nibbatti. tassa naamaggaha.nadivase a.t.thuttarasatesu braahma.nesu upaniitesu ye a.t.tha braahma.naa lakkha.napariggaha.nattha.m mahaatala.m upaniitaa. so tesu sabbanavako hutvaa mahaapurisassa lakkha.nanipphatti.m disvaa ``eka.msena aya.m buddho bhavissatii''ti ni.t.tha.m gantvaa mahaasattassa abhinikkhamana.m udikkhanto vicarati.

[03] bodhisattopi ^a^V1.0307^ea^ kho mahataa parivaarena va.d.dhamaano anukkamena vuddhippatto ~naa.naparipaaka.m gantvaa ekuunati.msatime vasse mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhamanto anomaanadiitiire pabbajitvaa anukkamena uruvela.m gantvaa padhaana.m padahi. tadaa ko.n.da~n~no maa.navo mahaasattassa pabbajitabhaava.m sutvaa lakkha.napariggaahakabraahma.naana.m puttehi vappamaa.navaadiihi saddhi.m attapa~ncamo ^a^P0.0297^ea^ pabbajitvaa anukkamena bodhisattassa santika.m upasa"nkamitvaa chabbassaani ta.m upa.t.thahanto tassa o.laarikaahaaraparibhogena nibbinno apakkamitvaa isipatana.m agamaasi. atha kho bodhisatto o.laarikaahaaraparibhogena laddhakaayabalo vesaakhapu.n.namaaya.m bodhirukkhamuule aparaajitapalla"nke nisinno ti.n.na.m maaraana.m matthaka.m madditvaa abhisambuddho hutvaa sattasattaaha.m bodhima.n.deyeva viitinaametvaa pa~ncavaggiyaana.m ~naa.naparipaaka.m ~natvaa aasaa.lhiipu.n.namaaya.m isipatana.m gantvaa tesa.m dhammacakkapavattanasuttanta.m (mahaava0 13 aadayo; sa.m0 ni0 5.1081) kathesi. desanaapariyosaane ko.n.da~n~natthero ^a^M1.0336^ea^ a.t.thaarasahi brahmako.tiihi saddhi.m sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaasi. atha pa~ncamiya.m pakkhassa anattalakkha.nasuttantadesanaaya (mahaava0 20 aadayo; sa.m0 ni0 3.59) arahatta.m sacchaakaasi.

[03] 596^b^.^eb^ eva.m so arahatta.m patvaa ``ki.m kamma.m katvaa aha.m lokuttarasukha.m adhigatomhii''ti upadhaarento attano pubbakamma.m paccakkhato ~natvaa somanassavasena pubbacaritaapadaana.m udaanavasena dassento ^b^padumuttarasambuddha^eb^ntiaadimaaha. tassattho he.t.thaa vuttoyeva. ^b^lokaje.t.tha.m vinaayaka^eb^nti sakalassa sattalokassa je.t.tha.m padhaananti attho. visesena veneyyasatte sa.msaarasaagarassa paratiira.m amatamahaanibbaana.m neti sampaapetiiti ^b^vinaayako,^eb^ ta.m vinaayaka.m. ^b^buddhabhuumimanuppatta^eb^nti buddhassa bhuumi pati.t.thaana.t.thaananti buddhabhuumi, sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.na.m, ta.m anuppatto pa.tividdhoti buddhabhuumimanuppatto, ta.m buddhabhuumimanuppatta.m, sabba~n~nutappatta.m buddhabhuutanti attho. ^b^pa.thama.m addasa.m aha^eb^nti pa.thama.m vesaakhapu.n.namiyaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaye buddhabhuuta.m padumuttarasambuddha.m aha.m addakkhinti attho.

[03] 597^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaavataa bodhiyaa muule^eb^ti yattakaa bodhirukkhasamiipe yakkhaa ^b^samaagataa^eb^ raasibhuutaa ^b^sambuddha.m^eb^ buddhabhuuta.m ta.m buddha.m ^b^pa~njaliikataa^eb^ dasa"ngulisamodhaana.m a~njalipu.ta.m sirasi .thapetvaa ^b^vandanti^eb^ namassantiiti sambandho.

[03] 598^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbe devaa tu.t.thamanaa^eb^ti buddhabhuuta.t.thaana.m aagataa te sabbe devaa tu.t.thacittaa aakaase sa~ncarantiiti ^a^V1.0308^ea^ sambandho. ^b^andhakaaratamonudo^eb^ti ativiya andhakaara.m moha.m nudo khepano aya.m buddho anuppattoti attho.

[03] 599^b^.^eb^ ^b^tesa.m haasaparetaana^eb^nti haasehi piitisomanassehi samannaagataana.m tesa.m devaana.m^b^ mahaanaado^eb^ mahaaghoso ^b^avattatha^eb^ pavattati, sammaasambuddhasaasane ^a^P0.0298^ea^ ^b^kilese^eb^ sa.mkilese dhamme jhaapayissaamaati sambandho.

[03] 600^b^.^eb^ ^b^devaana.m girama~n~naayaa^eb^ti vaacaaya thutivacanena saha udiirita.m devaana.m sadda.m jaanitvaa ha.t.tho ^b^ha.t.thena cittena^eb^ somanassasahagatena cittena ^b^aadibhikkha.m^eb^ pa.thama.m aahaara.m buddhabhuutassa aha.m adaasinti sambandho.

[03] 602^b^.^eb^ ^b^sattaaha.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0337^ea^ abhinikkhammaab^ti mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhamitvaa sattaaha.m padhaana.m katvaa sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.napada.t.thaana.m arahattamagga~naa.nasa"nkhaata.m ^b^bodhi.m ajjhagama.m^eb^ adhiga~nchi.m ahanti attho. ^b^ida.m me pa.thama.m bhatta^eb^nti ida.m bhatta.m sariirayaapana.m ^b^brahmacaarissa^eb^ uttamacaarissa ^b^me^eb^ mayha.m iminaa devaputtena pa.thama.m dinna.m ahosiiti attho.

[03] 603^b^.^eb^ ^b^tusitaa hi idhaagantvaa^eb^ti tusitabhavanato idha manussaloke aagantvaa ^b^yo^eb^ devaputto ^b^me^eb^ mama bhikkha.m ^b^upaanayi^eb^ adaasi, ^b^ta.m^eb^ devaputta.m ^b^kittayissaami^eb^ kathessaami paaka.ta.m karissaami. ^b^bhaasato^eb^ bhaasantassa mama vacana.m su.naathaati sambandho. ito para.m anuttaanapadameva va.n.nayissaama.

[03] 607^b^.^eb^ ^b^tidasaa^eb^ti taavati.msabhavanaa. ^b^agaaraa^eb^ti attano uppannabraahma.nagehato nikkhamitvaa pabbajitvaa cha sa.mvaccharaani dukkarakaarika.m karontena bodhisattena saha vasissatiiti sambandho.

[03] 608^b^.^eb^ ^b^tato sattamake vasse^eb^ti tato pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya sattame sa.mvacchare. ^b^buddho sacca.m kathessatii^eb^ti chabbassaani dukkarakaarika.m katvaa sattamasa.mvacchare buddho hutvaa baaraa.nasiya.m isipatane migadaaye dhammacakkapavattanasuttantadesanaaya dukkhasamudayanirodhamaggasaccasa"nkhaata.m catusacca.m kathessatiiti attho. ^b^ko.n.da~n~no naama naamenaa^eb^ti naamena gottanaamavasena ko.n.da~n~no naama. ^b^pa.thama.m sacchikaahitii^eb^ti pa~ncavaggiyaanamantare pa.thama.m aadito eva sotaapattimagga~naa.na.m sacchikaahiti paccakkha.m karissatiiti attho.

[03] 609^b^.^eb^ ^b^nikkhantenaanupabbaji^eb^nti ^a^V1.0309^ea^ nikkhantena bodhisattena saha nikkhamitvaa anupabbajinti attho. tathaa anupabbajitvaa mayaa ^b^padhaana.m^eb^ viiriya.m ^b^sukata.m^eb^ su.t.thu kata.m da.lha.m katvaa katanti attho. ^b^kilese jhaapanatthaayaa^eb^ti kilese sosanatthaaya viddha.msanatthaaya ^b^anagaariya.m^eb^ agaarassa ahita.m kasiva.nijjaadikammavirahita.m saasana.m ^b^pabbaji.m^eb^ pa.tipajjinti attho.

[03] 610^b^.^eb^ ^b^abhigantvaana^eb^ ^a^M1.0338^ea^ ^a^P0.0299^ea^ ^b^sabba~n~nuu^eb^ti sabba.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m vaa sa"nkhaaravikaaralakkha.nanibbaanapa~n~nattisa"nkhaata.m ~neyya.m vaa jaananto devehi saha vattamaane satta loke buddho ^b^migaara~n~na.m^eb^ migadaaya vihaara.m abhigantvaa upasa"nkamitvaa ^b^me^eb^ mayaa sacchikatena ^b^iminaa^eb^ sotaapattimagga~naa.nena ^b^amatabheri.m^eb^ amatamahaanibbaanabheri.m ahari pahari dassesiiti attho.

[03] 611^b^.^eb^ ^b^so daanii^eb^ti so aha.m pa.thama.m sotaapanno idaani arahattamagga~naa.nena amata.m ^b^santa.m^eb^ vuupasantasabhaava.m ^b^pada.m^eb^ pajjitabba.m paapu.nitabba.m, ^b^anuttara.m^eb^ uttaravirahita.m nibbaana.m patto adhigatoti attho. ^b^sabbaasave pari~n~naayaa^eb^ti kaamaasavaadayo sabbe aasave pari~n~naaya pahaanapari~n~naaya pajahitvaa ^b^anaasavo^eb^ nikkileso ^b^viharaami^eb^ iriyaapathavihaarena vaasa.m kappemi. ^b^pa.tisambhidaa catasso^eb^tyaadayo gaathaayo vuttatthaayeva.

[03] atha na.m satthaa aparabhaage jetavanamahaavihaare bhikkhusa"nghamajjhe pa~n~nattavarabuddhaasane nisinno pa.thama.m pa.tividdhadhammabhaava.m diipento ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ratta~n~nuuna.m yadida.m a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~no''ti (a0 ni0 1.188) etadagge .thapesi. so dviihi aggasaavakehi attani kariyamaana.m paramanipaccakaara.m, gaamantasenaasane aaki.n.navihaara~nca pariharitukaamo, vivekaabhiratiyaa viharitukaamo ca attano santika.m upagataana.m gaha.t.thapabbajitaana.m pa.tisanthaarakara.nampi papa~nca.m ma~n~namaano satthaara.m aapucchitvaa himavanta.m pavisitvaa chaddantehi naagehi upa.t.thiyamaano chaddantadahatiire dvaadasa vassaani vasi. eva.m tattha vasanta.m thera.m ekadivasa.m sakko devaraajaa upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa .thito evamaaha ``saadhu me, bhante, ayyo dhamma.m desetuu''ti. thero tassa catusaccagabbha.m tilakkha.naahata.m su~n~nataapa.tisa.myutta.m naanaanayavicitta.m amatogadha.m buddhaliilaaya dhamma.m desesi. ta.m sutvaa sakko attano pasaada.m pavedento --
[21] ``esa ^a^V1.0310^ea^ bhiyyo pasiidaami, sutvaa dhamma.m mahaarasa.m.
[22] viraago desito dhammo, anupaadaaya sabbaso''ti.. (theragaa0 673) --

[25] thuti.m ^a^M1.0339^ea^ akaasi. thero chaddantadahatiire dvaadasa vassaani vasitvaa upaka.t.the parinibbaane satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa parinibbaana.m anujaanaapetvaa tattheva gantvaa parinibbaayiiti.
[06] a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~nattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] ^b^padumuttaro^eb^ ^a^P0.0300^ea^ ^b^naama jino^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale siihayoniya.m nibbattitvaa pabbatapaade guhaaya.m vihaasi. bhagavaa tassa anuggaha.m kaatu.m gocaraaya pakkantakaale tassa sayanaguha.m pavisitvaa nirodha.m samaapajjitvaa nisiidi. siiho gocara.m gahetvaa nivatto guhadvaare .thatvaa bhagavanta.m disvaa ha.t.thatu.t.tho jalajathalajapupphehi puuja.m katvaa citta.m pasaadento bhagavato aarakkha.natthaaya a~n~ne vaa.lamige apanetu.m tiisu velaasu siihanaada.m nadanto buddhagataaya satiyaa a.t.thaasi. yathaa pa.thamadivase, eva.m sattaaha.m puujesi. bhagavaa ``sattaahaccayena nirodhaa vu.t.thahitvaa va.t.tissati imassa ettako upanissayo''ti tassa passantasseva aakaasa.m pakkhanditvaa vihaarameva gato.

[03] siiho buddhaviyogadukkha.m adhivaasetu.m asakkonto kaala.m katvaa ha.msavatiinagare mahaabhogakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto nagaravaasiihi saddhi.m vihaara.m gantvaa satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa pasanno sattaaha.m buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa yaavajiiva.m pu~n~naani katvaa aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale kosambiya.m ra~n~no udenassa purohitassa putto hutvaa nibbatti. ^b^bhaaradvaajo^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappato tayo vede uggahetvaa pa~nca maa.navakasataani mante vaacento mahagghasabhaavena ananuruupaacaarattaa ^a^M1.0340^ea^ tehi pariccatto raajagaha.m gantvaa bhagavato bhikkhusa"nghassa ca laabhasakkaara.m disvaa saasane pabbajitvaa bhojane amatta~n~nuu hutvaa viharati. satthaaraa upaayena matta~n~nutaaya pati.t.thaapento vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa bhagavato sammukhaa ^a^V1.0311^ea^ ``ya.m saavakehi pattabba.m, ta.m mayaa anuppatta''nti, bhikkhusa"nghe ca ``yassa magge vaa phale vaa ka"nkhaa atthi, so ma.m pucchatuu''ti siihanaada.m nadi. tena ta.m bhagavaa -- ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m siihanaadikaana.m yadida.m pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajo''ti (a0 ni0 1.188, 195) etadagge .thapesi.

[03] 613^b^.^eb^ eva.m etadagga.m .thaana.m patvaa pubbe katapu~n~nasambhaara.m saritvaa somanassavasena attano pu~n~nakammaapadaana.m vibhaavento ^b^padumuttaro^eb^tiaadimaaha. tassattho he.t.thaa vuttova. ^b^purato himavantassaa^eb^ti himaalayapabbatato pubbadisaabhaageti attho. ^b^cittakuu.te^eb^ ^a^P0.0301^ea^ ^b^vasii tadaa^eb^ti yadaa aha.m siiho migaraajaa hutvaa himavantapabbatasamiipe vasaami, tadaa padumuttaro naama satthaa anekehi ca osadhehi, anekehi ca ratanehi cittavicittataaya cittakuu.te cittapabbatasikhare vasiiti sambandho.

[03] 614^b^.^eb^ ^b^abhiitaruupo tatthaasi^eb^nti abhiitasabhaavo nibbhayasabhaavo migaraajaa tattha aasi.m ahosinti attho. ^b^catukkamo^eb^ti catuuhi disaahi kamo gantu.m samattho. ^b^yassa sadda.m su.nitvaanaa^eb^ti yassa migara~n~no siihanaada.m sutvaa ^b^bahujjanaa^eb^ bahusattaa ^b^vikkhambhanti^eb^ visesena khambhanti bhaayanti.

[03] 615^b^.^eb^ ^b^suphulla.m paduma.m gayhaa^eb^ti bhagavati pasaadena supupphitapadumapuppha.m .da.msitvaa. ^b^naraasabha.m^eb^ naraana.m aasabha.m uttama.m se.t.tha.m sambuddha.m upagacchi.m, samiipa.m agaminti attho. ^b^vu.t.thitassa samaadhimhaa^eb^ti nirodhasamaapattito vu.t.thitassa buddhassa ta.m puppha.m abhiropayi.m puujesinti attho.

[03] 616^b^.^eb^ ^b^catuddisa.m namassitvaa^eb^ti catuusu disaasu namassitvaa ^b^saka.m citta.m^eb^ attano citta.m ^b^pasaadetvaa^eb^ aadarena pati.t.thapetvaa ^b^siihanaada.m^eb^ abhiitanaada.m ^b^anadi.m^eb^ ghosesinti attho.
[03] 617^b^.^eb^ tato ^a^M1.0341^ea^ buddhena dinnabyaakara.na.m pakaasento ^b^padumuttaro^eb^tiaadimaaha. ta.m uttaanatthameva.

[03] 618^b^.^eb^ ^b^vadata.m se.t.tho^eb^ti ``maya.m buddhaa, maya.m buddhaa''ti vadantaana.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m se.t.tho uttamo buddho aagatoti sambandho. tassa aagatassa bhagavato ta.m dhamma.m ^b^sossaama^eb^ su.nissaamaati attho.

[03] 619^b^.^eb^ ^b^tesa.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0312^ea^ ^b^haasaparetaana^eb^nti haasehi somanassehi paretaana.m abhibhuutaana.m samannaagataana.m tesa.m devamanussaana.m. ^b^lokanaayako^eb^ti lokassa naayako saggamokkhasampaapako ^b^mama sadda.m^eb^ mayha.m siihanaada.m ^b^pakittesi^eb^ pakaasesi kathesi, ^b^diighadassii^eb^ anaagatakaaladassii ^b^mahaamuni^eb^ muniinamantare mahanto muni. sesagaathaa suvi~n~neyyameva.
[03] 622^b^.^eb^ naamena padumo naama cakkavattii hutvaa catusa.t.thiyaa jaatiyaa ^b^issariya.m^eb^ issarabhaava.m rajja.m kaarayissatiiti attho.
[03] 623^b^.^eb^ ^b^kappasatasahassamhii^eb^ti saamyatthe bhummavacana.m, kappasatasahassaana.m pariyosaaneti attho.

[03] 624^b^.^eb^ ^b^pakaasite paavacane^eb^ti tena gotamena bhagavataa pi.takattaye pakaasite desiteti attho. ^b^brahmabandhu bhavissatii^eb^ti tadaa gotamassa bhagavato kaale aya.m siiho migaraajaa braahma.nakule nibbattissatiiti attho. ^b^brahma~n~naa abhinikkhammaa^eb^ti braahma.nakulato nikkhamitvaa tassa bhagavato saasane pabbajissatiiti sambandho.

[03] 625^b^.^eb^ ^b^padhaanapahitatto^eb^ti viiriyakara.nattha.m pesitacitto. upadhisa"nkhaataana.m ^a^P0.0302^ea^ kilesaana.m abhaavena ^b^nirupadhi^eb^. kilesadarathaana.m abhaavena ^b^upasanto. sabbaasave^eb^ sakalaasave ^b^pari~n~naaya^eb^ pahaaya ^b^anaasavo^eb^ nikkileso ^b^nibbaayissati^eb^ khandhaparinibbaanena nibbuto bhavissatiiti attho.

[03] 626^b^.^eb^ ^b^vijane pantaseyyamhii^eb^ti janasambaadharahite duuraara~n~nasenaasaneti attho. ^b^vaa.lamigasamaakule^eb^ti kaa.lasiihaadiihi ca.n.damigasa"ngehi aakule sa.mki.n.neti attho. sesa.m vuttatthamevaati.
[06] pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] ^bga"ngaa^b ^a^M1.0342^ea^ ^a^V1.0313^ea^ ^b^bhaagiirathii naamaa^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato khadiravaniyattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare titthanaavikakule nibbattitvaa mahaaga"ngaaya payaagatitthe titthanaavaaya kamma.m karonto ekadivasa.m sasaavakasa"ngha.m bhagavanta.m ga"ngaatiira.m upagata.m disvaa pasannamaanaso naavaasa"nghaa.ta.m yojetvaa mahantena puujaasakkaarena paratiira.m paapetvaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m satthaaraa aara~n~nakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m agga.t.thaane .thapiyamaana.m disvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa bhagavato bhikkhusa"nghassa ca mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa pa.nidhaana.m akaasi. bhagavaa tassa patthanaaya ava~njhabhaava.m byaakaasi.

[03] so tato pa.t.thaaya pu~n~naani upacinanto devamanussesu sa.msaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the naalakagaame ruupasaariyaa naama braahma.niyaa kucchimhi nibbatti. ta.m vayappatta.m maataapitaro gharabandhanena bandhitukaamaa hutvaa tassa aarocesu.m. so saariputtattherassa pabbajitabhaava.m sutvaa ``mayha.m je.t.thabhaataa ayyo upatisso ima.m vibhava.m cha.d.detvaa pabbajito, tena vanta.m khe.lapi.n.da.m kathaaha.m anubhavissaamii''ti jaatasa.mvego paasa.m anupagacchamaanamigo viya ~naatake va~ncetvaa hetusampattiyaa codiyamaano bhikkhuuna.m santika.m gantvaa dhammasenaapatino kani.t.thabhaava.m nivedetvaa attano pabbajjaaya chanda.m aarocesi. bhikkhuu ta.m pabbaajetvaa paripu.n.naviisativassa.m upasampaadetvaa kamma.t.thaane niyojesu.m. so kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa khadiravana.m pavisitvaa vissamanto gha.tento vaayamanto ~naa.nassa paripaaka.m gatattaa nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no arahaa ahosi. so arahaa hutvaa satthaara.m dhammasenaapati~nca vanditu.m senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya nikkhamitvaa anupubbena saavatthi.m patvaa jetavana.m pavisitvaa satthaara.m dhammasenaapati~nca vanditvaa katipaaha.m jetavane vihaasi. atha na.m satthaa ariyaga.namajjhe ^a^P0.0303^ea^ nisinno aara~n~nakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi -- ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m aara~n~nakaana.m yadida.m revato''ti (a0 ni0 1.198, 203).

[03] 628^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0343^ea^ etadagga.t.thaana.m patvaa attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa piitisomanassavasena pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^ga"ngaa bhaagiirathii^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^ga"ngaa^eb^ti gaayamaanaa ghosa.m kurumaanaa gacchatiiti ga"ngaa. atha vaa go vuccati pathavii, tasmi.m gataa pavattaati ga"ngaa. anotattadaha.m ^a^V1.0314^ea^ tikkhattu.m padakkhi.na.m katvaa gata.t.thaane ^b^aava.t.taga"ngaa^eb^ti ca pabbatamatthakena gata.t.thaane ^b^bahalaga"ngaa^eb^ti ca tiracchaanapabbata.m vijjhitvaa gata.t.thaane ^b^uma"ngaga"ngaa^eb^ti ca tato bahalapabbata.m paharitvaa pa~ncayojana.m aakaasena gata.t.thaane ^b^aakaasaga"ngaa^eb^ti ca tassaa patita.t.thaana.m bhinditvaa jaata.m pa~nca yojana.m pokkhara.niikuula.m bhinditvaa tattha pana pa~nca"nguli viya pa~nca dhaaraa hutvaa ga"ngaa yamunaa sarabhuu mahii aciravatiiti pa~nca naamaa hutvaa jambudiipa.m pa~nca bhaaga.m pa~nca ko.t.thaasa.m katvaa pa~nca bhaage pa~nca ko.t.thaase itaa gataa pavattaati bhaagiirathii. ga"ngaa ca saa bhaagiirathii ceti ga"ngaabhaagiirathii. ``bhaagiirathii ga"ngaa''ti vattabbe gaathaabandhasukhattha.m pubbacariyavasena vuttanti da.t.thabba.m. ^b^himavantaa pabhaavitaati^eb^ satte hi.msati siitena hanati matheti aalo.letiiti himo, himo assa atthiiti himavaa, tato himavantato pa.t.thaaya pabhaavitaa pavattaa sandamaanaati himavantapabhaavitaa. ^b^kutitthe naaviko aasi^eb^nti tassaa ga"ngaaya ca.n.dasotasamaapanne visamatitthe keva.t.takule uppanno naaviko aasi.m ahosinti attho. ^b^orime ca tari.m aha^eb^nti sampattasampattamanusse paarimaa tiiraa orima.m tiira.m aha.m tari.m taaresinti attho.

[03] 629^b^.^eb^ ^b^padumuttaro naayako^eb^ti dvipadaana.m uttamo satte nibbaana.m naayako paapanako padumuttarabuddho mama pu~n~nasampatti.m nipphaadento. ^b^vasiisatasahassehi^eb^ khii.naasavasatasahassehi ga"ngaasota.m taritu.m tittha.m pattoti sambandho.

[03] 630^b^.^eb^ ^b^bahuu naavaa samaanetvaa^eb^ti sampatta.m ta.m sammaasambuddha.m disvaa va.d.dhakiihi su.t.thu sa"nkhata.m kata.m nipphaadita.m bahuu naavaayo samaanetvaa dve dve naavaayo ekato katvaa tassaa naavaaya upari ma.n.dapachadana.m katvaa ^b^naraasabha.m^eb^ padumuttarasambuddha.m ^b^pa.timaani.m^eb^ puujesinti attho.

[03] 631^b^.^eb^ ^b^aagantvaana^eb^ ^a^M1.0344^ea^ ^b^ca sambuddho^eb^ti eva.m sa"ngha.titaaya naavaaya tattha aagantvaana ^a^P0.0304^ea^ ^b^ta~nca naavaka.m^eb^ naavamuttama.m aaruhiiti sambandho. ^b^vaarimajjhe .thito satthaa^eb^ti naavamaaruu.lho satthaa ga"ngaajalamajjhe .thito samaano imaa somanassapa.tisa.myuttagaathaa abhaasatha kathesiiti sambandho.

[03] 632^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo so taaresi sambuddha^eb^nti yo so naaviko ga"ngaasotaaya sambuddha.m ataaresi. ^b^sa"ngha~ncaapi anaasava^eb^nti na kevalameva sambuddha.m taaresi, anaasava.m nikkilesa.m sa"ngha~ncaapi taaresiiti attho. ^b^tena cittapasaadenaa^eb^ti tena naavaapaajanakaale uppannena somanassasahagatacittapasaadena ^b^devaloke^eb^ chasu kaamasaggesu ^b^ramissati^eb^ dibbasampatti.m anubhavissatiiti attho.

[03] 633^b^.^eb^ ^b^nibbattissati^eb^ ^a^V1.0315^ea^ ^b^te byamha^eb^nti devaloke uppannassa ^b^te^eb^ tuyha.m ^b^byamha.m^eb^ vimaana.m ^b^sukata.m^eb^ su.t.thu nibbatta.m ^b^naavasa.n.thita.m^eb^ naavaasa.n.thaana.m ^b^nibbattissati^eb^ paatubhavissatiiti attho. ^b^aakaase pupphachadana^eb^nti naavaaya uparima.n.dapakatakammassa nissandena sabbadaa gatagata.t.thaane aakaase pupphachadana.m dhaarayissatiiti sambandho.

[03] 634^b^.^eb^ ^b^a.t.thapa~n~naasakappamhii^eb^ti ito pu~n~nakara.nakaalato pa.t.thaaya a.t.thapa.n.naasakappa.m atikkamitvaa naamena taarako naama cakkavattii khattiyo ^b^caaturanto^eb^ catuusu diipesu issaro ^b^vijitaavii^eb^ jitavanto bhavissatiiti sambandho. sesagaathaa uttaanatthaava.
[03] 637^b^.^eb^ ^b^revato naama naamenaa^eb^ti revatiinakkhattena jaatattaa ``revato''ti laddhanaamo ^b^brahmabandhu^eb^ braahma.naputtabhuuto ^b^bhavissati^eb^ braahma.nakule uppajjissatiiti attho.
[03] 639^b^.^eb^ ^b^nibbaayissatinaasavo^eb^ti nikkileso khandhaparinibbaanena nibbaayissati.

[03] 640^b^.^eb^ ^b^viiriya.m me dhuradhorayha^eb^nti eva.m padumuttarena bhagavataa byaakato aha.m kamena paaramitaako.ti.m patvaa ^b^me^eb^ mayha.m viiriya.m asithilaviiriya.m dhuradhorayha.m dhuravaaha.m dhuraadhaara.m yogehi khemassa nibbhayassa nibbaanassa adhivaahana.m ^a^M1.0345^ea^ aavahana.m ahosiiti attho. ^b^dhaaremi antima.m deha^eb^nti idaanaaha.m sammaasambuddhasaasane pariyosaanasariira.m dhaaremiiti sambandho.

[03] so aparabhaage attano jaatagaama.m gantvaa ``caalaa, upacaalaa, siisuupacaalaa''ti tissanna.m bhaginiina.m putte ``caalaa, upacaalaa, siisuupacaalaa''ti tayo bhaagineyye aanetvaa pabbaajetvaa kamma.t.thaane niyojesi. te kamma.t.thaana.m anuyuttaa vihari.msu.

[03] tasmi~nca samaye therassa kocideva aabaadho uppanno, ta.m sutvaa saariputtatthero -- ``revatassa gilaanapucchana.m ^a^P0.0305^ea^ adhigamapucchana~nca karissaamii''ti upaga~nchi. revatatthero dhammasenaapati.m duuratova aagacchanta.m disvaa tesa.m saama.neraana.m satuppaadavasena ovadiyamaano ^b^caale^eb^tigaatha.m abhaasittha. tattha ^b^caale upacaale siisuupacaale^eb^ti tesa.m aalapana.m. caalaa, upacaalaa, siisuupacaalaati hi itthili"ngavasena laddhanaamaa tayo daarakaa pabbajitaapi tathaa vohariyyanti. ``caalii, upacaalii, siisuupacaaliiti tesa.m naamaanii''ti ca vadanti. yadattha.m ``caale''tiaadinaa aamantana.m kata.m, ta.m dassento ^b^``patissataa nu kho viharathaa''^eb^ti vatvaa tattha kaara.na.m aaha -- ``aagato vo vaala.m viya vedhii''ti. ^b^patissataa^eb^ti patissatikaa ^a^V1.0316^ea^. ^b^kho^eb^ti avadhaara.ne. ^b^aagato^eb^ti aaga~nchi. ^b^vo^eb^ti tumhaaka.m. ^b^vaala.m viya vedhii^eb^ti vaalavedhi viya. aya~nhettha sa"nkhepattho -- tikkhajavananibbedhikapa~n~nataaya vaalavedhiruupo satthukappo tumhaaka.m maatulatthero aagato, tasmaa sama.nasa~n~na.m upa.t.thapetvaa satisampaja~n~nayuttaa eva hutvaa viharatha, yathaadhigate vihaare appamattaa bhavathaati.

[03] ta.m sutvaa te saama.neraa dhammasenaapatissa paccuggamanaadivatta.m katvaa ubhinna.m maatulattheraana.m pa.tisanthaaravelaaya.m naatiduure samaadhi.m samaapajjitvaa nisiidi.msu. dhammasenaapati revatattherena saddhi.m pa.tisanthaara.m katvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa te saama.nere upasa"nkami. te tathaa kaalaparicchedassa katattaa there upasa"nkamante u.t.thahitvaa vanditvaa a.t.tha.msu. thero -- ``katarakataravihaarena viharathaa''ti pucchitvaa tehi ``imaaya imaayaa''ti vutte daarakepi eva.m vinento -- ``mayha.m bhaatiko saccavaadii vata ^a^M1.0346^ea^ dhammassa anudhammacaari''nti thera.m pasa.msanto pakkaami. sesamettha uttaanatthamevaati.
[06] khadiravaniyattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] ^b^aaraamadvaaraa nikkhammaa^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato aanandattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare satthu vemaatikabhaataa hutvaa nibbatti. ^b^sumano^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. pitaa panassa nandaraajaa naama. so attano puttassa sumanakumaarassa vayappattassa ha.msavatiinagarato viisayojanasate .thaane bhoganagara.m adaasi. so kadaaci ^a^P0.0306^ea^ kadaaci aagantvaa satthaara~nca pitara~nca passati. tadaa raajaa satthaara~nca satasahassaparimaa.na.m bhikkhusa"ngha~nca sayameva sakkacca.m upa.t.thahi, a~n~nesa.m upa.t.thaatu.m na deti.

[03] tena samayena paccanto kupito ahosi. kumaaro tassa kupitabhaava.m ra~n~no anaarocetvaa sayameva ta.m vuupasamesi. ta.m sutvaa raajaa tu.t.thamaanaso ``vara.m te taava dammi, ga.nhaahii''ti aaha. kumaaro ``satthaara.m bhikkhusa"ngha~nca temaasa.m upa.t.thahanto jiivita.m ava~njha.m kaatu.m icchaamii''ti aaha. ``eta.m na sakkaa, a~n~na.m vadehii''ti. ``deva, khattiyaana.m dve kathaa naama natthi, eta.m me dehi, na mayha.m a~n~nenattho, sace satthaa anujaanaati, dinnamevaa''ti. so ^a^V1.0317^ea^ ``satthu citta.m jaanissaamii''ti vihaara.m gato. tena ca samayena bhagavaa gandhaku.ti.m pavi.t.tho hoti. so bhikkhuu upasa"nkamitvaa ``aha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m dassanaaya aagato, dassetha ma''nti. bhikkhuu ``sumano naama thero satthu upa.t.thaako, tassa santika.m gacchaahii''ti aaha.msu. so therassa santika.m gantvaa ``satthaara.m, bhante, dassethaa''ti aaha. atha thero tassa passantasseva pathaviya.m nimujjitvaa bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa ``raajaputto, bhante, tumhaaka.m dassanaaya aagato''ti aaha. ``tena hi bhikkhu bahi aasana.m ^a^M1.0347^ea^ pa~n~napehii''ti. thero punapi buddhaasana.m gahetvaa antogandhaku.tiya.m nimujjitvaa tassa passantassa bahiparive.ne paatubhavitvaa gandhaku.tiparive.ne aasana.m pa~n~naapesi. kumaaro ta.m disvaa ``mahanto vataaya.m bhikkhuu''ti citta.m uppaadesi.

[03] bhagavaapi gandhaku.tito nikkhamitvaa pa~n~nattaasane nisiidi. raajaputto satthaara.m vanditvaa pa.tisanthaara.m katvaa ``aya.m, bhante, thero tumhaaka.m saasane vallabho ma~n~ne''ti? ``aama, kumaara, vallabho''ti. ``ki.m katvaa, bhante, esa vallabho''ti? ``daanaadiini pu~n~naani katvaa''ti. ``bhagavaa, ahampi aya.m thero viya anaagate buddhasaasane vallabho hotukaamo''ti so buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa sattaaha.m khandhaavaare bhatta.m datvaa sattame divase, ``bhante, mayaa pitu santikaa tumhaaka.m temaasa.m pa.tijagganavaro laddho, temaasa.m me vassaavaasa.m adhivaasethaa''ti vatvaa satthu adhivaasana.m viditvaa saparivaara.m bhagavanta.m gahetvaa yojane yojane satthu bhikkhusa"nghassa ca vasanaanucchavike vihaare kaaretvaa tattha tattha vasaapento attano vasana.t.thaanasamiipe satasahassena kiite sobhananaamake uyyaane satasahassena kaarita.m vihaara.m pavesaapetvaa --
[21] ``satasahassena me kiita.m, satasahassena kaarita.m.
[22] sobhana.m naama uyyaana.m, pa.tigga.nha mahaamunii''ti.. --

[25] udaka.m ^a^P0.0307^ea^ paatesi. so vassuupanaayikadivase satthu mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa ``iminaa niihaarena daana.m dadeyyaathaa''ti puttadaare amacce ca daane kiccakara.ne ca niyojetvaa saya.m sumanattherassa vasana.t.thaanasamiipeyeva vasanto eva.m attano vasana.t.thaane satthaara.m temaasa.m upa.t.thahi. upaka.t.thaaya pana pavaara.naaya gaama.m pavisitvaa sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa sattame divase satthu bhikkhusa"nghassa ca paadamuule ticiivare .thapetvaa vanditvaa ``bhante, yadeta.m mayaa khandhaavaarato pa.t.thaaya pu~n~na.m kata.m, na ta.m sakkasampattiaadiina.m atthaaya kata.m, atha kho ahampi sumanatthero viya anaagate ekassa ^a^V1.0318^ea^ buddhassa upa.t.thaako vallabho bhaveyya''nti patthana.m akaasi. satthaa tassa anantaraayata.m disvaa byaakaritvaa pakkaami.
