[03] so ^a^M1.0348^ea^ tasmi.m buddhuppaade vassasatasahassa.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato parampi tattha tattha bhave u.laaraani pu~n~nakammaani upacinitvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapabhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbatto vi~n~nuta.m patvaa ekassa therassa pi.n.daaya carato pattaggaha.nattha.m uttarasaa.taka.m katvaa puuja.m akaasi. puna sagge nibbattitvaa tato cuto baaraa.nasiraajaa hutvaa a.t.tha paccekabuddhe disvaa te bhojetvaa attano ma"ngaluyyaane a.t.tha pa.n.nasaalaayo kaaretvaa tesa.m nisiidanatthaaya a.t.tha sabbaratanamayapii.the ceva ma.niaadhaarake ca pa.tiyaadetvaa dasavassasahassaani upa.t.thaana.m akaasi, etaani paaka.taani.

[03] kappasatasahassa.m pana tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto amhaaka.m bodhisattena saddhi.m tusitapure nibbattitvaa tato cuto amitodanasakkassa gehe nibbattitvaa sabbe ~naatake aanandite karonto jaatoti ^b^aanando^eb^tveva naama.m labhi. so anukkamena vayappatto kataabhinikkhamane sammaasambodhi.m patvaa pavattitavaradhammacakke pa.thama.m kapilavatthu.m gantvaa tato nikkhamante bhagavati tassa parivaarattha.m pabbajitu.m nikkhamantehi bhaddiyaadiihi saddhi.m nikkhamitvaa bhagavato santike pabbajitvaa aayasmato pu.n.nassa mantaa.niputtassa santike dhammakatha.m sutvaa sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi.

[03] tena ca samayena bhagavato pa.thamabodhiya.m viisativassaani anibaddhaa upa.t.thaakaa ahesu.m. ekadaa naagasamaalo pattaciivara.m gahetvaa vicarati, ekadaa naagito, ekadaa upavaano, ekadaa sunakkhatto, ekadaa cundo sama.nuddeso, ekadaa saagato, ekadaa meghiyo, te yebhuyyena satthu citta.m naaraadhayi.msu. athekadivasa.m bhagavaa gandhaku.tiparive.ne pa~n~nattavarabuddhaasane ^a^P0.0308^ea^ bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto nisinno bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aha.m, bhikkhave, idaani mahallako ekacce bhikkhuu `iminaa maggena gacchaamii'ti vutte a~n~nena maggena gacchanti, ekacce mayha.m pattaciivara.m bhuumiya.m nikkhipanti, mayha.m nibaddhupa.t.thaaka.m eka.m bhikkhu.m vijaanathaa''ti. ta.m sutvaa bhikkhuuna.m dhammasa.mvego udapaadi. athaayasmaa saariputto u.t.thaaya bhagavanta.m vanditvaa ``aha.m, bhante, tumhe upa.t.thahissaamii''ti aaha. ta.m bhagavaa pa.tikkhipi. etenupaayena mahaamoggallaana.m aadi.m katvaa sabbe mahaasaavakaa ``aha.m upa.t.thahissaami ^a^M1.0349^ea^, aha.m upa.t.thahissaamii''ti u.t.thahi.msu .thapetvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m. tepi bhagavaa pa.tikkhipi.

[03] aanando ^a^V1.0319^ea^ pana tu.nhiiyeva nisiidi. atha na.m bhikkhuu aaha.msu -- ``aavuso, tvampi satthu upa.t.thaaka.t.thaana.m yaacaahii''ti. ``yaacitvaa laddhupa.t.thaana.m naama kiidisa.m hoti? sace ruccati, satthaa sayameva vakkhatii''ti. atha bhagavaa -- ``na, bhikkhave, aanando a~n~nehi ussaahetabbo, sayameva jaanitvaa ma.m upa.t.thahissatii''ti aaha. tato bhikkhuu ``u.t.thehi, aavuso aananda, satthaara.m upa.t.thaaka.t.thaana.m yaacaahii''ti aaha.msu. thero u.t.thahitvaa ``sace me, bhante, bhagavaa attanaa laddha.m pa.niita.m ciivara.m na dassati, pa.niita.m pi.n.dapaata.m na dassati, ekagandhaku.tiya.m vasitu.m na dassati, nimantana.m gahetvaa na gamissati, evaaha.m bhagavanta.m upa.t.thahissaamii''ti aaha. ``ettake gu.ne labhato satthu upa.t.thaana.m ko bhaaro''ti upavaadamocanattha.m ime cattaaro pa.tikkhepaa, ``sace, bhante, bhagavaa mayaa gahita.m nimantana.m gamissati, sacaaha.m desantarato aagataagate taavadeva dassetu.m labhaami, yadaa me ka"nkhaa uppajjati, taavadeva bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa pucchitu.m labhaami, sace bhagavaa parammukhaa desita.m dhamma.m puna mayha.m byaakarissasi, evaaha.m bhagavanta.m upa.t.thahissaami''. ``ettakampi satthu santike anuggaha.m na labhatii''ti upavaadamocanattha~nceva dhammabha.n.daagaarikabhaavaparipuura.nattha~nca imaa catasso yaacanaati ime a.t.tha vare gahetvaa nibaddhupa.t.thaako ahosi. tasseva .thaanantarassa atthaaya kappasatasahassa.m puuritaana.m paaramiina.m phala.m paapu.ni.

[03] so upa.t.thaaka.t.thaana.m laddhadivasato pa.t.thaaya dasabala.m duvidhena udakena tividhena dantaka.t.thena hatthapaadaparikammena pi.t.thiparikammena gandhaku.tiparive.nasammajjanenaati evamaadiihi kiccehi upa.t.thahanto -- ``imaaya naama velaaya satthu ida.m naama laddhu.m va.t.tati, ida.m naama kaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti divasabhaaga.m santikaavacaro hutvaa rattibhaage mahanta.m da.n.dadiipika.m gahetvaa gandhaku.tiparive.na.m navavaare anupariyaayati ^a^P0.0309^ea^ satthari pakkosante pa.tivacanadaanaaya, thinamiddhavinodanattha.m. atha na.m satthaa jetavane ariyaga.namajjhe nisinno anekapariyaayena pasa.msitvaa bahussutaana.m satimantaana.m gatimantaana.m dhitimantaana.m upa.t.thaakaana~nca bhikkhuuna.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi.

[03] eva.m ^a^M1.0350^ea^ satthaaraa pa~ncasu .thaanesu etadagge .thapito catuuhi acchariyabbhuutadhammehi samannaagato satthu dhammakosaarakkho aya.m mahaathero sekhova samaano satthari parinibbute he.t.thaa vuttanayena bhikkhuuhi samuttejito devataaya ca sa.mvejito ``sveyeva ca daani dhammasa"ngiiti kaatabbaa, na kho pana meta.m patiruupa.m, yvaaya.m sekho sakara.niiyo asekhehi therehi saddhi.m dhamma.m gaayitu.m sannipaata.m gantu''nti sa~njaatussaaho vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa bahudeva ratti.m vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto ca"nkame viiriyasamata.m alabhitvaa tato vihaara.m pavisitvaa sayane nisiiditvaa sayitukaamo ^a^V1.0320^ea^ kaaya.m aava.t.tesi. apatta~nca siisa.m bimbohana.m, paadaa ca bhuumito muttamattaa, ekasmi.m antare anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucci, cha.labhi~n~no ahosi.

[03] 644^b^.^eb^ eva.m cha.labhi~n~naadigu.napa.tima.n.dito upa.t.thaakaadigu.nehi etadagga.t.thaana.m patto attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassavasena pubbacaritaapadaana.m dassento ^b^aaraamadvaaraa nikkhammaa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^aaraamadvaaraa^eb^ti sabbasattaana.m dhammadesanatthaaya vihaaradvaarato nikkhamitvaa bahidvaarasamiipe katama.n.dapamajjhe supa~n~nattavarabuddhaasane nisinno padumuttaro naama ^b^mahaamuni^eb^ sammaasambuddho. ^b^vassanto amata.m vu.t.thi^eb^nti dhammadesanaamahaaamatadhaaraahi dhammavassa.m vassanto. ^b^nibbaapesi mahaajana^eb^nti mahaajanassa cittasantaanagatakilesaggi.m ^b^nibbaapesi^eb^ vuupasamesi, mahaajana.m nibbaanaamatapaanena santi.m siitibhaava.m paapesiiti attho.

[03] 645^b^.^eb^ ^b^satasahassa.m te dhiiraa^eb^ti parivaarasampatti.m dassento aaha. chahi abhi~n~naahi iddhividhaadi~naa.nako.t.thaasehi samannaagataa anekasatasahassacakkavaa.lesu kha.nena gantu.m samatthaahi iddhiihi samannaagatattaa ^b^mahiddhikaa^eb^te dhiiraa satasahassakhii.naasavaa ^b^chaayaava anapaayinii^eb^ti katthaci anapagataa chaayaa iva ta.m sambuddha.m padumuttara.m bhagavanta.m ^b^parivaarenti^eb^ parivaaretvaa dhamma.m su.nantiiti attho.

[03] 646^b^.^eb^ ^b^hatthikkhandhagato aasi^eb^nti tadaa bhagavato dhammadesanaasamaye aha.m hatthipi.t.the nisinno ^b^aasi.m^eb^ ahosinti attho. ^b^setacchatta.m^eb^ ^a^P0.0310^ea^ ^b^varuttama^eb^nti patthetabba.m uttama.m setacchatta.m mama matthake dhaarayanto hatthipi.t.the ^a^M1.0351^ea^ nisinnoti sambandho. ^b^sucaaruruupa.m disvaanaa^eb^ti sundara.m caaru.m manohararuupavanta.m dhamma.m desiyamaana.m sambuddha.m disvaa ^b^me^eb^ mayha.m ^b^vitti^eb^ santu.t.thi somanassa.m ^b^udapajjatha^eb^ uppajjatiiti attho.

[03] 647^b^.^eb^ ^b^oruyha hatthikkhandhamhaa^eb^ti ta.m bhagavanta.m nisinna.m disvaa hatthipi.t.thito ^b^oruyha^eb^ orohitvaa ^b^naraasabha.m^eb^ naravasabha.m ^b^upagacchi.m^eb^ samiipa.m gatoti attho. ^b^ratanamayachatta.m me^eb^ti ratanabhuusita.m me mayha.m chatta.m buddhase.t.thassa matthake dhaarayinti sambandho.

[03] 648^b^.^eb^ ^b^mama sa"nkappama~n~naayaa^eb^ti mayha.m pasaadena uppanna.m sa"nkappa.m ~natvaa isiina.m antare mahantabhuuto so padumuttaro bhagavaa. ^b^ta.m katha.m .thapayitvaanaa^eb^ti ta.m attanaa desiyamaana.m dhammakatha.m .thapetvaa mama byaakara.natthaaya imaa gaathaa ^b^abhaasatha^eb^ kathesiiti attho.

[03] 649^b^.^eb^ kathanti ^a^V1.0321^ea^ ce? ^b^yo so^eb^tiaadimaaha. so.n.naala"nkaarabhuusita.m chatta.m yo so raajakumaaro me matthake dhaaresiiti sambandho. ^b^tamaha.m kittayissaamii^eb^ti ta.m raajakumaara.m aha.m kittayissaami paaka.ta.m karissaami. ^b^su.notha mama bhaasato^eb^ti bhaasantassa mama vacana.m su.notha ohitasotaa manasi karothaati attho.

[03] 650^b^.^eb^ ^b^ito gantvaa aya.m poso^eb^ti aya.m raajakumaaro ito manussalokato cuto tusita.m gantvaa ^b^aavasissati^eb^ tattha viharissati. tattha accharaahi purakkhato parivaarito tusitabhavanasampatti.m anubhossatiiti sambandho.

[03] 651^b^.^eb^ ^b^catutti.msakkhattu^eb^nti tusitabhavanato cavitvaa taavati.msabhavane uppanno catutti.msavaare devindo devarajja.m karissatiiti sambandho. ^b^balaadhipo a.t.thasata^eb^nti taavati.msabhavanato cuto manussaloke uppanno ^b^balaadhipo^eb^ catura"nginiyaa senaaya ^b^adhipo^eb^ padhaano a.t.thasatajaatiisu padesaraajaa hutvaa ^b^vasudha.m^eb^ anekaratanavara.m pathavi.m ^b^aavasissati^eb^ puthabya.m viharissatiiti attho.

[03] 652^b^.^eb^ ^b^a.t.thapa~n~naasakkhattu^eb^nti a.t.thapa~n~naasajaatiisu cakkavattii raajaa bhavissatiiti attho. ^b^mahiyaa^eb^ sakalajambudiipapathaviyaa ^b^vipula.m^eb^ asa"nkhyeyya.m padesarajja.m kaarayissati.
[03] 654^b^.^eb^ ^b^sakyaana.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0352^ea^ ^b^kulaketussaa^eb^ti sakyaraajuuna.m kulassa dhajabhuutassa buddhassa ~naatako bhavissatiiti attho.

[03] 655^b^.^eb^ ^b^aataapii^eb^ti viiriyavaa. ^b^nipako^eb^ti nepakkasa"nkhaataaya pa~n~naaya samannaagato. ^b^baahusaccesu^eb^ bahussutabhaavesu pi.takattayadhaara.nesu ^b^kovido^eb^ ^a^P0.0311^ea^ cheko. ^b^nivaatavutti^eb^ anava~n~nattiko ^b^athaddho^eb^ kaayapaagabbiyaadithaddhabhaavavirahito ^b^sabbapaa.thii^eb^ sakalapi.takattayadhaarii bhavissatiiti sambandho.

[03] 656^b^.^eb^ ^b^padhaanapahitatto so^eb^ti so aanandatthero viiriyakara.naaya pesitacitto. ^b^upasanto niruupadhii^eb^ti raaguupadhidosuupadhimohuupadhiihi virahito, sotaapattimaggena pahaatabbakilesaana.m pahiinattaa upasanto santakaayacitto.

[03] 657^b^.^eb^ ^b^santi aara~n~nakaa^eb^ti ara~n~ne bhavaa mahaavane jaataa. ^b^sa.t.thihaayanaa^eb^ti sa.t.thivassakaale haayanabalaa ^a^V1.0322^ea^. ^b^tidhaa pabhinnaa^eb^ti akkhika.n.nakosasa"nkhaatehi tiihi .thaanehi bhinnamadaa. ^b^maata"ngaa^eb^ti maata"ngahatthikule jaataa. ^b^iisaadantaa^eb^ti rathiisaasadisadantaa. ^b^uruu.lhavaa^eb^ raajavaahanaa. ku~njarasa"nkhaataa naagaa hatthiraajaano santi sa.mvijjanti yathaa, tathaa satasahassasa"nkhyaa khii.naasavasa"nkhaataa pa.n.ditaa mahiddhikaa arahantanaagaa santi, sabbe te arahantanaagaa buddhanaagaraajassa. ^b^na honti pa.nidhimhi te^eb^ti te pa.nidhimhi taadisaa na honti, ki.m sabbe te bhayabhiitaa sakabhaavena sa.n.thaatu.m asamatthaati attho. sesa.m vuttanayattaa uttaanatthamevaati.
[06] aanandattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.
[06] ettaavataa pa.thamaa buddhavaggava.n.nanaa samattaa.
[06] pa.thamo bhaago ni.t.thito.
[06].. namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa..

[03] ^b^nibbute^eb^ ^a^M2.0001^ea^ ^a^V2.0001^ea^ ^b^lokanaathamhii^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato siihaasanadaayakattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave pu~n~naani upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale vibhavasampanne saddhaasampanne ekasmi.m kule nibbatto, dharamaane bhagavati devaloke vasitvaa nibbute bhagavati uppannattaa vi~n~nuta.m patto bhagavato saariirikacetiya.m disvaa ``aho me alaabhaa, bhagavato dharamaane kaale asampatto''ti cintetvaa cetiye citta.m pasaadetvaa somanassajaato sabbaratanamaya.m devataanimmitasadisa.m dhammaasane siihaasana.m kaaretvaa jiivamaanakabuddhassa ^a^V2.0002^ea^ viya puujesi. tassupari gehampi dibbavimaanamiva kaaresi, paada.t.thapanapaadapii.thampi kaaresi. eva.m yaavajiiva.m diipadhuupapupphagandhaadiihi anekavidha.m puuja.m katvaa tato cuto devaloke nibbatto cha kaamasagge aparaapara.m dibbasampatti.m anubhavitvaa manussesu cakkavattisampatti.m ^a^M2.0002^ea^ anekakkhattu.m anubhavitvaa sa"nkhyaatikkanta.m padesarajjasampatti~nca anubhavitvaa kassapassa bhagavato saasane pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m katvaa etthantare devamanussesu sa.msaranto ^a^P0.0312^ea^ imasmi.m buddhuppaade ekasmi.m vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa laddhuupasampado kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa gha.tento vaayamanto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassa.m uppaadetvaa pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^nibbute lokanaathamhii^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha lokassa naatho padhaanoti lokanaatho, lokattayasaamiiti attho. lokanaathe siddhatthamhi nibbuteti sambandho. ^b^vitthaarite paavacane^eb^ti paavacane pi.takattaye vitthaarite pattha.te paaka.teti attho. ^b^baahuja~n~namhi saasane^eb^ti sikkhattayasa"ngahite buddhasaasane anekasatasahassako.tikhii.naasavasa"nkhaatehi bahujanehi ~naate adhigateti attho.

[03] 2-3^b^.^eb^ ^b^pasannacitto sumano^eb^ti tadaa aha.m buddhassa dharamaanakaale asampatto nibbute tasmi.m devalokaa cavitvaa manussaloka.m upapanno tassa bhagavato saariirikadhaatucetiya.m disvaa pasannacitto saddhaasampayuttamano sundaramano ``aho mamaagamana.m svaagamana''nti sa~njaatapasaadabahumaano ``mayaa nibbaanaadhigamaaya eka.m pu~n~na.m kaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa bhagavato cetiyasamiipe bhagavanta.m uddissa hira~n~nasuva.n.naratanaadiihi ala"nkaritvaava siihaasana.m akaasi. tatra nisinnassa paada.t.thapanatthaaya paadapii.tha~nca kaaresi. siihaasanassa atemanatthaaya tassupari ghara~nca kaaresi. tena vutta.m -- ^b^``siihaasanamakaasaha.m...pe0... ghara.m tattha akaasaha''^eb^nti. ^b^tena cittappasaadenaa^eb^ti dharamaanassa viya bhagavato siihaasana.m mayaa kata.m, tena cittappasaadena. ^b^tusita.m upapajjaha^eb^nti tusitabhavane upapajjinti attho.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ^b^aayaamena catubbiisaa^eb^ti tatrupapannassa devabhuutassa sato mayha.m sukata.m pu~n~nena nibbattita.m paatubhuuta.m aayaamena uccato catubbiisayojana.m ^b^vitthaarena^eb^ tiriyato catuddasayojana.m taavadeva nibbattikkha.neyeva ^b^aasi^eb^ ahosiiti attho. sesa.m suvi~n~neyyameva.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ^b^catunnavute^eb^ ^a^M2.0003^ea^ ^a^V2.0003^ea^ ^b^ito kappe^eb^ti ito kappato catunavute kappe ya.m kamma.m ^b^akari.m^eb^ akaasi.m, tadaa tato pa.t.thaaya pu~n~nabalena ka~nci duggati.m naabhijaanaami, na anubhuutapubbaa kaaci duggatiiti attho.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ^b^tesattatimhito kappe^eb^ti ito kappato tesattatikappe. ^b^indanaamaa tayo janaa^eb^ti indanaamakaa tayo cakkavattiraajaano ekasmi.m kappe tiisu jaatiisu indo naama cakkavattii raajaa ahosinti attho. ^b^dvesattatimhito^eb^ ^a^P0.0313^ea^ ^b^kappe^eb^ti ito dvesattatikappe. sumananaamakaa tayo janaa tikkhattu.m cakkavattiraajaano ahesu.m.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ^b^samasattatito kappe^eb^ti ito kappato anuunaadhike sattatime kappe ^b^varu.nanaamakaa^eb^ varu.no cakkavattiiti eva.mnaamakaa tayo ^b^cakkavattiraajaano^eb^ cakkaratanasampannaa catudiipamhi issaraa ahesunti attho. sesa.m suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] siihaasanadaayakattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] ^b^siddhatthassa bhagavato^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato ekatthambhadaayakatherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale vanakammiko hutvaa ekasmi.m vibhavasampanne kule nibbatto. tasmi.m samaye sabbe saddhaa pasannaa upaasakaa ekacchandaa ``bhagavato upa.t.thaanasaala.m karomaa''ti dabbasambhaaratthaaya vana.m pavisitvaa ta.m upaasaka.m disvaa ``amhaaka.m eka.m thambha.m dethaa''ti yaaci.msu. so ta.m pavatti.m sutvaa ``tumhe maa cintayitthaa''ti te sabbe uyyojetvaa eka.m saaramaya.m thambha.m gahetvaa satthu dassetvaa tesa.myeva adaasi. so teneva somanassajaato tadeva muula.m katvaa a~n~naani daanaadiini pu~n~naani katvaa tato cuto devaloke nibbatto aparaapara.m chasu kaamaavacaresu dibbasampattiyo anubhavitvaa manussesu ca aggacakkavattisampatti.m anekavaara.m anubhavitvaa asa"nkhyeyya.m padesarajjasampatti~nca anubhavitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade saddhaasampanne ekasmi.m ^a^M2.0004^ea^ kule nibbatto maataapituuhi saddhi.m bhagavato santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa laddhuupasampado kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa manasikaronto nacirasseva arahaa ahosi.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ so ^a^V2.0004^ea^ eva.m pattaarahatto attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassajaato pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^siddhatthassaa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha siddhatthassa ^b^bhagavato^eb^ bhagyasampannassa sammaasambuddhassa. ^b^mahaapuugaga.no^eb^ti mahaaupaasakasamuuho ^b^ahu^eb^ ahosiiti attho. ^b^sara.na.m gataa ca te buddha^eb^nti ``buddha.m sara.na''nti gataa bhaji.msu jaani.msu vaa te upaasakaa. ^b^tathaagata.m saddahanti^eb^ buddhagu.na.m attano cittasantaane .thapentiiti attho.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbe sa"ngamma mantetvaa^eb^ti sabbe samaagamma sannipatitvaa mantetvaa a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~n~naapetvaa ekacchandaa hutvaa ^b^maa.la.m^eb^ upa.t.thaanasaala.m satthuno atthaaya ^b^kubbanti^eb^ karontiiti attho. dabbasambhaaresu ekatthambha.m alabhantaa ^b^brahaavane^eb^ mahaavane vicinantiiti sambandho.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ ^b^teha.m^eb^ ^a^P0.0314^ea^ ^b^ara~n~ne disvaanaa^eb^ti aha.m te upaasake ara~n~ne disvaana ^b^ga.na.m^eb^ samuuha.m ^b^upagamma^eb^ samiipa.m gantvaa ^b^a~njali.m paggahetvaana^eb^ dasa"ngulisamodhaana.m a~njali.m sirasi katvaa aha.m ^b^ga.na.m^eb^ upaasakasamuuha.m ``tumhe ima.m vana.m kimattha.m aagatatthaa''ti ^b^tadaa^eb^ tasmi.m kaale paripucchinti sambandho.
[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ^b^te^eb^ siilavanto upaasakaa ^b^me^eb^ mayaa pu.t.thaa ``maa.la.m maya.m kattukaamaa hutvaa ekatthambho amhehi na labbhatii''ti ^b^viyaaka.msu^eb^ visesena kathayi.msuuti sambandho.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ ^b^mama.m^eb^ mayha.m ekatthambha.m detha, aha.m ta.m dassaami satthuno santika.m aha.m thambha.m aaharissaami, ^b^te^eb^ bhavanto thambhahara.ne ^b^appossukkaa^eb^ ussaaharahitaa bhavantuuti sambandho.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ ^b^ya.m ya.m yonupapajjaamii^eb^ti ya.m ya.m yoni.m devatta.m atha maanusa.m upagacchaamiiti attho. bhummatthe vaa upayogavacana.m, yasmi.m yasmi.m devaloke vaa manussaloke vaati attho. sesa.m uttaanatthamevaati.
[06] ekatthambhikattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] ^b^padumuttarassa^eb^ ^a^M2.0005^ea^ ^a^V2.0005^ea^ ^b^bhagavato^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato nandattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare ekasmi.m kule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto bhagavato santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m indriyesu guttadvaaraana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa saya.m ta.m .thaanantara.m patthento bhagavato bhikkhusa"nghassa ca puujaasakkaarabahula.m mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa ``aha.m, bhante, anaagate tumhaadisassa buddhassa evaruupo saavako bhaveyya''nti pa.nidhaana.m akaasi.

[03] so tato pa.t.thaaya devamanussesu sa.msaranto atthadassissa bhagavato kaale dhammataaya naama nadiyaa mahanto kacchapo hutvaa nibbatto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m nadi.m taritu.m tiire .thita.m disvaa saya.m bhagavanta.m taaretukaamo satthu paadamuule nipajji. satthaa tassa ajjhaasaya.m ~natvaa pi.t.thi.m abhiruhi. so ha.t.thatu.t.tho vegena sota.m chindanto siighatara.m paratiira.m paapesi. bhagavaa tassa anumodana.m vadanto bhaavini.m sampatti.m kathetvaa pakkaami.

[03] so tena pu~n~nakammena sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto ^a^P0.0315^ea^ imasmi.m buddhuppaade kapilavatthusmi.m suddhodanamahaaraajassa aggamahesiyaa mahaapajaapatigotamiyaa kucchimhi nibbatto, tassa naamaggaha.nadivase ~naatisa"ngha.m nandayanto jaatoti ^b^``nando''^eb^tveva naama.m aka.msu. tassa vayappattakaale bhagavaa pavattitavaradhammacakko lokaanuggaha.m karonto anukkamena kapilavatthu.m gantvaa ~naatisamaagame pokkharavassa.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa vessantarajaataka.m (jaa0 2.22.1655 aadayo) kathetvaa dutiyadivase pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tho ``utti.t.the nappamajjeyyaa''ti (dha0 pa0 168) gaathaaya pitara.m sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaapetvaa nivesana.m gantvaa ``dhamma~ncare sucarita''nti (dha0 pa0 169) gaathaaya mahaapajaapati.m sotaapattiphale raajaana.m sakadaagaamiphale pati.t.thaapetvaa tatiyadivase nandakumaarassa abhisekagehapavesanaaavaahama"ngalesu vattamaanesu pi.n.daaya paavisi. satthaa nandakumaarassa hatthe patta.m datvaa ma"ngala.m vatvaa tassa hatthato patta.m aggahetvaava vihaara.m gato ^a^M2.0006^ea^, ta.m pattahattha.m vihaara.m aagata.m anicchamaana.myeva pabbaajetvaa tathaapabbaajitattaayeva anabhiratiyaa pii.lita.m ~natvaa upaayena tassa ta.m anabhirati.m vinodesi. so yoniso pa.tisa"nkhaaya vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. thero puna divase bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa evamaaha -- ``ya.m me, bhante, bhagavaa paa.tibhogo pa~ncanna.m accharaasataana.m pa.tilaabhaaya ^a^V2.0006^ea^ kaku.tapaadaana.m, mu~ncaamaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m etasmaa pa.tissavaa''ti. bhagavaapi ``yadeva te, nanda, anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta.m, tadaaha.m mutto etasmaa pa.tissavaa''ti aaha. athassa bhagavaa savisesa.m indriyesu guttadvaarata.m ~natvaa ta.m gu.na.m vibhaavento ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m indriyesu guttadvaaraana.m yadida.m nando''ti (a0 ni0 1.219, 230) indriyesu guttadvaarabhaavena na.m etadagge .thapesi. thero hi ``indriyaasa.mvara.m nissaaya ima.m vippakaara.m patto, tamaha.m su.t.thu nigga.nhissaamii''ti ussaahajaato balavahirottappo tattha ca kataadhikaarattaa indriyasa.mvare ukka.msapaarami.m agamaasi.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ eva.m so etadagga.t.thaana.m patvaa attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassappatto pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^padumuttarassa bhagavato^eb^tiaadimaaha. ^b^vattha.m khoma.m mayaa dinna^eb^nti khomara.t.the jaata.m vattha.m bhagavati cittappasaadena gaaravabahumaanena mayaa paramasukhuma.m khomavattha.m dinnanti attho. ^b^sayambhussaa^eb^ti ^a^P0.0316^ea^ sayameva bhuutassa jaatassa ariyaaya jaatiyaa nibbattassa. ^b^mahesino^eb^ti mahante siilasamaadhipa~n~naavimuttivimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhe esi gavesiiti mahesi, tassa mahesino sayambhussa ciivaratthaaya khomavattha.m mayaa dinnanti sambandho.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ ^b^ta.m me buddho viyaakaasii^eb^ti ettha ^b^ta^eb^nti saamyatthe upayogavacana.m, tassa vatthadaayakassa me daanaphala.m visesena akaasi kathesi buddhoti attho. ^b^jalajuttamanaamako^eb^ti padumuttaranaamako. ``jalaruttamanaayako''tipi paa.tho, tassa jalamaanaana.m devabrahmaana.m uttamanaayako padhaanoti attho. ^b^iminaa vatthadaanenaa^eb^ti iminaa vatthadaanassa nissandena tva.m anaagate ^b^hemava.n.no^eb^ suva.n.nava.n.no bhavissasi.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ ^b^dve^eb^ ^a^M2.0007^ea^ ^b^sampatti.m anubhotvaa^eb^ti dibbamanussasa"nkhaataa dve sampattiyo anubhavitvaa. ^b^kusalamuulehi codito^eb^ti kusalaavayavehi kusalako.t.thaasehi codito pesito, ``tva.m iminaa pu~n~nena satthu kula.m pasavaahii''ti pesito viyaati attho. ``gotamassa bhagavato kani.t.tho tva.m bhavissasii''ti byaakaasiiti sambandho.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ ^b^raagaratto sukhasiilo^eb^ti kilesakaamehi ratto alliino kaayasukhacittasukhaanubhavanasabhaavo. ^b^kaamesu gedhamaayuto^eb^ti vatthukaamesu gedhasa"nkhaataaya ta.nhaaya aayuto yojitoti attho. ^b^buddhena codito santo, tadaa tva^eb^nti yasmaa kaamesu gedhito, ^b^tadaa^eb^ tasmaa ^a^V2.0007^ea^ tva.m attano bhaatukena gotamabuddhena codito pabbajjaaya uyyojito tassa santike pabbajissasiiti sambandho.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ ^b^pabbajitvaana tva.m tatthaa^eb^ti tasmi.m gotamassa bhagavato saasane tva.m pabbajitvaa ^b^kusalamuulena^eb^ muulabhuutena pu~n~nasambhaarena ^b^codito^eb^ bhaavanaaya.m niyojito ^b^sabbaasave^eb^ sakalaasave ^b^pari~n~naaya^eb^ jaanitvaa pajahitvaa anaamayo niddukkho ^b^nibbaayissasi^eb^ adassana.m paapessasi, apa.n.nattikabhaava.m gamissasiiti attho.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ ^b^satakappasahassamhii^eb^ti ito kappato pubbe satakappaadhike sahassame kappamhi ce.lanaamakaa cattaaro cakkavattiraajaano ahesunti attho. ^b^sa.t.thi kappasahassaanii^eb^ti kappasahassaani sa.t.thi ca atikkamitvaa he.t.thaa ekasmi.m kappe cattaaro janaa upace.laa naama cakkavattiraajaano catuusu jaatiisu ahesunti attho.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ ^b^pa~ncakappasahassamhii^eb^ti pa~ncakappaadhike sahassame kappamhi ce.laa naama cattaaro janaa cakkavattiraajaano sattahi ratanehi sampannaa sama"ngiibhuutaa jambudiipaaparagoyaanauttarakurupubbavidehadiipasa"nkhaate ^a^P0.0317^ea^ ^b^catudiipamhi issaraa^eb^ padhaanaa visu.m ahesunti attho. sesa.m vuttanayamevaati.
[06] nandattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] ^b^padumuttaro^eb^ ^a^M2.0008^ea^ ^b^naama jino^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato cuu.lapanthakattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale yadettha a.t.thuppattivasena vattabba.m, ta.m a.t.thakanipaate mahaapanthakavatthusmi.m (theragaa0 510 aadayo) vuttameva. aya.m pana viseso -- mahaapanthakatthero arahatta.m patvaa phalasamaapattisukhena viitinaamento cintesi -- ``katha.m nu kho sakkaa cuu.lapanthakampi imasmi.m sukhe pati.t.thaapetu''nti. so attano ayyaka.m dhanase.t.thi.m upasa"nkamitvaa aaha -- ``sace, mahaase.t.thi ^a^V2.0008^ea^, anujaanaatha, aha.m cuu.lapanthaka.m pabbaajeyya''nti. ``pabbaajetha, bhante''ti. thero ta.m pabbaajesi. so dasasu siilesu pati.t.thito bhaatu santike --
[21] ``paduma.m yathaa kokanada.m sugandha.m, paato siyaa phullamaviitagandha.m.
[22] a"ngiirasa.m passa virocamaana.m, tapantamaadiccamivantalikkhe''ti.. (sa.m0 ni0 1.123; a0 ni0 5.195) --

[25] gaatha.m ugga.nhanto catuuhi maasehi uggahetu.m naasakkhi, gahitampi hadaye na ti.t.thati. atha na.m mahaapanthako, ``cuu.lapanthaka, tva.m imasmi.m saasane abhabbo, catuuhi maasehi eka.m gaathampi gahetu.m na sakkosi, pabbajitakicca.m pana tva.m katha.m matthaka.m paapessasi, nikkhama ito''ti so therena pa.naamiko dvaarako.t.thakasamiipe rodamaano a.t.thaasi.

[03] tena ca samayena satthaa jiivakambavane viharati. atha jiivako purisa.m pesesi -- ``gaccha, pa~ncahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m satthaara.m nimantehii''ti. tena ca samayena aayasmaa mahaapanthako bhattuddesako hoti. so ``pa~ncanna.m bhikkhusataana.m bhikkha.m pa.ticchathaa''ti vutto ``cuu.lapanthaka.m .thapetvaa sesaana.m pa.ticchaamii''ti aaha. ta.m sutvaa cuu.lapanthako bhiyyosomattaaya domanassappatto ahosi. satthaa tassa cittakkheda.m ~natvaa ``cuu.lapanthako mayaa katena upaayena bujjhissatii''ti ^a^P0.0318^ea^ tassa aviduura.t.thaane attaana.m dassetvaa ``ki.m, panthaka, rodasii''ti pucchi. ``bhaataa ma.m, bhante, pa.naametii''ti aaha. ``panthaka, maa cintayi, mama saasane ^a^M2.0009^ea^ tuyha.m pabbajjaa, ehi ima.m gahetvaa `rajohara.na.m, rajohara.na'nti manasi karohii''ti iddhiyaa suddha.m co.lakkha.n.da.m abhisa"nkharitvaa adaasi. so satthaaraa dinna.m co.lakkha.n.da.m ``rajohara.na.m, rajohara.na''nti hatthena parimajjanto nisiidi. tassa ta.m parimajjantassa kili.t.thadhaatuka.m jaata.m, puna parimajjantassa ukkhaliparipu~nchanasadisa.m jaata.m. so ~naa.naparipaakattaa eva.m cintesi -- ``ida.m co.lakkha.n.da.m pakatiyaa parisuddha.m, ima.m upaadi.n.nakasariira.m nissaaya kili.t.tha.m a~n~nathaa jaata.m, tasmaa anicca.m yathaapeta.m, eva.m cittampii''ti khayavaya.m pa.t.thapetvaa tasmi.myeva nimitte jhaanaani nibbattetvaa jhaanapaadaka.m katvaa vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni. arahattapattassevassa tepi.taka.m pa~ncaabhi~n~naa ca aagami.msu.

[03] satthaa ekuunehi pa~ncabhikkhusatehi saddhi.m gantvaa jiivakassa nivesane pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. cuu.lapanthako pana attano bhikkhaaya appa.ticchitattaa eva na gato. jiivako yaagu.m daatu.m ^a^V2.0009^ea^ aarabhi. satthaa hatthena patta.m pidahi. ``kasmaa, bhante, na ga.nhathaa''ti vutte ``vihaare eko bhikkhu atthi, jiivakaa''ti. so purisa.m pesesi -- ``gaccha, bha.ne, vihaare nisinna.m ayya.m gahetvaa ehii''ti. cuu.lapanthakattheropi ruupena kiriyaaya ca ekampi ekena asadisa.m bhikkhusahassa.m nimminitvaa nisiidi. so puriso vihaare bhikkhuuna.m bahubhaava.m disvaa gantvaa jiivakassa kathesi -- ``imasmaa bhikkhusa"nghaa vihaare bhikkhusa"ngho bahutaro, pakkositabba.m ayya.m na jaanaamii''ti. jiivako satthaara.m pucchi -- ``ko naamo, bhante, vihaare nisinno bhikkhuu''ti? ``cuu.lapanthako naama, jiivakaa''ti. ``gaccha, bha.ne, `cuu.lapanthako naama kataro'ti pucchitvaa ta.m aanehii''ti. so vihaara.m gantvaa ``cuu.lapanthako naama kataro, bhante''ti pucchi. ``aha.m cuu.lapanthako, aha.m cuu.lapanthako''ti ekappahaarena bhikkhusahassampi kathesi. so punaagantvaa ta.m pavatti.m jiivakassa aarocesi jiivako pa.tividdhasaccattaa ``iddhimaa ma~n~ne, ayyo''ti nayato ~natvaa ``gaccha, bha.ne, pa.thama.m kathenta.m ayyameva `tumhe satthaa pakkosatii'ti vatvaa ciivaraka.n.ne ga.nhaahii''ti aaha. so vihaara.m gantvaa tathaa akaasi. taavadeva nimmitabhikkhuu antaradhaayi.msu. so thera.m gahetvaa agamaasi.

[03] satthaa ^a^M2.0010^ea^ tasmi.m kha.ne yaagu~nca khajjakaadibheda~nca pa.tigga.nhi. katabhattakicco bhagavaa aayasmanta.m cuu.lapanthaka.m aa.naapesi ``anumodana.m karohii''ti. so pabhinnapa.tisambhido sineru.m gahetvaa ^a^P0.0319^ea^ mahaasamudda.m manthento viya tepi.taka.m buddhavacana.m sa"nkhobhento satthu ajjhaasaya.m ga.nhanto anumodana.m akaasi. dasabale bhattakicca.m katvaa vihaara.m gate dhammasabhaaya.m kathaa udapaadi `aho buddhaana.m aanubhaavo, yatra hi naama cattaaro maase ekagaatha.m gahetu.m asakkontampi lahukena kha.neneva eva.m mahiddhika.m aka.msuu'ti, tathaa hi jiivakassa nivesane nisinno bhagavaa `eva.m cuu.lapanthakassa citta.m samaahita.m, viithipa.tipannaa vipassanaa'ti ~natvaa yathaanisinnoyeva attaana.m dassetvaa, `panthaka, nevaaya.m pilotikaa kili.t.thaa rajaanuki.n.naa, ito pana a~n~nopi ariyassa vinaye sa.mkileso rajo'ti dassento --
[21] ``raago rajo na ca pana re.nu vuccati, raagasseta.m adhivacana.m rajoti.
[22] eta.m raja.m vippajahitvaa bhikkhavo, viharanti te vigatarajassa saasane..
[22] ``doso rajo...pe0... vigatarajassa saasane..
[22] ``moho ^a^V2.0010^ea^ rajo...pe0... vigatarajassa saasane''ti.. (mahaani0 209; cuu.lani0 udayamaa.navapucchaaniddesa 74) --

[25] imaa tisso gaathaayo abhaasi. gaathaapariyosaane cuu.lapanthako sahapa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.niiti. satthaa tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m kathaasallaapa.m sutvaa aagantvaa buddhaasane nisiiditvaa ``ki.m vadetha, bhikkhave''ti pucchitvaa ``ima.m naama, bhante''ti vutte ``bhikkhave, cuu.lapanthakena idaani mayha.m ovaade .thatvaa lokuttharadaayajja.m laddha.m, pubbe pana lokiyadaayajja.m laddha''nti vatvaa tehi yaacito cuu.lase.t.thijaataka.m (jaa0 1.1.4) kathesi. aparabhaage na.m satthaa ariyaga.naparivuto dhammaasane nisinno manomaya.m kaaya.m abhinimminantaana.m bhikkhuuna.m cetoviva.t.takusalaana~nca agga.t.thaane .thapesi.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ eva.m so pattaetadagga.t.thaano attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa piitisomanassavasena pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha purimapadadvaya.m vuttatthameva. ^b^ga.namhaa vuupaka.t.tho^eb^ ^a^M2.0011^ea^ ^b^so^eb^ti so padumuttaro naama satthaa ga.namhaa mahataa bhikkhusamuuhato vuupaka.t.tho visu.m bhuuto viveka.m upagato. ^b^tadaa^eb^ ^a^P0.0320^ea^ mama taapasakaale ^b^himavante^eb^ himaalayapabbatasamiipe ^b^vasi^eb^ vaasa.m kappesi, catuuhi iriyaapathehi vihaasiiti attho.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ ^b^ahampi...pe0... tadaa^eb^ti yadaa so bhagavaa himavanta.m upagantvaa vasi, tadaa ahampi himavantasamiipe kataassame ^b^aa^eb^ samantato kaayacittapii.laasa"nkhaataa parissayaa samanti etthaati ^b^assamo^eb^ti laddhanaame ara~n~naavaase vasaamiiti sambandho. ^b^aciraagata.m mahaaviira^eb^nti acira.m aagata.m mahaaviiriyavanta.m ^b^lokanaayaka.m^eb^ padhaana.m ta.m bhagavanta.m upesinti sambandho, aagatakkha.neyeva upaagaminti attho.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ ^b^pupphacchatta.m gahetvaanaa^eb^ti eva.m upagacchanto ca padumuppalapupphaadiihi chaadita.m pupphamaya.m chatta.m gahetvaa ^b^naraasabha.m^eb^ naraana.m se.t.tha.m bhagavanta.m chaadento ^b^upagacchi.m^eb^ samiipa.m gatosmiiti attho. ^b^samaadhi.m samaapajjanta^eb^nti ruupaavacarasamaadhijjhaana.m samaapajjanta.m appetvaa nisinnassa antaraaya.m aha.m akaasinti sambandho.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ ^b^ubho hatthehi paggayhaa^eb^ti ta.m susajjita.m pupphacchatta.m dviihi hatthehi ukkhipitvaa aha.m ^a^V2.0011^ea^ bhagavato adaasinti sambandho. ^b^pa.tiggahesii^eb^ti ta.m mayaa dinna.m pupphacchatta.m padumuttaro bhagavaa sampa.ticchi, saadara.m saadiyiiti attho.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ ^b^satapattachatta.m paggayhaa^eb^ti ekekasmi.m padumapupphe satasatapattaana.m vasena satapattehi padumapupphehi chaadita.m pupphacchatta.m pakaarena aadarena gahetvaa taapaso mama adaasiiti attho. ^b^tamaha.m kittayissaamii^eb^ti ta.m taapasa.m aha.m kittayissaami paaka.ta.m karissaamiiti attho. mama ^b^bhaasato^eb^ bhaasamaanassa vacana.m su.notha manasi karotha.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ ^b^pa~ncaviisatikappaanii^eb^ti iminaa pupphacchattadaanena pa~ncaviisativaare taavati.msabhavane sakko hutvaa devarajja.m karissatiiti sambandho. ^b^catutti.msatikkhattu~ncaa^eb^ti catutti.msativaare manussaloke cakkavattii raajaa bhavissati.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ ^b^ya.m^eb^ ^a^M2.0012^ea^ ^b^ya.m yoni^eb^nti manussayoniaadiisu ya.m ya.m jaati.m ^b^sa.msarati^eb^ gacchati upapajjati. tattha tattha yoniya.m ^b^abbhokaase^eb^ su~n~na.t.thaane ^b^pati.t.thanta.m^eb^ nisinna.m .thita.m vaa paduma.m ^b^dhaarayissati^eb^ upari chaadayissatiiti attho.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ ^b^pakaasite paavacane^eb^ti tena bhagavato sakalapi.takattaye pakaasite diipite ^b^manussatta.m^eb^ manussajaati.m ^b^labhissati^eb^ upapajjissati. ^b^manomayamhi kaayamhii^eb^ti manena jhaanacittena nibbattoti manomayo, yathaa citta.m pavattati, tathaa kaaya.m pavatteti cittagatika.m karotiiti ^a^P0.0321^ea^ attho. tamhi manomaye kaayamhi so taapaso cuu.lapanthako naama hutvaa uttamo aggo bhavissatiiti attho. sesa.m he.t.thaa vuttattaa uttaanattaa ca suvi~n~neyyameva.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ ^b^sari.m kokanada.m aha^eb^nti aha.m bhagavato nimmitaco.laka.m parimajjanto kokanada.m paduma.m sarinti attho. ^b^tattha citta.m vimucci me^eb^ti tasmi.m kokanade padume mayha.m citta.m adhimucci alliino, tato aha.m arahatta.m paapu.ninti sambandho.
[03] 53^b^.^eb^ aha.m manomayesu cittagatikesu kaayesu ^b^sabbattha^eb^ sabbesu ^b^paarami.m^eb^ pariyosaana.m ^b^gato^eb^ pattoti sambandho. sesa.m vuttanayamevaati.
[06] cuu.lapanthakattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] ^b^nibbute^eb^ ^a^V2.0012^ea^ ^b^lokanaathamhii^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato pilindavacchattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare mahaabhogakule nibbatto he.t.thaa vuttanayena satthu santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m devataana.m piyamanaapabhaavena agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa tato cuto devamanussesu sa.msaranto sumedhassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbatto. parinibbute bhagavati tassa thuupa.m puujetvaa sa"nghassa mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa tato cavitvaa devamanussesu ubhayasampattiyo ^a^M2.0013^ea^ anubhavitvaa anuppanne buddhe cakkavattii raajaa hutvaa mahaajana.m pa~ncasiilesu pati.t.thaapetvaa saggaparaayana.m akaasi. so anuppanneyeva amhaaka.m bhagavati saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbatti, ^b^pilindo^eb^tissa naama.m aka.msu. ^b^vaccho^eb^ti gotta.m. so aparabhaage ^b^pilindavaccho^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha. sa.msaare pana sa.mvegabahulataaya paribbaajakapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa cuu.lagandhaara.m naama vijja.m saadhetvaa taaya vijjaaya aakaasacaarii paracittaviduu ca hutvaa raajagahe laabhaggayasaggapatto pa.tivasati.

[03] atha amhaaka.m bhagavaa abhisambuddho hutvaa anukkamena raajagaha.m upagato. tato pa.t.thaaya buddhaanubhaavena tassa saa vijjaa na sampajjati, attano kicca.m na saadheti. so cintesi -- ``suta.m kho paneta.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m `yattha mahaagandhaaravijjaa dharati ^a^P0.0322^ea^, tattha cuu.lagandhaaravijjaa na sampajjatii'ti sama.nassa pana gotamassa aagatakaalato pa.t.thaaya naaya.m mama vijjaa sampajjati, nissa.msaya.m sama.no gotamo mahaagandhaaravijja.m jaanaati, ya.mnuunaaha.m ta.m payirupaasitvaa tassa santike ta.m vijja.m pariyaapu.neyya''nti. so bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca -- ``aha.m, mahaasama.na, tava santike eka.m vijja.m pariyaapu.nitukaamo, okaasa.m me karohii''ti. ``tena hi mama santike pabbajaahii''ti aaha. so ``vijjaaya parikamma.m pabbajjaa''ti ma~n~namaano pabbaji. tassa bhagavaa dhamma.m kathetvaa caritaanukuula.m kamma.t.thaana.m adaasi. so upanissayasampannataaya nacirasseva vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ yaa pana purimajaatiya.m tassovaade .thatvaa sagge nibbattaa devataa, taa kata~n~nuta.m nissaaya tasmi.m sa~njaatabahumaanaa saaya.m paata.m thera.m payirupaasitvaa gacchanti. tasmaa na.m bhagavaa devataana.m ativiya piyamanaapabhaavena aggabhaave .thapesi ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ^a^V2.0013^ea^ devataana.m piyamanaapaana.m yadida.m pilindavaccho''ti (a0 ni0 1.209, 215). eva.m so pattaagga.t.thaano attano pubbakamma.m anussaritvaa piitisomanassavasena pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^nibbute lokanaathamhii^eb^tiaadimaaha.

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0014^ea^ kaamaruupaaruupalokassa naatho padhaanoti ^b^lokanaatho^eb^. medhaa vuccanti sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.naanaavara.na~naa.naadayo, sundaraa, pasa.t.thaa vaa medhaa yassa so ^b^sumedho,^eb^ aggo ca so puggalo caati ^b^aggapuggalo,^eb^ tasmi.m sumedhe lokanaayake aggapuggale khandhaparinibbaanena nibbute satiiti sambandho. ^b^pasannacitto sumano^eb^ti saddhaaya pasaaditacitto somanassena sundaramano aha.m tassa sumedhassa bhagavato ^b^thuupapuuja.m^eb^ cetiyapuuja.m akaasinti attho.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ ^b^ye ca khii.naasavaa tatthaa^eb^ti tasmi.m samaagame ye ca khii.naasavaa pahiinakilesaa ^b^cha.labhi~n~naa^eb^ chahi abhi~n~naahi samannaagataa ^b^mahiddhikaa^eb^ mahantehi iddhiihi samannaagataa santi, ^b^te^eb^ sabbe khii.naasave aha.m tattha ^b^samaanetvaa^eb^ su.t.thu aadarena aanetvaa ^b^sa"nghabhatta.m^eb^ sakalasa"nghassa daatabbabhatta.m ^b^akaasi.m^eb^ tesa.m bhojesinti attho.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ ^b^upa.t.thaako tadaa ahuu^eb^ti tadaa mama sa"nghabhattadaanakaale sumedhassa bhagavato naamena sumedho naama upa.t.thaakasaavako ahu ahosiiti attho. so saavako mayha.m puujaasakkaara.m ^b^anumodittha^eb^ anumodito aanisa.msa.m kathesiiti attho.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ ^b^tena cittappasaadenaa^eb^ti tena thuupapuujaakara.navasena uppannena ^a^P0.0323^ea^ cittappasaadena devaloke dibbavimaana.m ^b^upapajji.m^eb^ upagato asmiiti attho, tattha nibbattomhiiti vutta.m hoti. ^b^cha.laasiitisahassaanii^eb^ti tasmi.m vimaane cha asiitisahassaani devaccharaayo ^b^me^eb^ mayha.m citta.m ^b^rami.msu^eb^ ramaapesunti sambandho.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ ^b^mameva anuvattantii^eb^ti ^b^taa^eb^ accharaayo ^b^sabbakaamehi^eb^ dibbehi ruupaadivatthukaamehi upa.t.thahantiyo mama.m eva anuvattanti mama vacana.m anukaronti ^b^sadaa^eb^ niccakaalanti attho. sesa.m suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] pilindavacchattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] ^b^padumuttarassa^eb^ ^a^M2.0015^ea^ ^a^V2.0014^ea^ ^b^bhagavato^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato raahulattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi aayasmaa purimajinavaresu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbatto vi~n~nuta.m patvaa satthu dhammadesana.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m sikkhaakaamaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa sayampi ta.m .thaanantara.m patthento senaasanavisodhanavijjotanaadika.m u.laara.m pu~n~na.m katvaa pa.nidhaana.m akaasi. so tato cavitvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade amhaaka.m bodhisatta.m pa.ticca yasodharaaya deviyaa kucchimhi nibbattitvaa ^b^raahulo^eb^ti laddhanaamo mahataa khattiyaparivaarena va.d.dhi. tassa pabbajjaavidhaana.m khandhake (mahaava0 105) aagatameva. so pabbajitvaa satthu santike anekehi suttapadehi suladdhovaado paripakka~naa.no vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. arahaa pana hutvaa attano pa.tipatti.m paccavekkhitvaa a~n~na.m byaakaronto --
[21] ``ubhayeneva sampanno, raahulabhaddoti ma.m viduu.
[22] ya~ncamhi putto buddhassa, ya~nca dhammesu cakkhumaa..
[21] ``ya~nca me aasavaa khii.naa, ya~nca natthi punabbhavo.
[22] arahaa dakkhi.neyyomhi, tevijjo amataddaso..
[21] ``kaamandhaa jaalapacchannaa, ta.nhaachadanachaaditaa.
[22] pamattabandhunaa bandhaa, macchaava kuminaa mukhe..
[21] ``ta.m kaama.m ahamujjhitvaa, chetvaa maarassa bandhana.m.
[22] samuula.m ta.nhamabbuyha, siitibhuutosmi nibbuto''ti.. (theragaa0 295-298).

[03] catasso gaathaa abhaasi. tattha ^a^P0.0324^ea^ ^b^ubhayeneva sampanno^eb^ti jaatisampadaa pa.tipattisampadaati ubhayasampattiyaapi sampanno samannaagato. ^b^raahulabhaddoti ma.m viduu^eb^ti ``raahulabhaddo''ti ma.m sabrahmacaarino ^a^V2.0015^ea^ sa~njaananti. tassa hi jaatasaasana.m sutvaa bodhisattena, ``raahu, jaato, bandhana.m jaata''nti vuttavacana.m upaadaaya suddhodanamahaaraajaa ``raahulo''ti naama.m ^a^M2.0016^ea^ ga.nhi. tattha aadito pitaraa vuttapariyaayameva gahetvaa aaha -- ``raahulabhaddoti ma.m viduu''ti. ^b^bhaddo^eb^ti pasa.msaavacanameva. aparabhaage satthaa ta.m sikkhaakaamabhaavena agga.t.thaane .thapesi ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaakaamaana.m yadida.m raahulo''ti (a0 ni0 1.209).

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ eva.m so pattaetadagga.t.thaano attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassajaato pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^padumuttarassa bhagavato^eb^tiaadimaaha. ^b^sattabhuumimhi paasaade^eb^ti pasaada.m somanassa.m janetiiti paasaado. uparuupari .thitaa satta bhuumiyo yasmi.m paasaade soya.m sattabhuumi, tasmi.m sattabhuumimhi paasaade. ^b^aadaasa.m santhari.m aha^eb^nti aadaasatala.m nipphaadetvaa lokaje.t.thassa bhagavato taadino aha.m santhara.m adaasi.m, santharitvaa puujesinti attho.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ ^b^khii.naasavasahassehii^eb^ti arahantasahassehi pariki.n.no parivuto. ^b^dvipadindo^eb^ dvipadaana.m indo saami naraasabho mahaamuni gandhaku.ti.m tehi saha ^b^upaagami^eb^ paavisiiti attho.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ ^b^virocento gandhaku.ti^eb^nti ta.m gandhaku.ti.m sobhayamaano devaana.m devo ^b^devadevo^eb^ naraana.m aasabho ^b^naraasabho^eb^ je.t.tho satthaa bhikkhusa"nghamajjhe nisiiditvaa imaa byaakara.nagaathaayo ^b^abhaasatha^eb^ kathesiiti sambandho.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ ^b^yenaaya.m jotitaa seyyaa^eb^ti yena upaasakena aya.m paasaadasa"nkhaataa seyyaa jotitaa pabhaasitaa pajjalitaa. ^b^aadaasova^eb^ ka.msalohamaya.m aadaasatala.m iva su.t.thu sama.m katvaa santhataa. ^b^ta.m^eb^ upaasaka.m ^b^kittayissaami^eb^ paaka.ta.m karissaamiiti attho. sesa.m suvi~n~neyyameva.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ^b^a.t.thaanameta.m ya.m taadii^eb^ti ya.m yena kaara.nena taadii i.t.thaani.t.thesu akampiyasabhaavattaa taadii ^b^agaare^eb^ gharaavaase ^b^rati.m^eb^ alliinabhaava.m ^b^ajjhagaa^eb^ paapu.ni, ^b^eta.m^eb^ kaara.na.m a.t.thaana.m akaara.nanti attho.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ ^b^nikkhamitvaa^eb^ ^a^M2.0017^ea^ ^b^agaarasmaa^eb^ti gharaavaasato nikkhamitvaa ta.m ti.nadalamiva pariccajitvaa ^b^subbato^eb^ susikkhito pabbajissati. ^b^raahulo naama^eb^ ^a^P0.0325^ea^ ^b^naamenaa^eb^ti suddhodanamahaaraajena pesita.m ^a^V2.0016^ea^ kumaarassa jaatasaasana.m sutvaa pitaraa siddhatthena, ``raahu jaato, bandhana.m jaata''nti vuttanaamattaa raahulo naamaati attho. ``yathaa candasuuriyaana.m vimaanapabhaaya kili.t.thakara.nena raahu asurindo upeti gacchati, evamevaaya.m mama abhinikkhamanapabbajjaadiina.m antaraaya.m karontoriva jaato''ti adhippaayena, ``raahu jaatoti aahaa''ti da.t.thabba.m. ^b^arahaa so bhavissatii^eb^ti so taadiso upanissayasampanno vipassanaaya.m yuttappayutto arahaa khii.naasavo bhavissatiiti attho.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ ^b^kikiiva a.n.da.m rakkheyyaa^eb^ti a.n.da.m biija.m rakkhamaanaa kikii saku.nii iva appamatto siila.m rakkheyya, ^b^caamarii viya vaaladhi^eb^nti vaala.m rakkhamaanaa ka.n.dakesu vaale laggante bhindanabhayena anaaka.d.dhitvaa maramaanaa caamarii viya jiivitampi pariccajitvaa siila.m abhinditvaa rakkheyya. ^b^nipako siilasampanno^eb^ti nepakka.m vuccati pa~n~naa, tena nepakkena samannaagato nipako kha.n.dachiddaadibhaava.m apaapetvaa rakkha.nato siilasampanno bhavissatiiti eva.m so bhagavaa byaakara.namakaasi. so eva.m pattaarahattaphalo ekadivasa.m viveka.t.thaane nisinno somanassavasena ^b^eva.m rakkhi.m mahaamunii^eb^tiaadimaaha. ta.m suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] raahulattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] ^b^padumuttara.m bhagavanta^eb^ntiaadika.m aayasmato upasenava"ngantaputtattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbattitvaa vayappatto satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m samantapaasaadikaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa satthu adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa ^a^M2.0018^ea^ devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade naalakagaame ruupasaarii braahma.niyaa kucchimhi nibbatti, ^b^upaseno^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto tayo vede ugga.nhitvaa satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa upasampadaaya ekavassiko ``ariyagabbha.m va.d.dhemii''ti eka.m kulaputta.m attano santike upasampaadetvaa tena saddhi.m satthu santika.m gato. satthaaraa cassa tassa avassikassa bhikkhuno saddhivihaarikabhaava.m sutvaa ``atilahu.m kho tva.m, moghapurisa, baahullaaya aavatto''ti (mahaava0 75) garahito ``idaanaaha.m yadi parisa.m nissaaya satthaaraa garahito, parisa.myeva pana nissaaya ^a^P0.0326^ea^ satthu ^a^V2.0017^ea^ pasaada.m karissaamii''ti vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. arahaa pana hutvaa sayampi sabbe dhuta"ngadhamme samaadaaya vattati, a~n~nepi tadatthaaya samaadapesi, tena na.m bhagavaa samantapaasaadikaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi. so aparena samayena kosambiya.m kalahe uppanne bhikkhusa"nghe ca dvidhaabhuute ekena bhikkhunaa ta.m kalaha.m parivajjitukaamena ``etarahi kho kalaho uppanno, bhikkhusa"ngho ca dvidhaabhuuto, katha.m nu kho mayaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti pu.t.tho vivekavaasato pa.t.thaaya tassa pa.tipatti.m kathesi. eva.m thero tassa bhikkhuno ovaadadaanaapadesena attano tathaa pa.tipannabhaava.m diipento a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ so eva.m pattaetadagga.t.thaano attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassavasena pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^padumuttara.m bhagavanta^eb^ntiaadimaaha. ^b^pabbhaaramhi nisiidanta^eb^nti purato bhaara.m namita.m onamitanti pabbhaara.m vivekakaama.m vanamajjhe saya.mjaatapabbatapabbhaare nisinna.m ^b^naruttama.m^eb^ bhagavanta.m aha.m ^b^upagacchi.m^eb^ samiipa.m gatoti attho.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ ^b^ka.nikaarapuppha disvaa^eb^ti tathaa upagacchanto tasmi.m padese supupphita.m ka.nikaara.m disvaa. ^b^va.n.te chetvaanaha.m tadaa^eb^ti tasmi.m tathaagatassa di.t.thakaale ta.m puppha.m va.n.te va.n.tasmi.m chetvaana chinditvaana. ^b^ala"nkaritvaa chattamhii^eb^ti tena pupphena chatta.m chaadetvaa. ^b^buddhassa abhiropayi^eb^nti pabbhaare nisinnassa buddhassa muddhani akaasinti attho.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ ^b^pi.n.dapaata~nca^eb^ ^a^M2.0019^ea^ ^b^paadaasi^eb^nti tasmi.myeva nisinnassa bhagavato pi.n.dapaata.m pakaarena adaasi.m bhojesinti attho. ^b^paramanna.m subhojana^eb^nti sundarabhojanasa"nkhaata.m paramanna.m uttamaahaara.m. ^b^buddhena navame tatthaa^eb^ti tasmi.m viveka.t.thaane buddhena saha navame a.t.tha ^b^sama.ne^eb^ samitapaape khii.naasavabhikkhuu bhojesinti attho.

[03] ^b^ya.m vadanti sumedho^eb^ti ya.m gotamasammaasambuddha.m ^b^bhuuripa~n~na.m^eb^ pathavisamaana.m pa~n~na.m ^b^sumedha.m^eb^ sundara.m sabba~n~nutaadipa~n~navanta.m. sumedho iti sundarapa~n~no iti vadanti pa.n.ditaa ito kappato satasahasse kappe eso gotamo sammaasambuddho bhavissatiiti sambandho. sesa.m suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] upasenava"ngantaputtattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] ^b^padumuttarassa^eb^ ^a^P0.0327^ea^ ^a^V2.0018^ea^ ^b^bhagavato^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato ra.t.thapaalattherassa apadaana.m. ayampaayasmaa purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato uppattito puretarameva ha.msavatiinagare gahapatimahaasaalakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto pitu accayena gharaavaase pati.t.thito ratanako.t.thaagaarakammikena dassita.m aparimaa.na.m va.msaanugata.m dhana.m disvaa ``ima.m ettaka.m dhanaraasi.m mayha.m pituayyakapayyakaadayo attanaa saddhi.m gahetvaa gantu.m naasakkhi.msu, mayaa pana gahetvaa gantu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa kapa.naddhikaadiina.m mahaadaana.m adaasi. so abhi~n~naalaabhi.m eka.m taapasa.m upasa"nkamitvaa tena devalokaadhipacce niyojito yaavajiiva.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvaa dibbasampatti.m anubhavanto tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa tato cuto manussaloke bhinna.m ra.t.tha.m sandhaaretu.m samatthassa kulassa ekaputtako hutvaa nibbatti. tena samayena padumuttaro bhagavaa loke uppajjitvaa pavattitavaradhammacakko veneyyasatte nibbaanamahaanagarasa"nkhaata.m khemantabhuumi.m sampaapesi. atha so kulaputto anukkamena vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m upaasakehi saddhi.m vihaara.m gantvaa satthaara.m dhamma.m desenta.m disvaa pasannacitto parisapariyante nisiidi.

[03] tena ^a^M2.0020^ea^ kho pana samayena satthaa eka.m bhikkhu.m saddhaapabbajitaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi. so ta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso satasahassabhikkhuparivutassa bhagavato sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m datvaa ta.m .thaana.m patthesi. satthaa anantaraayena samijjhanabhaava.m disvaa ``aya.m anaagate gotamassa naama sammaasambuddhassa saasane saddhaapabbajitaana.m aggo bhavissatii''ti byaakaasi. so satthaara.m bhikkhusa"ngha~nca vanditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. so yaavataayuka.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato cavitvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto ito dvenavute kappe phussassa bhagavato kaale satthu vemaatikesu tiisu raajaputtesu satthaara.m upa.t.thahantesu tesa.m pu~n~nakiriyaasu sahaayakicca.m akaasi. eva.m tattha tattha bhave bahu.m kusala.m upacinitvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kurura.t.the thullako.t.thikanigame ra.t.thapaalase.t.thino gehe nibbatti, tassa bhinna.m ra.t.tha.m sandhaaretu.m samatthakule nibbattattaa ^b^ra.t.thapaalo^eb^ti va.msaanugatameva naama.m ahosi. so mahataa parivaarena va.d.dhanto anukkamena yobbanappatto maataapituuhi patiruupena daarena sa.myojito mahante ^a^P0.0328^ea^ ca yase pati.t.thaapito dibbasampattisadisasampatti.m paccanubhoti.

[03] atha ^a^V2.0019^ea^ bhagavaa kurura.t.the janapadacaarika.m caranto thullako.t.thika.m anupaapu.ni. ta.m sutvaa ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitukaamo sattaaha.m bhattaccheda.m katvaa kicchena kasirena maataapitaro anujaanaapetvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaacitvaa satthu aa.nattiyaa a~n~natarassa santike pabbajitvaa yonisomanasikaarena kamma.m karonto vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. arahatta.m pana patvaa satthaara.m anujaanaapetvaa maataapitaro passitu.m thullako.t.thika.m gantvaa tattha sapadaana.m pi.n.daaya caranto pitu nivesane aabhidosika.m kummaasa.m labhitvaa ta.m amata.m viya paribhu~njanto pitaraa nimantito svaatanaaya adhivaasetvaa dutiyadivase pitu nivesane pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa ala"nkatapa.tiyatte itthaagaarajane upagantvaa ``kiidisaa naama taa, ayyaputta, accharaayo, yaasa.m tva.m hetu brahmacariya.m carasii''tiaadiini (ma0 ni0 2.301) vatvaa palobhanakamma.m kaatu.m aaraddhe tassaadhippaaya.m viparivattetvaa aniccataadipa.tisa.myutta.m dhamma.m kathento --
[21] ``passa ^a^M2.0021^ea^ cittakata.m bimba.m, arukaaya.m samussita.m.
[22] aatura.m bahusa"nkappa.m, yassa natthi dhuva.m .thiti..
[21] ``passa cittakata.m ruupa.m, ma.ninaa ku.n.dalena ca.
[22] a.t.thi.m tacena onaddha.m, saha vatthehi sobhati..
[21] ``alattakakataa paadaa, mukha.m cu.n.nakamakkhita.m.
[22] ala.m baalassa mohaaya, no ca paaragavesino..
[21] ``a.t.thaapadakataa kesaa, nettaa a~njanamakkhitaa.
[22] ala.m baalassa mohaaya, no ca paaragavesino..
[21] ``a~njaniiva navaa cittaa, puutikaayo ala"nkato.
[22] ala.m baalassa mohaaya, no ca paaragavesino..
[21] ``odahi ^a^P0.0329^ea^ migavo paasa.m, naasadaa vaagura.m migo.
[22] bhutvaa nivaapa.m gacchaama, kandante migabandhake..
[21] ``chinno ^a^V2.0020^ea^ paaso migavassa, naasadaa vaagura.m migo.
[22] bhutvaa nivaapa.m gacchaama, socante migaluddake''ti.. (ma0 ni0 2.302; theragaa0 769-775).

[03] imaa gaathaayo abhaasi. imaa gaathaa vatvaa vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa ra~n~no korabyassa migaajinavanuyyaane ma"ngalasilaapa.t.te nisiidi. therassa kira pitaa sattasu dvaarako.t.thakesu agga.la.m daapetvaa malle aa.naapesi ``nikkhamitu.m maa detha, kaasaayaani apanetvaa setakaani nivaasaapethaa''ti. tasmaa thero aakaasena agamaasi. atha raajaa korabyo therassa tattha nisinnabhaava.m sutvaa ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ``idha, bho ra.t.thapaala, pabbajanto byaadhipaariju~n~na.m vaa jaraabhoga~naatipaariju~n~na.m vaa patto pabbajati, tva.m pana ki~ncipi paariju~n~na.m anupagato eva kasmaa pabbajasii''ti pucchi. athassa thero ``upaniyyati loko addhuvo, ataa.no loko anabhissaro, asara.no loko sabba.m pahaaya gamaniiya.m, uuno loko atitto ta.nhaadaaso''ti (ma0 ni0 2.305) imesa.m catunna.m dhammuddesaana.m attanaa viditabhaava.m kathetvaa tassaa desanaaya anugiiti.m kathento --
[21] ``passaami ^a^M2.0022^ea^ loke sadhane manusse, laddhaana vitta.m na dadanti mohaa.
[22] luddhaa dhana.m sannicaya.m karonti, bhiyyova kaame abhipatthayanti..
[21] ``raajaa pasayhappathavi.m vijetvaa, sasaagaranta.m mahimaavasanto.
[22] ora.m samuddassa atittaruupo, paara.m samuddassapi patthayetha..
[21] ``raajaa ca a~n~ne ca bahuu manussaa, aviitata.nhaa mara.na.m upenti.
[22] uunaava hutvaana jahanti deha.m, kaamehi lokamhi na hatthi titti..
[21] ``kandanti ^a^P0.0330^ea^ na.m ~naatii pakiriya kese, `aho vataa no amaraa'ti caahu.
[22] vatthena na.m paaruta.m niiharitvaa, cita.m samodhaaya tato .dahanti..
[21] ``so .dayhati suulehi tujjamaano, ekena vatthena pahaaya bhoge.
[22] na miiyamaanassa bhavanti taa.naa, ~naatii ca mittaa atha vaa sahaayaa..
[21] ``daayaadakaa ^a^V2.0021^ea^ tassa dhana.m haranti, satto pana gacchati yena kamma.m.
[22] na miiyamaana.m dhanamanveti ki~nci, puttaa ca daaraa ca dhana~nca ra.t.tha.m..
[21] ``na diighamaayu.m labhate dhanena, na caapi vittena jara.m vihanti.
[22] appa.m hida.m jiivitamaahu dhiiraa, asassata.m vippari.naamadhamma.m..
[21] ``a.d.dhaa ^a^M2.0023^ea^ daliddaa ca phusanti phassa.m, baalo ca dhiiro ca tatheva phu.t.tho.
[22] baalo hi baalyaa vadhitova seti, dhiiro ca no vedhati phassaphu.t.tho..
[21] ``tasmaa hi pa~n~naava dhanena seyyaa, yaaya vosaanamidhaadhigacchati.
[22] abyositattaa hi bhavaabhavesu, paapaani kammaani karoti mohaa..
[21] ``upeti gabbha~nca para~nca loka.m, sa.msaaramaapajjaparamparaaya.
[22] tassappapa~n~no abhisaddahanto, upeti gabbha~nca para~nca loka.m..
[21] ``coro ^a^P0.0331^ea^ yathaa sandhimukhe gahiito, sakammunaa ha~n~nati paapadhammo.
[22] eva.m pajaa pecca paramhi loke, sakammunaa ha~n~nati paapadhammo..
[21] ``kaamaa hi citraa madhuraa manoramaa, viruuparuupena mathenti citta.m.
[22] aadiinava.m kaamagu.nesu disvaa, tasmaa aha.m pabbajitomhi raaja..
[21] ``dumapphalaaniiva patanti maa.navaa, daharaa ca vu.d.dhaa ca sariirabhedaa.
[22] etampi disvaana pabbajitomhi raaja, apa.n.naka.m saama~n~nameva seyyo..
[21] ``saddhaayaaha.m pabbajito, upeto jinasaasane.
[22] ava~njhaa mayha.m pabbajjaa, ana.no bhu~njaami bhojana.m..
[21] ``kaame aadittato disvaa, jaataruupaani satthato.
[22] gabbhaavokkantito dukkha.m, nirayesu mahabbhaya.m..
[21] ``etamaadiinava.m ^a^M2.0024^ea^ ^a^V2.0022^ea^ ~natvaa, sa.mvega.m alabhi.m tadaa.
[22] soha.m viddho tadaa santo, sampatto aasavakkhaya.m..
[21] ``parici.n.no mayaa satthaa, kata.m buddhassa saasana.m.
[22] ohito garuko bhaaro, bhavanetti samuuhataa..
[21] ``yassatthaaya pabbajito, agaarasmaanagaariya.m.
[22] so me attho anuppatto, sabbasa.myojanakkhayo''ti.. (theragaa0 776-793) --

[25] imaa gaathaa avoca. eva.m thero ra~n~no korabyassa dhamma.m desetvaa satthu santikameva gato. satthaa ca aparabhaage ariyaga.namajjhe nisinno thera.m saddhaapabbajitaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi.

[03] 97-8^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P0.0332^ea^ so thero pattaetadagga.t.thaano pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassajaato pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^padumuttarassa bhagavato^eb^tiaadimaaha. ^b^varanaago mayaa dinno^eb^ti tassa bhagavato ruupakaaye pasiiditvaa varo uttamo se.t.tho ^b^iisaadanto^eb^ rathiisaasadisadanto uruu.lhavaa bhaaravaho raajaaraho vaa. ^b^setacchattopasobhito^eb^ti hatthikkhandhe ussaapitasetacchattena upasevito sobhamaano. punapi ki.m visi.t.tho varanaago? ^b^sakappano^eb^ hatthaala"nkaarasahito. ^b^sa"nghaaraama.m^eb^ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa vasanatthaaya aaraama.m vihaara.m ^b^akaarayi.m^eb^ kaaresi.m.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ ^b^catupa~n~naasasahassaanii^eb^ti tasmi.m kaaraapite vihaarabbhantare catupa~n~naasasahassaani paasaadaani ca aha.m akaarayi.m kaaresinti attho. ^b^mahoghadaana.m karitvaanaa^eb^ti sabbaparikkhaarasahita.m mahoghasadisa.m mahaadaana.m sajjetvaa ^b^mahesino^eb^ munino niyyaadesinti attho.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ ^b^anumodi mahaaviiro^eb^ti caturaasa"nkhyeyyasatasahassesu kappesu abbocchinnaussaahasa"nkhaatena viiriyena mahaaviiro ^b^sayambhuu^eb^ sayameva bhuuto jaato laddhasabba~n~nuta~n~naa.no aggo se.t.tho puggalo ^b^anumodi^eb^ vihaaraanumodana.m akaasi. ^b^sabbe jane haasayanto^eb^ti sakalaanantaaparimaa.ne devamanusse haasayanto santu.t.the ^a^M2.0025^ea^ ^b^kurumaano^eb^ amatanibbaanapa.tisa.myutta.m catusaccadhammadesana.m ^b^desesi^eb^ pakaasesi vivari vibhaji uttaanii akaasiiti attho.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ ^b^ta.m^eb^ ^a^V2.0023^ea^ ^b^me viyaakaasii^eb^ti ta.m mayha.m katapu~n~na.m bala.m visesena paaka.ta.m akaasi. ^b^jalajuttamanaamako^eb^ti jale jaata.m jalaja.m paduma.m, padumuttaranaamakoti attho. ``jalanuttamanaayako''tipi paa.tho. tattha attano pabhaaya jalantiiti jalanaa, candimasuuriyadevabrahmaano, tesa.m jalanaana.m uttamoti jalanuttamo. sabbasattaana.m naayako uttamoti naayako, sambhaaravante satte nibbaana.m neti paapetiiti vaa naayako, jalanuttamo ca so naayako caati ^b^jalanuttamanaayako. bhikkhusa"nghe nisiiditvaa^eb^ti bhikkhusa"nghassa majjhe nisinno ^b^imaa gaathaa abhaasatha^eb^ paaka.ta.m katvaa kathesiiti attho. sesa.m uttaanatthamevaati.
[06] ra.t.thapaalattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] ^b^pabbhaara.m sodhayantassaa^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato sopaakattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato ^a^P0.0333^ea^ kaale a~n~natarassa ku.tumbikassa putto hutvaa nibbatti. ekadivasa.m satthaara.m disvaa biijapuuraphalaani satthu upanesi, paribhu~nji bhagavaa tassaanukampa.m upaadaaya. so bhikkhu satthari sa"nghe ca abhippasanno salaakabhatta.m pa.t.thapetvaa sa"nghuddesavasena ti.n.na.m bhikkhuuna.m yaavataayuka.m khiirabhatta.m adaasi. so tehi pu~n~nehi aparaapara.m devamanussesu sampattiyo anubhavanto ekadaa manussayoniya.m nibbatto ekassa paccekabuddhassa khiirabhatta.m adaasi.

[03] eva.m tattha tattha pu~n~naani katvaa sugatiisuyeva paribbhamanto imasmi.m buddhuppaade purimakammanissandena saavatthiya.m a~n~nataraaya duggatitthiyaa kucchimhi pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. saa ta.m dasamaase kucchinaa pariharitvaa paripakke gabbhe vijaayanakaale vijaayitu.m asakkontii muccha.m aapajjitvaa bahuvela.m mataa viya nipajji. ~naatakaa ``mataa''ti sa~n~naaya susaana.m netvaa citaka.m aaropetvaa ^a^M2.0026^ea^ devataanubhaavena vaatavu.t.thiyaa u.t.thitaaya aggi.m adatvaa pakkami.msu. daarako pacchimabhavikattaa devataanubhaaveneva arogo hutvaa maatukucchito nikkhami. maataa pana kaalamakaasi. devataa manussaruupenupagamma ta.m gahetvaa susaanagopakassa gehe .thapetvaa katipaaha.m kaala.m patiruupena aahaarena posesi. tato para.m susaanagopako attano putta.m katvaa va.d.dhesi. so ^a^V2.0024^ea^ tathaa va.d.dhento tassa puttena suppiyena naama daarakena saddhi.m kii.lanto vicari. tassa susaane jaatasa.mva.d.dhabhaavato ^b^sopaako^eb^ti sama~n~naa ahosi.

[03] athekadivasa.m sattavassika.m ta.m bhagavaa paccuusavelaaya.m ~naa.najaala.m pattharitvaa veneyyabandhave olokento ~naa.najaalassa antogata.m disvaa susaana.t.thaana.m agamaasi. daarako pubbahetunaa codiyamaano pasannamaanaso satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa a.t.thaasi. satthaa tassa dhamma.m kathesi. so dhamma.m sutvaa pabbajja.m yaacitvaa pitaraa ``anu~n~naatosii''ti vutto pitara.m satthu santika.m aanesi. tassa pitaa satthaara.m vanditvaa ``ima.m daaraka.m pabbaajetha, bhante''ti anujaani, ta.m pabbaajetvaa bhagavaa mettaabhaavanaaya niyojesi. so mettaakamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa susaane viharanto nacirasseva mettaajhaana.m paadaka.m katvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m sacchaakaasi. arahaa hutvaapi a~n~nesa.m sosaanikabhikkhuuna.m mettaabhaavanaavidhi.m dassento ^b^``yathaapi ekaputtasmi''^eb^nti (theragaa0 33) gaatha.m abhaasi. ida.m ^a^P0.0334^ea^ vutta.m hoti -- yathaa ekaputtake piye manaape maataa pitaa ca kusalii ekantahitesii bhaveyya, eva.m puratthimaadibhedaasu sabbaasu disaasu kaamabhavaadibhedesu vaa sabbesu bhavesu daharaadibhedaasu sabbaasu avatthaasupi .thitesu sabbesu sattesu ekantahitesitaaya kusalii bhaveyya ``mitto, udaasino, paccatthiko''ti siima.m akatvaa siimaaya sambhedavasena sabbattha ekarasa.m metta.m bhaaveyyaati ima.m pana gaatha.m vatvaa ``sace tumhe aayasmanto eva.m metta.m bhaaveyyaatha, ye te bhagavataa `sukha.m supatii'tiaadinaa (a0 ni0 11.15; pari0 331; mi0 pa0 4.4.6) ekaadasa mettaanisa.msaa ca vuttaa, eka.msena tesa.m bhaagino bhavathaa''ti ovaada.m adaasi.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M2.0027^ea^ so pattaphalaadhigamo attano katapu~n~na.m paccavekkhitvaa sa~njaatasomanasso pubbacaritaapadaana.m dassento ^b^pabbhaara.m sodhayantassaa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^pabbhaara^eb^nti silaapabbatassa viveka.t.thaana.m, ta.m pabbajitaanuruupattaa i.t.thakapaakaara.m katvaa dvaarakavaa.ta.m yojetvaa bhikkhuuna.m vasanatthaaya adaasi, pakaarena bharo patthetabboti pabbhaaro, ta.m sodhayantassa mama santika.m siddhattho naama bhagavaa ^b^aagacchi^eb^ paapu.ni.

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ ^b^buddha.m upagata.m disvaa^eb^ti eva.m mama santika.m aagata.m disvaa ^b^taadino^eb^ i.t.thaani.t.thesu akampiyasabhaavattaa taadigu.nayuttassa ^b^lokaje.t.thassa^eb^ buddhassa ^b^santhara.m^eb^ ti.napa.n.naadisanthara.m ka.t.thatthara.m ^b^pa~n~naapetvaa^eb^ ni.t.thaapetvaa ^b^pupphaasana.m^eb^ pupphamaya.m aasana.m aha.m adaasi.m.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ ^b^pupphaasane^eb^ ^a^V2.0025^ea^ ^b^nisiiditvaa^eb^ti tasmi.m pa~n~natte pupphaasane nisiiditvaa lokanaayako siddhattho bhagavaa. ^b^mama~nca gatima~n~naayaa^eb^ti mayha.m gati.m aayati.m uppatti.t.thaana.m a~n~naaya jaanitvaa ^b^aniccata.m^eb^ aniccabhaava.m ^b^udaahari^eb^ kathesi.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ ^b^aniccaa vata sa"nkhaaraa^eb^ti vata ekantena sa"nkhaaraa paccayehi samecca samaagantvaa kariiyamaanaa sabbe sappaccayadhammaa hutvaa abhaava.t.thena aniccaa. ^b^uppaadavayadhammino^eb^ti uppajjitvaa vinassanasabhaavaa ^b^uppajjitvaa^eb^ paatubhavitvaa ete sa"nkhaaraa ^b^nirujjhanti^eb^ vinassantiiti attho. ^b^tesa.m vuupasamo sukho^eb^ti tesa.m sa"nkhaaraana.m visesena upasamo sukho, tesa.m vuupasamakara.m nibbaanameva ekantasukhanti attho.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ ^b^ida.m vatvaana sabba~n~nuu^eb^ti sabbadhammajaananako bhagavaa lokaana.m je.t.tho vu.d.dho naraana.m aasabho padhaano viiro ida.m aniccapa.tisa.myutta.m ^a^P0.0335^ea^ dhammadesana.m ^b^vatvaana^eb^ kathetvaa ^b^ambare^eb^ aakaase ha.msaraajaa iva ^b^nabha.m^eb^ aakaasa.m abbhuggamiiti sambandho.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ ^b^saka.m di.t.thi.m^eb^ attano laddhi.m khanti.m ruci.m ajjhaasaya.m ^b^jahitvaana^eb^ pahaaya. ^b^bhaavayaaniccasa~n~naha^eb^nti anicce aniccanti pavattasa~n~na.m aha.m bhaavayi.m va.d.dhesi.m manasi akaasi.m. ^b^tattha kaala.m kato aha^eb^nti tattha tissa.m jaatiya.m tato jaatito aha.m kaala.m kato mato.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ ^b^dve^eb^ ^a^M2.0028^ea^ ^b^sampattii anubhotvaa^eb^ti manussasampattidibbasampattisa"nkhaataa dve sampattiyo anubhavitvaa. ^b^sukkamuulena codito^eb^ti puraa.nakusalamuulena, muulabhuutena kusalena vaa codito sa~ncodito. ^b^pacchime bhave sampatte^eb^ti pariyosaane bhave sampatte paapu.nite. ^b^sapaakayonupaagami^eb^nti saka.m pacitabhatta.m sapaaka.m yoni.m upaagami.m. yassa kulassa attano pacitabhatta.m a~n~nehi abhu~njaniiya.m, tasmi.m ca.n.daalakule nibbattosmiiti attho. atha vaa saa vuccati sunakho, sunakhocchi.t.thabhattabhu~njanakaca.n.daalakule jaatoti attho. sesa.m uttaanatthamevaati.
[06] sopaakattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] ^b^aahuti.m^eb^ ^a^V2.0026^ea^ ^b^yi.t.thukaamo^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato suma"ngalattherassa apadaana.m. ayampaayasmaa purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto piyadassissa bhagavato kaale rukkhadevataa hutvaa nibbatti. so ekadivasa.m satthaara.m nhatvaa ekaciivara.m .thita.m disvaa somanassappatto appho.tesi. so tena pu~n~nena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiyaa aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m gaamake taadisena kammanissandena daliddakule nibbatti, tassa ^b^suma"ngalo^eb^ti naama.m ahosi. so vayappatto khujjakaasitana"ngalakuddaalaparikkhaaro hutvaa kasiyaa jiivika.m kappesi. so ekadivasa.m ra~n~naa pasenadinaa kosalena bhagavato bhikkhusa"nghassa ca mahaadaane pavattiyamaane daanuupakara.naani gahetvaa aagacchantehi manussehi saddhi.m dadhigha.ta.m gahetvaa aagato bhikkhuuna.m sakkaarasammaana.m disvaa ``ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa sukhumavatthanivatthaa subhojanaani bhu~njitvaa nivaatesu senaasanesu viharanti, ya.mnuunaahampi pabbajeyya''nti cintetvaa a~n~natara.m mahaathera.m upasa"nkamitvaa attano pabbajaadhippaaya.m nivedesi. so ta.m karu.naayanto pabbaajetvaa kamma.t.thaana.m ^a^P0.0336^ea^ aacikkhi. so ara~n~ne ^a^M2.0029^ea^ viharanto ekakavihaare nibbinno ukka.n.thito hutvaa vibbhamitukaamo ~naatigaama.m gacchanto antaraamagge kaccha.m bandhitvaa khetta.m kasante kili.t.thavatthanivatthe samantato rajoki.n.nasariire vaataatapena sussante khetta.m kassake manusse disvaa ``mahanta.m vatime sattaa jiivikanimitta.m dukkha.m paccanubhavantii''ti sa.mvega.m pa.tilabhi. ~naa.nassa paripaakagatattaa cassa yathaagahita.m kamma.t.thaana.m upa.t.thaasi. so a~n~natara.m rukkhamuula.m upagantvaa viveka.m labhitvaa yonisomanasikaronto vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa maggapa.tipaa.tiyaa arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ eva.m so pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassavasena pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^aahuti.m yi.t.thukaamoha^eb^ntiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^aahuti^eb^nti annapaanaadianekavidha.m puujaasakkaaruupakara.na.m. ^b^yi.t.thukaamo^eb^ti yajitukaamo, daana.m daatukaamo aha.m. ^b^pa.tiyaadetvaana bhojana^eb^nti aahaara.m pa.tiyaadetvaa nipphaadetvaa. ^b^braahma.ne pa.timaanento^eb^ti pa.tiggaahake suddhapabbajite pariyesanto. ^b^visaale maa.lake .thito^eb^ti parisuddhapa.n.darapulinatalaabhiraame vipule maa.lake .thito.

[03] 125-7^b^.^eb^ ^b^athaddasaasi.m sambuddha^eb^ntiaadiisu ^b^mahaayasa.m^eb^ mahaaparivaara.m ^b^sabbaloka.m^eb^ sakalasattaloka.m ^b^vinetaana.m^eb^ visesena netaara.m nibbaanasampaapaka.m ^b^sayambhu.m^eb^ sayameva bhuuta.m anaacariyaka.m ^a^V2.0027^ea^ ^b^aggapuggala.m^eb^ se.t.thapuggala.m bhagavanta.m bhagyavantaadigu.nayutta.m ^b^jutimanta.m^eb^ niilapiitaadipabhaasampanna.m saavakehi ^b^purakkhata.m^eb^ parivaarita.m ^b^aadiccamiva^eb^ suuriyamiva ^b^rocanta.m^eb^ sobhamaana.m ^b^rathiya.m^eb^ viithiya.m pa.tipannaka.m gacchanta.m piyadassi.m naama ^b^sambuddha.m^eb^ addasinti sambandho. ^b^a~njali.m paggahetvaanaa^eb^ti bandha~njalipu.ta.m sirasi katvaa ^b^saka.m citta.m^eb^ attano citta.m ^b^pasaadayi.m^eb^ itthambhuutassa bhagavato gu.ne pasaadesi.m pasannamakaasinti attho. ^b^manasaava nimantesi^eb^nti cittena pavaaresi.m. ^b^aagacchatu mahaamunii^eb^ti mahito puujaaraho muni bhagavaa mama nivesana.m aagacchatu.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ ^b^mama sa"nkappama~n~naayaa^eb^ti mayha.m cittasa"nkappa.m ~natvaa ^b^loke^eb^ sattaloke ^b^anuttaro^eb^ uttaravirahito satthaa ^b^khii.naasavasahassehi^eb^ arahantasahassehi ^a^M2.0030^ea^ parivuto ^b^mama dvaara.m^eb^ mayha.m gehadvaara.m ^b^upaagami^eb^ sampaapu.ni.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ tassa sampattassa satthuno eva.m namakkaaramakaasi.m. ^b^purisaaja~n~na^eb^ purisaana.m aaja~n~na, se.t.tha, mama namakkaaro ^b^te^eb^ tuyha.m ^b^atthu^eb^ bhavatu. ^b^purisuttama^eb^ purisaana.m uttama adhikagu.navisi.t.tha ^b^te^eb^ tuyha.m mama namakkaaro atthu. ^b^paasaada.m^eb^ pasaadajanaka.m mama nivesana.m ^a^P0.0337^ea^ abhiruhitvaa ^b^siihaasane^eb^ uttamaasane nisiidatanti aayaacinti attho.

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ ^b^danto dantaparivaaro^eb^ti saya.m dvaarattayena danto tathaa dantaahi bhikkhubhikkhuniiupaasakaupaasikaasa"nkhaataahi catuuhi parisaahi parivaarito. ^b^ti.n.no taarayata.m varo^eb^ti saya.m ti.n.no sa.msaarato utti.n.no nikkhanto taarayata.m taarayantaana.m visi.t.thapuggalaana.m varo uttamo bhagavaa mamaaraadhanena paasaada.m abhiruhitvaa ^b^pavaraasane^eb^ uttamaasane ^b^nisiidi^eb^ nisajja.m kappesi.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ ^b^ya.m me atthi sake gehe^eb^ti attano gehe ya.m aamisa.m ^b^paccupa.t.thita.m^eb^ sampaadita.m raasikata.m atthi. ^b^taaha.m buddhassa paadaasi^eb^nti buddhassa buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa ta.m aamisa.m paadaasi.m pa-kaarena aadarena vaa adaasinti attho. ^b^pasanno sehi paa.nibhii^eb^ti attano dviihi hatthehi passannacitto gahetvaa paadaasinti attho.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ ^b^pasannacitto^eb^ pasaaditamanasa"nkappo sumano sundaramano. ^b^vedajaato^eb^ jaatavedo uppannasomanasso ^b^kata~njalii^eb^ sirasi .thapitaa~njalipu.to ^b^buddhase.t.tha.m namassaami^eb^ se.t.thassa buddhassa pa.naama.m karomiiti attho. ^b^aho buddhassu.laarataa^eb^ti pa.tividdhacatusaccassa satthuno u.laarataa mahantabhaavo aho acchariyanti attho.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ ^b^a.t.thanna.m^eb^ ^a^V2.0028^ea^ ^b^payiruupaasata^eb^nti payirupaasantaana.m ^b^bhu~nja.m^eb^ bhu~njantaana.m a.t.thanna.m ariyapuggalaana.m antare ^b^khii.naasavaa^eb^ arahantova bahuuti attho. ^b^tuyheveso aanubhaavo^eb^ti eso aakaasacara.naummujjananimujjanaadiaanubhaavo tuyheva tuyha.m eva aanubhaavo, naa~n~nesa.m. ^b^sara.na.m ta.m upemaha^eb^nti ta.m itthambhuuta.m tuva.m sara.na.m taa.na.m le.na.m paraayananti upemi gacchaami jaanaami vaati attho.
[03] 134^b^.^eb^ lokaje.t.tho ^a^M2.0031^ea^ naraasabho piyadassii bhagavaa bhikkhusa"nghamajjhe nisiiditvaa imaa byaakara.nagaathaa abhaasatha kathesiiti attho. sesa.m suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] suma"ngalattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.
[06] dutiyassa siihaasanavaggassa va.n.nanaa samattaa.

[01] ^b^himavantassaaviduure^eb^tiaadika.m ^a^V2.0029^ea^ aayasmato subhuutittherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto ito kappasatasahassamatthake anuppanneyeva padumuttare bhagavati lokanaathe ha.msavatiinagare ^a^P0.0338^ea^ a~n~natarassa braahma.namahaasaalassa ekaputtako hutvaa nibbatti, tassa ^b^nandamaa.navo^eb^ti naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto tayo vede ugga.nhitvaa tattha saara.m apassanto attano parivaarabhuutehi catucattaaliisaaya maa.navasahassehi saddhi.m pabbatapaade isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa a.t.tha samaapattiyo pa~ncaabhi~n~naayo ca nibbattesi. antevaasikaanampi kamma.t.thaana.m aacikkhi. tepi nacirasseva jhaanalaabhino ahesu.m.

[03] tena ca samayena padumuttaro bhagavaa loke uppajjitvaa ha.msavatiinagara.m upanissaaya viharanto ekadivasa.m paccuusasamaye loka.m volokento nandataapasassa antevaasikaja.tilaana.m arahattuupanissaya.m, nandataapasassa ca dviiha"ngehi samannaagatassa saavaka.t.thaanantarassa patthana.m disvaa paatova sariirapa.tijaggana.m katvaa pubba.nhasamaye pattaciivaramaadaaya a~n~na.m ka~nci anaamantetvaa siiho viya ekacaro nandataapasassa antevaasikesu phalaaphalatthaaya gatesu ``buddhabhaava.m me jaanaatuu''ti passantasseva nandataapasassa aakaasato otaritvaa pathaviya.m pati.t.thaasi. nandataapaso buddhaanubhaava~nceva lakkha.napaaripuuri~nca disvaa lakkha.namante sammasitvaa ``imehi lakkha.nehi samannaagato naama agaara.m ajjhaavasanto raajaa hoti cakkavattii, pabbajanto loke viva.tacchedo ^a^M2.0032^ea^ sabba~n~nuu buddho hoti, aya.m purisaajaaniiyo nissa.msaya.m buddho''ti ~natvaa paccuggamana.m katvaa pa~ncapati.t.thitena vanditvaa aasana.m pa~n~naapetvaa adaasi. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. nandataapasopi attano anucchavika.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. tasmi.m samaye catucattaaliisasahassaja.tilaa pa.niitapa.niitaani ojavantaani phalaaphalaani gahetvaa aacariyassa santika.m sampattaa buddhaana~nceva aacariyassa ca nisinnaakaara.m oloketvaa aaha.msu -- ``aacariya, maya.m `imasmi.m loke tumhehi mahantataro natthii'ti vicaraama, aya.m pana puriso tumhehi mahantataro ma~n~ne''ti. nandataapaso -- ``taataa ^a^V2.0030^ea^, ki.m vadetha, tumhe saasapena saddhi.m a.t.thasa.t.thiyojanasatasahassubbedha.m sineru.m upametu.m icchatha, sabba~n~nubuddhena saddhi.m maa ma.m upamitthaa''ti aaha. atha te taapasaa -- ``sace aya.m orako abhavissa, na amhaaka.m aacariyo eva.m upama.m aahareyya. yaava mahaavataaya.m purisaajaaniiyo''ti paadesu nipatitvaa sirasaa vandi.msu. atha te aacariyo aaha -- ``taataa, amhaaka.m buddhaana.m anucchaviko deyyadhammo natthi, bhagavaa ca bhikkhaacaaravelaaya.m idhaagato, tasmaa maya.m yathaabala.m deyyadhamma.m dassaama, tumhehi ya.m ya.m pa.niita.m phalaaphala.m aabhata.m, ta.m ta.m aaharathaa''ti aaharaapetvaa sahattheneva dhovitvaa saya.m ^a^P0.0339^ea^ tathaagatassa patte pati.t.thaapesi. satthaaraa phalaaphale pa.tiggahitamatte devataa dibboja.m pakkhipi.msu. taapaso udakampi sayameva parissaavetvaa adaasi. tato bhojanakicca.m ni.t.thaapetvaa nisinne satthari sabbe antevaasike pakkositvaa satthu santike saara.niiya.m katha.m kathento nisiidi. satthaa ``bhikkhusa"ngho aagacchatuu''ti cintesi. satthu citta.m ~natvaa satasahassamattaa khii.naasavaa aagantvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa a.t.tha.msu.

[01] atha nandataapaso antevaasike aamantesi -- ``taataa, buddhaana.m nisinnaasanampi niica.m, sama.nasatasahassassapi aasana.m natthi. tumhehi ajja u.laara.m bhagavato bhikkhusa"nghassa ca sakkaara.m kaatu.m va.t.tati, pabbatapaadato va.n.nagandhasampannaani pupphaani aaharathaa''ti aaha. acinteyyattaa iddhivisayassa te muhutteneva va.n.nagandharasasampannaani pupphaani aaharitvaa buddhaana.m yojanappamaa.na.m pupphaasana.m pa~n~naapesu.m. aggasaavakaana.m tigaavuta.m, sesabhikkhuuna.m ^a^M2.0033^ea^ a.d.dhayojanaadibheda.m, sa"nghanavakassa usabhamatta.m pa~n~naapesu.m. eva.m pa~n~nattesu aasanesu nandataapaso tathaagatassa purato a~njali.m paggayha .thito, ``bhante, amhaaka.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya ima.m pupphaasana.m aaruyha nisiidathaa''ti aaha. nisiidi bhagavaa pupphaasane. eva.m nisinne satthari satthu aakaara.m ~natvaa bhikkhuu attano attano pattaasane nisiidi.msu. nandataapaso mahanta.m pupphacchatta.m gahetvaa tathaagatassa matthake dhaarento a.t.thaasi. satthaa ``taapasaana.m aya.m sakkaaro mahapphalo hotuu''ti nirodhasamaapatti.m samaapajji. satthu samaapannabhaava.m ~natvaa bhikkhuupi samaapatti.m samaapajji.msu. tathaagate sattaaha.m nirodha.m samaapajjitvaa nisinne antevaasikaa bhikkhaacaarakaale sampatte vanamuulaphalaaphala.m paribhu~njitvaa sesakaale buddhaana.m a~njali.m paggayha a.t.tha.msu. nandataapaso pana bhikkhaacaarampi agantvaa pupphacchatta.m dhaarentoyeva sattaaha.m piitisukheneva viitinaamesi.

[03] satthaa nirodhato vu.t.thaaya ara.navihaaria"ngena dakkhi.neyya"ngena caati dviihi a"ngehi samannaagata.m eka.m saavaka.m ``isiga.nassa pupphaasanaanumodana.m karohii''ti aa.naapesi. so cakkavattira~n~no santikaa pa.tiladdhamahaalaabho mahaayodho viya tu.t.thamaanaso attano visaye .thatvaa tepi.taka.m buddhavacana.m sammasitvaa ^a^V2.0031^ea^ anumodanamakaasi. tassa desanaavasaane satthaa saya.m dhamma.m desesi. satthu desanaavasaane sabbepi catucattaaliisasahassataapasaa arahatta.m paapu.ni.msu. satthaa -- ``etha bhikkhavo''ti hattha.m pasaaresi. tesa.m taavadeva kesamassuu antaradhaayi.msu ^a^P0.0340^ea^. a.t.tha parikkhaaraa sariire pa.timukkaava ahesu.m. te sa.t.thivassikattheraa viya satthaara.m parivaarayi.msu. nandataapaso pana vikkhittacittataaya visesa.m naadhiga~nchi. tassa kira ara.navihaarittherassa dhamma.m sotu.m aaraddhakaalato pa.t.thaaya -- ``aho vataahampi anaagate ekassa buddhassa saasane iminaa saavakena laddhagu.na.m labheyya''nti citta.m udapaadi. so tena vitakkena maggaphalapa.tivedha.m kaatu.m naasakkhi. tathaagata.m pana vanditvaa a~njali.m paggayha sammukhe .thito evamaaha -- ``bhante, yena bhikkhunaa isiga.nassa pupphaasanaanumodanaa kataa, ko naamaaya.m tumhaaka.m saasane''ti? ``ara.navihaaria"ngena ca dakkhi.neyya"ngena ca etadagga.t.thaana.m patto eso bhikkhuu''ti. ``bhante, yvaaya.m mayaa sattaaha.m pupphacchatta.m dhaarentena ^a^M2.0034^ea^ sakkaaro kato, tena adhikaarena a~n~na.m sampatti.m na patthemi, anaagate pana ekassa buddhassa saasane aya.m thero viya dviiha"ngehi samannaagato saavako bhaveyya''nti patthana.m akaasi.

[03] satthaa ``samijjhissati nu kho imassa taapasassa patthanaa''ti anaagata.msa~naa.na.m pesetvaa olokento kappasatasahassa.m atikkamitvaa samijjhanakabhaava.m disvaa, ``taapasa, na te aya.m patthanaa mogha.m bhavissati, anaagate kappasatasahassa.m atikkamitvaa gotamo naama buddho uppajjissati, tassa santike samijjhissatii''ti dhammakatha.m kathetvaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto aakaasa.m pakkhandi. nandataapaso yaava cakkhupatha.m na samatikkamati, taava satthu bhikkhusa"nghassa ca a~njali.m paggahetvaa a.t.thaasi. so aparabhaage kaalena kaala.m satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa dhamma.m su.nitvaa aparihiinajjhaanova kaala.m katvaa brahmaloke nibbatto. tato pana cuto aparaanipi pa~nca jaatisataani pabbajitvaa aara~n~nakova ahosi, kassapasammaasambuddhakaalepi pabbajitvaa aara~n~nako hutvaa gatapaccaagatavatta.m puuresi. eta.m kira vatta.m aparipuuretvaa mahaasaavakabhaava.m paapu.nantaa naama natthi, gatapaccaagatavatta.m pana aagama.t.thakathaasu vuttanayeneva veditabba.m. so viisativassasahassaani gatapaccaagatavatta.m puuretvaa kaala.m katvaa taavati.msadevaloke nibbatti.

[03] eva.m so taavati.msabhavane aparaapara.m uppajjanavasena dibbasampatti.m anubhavitvaa tato cuto manussaloke anekasatakkhattu.m cakkavattiraajaa padesaraajaa ca hutvaa u.laara.m manussasampatti.m anubhavitvaa amhaaka.m bhagavato uppannakaale saavatthiya.m sumanase.t.thissa gehe anaathapi.n.dikassa ^a^P0.0341^ea^ kani.t.tho hutvaa nibbatti. ^b^subhuutii^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi.

[03] tena ^a^V2.0032^ea^ ca samayena amhaaka.m bhagavaa loke uppajjitvaa pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena raajagaha.m gantvaa tattha ve.luvanapa.tiggaha.naadinaa lokaanuggaha.m karonto raajagaha.m upanissaaya siitavane vihaasi. tadaa anaathapi.n.diko se.t.thi saavatthiya.m u.t.thaanaka.m bha.n.da.m gahetvaa attano sahaayassa raajagahase.t.thino geha.m gantvaa buddhuppaada.m sutvaa satthaara.m siitavane viharanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa pa.thamadassaneneva sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaaya ^a^M2.0035^ea^ satthaara.m saavatthi.m aagamanatthaaya yaacitvaa tato pa~ncacattaaliisayojane magge yojane yojane satasahassapariccaagena vihaare pati.t.thaapetvaa saavatthiya.m a.t.thakariisappamaa.na.m jetassa kumaarassa uyyaanabhuumi.m ko.tisanthaarena ki.nitvaa tattha bhagavato vihaara.m kaaretvaa adaasi. vihaaramahadivase aya.m subhuutiku.tumbiko anaathapi.n.dikase.t.thinaa saddhi.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.nanto saddha.m pa.tilabhitvaa pabbaji. so upasampanno dve maatikaa pagu.naa katvaa kamma.t.thaana.m kathaapetvaa ara~n~ne sama.nadhamma.m karonto mettaajhaana.m nibbattetvaa ta.m paadaka.m katvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[03] so dhamma.m desento yasmaa satthaaraa desitaniyaamena anodissaka.m katvaa deseti, tasmaa ara.navihaariina.m aggo naama jaato. yasmaa ca pi.n.daaya caranto ghare ghare mettaajhaana.m samaapajjitvaa vu.t.thaaya bhikkha.m pa.tigga.nhaati ``eva.m daayakaana.m mahapphala.m bhavissatii''ti, tasmaa dakkhi.neyyaana.m aggo naama jaato. tena na.m bhagavaa ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ara.navihaariina.m dakkhi.neyyaana~nca yadida.m subhuutii''ti (a0 ni0 1.198, 201) dvaya"ngasamannaagate agga.t.thaane .thapesi. evamaya.m mahaathero attanaa puuritapaaramiina.m phalassa matthaka.m arahatta.m patvaa loke abhi~n~naato abhilakkhito hutvaa bahujanahitaaya janapadacaarika.m caranto anupubbena raajagaha.m agamaasi.
