[03] 171^b^.^eb^ navamaapadaane ^a^P0.0489^ea^ ^b^tadaaha.m maa.navo aasi^eb^nti yadaa sumedhapa.n.dito diipa"nkarabhagavato santikaa byaakara.na.m labhi, tadaa aha.m megho naama braahma.namaa.navo ^a^M2.0211^ea^ hutvaa sumedhataapasena saha isipabbajja.m ^a^V2.0210^ea^ pabbajitvaa sikkhaapadesu sikkhito kenaci paapasahaayena sa.msa.t.tho sa.msaggadosena paapavitakkaadivasa.m gato maatughaatakammavasena narake aggijaalaadidukkhamanubhavitvaa tato cuto samudde timi"ngalamahaamaccho hutvaa nibbatto, samuddamajjhe gacchanta.m mahaanaava.m gilitukaamo gato. disvaa ma.m vaa.nijaa bhiitaa ``aho gotamo bhagavaa''ti saddamaka.msu. atha mahaamaccho pubbavaasanaavasena buddhagaarava.m uppaadetvaa tato cuto saavatthiya.m vibhavasampanne braahma.nakule nibbatto saddho pasanno satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa pabbajitvaa saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.nitvaa divasassa tikkhattu.m upa.t.thaana.m gantvaa saramaano vandati. tadaa bhagavaa ``cira.m dhammarucii''ti ma.m aaha.

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ atha so thero ``sucira.m satapu~n~nalakkha.na''ntiaadiihi gaathaahi thomesi. bhante, satapu~n~nalakkha.nadhara gotama. ^b^patipubbena visuddhapaccaya^eb^nti pubbe diipa"nkarapaadamuule paripu.n.napaaramiipaccayasambhaaro su.t.thu cira.m kaala.m mayaa na di.t.tho asiiti attho. ^b^ahamajjasupekkhana^eb^nti ajja imasmi.m divase aha.m supekkhana.m sundaradassana.m, sundaradi.t.tha.m vaa ^b^nirupama.m viggaha.m^eb^ upamaarahitasariira.m gotama.m ^b^vata^eb^ ekantena ^b^passaami^eb^ dakkhaamiiti attho.

[03] 185-186^b^.^eb^ ^b^sucira.m vihatatamo mayaa^eb^ti visesena hatatamo viddha.msitamoho tva.m mayaapi su.t.thu cira.m thomitoti attho. ^b^sucirakkhena nadii visositaa^eb^ti esaa ta.nhaanadii sundararakkhena gopanena visesena sositaa, abhabbuppattikataa tayaati attho. ^b^sucira.m amala.m visodhita^eb^nti su.t.thu cira.m diighena addhunaa amala.m nibbaana.m visesena sodhita.m, su.t.thu kata.m adhigata.m tayaati attho. ^b^nayana.m ~naa.namaya.m mahaamune. cirakaalasama"ngito^eb^ti mahaamune mahaasama.na ~naa.namaya.m nayana.m dibbacakkhu.m cirakaala.m samadhigato sampatto tvanti attho. ^b^avina.t.tho punarantara^eb^nti aha.m puna antara.m antaraabhave majjhe parina.t.tho ^a^P0.0490^ea^ parihiino ahosinti attho. ^b^punarajjasamaagato tayaa^eb^ti ajja imasmi.m kaale tayaa saddhi.m punapi samaagato ekiibhuuto saha vasaamiiti attho. ^b^na hi nassanti kataani gotamaa^eb^ti gotama sabba~n~nubuddha, tayaa saddhi.m kataani samaagamaadiini ^a^M2.0212^ea^ na hi nassanti yaava khandhaparinibbaanaa na vinaa bhavissantiiti attho. sesa.m uttaanamevaati.
[06] dhammaruciyattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.
[03] dasamaapadaana.m suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] ekuunapa~n~naasamavaggava.n.nanaa samattaa.
[03] pa~n~naasamavagge ^a^V2.0211^ea^ ca ekapa~n~naasamavagge ca dvepa~n~naasamavagge ca tepa~n~naasamavagge ca sabbaani apadaanaani uttaanaanevaati.

[03] catupa~n~naasamavagge ^a^V2.0212^ea^ pa.thamaapadaane ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato mahaakaccaayanattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale gahapatimahaasaalakule nibbattitvaa vuddhippatto ekadivasa.m satthu santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaaraa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajantaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapiyamaana.m eka.m bhikkhu.m disvaa sayampi ta.m .thaanantara.m patthento pa.nidhaana.m katvaa daanaadiini pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto sumedhassa bhagavato kaale vijjaadharo hutvaa aakaasena gacchanto ekasmi.m vanasa.n.de nisinna.m bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso ka.nikaarapupphehi puuja.m akaasi.

[03] so tena pu~n~nena aparaapara.m sugatiisuyeva parivattento kassapadasabalassa kaale baaraa.nasiya.m kulagehe nibbattitvaa parinibbute bhagavati suva.n.nacetiyakamma.t.thaane satasahassagghanikaaya suva.n.ni.t.thakaaya puuja.m katvaa ``imassa nissandena nibbattanibbatta.t.thaane sariira.m me suva.n.nava.n.na.m hotuu''ti ^a^M2.0213^ea^ patthana.m akaasi. tato yaavajiiva.m kusalakamma.m katvaa eka.m buddhantara.m devamanussesu sa.msaritvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade ujjeniya.m ra~n~no ca.n.dapajjotassa purohitagehe nibbatti, tassa naamaggaha.nadivase maataa ``mayha.m ^a^P0.0491^ea^ putto suva.n.nava.n.no, attano naama.m gahetvaa aagato''ti ^b^ka~ncanamaa.navo^eb^tveva naama.m akaasi. so vuddhimanvaaya tayo vede ugga.nhitvaa pitu accayena purohita.t.thaana.m labhi. so gottavasena ^b^kaccaayano^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha. atha raajaa ca.n.dapajjoto buddhuppaada.m sutvaa, ``aacariya, tumhe tattha gantvaa satthaara.m idhaanethaa''ti pesesi. so atta.t.thamo satthu santika.m upagato tassa satthaa dhamma.m desesi, desanaapariyosaane sattahi janehi saddhi.m saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatte pati.t.thaasi.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ so eva.m pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassajaato pubbacaritaapadaana.m ^a^V2.0213^ea^ pakaasento ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadimaaha. ta.m he.t.thaa vuttatthameva. atha satthaa ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti hattha.m pasaaresi. te taavadeva dva"ngulamattakesamassuiddhimayapattaciivaradharaa vassasa.t.thikattheraa viya ahesu.m. eva.m thero sadattha.m nipphaadetvaa, ``bhante, raajaa pajjoto tumhaaka.m paade vanditu.m dhamma~nca sotu.m icchatii''ti aarocesi. satthaa ``tva.myeva, kaccaana, tattha gaccha, tayi gate raajaa pasiidissatii''ti aaha. thero satthu aa.naaya atta.t.thamo tattha gantvaa raajaana.m pasaadetvaa avantiisu saasana.m pati.t.thaapetvaa puna satthu santikameva aagato. attano pubbapatthanaavasena kaccaayanappakara.na.m mahaaniruttippakara.na.m nettippakara.nanti pakara.nattaya.m sa"nghamajjhe byaakaasi. atha santu.t.thena bhagavataa ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajantaana.m yadida.m mahaakaccaano''ti (a0 ni0 1.188, 197) etadagga.t.thaane .thapito aggaphalasukhena vihaasiiti.
[06] mahaakaccaayanattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] dutiyaapadaane ^a^M2.0214^ea^ ^b^ito satasahassamhii^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato vakkalittherassa apadaana.m. ayampi thero purimajinavaresu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbatto vi~n~nuta.m patto satthu santika.m gacchantehi upaasakehi saddhi.m vihaara.m gantvaa parisapariyante .thito dhamma.m su.nanto satthaaraa eka.m bhikkhu.m ^a^P0.0492^ea^ saddhaadhimuttaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapita.m disvaa sayampi ta.m .thaanantara.m patthento sattaaha.m buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m datvaa pa.nidhaana.m akaasi. satthaa tassa anantaraaya.m disvaa byaakari.

[03] so yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbatti, tassa ^b^vakkalii^eb^ti naama.m kari.msu. tattha ^b^kalii^eb^ti aparaadhatilakaa.lakaadidosassa adhivacana.m. niddhantasuva.n.napi.n.dasadisataaya apagato byapagato kali doso assaati va-kaaraagama.m katvaa vakkaliiti vuccati. so vuddhippatto tayo vede ugga.nhitvaa braahma.nasippesu nipphatti.m gato, satthaara.m disvaa ruupakaayasampattidassanena atitto satthaaraa saddhi.myeva vicarati. ``agaaramajjhe vasanto niccakaala.m satthu dassana.m na labhissaamii''ti ^a^V2.0214^ea^ satthu santike pabbajitvaa .thapetvaa bhojanakaala.m sariirakiccakaala~nca sesakaale yattha .thitena sakkaa dasabala.m passitu.m, tattha .thito a~n~na.m kicca.m pahaaya bhagavanta.m olokentoyeva viharati. satthaa tassa ~naa.naparipaaka.m aagamento bahukaala.m tasmi.m ruupadassaneneva vicarante ki~nci avatvaa punekadivasa.m -- ``ki.m te, vakkali, iminaa puutikaayena di.t.thena? yo kho, vakkali, dhamma.m passati, so ma.m passati; yo ma.m passati, so dhamma.m passati. dhamma~nhi, vakkali, passanto ma.m passatii''ti (sa.m0 ni0 3.87) aaha. satthari eva.m vadantepi thero satthu dassana.m pahaaya a~n~nattha gantu.m na sakkoti. tato satthaa, ``naaya.m bhikkhu sa.mvega.m alabhitvaa bujjhissatii''ti vassuupanaayikadivase -- ``apehi, vakkalii''ti thera.m pa.naamesi. so satthaaraa pa.naamito satthu sammukhe .thaatu.m asakkonto -- ``ki.m mayha.m jiivitena, yoha.m satthaara.m da.t.thu.m na labhaamii''ti gijjhakuu.te pabbate papaata.t.thaana.m ^a^M2.0215^ea^ abhiruhi? satthaa tassa ta.m pavatti.m ~natvaa -- ``aya.m bhikkhu mama santikaa assaasa.m alabhanto maggaphalaana.m upanissaya.m naaseyyaa''ti attaana.m dassetvaa obhaasa.m vissajjento --
[21] ``paamojjabahulo bhikkhu, pasanno buddhasaasane.
[22] adhigacche pada.m santa.m, sa"nkhaaruupasama.m sukha''nti.. (dha0 pa0 381) --

[25] gaatha.m vatvaa ``ehi, vakkalii''ti (dha0 pa0 a.t.tha0 2.381) hattha.m pasaaresi. thero ``dasabalo me di.t.tho, `ehii'ti avhaayanampi laddha''nti balavapiitisomanassa.m uppaadetvaa ``kuto gacchaamii''ti attano gamanabhaava.m ajaanitvaava satthu sammukhe ^a^P0.0493^ea^ aakaase pakkhanditvaa pa.thamena paadena pabbate .thitoyeva satthaaraa vuttagaathaayo aavajjento aakaaseyeva piiti.m vikkhambhetvaa saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.niiti a"nguttara.t.thakathaaya.m (a0 ni0 a.t.tha0 1.1.208) dhammapadava.n.nanaaya~nca (dha0 pa0 a.t.tha0 2.381 vakkalittheravatthu) aagata.m.

[03] idha pana eva.m veditabba.m -- ``ki.m te, vakkalii''tiaadinaa satthaaraa ovadito gijjhakuu.te viharanto vipassana.m pa.t.thapesi, tassa saddhaaya balavabhaavato eva vipassanaa viithi.m na otarati? bhagavaa ta.m ~natvaa kamma.t.thaana.m sodhetvaa adaasi. so puna vipassana.m matthaka.m paapetu.m naasakkhiyeva. athassa aahaaravekallena vaataabaadho uppajji, ta.m vaataabaadhena pii.liyamaana.m ~natvaa bhagavaa tattha gantvaa pucchanto --
[21] ``vaatarogaabhiniito ^a^V2.0215^ea^ tva.m, vihara.m kaanane vane.
[22] paviddhagocare luukhe, katha.m bhikkhu karissasii''ti.. (theragaa0 350) --
[25] aaha. ta.m sutvaa thero --
[21] ``piitisukhena vipulena, pharamaano samussaya.m.
[22] luukhampi abhisambhonto, viharissaami kaanane..
[21] ``bhaavento satipa.t.thaane, indriyaani balaani ca.
[22] bojjha"ngaani ca bhaavento, viharissaami kaanane..
[21] ``aaraddhaviiriye pahitatte, nicca.m da.lhaparakkame.
[22] samagge sahite disvaa, viharissaami kaanane..
[21] ``anussaranto ^a^M2.0216^ea^ sambuddha.m, agga.m danta.m samaahita.m.
[22] atandito rattindiva.m, viharissaami kaanane''ti.. (theragaa0 351-354) --
[25] catasso gaathaayo abhaasi. taasa.m attho theragaathaava.n.nanaaya.m (theragaa0 a.t.tha0 2.351-354) vuttoyeva. eva.m thero vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ so arahatta.m patvaa attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassajaato pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^ito satasahassamhii^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^ito^eb^ti kakusandhaadiina.m uppannabhaddakappato he.t.thaa kappasatasahassamatthaketi attho.
[03] 29^b^.^eb^ ^b^padumaakaaravadano^eb^ti supupphitapadumasassiriikamukho. ^b^padumapattakkho^eb^ti setapadumapupphapa.n.nasadisaakkhiiti attho.
[03] 30^b^.^eb^ ^b^padumuttaragandhovaa^eb^ti padumagandhamukhoti attho.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ ^b^andhaana.m^eb^ ^a^P0.0494^ea^ ^b^nayanuupamo^eb^ti cakkhuvirahitaana.m sattaana.m nayanasadiso, dhammadesanaaya sabbasattaana.m ^a^V2.0216^ea^ pa~n~naacakkhaadicakkhudaayakoti attho. ^b^santaveso^eb^ti santasabhaavo santairiyaapatho. ^b^gu.nanidhii^eb^ti gu.naana.m nidhi, sabbagu.naga.naana.m nidhaana.t.thaanabhuutoti attho. ^b^karu.naamatiaakaro^eb^ti saadhuuna.m cittakampanasa"nkhaataaya karu.naaya ca atthaanatthaminanaparicchinnamatiyaa ca aakaro aadhaarabhuuto.
[03] 32^b^.^eb^ ^b^brahmaasurasuraccito^eb^ti brahmehi ca asurehi ca devehi ca accito puujitoti attho.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ ^b^madhurena rutena caa^eb^ti karaviikarutamadhurena saddena sakala.m jana.m ra~njayantiiti sambandho. ^b^santhavii saavaka.m saka^eb^nti attano saavaka.m madhuradhammadesanaaya santhavii, thuti.m akaasiiti attho.
[03] 34^b^.^eb^ ^b^saddhaadhimutto^eb^ti saddahanasaddhaaya saasane adhimutto pati.t.thitoti attho. ^b^mama dassanalaalaso^eb^ti mayha.m dassane byaava.to tapparo.
[03] 35^b^.^eb^ ^b^ta.m^eb^ ^a^M2.0217^ea^ ^b^.thaanamabhirocayi^eb^nti ta.m saddhaadhimutta.t.thaanantara.m abhirocayi.m, icchi.m patthesinti attho.
[03] 40^b^.^eb^ ^b^piitama.t.thanivaasana^eb^nti sili.t.thasuva.n.nava.n.navatthe nivatthanti attho. ^b^hemaya~n~nopacita"nga^eb^nti suva.n.napaama"ngalaggitagattanti attho.

[03] 47-48^b^.^eb^ ^b^noniitasukhumaala.m ma^eb^nti navaniitamiva mudutalu.nahatthapaada.m. ^b^jaatapallavakomala^eb^nti asokapallavapattakomalamiva mudukanti attho. ^b^pisaaciibhayatajjitaa^eb^ti tadaa eva.mbhuuta.m kumaara.m ma.m a~n~naa pisaacii ekaa rakkhasii bhayena tajjesi bhi.msaapesiiti attho. tadaa ^b^mahesissa^eb^ sammaasambuddhassa paadamuule ma.m ^b^saayesu.m^eb^ nipajjaapesu.m. ^b^diinamaanasaa^eb^ bhiitacittaa mama maataapitaro ^b^ima.m^eb^ daaraka.m te dadaama, imassa ^b^sara.na.m^eb^ pati.t.thaa hotu naatha naayakaati sambandho.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ ^b^tadaa pa.tiggahi so ma^eb^nti so bhagavaa tadaa tasmi.m mama maatuyaa dinnakaale ^b^jaalinaa^eb^ jaalayuttena sa"nkhaalakena cakkalakkha.naadiihi ^a^P0.0495^ea^ lakkhitena ^b^mudukomalapaa.ninaa^eb^ mudukena visuddhena hatthatalena ma.m aggahesiiti attho.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbapaaramisambhuuta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0217^ea^ sabbehi daanapaaramitaadiihi sambhuuta.m jaata.m. ^b^niilakkhinayana.m vara.m^eb^ pu~n~nasambhaaraja.m uttamaniilaakkhivanta.m. ^b^sabbasubhaaki.n.na.m^eb^ sabbena subhena va.n.nena sa.n.thaanena aaki.n.na.m gahaniibhuuta.m ^b^ruupa.m^eb^ bhagavato hatthapaadasiisaadiruupa.m disvaati attho, titti.m apatto viharaami ahanti sambandho.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ ^b^tadaa ma.m cara.nantago^eb^ti tasmi.m mayha.m arahatta.m pattakaale siilaadipannarasanna.m cara.nadhammaana.m antago, pariyosaanappatto paripuurakaariiti attho. ``mara.nantago''tipi paa.tho. tassa mara.nassa anta.m nibbaana.m pattoti attho. saddhaadhimuttaana.m agga.m pa~n~napesiiti sambandho. atha satthaa bhikkhusa"nghamajjhe nisinno ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m saddhaadhimuttaana.m yadida.m, vakkalii''ti (a0 ni0 1.198, 208) ma.m etadagga.t.thaane .thapesiiti vutta.m hoti. sesa.m suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] vakkalittheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] ^b^padumuttaro^eb^ ^a^M2.0218^ea^ ^b^naama jino^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato kappinattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbatto vi~n~nuta.m patvaa satthu santike dhammadesana.m su.nanto satthaaraa eka.m bhikkhu.m ovaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapita.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi.

[03] so tattha yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto baaraa.nasito aviduure ekasmi.m pesakaaragaame je.t.thapesakaaragehe nibbatto tadaa sahassamattaa paccekabuddhaa himavante a.t.tha maase vasitvaa vassike cattaaro maase janapade vasanti. te ekavaara.m baaraa.nasiyaa aviduure otaritvaa ``senaasana.m kara.natthaaya hatthakamma.m yaacathaa''ti ra~n~no santika.m a.t.tha paccekabuddhe pahi.ni.msu. tadaa pana ra~n~no vappama"ngala.m ahosi. so ``paccekabuddhaa ^a^P0.0496^ea^ kira aagataa''ti sutvaa nikkhamitvaa aagatakaara.na.m pucchitvaa ``ajja, bhante, okaaso natthi sve amhaaka.m vappama"ngala.m ^a^V2.0218^ea^, tatiyadivase karissaamaa''ti vatvaa paccekabuddhe animantetvaava paavisi. paccekabuddhaa ``a~n~na.m gaama.m pavisissaamaa''ti pakkami.msu.

[03] tasmi.m samaye je.t.thapesakaarassa bhariyaa kenacideva kara.niiyena baaraa.nasi.m gacchantii te paccekabuddhe disvaa vanditvaa, ``ki.m, bhante, avelaaya ayyaa aagataa''ti pucchi. te aadito pa.t.thaaya kathesu.m. ta.m sutvaa saddhaasampannaa buddhisampannaa itthii ``sve, bhante, amhaaka.m bhikkha.m ga.nhathaa''ti nimantesi. ``bahukaa maya.m, bhaginii''ti. ``kittakaa, bhante''ti? ``sahassamattaa, bhaginii''ti. ``bhante, imasmi.m no gaame sahassamattaa vasimhaa, ekeko ekekassa bhikkha.m dassati, bhikkha.m adhivaasetha, ahameva vo vasana.t.thaana.m kaaraapessaamii''ti aaha. paccekabuddhaa adhivaasesu.m.

[03] saa gaama.m pavisitvaa ugghosesi -- ``ammataataa, aha.m sahassamatte paccekabuddhe disvaa nimantesi.m, ayyaana.m nisiidana.t.thaana.m sa.mvidahatha, yaagubhattaadiini sampaadethaa''ti gaamamajjhe ma.n.dapa.m kaaraapetvaa aasanaani pa~n~naapetvaa punadivase paccekabuddhe nisiidaapetvaa pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena parivisitvaa bhattakiccapariyosaane tasmi.m gaame sabbaa itthiyo ^a^M2.0219^ea^ aadaaya taahi saddhi.m paccekabuddhe vanditvaa temaasa.m vasanatthaaya pa.ti~n~na.m ga.nhitvaa puna gaame ugghosesi -- ``ammataataa, ekekakulato ekekapuriso vaasipharasuaadiini gahetvaa ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa dabbasambhaare aaharitvaa ayyaana.m vasana.t.thaana.m karotuu''ti. gaamavaasino tassaayeva vacana.m sutvaa ekeko ekeka.m katvaa saddhi.m rattidivaa.t.thaanehi pa.n.nasaalasahassa.m ni.t.thaapetvaa attano attano pa.n.nasaalaaya.m upagata.m paccekabuddha.m ``aha.m sakkacca.m upa.t.thahissaami, aha.m sakkacca.m upa.t.thahissaamii''ti vatvaa upa.t.thahi.msu. saa vassa.mvu.t.thakaale ``attano attano pa.n.nasaalaaya vassa.mvu.t.thaana.m paccekabuddhaana.m ciivarasaa.take sajjethaa''ti samaadapetvaa ekekassa sahassa sahassamuula.m ciivara.m daapesi. paccekabuddhaa vu.t.thavassaa anumodana.m katvaa pakkami.msu. gaamavaasinopi ida.m pu~n~nakamma.m katvaa tato cuto taavati.msadevaloke nibbattitvaa ga.nadevataa naama ahesu.m.

[03] te tattha dibbasampatti.m anubhavitvaa kassapasammaasambuddhakaale ku.tumbikagehesu nibbatti.msu. pubbe je.t.thakapesakaaro je.t.thakaku.tumbikassa putto ahosi. bhariyaapissa ekassa je.t.thakaku.tumbikassa dhiitaa ahosi. sesaana.m bhariyaayo sesaku.tumbikaana.m dhiitaro ^a^P0.0497^ea^ ahesu.m, taa sabbaapi vayappattaa parakula.m gacchantiyo tesa.m tesa.myeva gehaani agama.msu. athekadivasa.m vihaare dhammassavane sa"nghu.t.the ``satthaa dhamma.m desessatii''ti sutvaa te sabbepi ku.tumbikaa ``dhamma.m sossaamaa''ti ^a^V2.0219^ea^ bhariyaahi saddhi.m vihaara.m agama.msu. tesa.m vihaaramajjha.m pavi.t.thakkha.ne vassa.m vassi. yesa.m kuluupakaa vaa ~naatisaama.neraadayo vaa atthi, te tesa.m parive.naadiini pavisi.msu. te pana tathaaruupaana.m natthitaaya katthaci pavisitu.m avisahantaa vihaaramajjheyeva a.t.tha.msu. atha ne je.t.thakaku.tumbiko aaha -- ``passatha, bho, amhaaka.m vippakaara.m, kulaputtehi naama ettakena lajjitu.m yutta''nti. ``ayya, ki.m karomaa''ti? ``maya.m vissaasika.t.thaanassa abhaavena ima.m vippakaara.m pattaa, sabbe dhana.m sa.mharitvaa parive.na.m karissaamaa''ti. ``saadhu, ayyaa''ti je.t.thako sahassa.m adaasi. sesaa pa~nca pa~nca sataani. itthiyo a.d.dhateyyaani a.d.dhateyyaani sataani. te ta.m dhana.m aaharitvaa sahassakuu.taagaaraparivaara.m satthu vasanatthaaya mahaaparive.na.m naama ^a^M2.0220^ea^ kaaraapesu.m. navakammassa mahantataaya dhane appahonte pubbe dinnadhanato puna upa.d.dhuupa.d.dha.m ada.msu. ni.t.thite parive.ne vihaaramaha.m karontaa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m datvaa viisatiyaa bhikkhusahassaana.m ciivaraani sajjayi.msu.

[03] je.t.thakaku.tumbikassa pana bhariyaa attano pa~n~naaya .thitaa aha.m tehi samaka.m akatvaa atirekatara.m katvaa ``satthaara.m puujessaamii''ti anojapupphava.n.nena sahassamuulena saa.takena saddhi.m anojapupphaca"nko.taka.m gahetvaa satthaara.m anojapupphehi puujetvaa ta.m saa.taka.m satthu paadamuule .thapetvaa, ``bhante, nibbattanibbatta.t.thaane anojapupphava.n.na.myeva me sariira.m hotu, anojaatveva ca naama.m hotuu''ti patthana.m akaasi. satthaa ``eva.m hotuu''ti anumodana.m akaasi. te sabbepi yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa tato cutaa devaloke nibbatti.msu. te imasmi.m buddhuppaade devalokaa cavitvaa je.t.thako kukku.tavatiinagare raajakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto mahaakappinaraajaa naama ahosi. sesaa amaccakulesu nibbatti.msu. je.t.thakassa bhariyaa maddara.t.the saakalanagare raajakule nibbatti anojapupphava.n.namevassaa sariira.m ahosi, tena ^b^anojaa^eb^tvevassaa naama.m aka.msu, saa vayappattaa mahaakappinara~n~no geha.m gantvaa ^b^anojaadevii^eb^ti paaka.taa ahosi.

[03] sesitthiyopi amaccakulesu nibbattitvaa vayappattaa tesa.myeva amaccaputtaana.m ^a^P0.0498^ea^ gehaani agama.msu. te sabbepi ra~n~no sampattisadisa.m sampatti.m anubhavi.msu. yadaa hi raajaa ala"nkaarapa.tima.n.dito hatthi.m abhiruhitvaa vicarati, tadaapi te tatheva vicaranti. tasmi.m assena vaa rathena vaa vicarante tepi tatheva vicaranti. eva.m te ekato hutvaa kataana.m pu~n~naana.m balena ekatova sampatti.m anubhavi.msu. ra~n~no pana vaalo, vaalavaahano, puppho, pupphavaahano, supattoti pa~nceva assaa honti. tesu raajaa supatta.m assa.m saya.m aarohati, itare cattaaro asse assaarohaana.m saasanaahara.natthaaya adaasi. raajaa te paatova bhojetvaa ``gacchatha ^a^V2.0220^ea^, bha.ne, dve vaa tii.ni vaa yojanaani aahi.n.ditvaa buddhassa vaa dhammassa vaa sa"nghassa vaa uppannabhaava.m sutvaa mayha.m sukhasaasana.m ^a^M2.0221^ea^ aarocethaa''ti pesesi. te catuuhi dvaarehi nikkhamitvaa dve tii.ni yojanaani aahi.n.ditvaa ki~nci saasana.m alabhitvaava paccaagami.msu.

[03] athekadivasa.m raajaa supatta.m aaruhitvaa amaccasahassaparivuto uyyaana.m gacchanto kilantaruupe pa~ncasatamatte vaa.nijake nagara.m pavisante disvaa ``ime addhaanakilantaa, addho imesa.m santikaa eka.m bhaddaka.m saasana.m sossaamii''ti te pakkosaapetvaa ``kuto aagatatthaa''ti pucchi. ``atthi, deva, ito viisatiyojanasatamatthake saavatthi naama nagara.m, tato aagatamhaa''ti. ``atthi pana vo dese ki~nci saasana.m uppanna''nti. ``deva, a~n~na.m ki~nci natthi, sammaasambuddho uppanno''ti. raajaa taavadeva balavapiitiyaa phu.t.thasariiro ki~nci sallakkhetu.m asakkonto muhutta.m viitinaametvaa pana, ``taataa, ki.m vadethaa''ti pucchi. ``buddho, deva, uppanno''ti. raajaa dutiyampi tatiyampi tatheva viitinaametvaa catutthavaare ``ki.m vadetha, taataa''ti pucchitvaa ``buddho uppanno''ti vutte, ``taataa, sukhasaasanasavanaaya satasahassa.m vo dammii''ti vatvaa ``aparampi ki~nci saasana.m atthi, taataa''ti pucchi. ``atthi, deva, dhammo uppanno''ti. raajaa tampi sutvaa purimanayeneva tayo vaare viitinaametvaa catutthavaare ``dhammo uppanno''ti vutte -- ``idhaapi vo satasahassa.m dammii''ti vatvaa ``aparampi ki~nci saasana.m atthi, taataa''ti pucchi. ``atthi, deva, sa"ngho uppanno''ti. raajaa tampi sutvaa tatheva tayo vaare viitinaametvaa catutthavaare ``sa"ngho uppanno''ti vutte -- ``idhaapi vo satasahassa.m dammii''ti vatvaa amaccasahassa.m oloketvaa, ``taataa, ki.m karissaamaa''ti pucchi. ``deva, tumhe ki.m karissathaa''ti? ``aha.m, taataa, `buddho uppanno dhammo uppanno sa"ngho uppanno'ti sutvaa na puna nivattissaami, bhagavanta.m uddissa gantvaa tassa santike pabbajissaamii''ti. ``mayampi, deva, tumhehi saddhi.m pabbajissaamaa''ti. raajaa suva.n.napa.t.te ^a^P0.0499^ea^ akkharaani likhaapetvaa vaa.nijakaana.m datvaa ``ima.m anojaaya naama deviyaa detha, saa tumhaaka.m tii.ni satasahassaani dassati, eva~nca pana na.m vadeyyaatha `ra~n~naa kira te issariya.m vissa.t.tha.m, yathaasukha.m sampatti.m paribhu~njaahii'ti, sace pana `vo raajaa kaha'nti pucchati, `satthaara.m uddissa pabbajissaamii'ti vatvaa gatoti aaroceyyaathaa''ti aaha. amaccaapi attano attano bhariyaana.m tatheva ^a^M2.0222^ea^ saasana.m pahi.ni.msu. raajaa vaa.nijake uyyojetvaa assa.m abhiruyha amaccasahassaparivuto ta.mkha.na~n~neva nikkhami.

[03] satthaapi ta.mdivasa.m paccuusakaale loka.m volokento mahaakappinaraajaana.m saparivaara.m disvaa ``aya.m ^a^V2.0221^ea^ mahaakappino vaa.nijakaana.m santikaa ti.n.na.m ratanaana.m uppannabhaava.m sutvaa tesa.m vacana.m tiihi satasahassehi puujetvaa rajja.m pahaaya amaccasahassaparivuto ma.m uddissa pabbajitukaamo sve nikkhamissati, so saparivaaro saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.nissati, paccuggamana.m karissaamii''ti punadivase cakkavattii viya khuddakagaamabhojaka.m raajaana.m paccuggacchanto sayameva pattaciivaramaadaaya viisayojanasata.m magga.m paccuggantvaa candabhaagaaya nadiyaa tiire nigrodharukkhamuule chabba.n.nabuddharasmiyo vissajjetvaa nisiidi. raajaapi aagacchanto eka.m nadi.m patvaa ``kaa naamaaya''nti pucchi. ``aparacchaa naama, devaa''ti. ``kimassaa parimaa.na.m, taataa''ti? ``gambhiirato gaavuta.m, puthulato dve gaavutaani, devaa''ti. ``atthi panettha naavaa vaa u.lumpo vaa''ti? ``natthi, devaa''ti. ``naavaadiini olokente amhe jaati jara.m upaneti, jaraa mara.na.m. aha.m nibbematiko hutvaa tii.ni ratanaani uddissa nikkhanto, tesa.m me aanubhaavena `ida.m udaka.m udaka.m viya maa hotuu'ti ratanattayassa gu.na.m aavajjetvaa `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho'''ti buddhagu.na.m anussaranto saparivaaro assasahassena udakapi.t.the pakkhandi. sindhavaa pi.t.thipaasaa.ne viya pakkhandi.msu. khuraana.m agga.t.thaaneva temi.msu.

[03] so ta.m uttaritvaa purato gacchanto aparampi nadi.m disvaa ``aya.m kaa naamaa''ti pucchi. ``niilavaahaa naama, devaa''ti. ``kimassaa parimaa.na''nti? ``gambhiiratopi puthulatopi a.d.dhayojana.m, devaa''ti. sesa.m purimasadisameva. ta.m pana nadi.m disvaa ``svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo''ti dhammaanussati.m anussaranto pakkhandi. tampi atikkamitvaa gacchanto aparampi nadi.m disvaa ``aya.m kaa naamaa''ti pucchi. ``candabhaagaa ^a^P0.0500^ea^ naama, devaa''ti. ``kimassaa parimaa.na''nti? ``gambhiiratopi puthulatopi yojana.m, devaa''ti. sesa.m purimasadisameva. ta.m pana nadi.m disvaa ``suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho''ti sa"nghaanussati.m anussaranto ^a^M2.0223^ea^ pakkhandi. tampi nadi.m atikkamitvaa gacchanto satthu sariirato nikkhantaa chabba.n.nabuddharasmiyo nigrodharukkhassa saakhaavi.tapapalaasaani obhaasayamaanaa disvaa cintesi -- ``aya.m obhaaso neva candassa, na suuriyassa, na devamaarabraahma.nasupa.n.nanaagaana.m a~n~natarassa, addhaa aha.m satthaara.m uddissa aagacchanto sammaasambuddhena di.t.tho bhavissaamii''ti. so taavadeva assapi.t.thito otaritvaa onatasariiro rasmiyaanusaarena satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa manosilaarase nimujjanto viya buddharasmiina.m anto paavisi. so satthaara.m vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi saddhi.m amaccasahassena. satthaa tesa.m anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi. desanaapariyosaane saparivaaro raajaa sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi.

[03] atha ^a^V2.0222^ea^ sabbe u.t.thahitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci.msu. satthaa ``aagamissati nu kho imesa.m kulaputtaana.m iddhimayapattaciivara''nti upadhaarento ``ime kulaputtaa paccekabuddhasahassaana.m ciivarasahassa.m ada.msu, kassapabuddhakaale viisatiyaa bhikkhusahassaana.m viisaticiivarasahassaanipi ada.msu, anacchariya.m imesa.m kulaputtaana.m iddhimayapattaciivaraagamana''nti ~natvaa dakkhi.nahattha.m pasaaretvaa ``etha, bhikkhavo, caratha brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti aaha. te taavadeva a.t.thaparikkhaaradharaa vassasa.t.thikattheraa viya hutvaa vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa paccorohitvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu.

[03] te pana vaa.nijakaa raajageha.m gantvaa deviyaa ra~n~naa pahitasaasana.m aarocetvaa deviyaa ``aagacchantuu''ti vutte pavisitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. atha ne devii pucchi -- ``taataa, ki.mkaara.naa aagatatthaa''ti? ``maya.m ra~n~naa tumhaaka.m santika.m pesitaa, tii.ni kira no satasahassaani dethaa''ti. ``bahu.m, bha.ne, bha.natha, ki.m tumhehi ra~n~no santike kata.m, kismi.m vo raajaa pasanno ettaka.m dhana.m daapetii''ti? ``devi, na a~n~na.m ki~nci kata.m, eka.m pana saasana.m aarocayimhaa''ti. ``sakkaa pana, taataa, mayhampi ta.m aarocetu''nti. ``sakkaa, devii''ti suva.n.nabhi"ngaarena mukha.m vikkhaaletvaa ``devi, buddho loke uppanno''ti. saapi ta.m sutvaa piitiyaa phu.t.thasariiraa tikkhattu.m ki~nci asallakkhetvaa catutthavaare ``buddho uppanno''ti sutvaa ``ki.m, taataa, imasmi.m pade ra~n~naa dinna''nti ^a^P0.0501^ea^? ``satasahassa.m, devii''ti. ``taataa, ananucchavika.m ra~n~naa kata.m evaruupa.m saasana.m ^a^M2.0224^ea^ sutvaa tumhaaka.m satasahassadadamaanena, aha.m vo mama duggatapa.n.naakaare tii.ni satasahassaani dammi. apara.m ki~nci tumhehi aarocita''nti? te ida~nca ida~ncaati itaraanipi dve saasanaani aarocesu.m. devii purimanayeneva tayo tayo vaare asallakkhetvaa catutthacatutthavaare tii.ni tii.ni satasahassaani adaasi. eva.m te sabbaani dvaadasasatasahassaani labhi.msu.

[03] atha ne devii pucchi -- ``raajaa kaha.m, taataa''ti? ``devi, raajaa `satthaara.m uddissa pabbajissaamii'ti vatvaa gato''ti. ``mayha.m tena ki.m saasana.m dinna''nti? ``sabba.m kira issariya.m tumhaaka.m vissa.t.tha.m, `tumhe kira yathaasukha.m sampatti.m anubhavathaa'''ti. ``amaccaa pana kuhi.m, taataa''ti? ``tepi ra~n~naa saddhi.m `pabbajissaamaa'ti gataa, devii''ti. saa tesa.m bhariyaayo pakkosaapetvaa, ``ammaa, tumhaaka.m saamikaa ra~n~naa saddhi.m `pabbajissaamaa'ti gataa, tumhe ki.m karissathaa''ti? ``ki.m pana tehi amhaaka.m saasana.m pahita.m, devii''ti? ``tehi kira attano sampatti tumhaaka.m vissa.t.thaa `tumhe kira sampatti.m yathaasukha.m paribhu~njathaa'''ti. ``tumhe pana, devi, ki.m ^a^V2.0223^ea^ karissathaa''ti? ``amhaaka.m so taava raajaa magge .thito tiihi satasahassehi tii.ni ratanaani puujetvaa khe.lapi.n.da.m viya sampatti.m pahaaya `pabbajissaamii'ti nikkhanto, mayaapi ti.n.na.m ratanaana.m saasana.m sutvaa taani navahi satasahassehi puujitaani, na kho panesaa sampatti naama ra~n~noyeva dukkhaa, mayhampi dukkhaa eva. ko ra~n~naa cha.d.ditakhe.lapi.n.da.m ja.n.nukehi bhuumiya.m pati.t.thahitvaa mukhena ga.nhissati, na mayha.m sampattiyaa attho, satthaara.m uddissa pabbajissaamii''ti. ``devi, mayampi tumhehi saddhi.m pabbajissaamaa''ti. ``sace sakkotha, saadhuu''ti. ``sakkoma, devii''ti. tena hi ``ethaa''ti rathasahassa.m yojaapetvaa ratha.m aaruyha taahi saddhi.m nikkhamitvaa antaraamagge pa.thama.m nadi.m disvaa yathaa ra~n~naa pa.thama.m pucchitaa, tatheva pucchitvaa sabba.m pavatti.m sutvaa ``ra~n~naa gatamagga.m olokethaa''ti vatvaa ``sindhavaana.m padavala~nja.m na passaamaa''ti vutte raajaa ``tii.ni ratanaani uddissa nikkhantosmii''ti saccakiriya.m karitvaa ti.n.na.m ratanaana.m gu.ne anussaritvaa gato bhavissati ^a^P0.0502^ea^, ahampi tii.ni ratanaani uddissa nikkhantaa, tesa.m me aanubhaavena ``ida.m udaka.m udaka.m viya maa hotuu''ti ti.n.na.m ratanaana.m gu.ne anussarantii rathasahassa.m ^a^M2.0225^ea^ pesesi. udaka.m pi.t.thipaasaa.nasadisa.m ahosi, cakkaana.m agga.t.thaaneva temi.msu. eteneva upaayena itaraa dvepi nadiyo uttari.msu.

[03] satthaa taasa.m aagatabhaava.m ~natvaa yathaa taa attano santike nisinne saamike bhikkhuu na passanti, tathaa adhi.t.thaasi. deviipi aagacchantii satthu sariirato nikkhantaa rasmiyo disvaa tatheva cintetvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa, vanditvaa ekamanta.m .thitaa pucchi -- ``bhante, mahaakappino raajaa tumhe uddissa nikkhamitvaa gato, kaha.m nu kho so, amhaaka.m ta.m dassethaa''ti. ``nisiidatha taava, idheva na.m passissathaa''ti. taa sabbaapi ha.t.thatu.t.thaa ``idheva kira nisinnaa saamike no passissaamaa''ti nisiidi.msu. satthaa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi. anojaadevii desanaapariyosaane taahi saddhi.m sotaapattiphala.m paapu.ni. mahaakappino thero taasa.m desiyamaana.m dhammadesana.m sutvaa saparivaaro saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni. tasmi.m kha.ne satthaa taasa.m te bhikkhuu dassesi. taasa~nhi aagatakkha.neyeva attano saamike kaasaavadhare mu.n.dasiise disvaa citta.m ekagga.m na bhaveyya, maggaphala.m nibbattetu.m sakkaa na bhaveyya. tasmaa acalasaddhaaya pati.t.thitakaalato pa.t.thaaya taasa.m te bhikkhuu arahattappatte dassesi. taapi te disvaa pa~ncapati.t.thitena vanditvaa, ``bhante, tumhaaka.m pabbajitakicca.m matthakappatta''nti vatvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa ekamanta.m .thatvaa pabbajja.m yaaci.msu.

[03] eva.m vutte satthaa uppalava.n.naaya theriyaa aagamana.m cintesi. saa satthu cintitakkha.neyeva aakaasenaagantvaa ^a^V2.0224^ea^ taa sabbaa itthiyo gahetvaa aakaasena bhikkhunupassaya.m netvaa pabbaajesi. taa sabbaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni.msu. satthaa bhikkhusahassa.m aadaaya aakaasena jetavana.m agamaasi. tatra suda.m aayasmaa mahaakappino ratti.t.thaanaadiisu ``aho sukha.m, aho sukha''nti udaana.m udaanento vicarati. bhikkhuu bhagavato aarocesu.m -- ``bhante, mahaakappino `aho sukha.m, aho sukha'nti udaana.m udaanento vicarati, attano rajjasukha.m aarabbha udaaneti ma~n~ne''ti. satthaa ta.m pakkosaapetvaa -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, kappina, kaamasukha.m aarabbha udaana.m udaanesii''ti? ``bhagavaa me, bhante, ta.m aarabbha udaanabhaava.m vaa a~n~na.m aarabbha udaanabhaava.m vaa jaanaatii''ti. atha satthaa -- ``na, bhikkhave, mama putto kaamasukha.m rajjasukha.m aarabbha udaana.m udaaneti, puttassa ^a^M2.0226^ea^ pana me dhamma.m carato dhammapiiti naama uppajjati, so amatamahaanibbaana.m ^a^P0.0503^ea^ aarabbha eva.m udaana.m udaanesii''ti anusandhi.m gha.tetvaa dhamma.m desento ima.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``dhammapiiti sukha.m seti, vippasannena cetasaa.
[22] ariyappavedite dhamme, sadaa ramati pa.n.dito''ti.. (dha0 pa0 79).

[03] athekadivasa.m satthaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``kacci, bhikkhave, kappino bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m desetii''ti? ``appossukko, bhante, di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m anuyutto viharati, ovaadamattampi na detii''ti. satthaa thera.m pakkosaapetvaa -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, kappina, antevaasikaana.m ovaadamattampi na desii''ti? ``sacca.m, bhagavaa''ti. ``braahma.na, maa eva.m akaasi, ajja pa.t.thaaya upagataana.m bhikkhuuna.m dhamma.m desehii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante''ti thero bhagavato vacana.m sirasaa sampa.ticchitvaa ekovaadeneva sama.nasahassa.m arahatte pati.t.thaapesi. tena na.m satthaa pa.tipaa.tiyaa attano saavake .thaanantare .thapento ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuovaadakaana.m yadida.m mahaakappino''ti (a0 ni0 1.219, 231) etadagge .thapesi.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ eva.m thero pattaarahattaphalo attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassajaato pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadimaaha. ^b^udito aja.taakaase^eb^ti sakalaakaase udito u.t.thito paaka.tabhuuto. ^b^saradambare^eb^ saradakaale aakaase ^b^raviiva^eb^ suuriyo ivaati attho.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ ^b^saavakassa^eb^ ^a^V2.0225^ea^ ^b^kataavino^eb^ti tassa bhagavato ^b^me mana.m^eb^ mama citta.m, ^b^tappayantassa^eb^ tosayantassa saavakassa ovaadakassa gu.na.m pakaasayato agga.t.thaane .thapentassa kataavino saataccakiccayuttassa vacana.m sutvaati sambandho.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ ^b^samuggatatanuuruha^eb^nti su.t.thu uggataloma.m uddhaggaloma.m, udagyamana.m vaa. ^b^jiimuutava.n.na^eb^nti muttaphalasamaanava.n.na.m sundarasariirapabhanti ^a^P0.0504^ea^ attho. ^b^pii.na.msa^eb^nti paripu.n.na.m a.msa.m. ^b^pasannanayanaanana^eb^nti pasannaakkhipasannamukhanti attho.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ^b^sataso anusaasiyaa^eb^ti dhammena samena vacanena kaara.navasena anusaasitvaati attho. ^b^baaraa.nasiyamaasanne^eb^ti baaraa.nasiyaa samiipe pesakaaragaame. ^b^jaato keniyajaatiya^eb^nti tantavaayajaatiyaa pesakaarakule jaatoti attho. sesa.m suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] mahaakappinattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] catutthaapadaane ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato dabbamallaputtattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare se.t.thiputto hutvaa jaato vibhavasampanno ahosi, satthari pasanno satthu dhammadesana.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m senaasanapa~n~naapakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m nimantetvaa sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m datvaa sattaahaccayena bhagavato paadamuule nipatitvaa ta.m .thaana.m patthesi. bhagavaapissa samijjhanabhaava.m ~natvaa byaakaasi. so yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa tato cuto tusitaadiisu devesu dibbasampatti.m anubhavitvaa tato cuto ^a^V2.0226^ea^ vipassissa bhagavato kaale ekasmi.m kule nibbatto asappurisasa.msaggena tassa saavaka.m bhikkhu.m arahaati jaanantopi abbhuutena abbhaacikkhi. tasseva saavakaana.m khiirasalaakabhatta.m adaasi. so yaavataayuka.m ^a^M2.0228^ea^ pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvaa kassapadasabalassa kaale kulagehe nibbatto osaanakaale saasane pabbajito parinibbute bhagavati sakalaloke kolaahale jaate satta bhikkhavo pabbajito paccantajanapade vanamajjhe eka.m pabbata.m abhiruhitvaa ``jiivitaasaa orohantu niraalayaa nisiidantuu''ti nisse.ni.m paatesu.m. tesa.m ovaadadaayako je.t.thakatthero satthaahabbhantare arahaa ahosi. tadanantaratthero anaagaamii, itare pa~nca parisuddhasiilaa tato cutaa devaloke nibbattaa. tattha eka.m buddhantara.m dibbasukha.m anubhavitvaa ^a^P0.0505^ea^ imasmi.m buddhuppaade pukkusaati (ma0 ni0 3.342), sabhiyo (su0 ni0 sabhiyasutta), baahiyo (udaa0 10), kumaarakassapoti (ma0 ni0 1.249) ime cattaaro tattha tattha nibbatti.msu. aya.m pana mallara.t.the anupiyanagare nibbatti. tasmi.m maatukucchito anikkhanteyeva maataa kaalamakaasi, atheko tassaa sariira.m jhaapanatthaaya citakasmi.m aaropetvaa kumaara.m dabbantare patita.m gahetvaa jaggaapesi. dabbe patitattaa ^b^dabbo mallaputto^eb^ti paaka.to ahosi. aparabhaage pubbasambhaaravasena pabbaji, so kamma.t.thaanamanuyutto nacirasseva saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[03] atha na.m satthaa majjhattabhaavena aanubhaavasampannabhaavena ca bhikkhuuna.m senaasana.m pa~n~naapane bhattuddesane ca niyojesi. sabbo ca bhikkhusa"ngho ta.m samannesi. ta.m vinayakhandhake (cuu.lava0 189-190) aagatameva. aparabhaage thero ekassa varasalaakadaayakassa salaakabhatta.m mettiyabhuumajakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m uddisi. te ha.t.thatu.t.thaa ``sve mayha.m muggaghatamadhumissakabhatta.m bhu~njissaamaa''ti ussaahajaataa ahesu.m. so pana upaasako tesa.m vaarappattabhaava.m sutvaa daasi.m aa.naapesi -- ``ye, je, bhikkhuu sve idha aagamissanti, te ka.naajakena bila"ngadutiyena parivisaahii''ti. saapi tatheva te bhikkhuu aagate ko.t.thakapamukhe nisiidaapetvaa bhojesi. te bhikkhuu anattamanaa kopena ta.tata.taayantaa there aaghaata.m bandhitvaa ``madhurabhattadaayaka.m amhaaka.m amadhurabhatta.m daapetu.m esova niyojesii''ti dukkhii dummanaa nisiidi.msu. atha te mettiyaa naama bhikkhunii ``ki.m, bhante, dummanaa''ti pucchi. te, ``bhagini, ki.m amhe dabbena ^a^M2.0229^ea^ mallaputtena vihe.thiyamaane ajjhupekkhasii''ti aaha.msu. ``ki.m, bhante, mayaa sakkaa kaatu''nti? ``tassa dosa.m aaropehii''ti. saa tattha tattha therassa abhuutaaropana.m akaasi. ta.m sutvaa bhikkhuu bhagavato aarocesu.m. atha bhagavaa dabba.m mallaputta.m pakkosaapetvaa -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, dabba, mettiyaaya bhikkhuniyaa vippakaaramakaasii''ti pucchi. ``yathaa ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa jaanaatii''ti. ``na kho, dabba ^a^V2.0227^ea^, dabbaa eva.m nibbe.thenti, kaarakabhaava.m vaa akaarakabhaava.m vaa vadehii''ti. ``akaarako aha.m, bhante''ti. bhagavaa -- ``mettiya.m bhikkhuni.m naasetvaa te bhikkhuu anuyu~njathaa''ti aaha. upaalittherappamukhaa ^a^P0.0506^ea^ bhikkhuu ta.m bhikkhuni.m uppabbaajetvaa mettiyabhuumajake bhikkhuu anuyu~njitvaa tehi ``amhehi niyojitaa saa bhikkhunii''ti vutte bhagavato ekamattha.m aarocesu.m. bhagavaa mettiyabhuumajakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m amuulakasa"nghaadisesa.m pa~n~napesi.

[03] tena ca samayena dabbatthero bhikkhuuna.m senaasana.m pa~n~naapento ve.luvanavihaarassa saamantaa a.t.thaarasamahaavihaare sabhaage bhikkhuu pesento rattibhaage andhakaare a"nguliyaa padiipa.m jaaletvaa tenevaalokena aniddhimante bhikkhuu pesesi. eva.m therassa senaasanapa~n~naapanabhattuddesanakicce paaka.te jaate satthaa ariyaga.namajjhe dabbatthera.m .thaanantare .thapento ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m senaasanapa~n~naapakaana.m yadida.m dabbo mallaputto''ti (a0 ni0 1.209, 214) etadagge .thapesi.

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ ^b^du.t.thacitto^eb^ti duusitacitto asaadhusa"ngamena apasannacittoti attho. ^b^upavadi.m saavaka.m tassaa^eb^ti tassa bhagavato khii.naasava.m saavaka.m upavadi.m, upari abhuuta.m vacana.m aaropesi.m, abbhakkhaana.m akaasinti attho.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ ^b^dundubhiyo^eb^ti ^a^M2.0230^ea^ dundu.m iti saddaayanato dundubhisa"nkhaataa bheriyo. ^b^naadayi.msuu^eb^ti sadda.m kari.msu. ^b^samantato asaniyo^eb^ti sabbadisaabhaagato asane vinaasane niyuttoti asaniyo, devada.n.daa bhayaavahaa phali.msuuti sambandho.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ ^b^ukkaa pati.msu nabhasaa^eb^ti aakaasato aggikkhandhaa ca pati.msuuti attho. ^b^dhuumaketu ca dissatii^eb^ti dhuumaraajisahito aggikkhandho ca dissati pa~n~naayatiiti attho. sesa.m suvi~n~neyyamevaati.

[03] pa~ncamaapadaane ^a^V2.0228^ea^ ^b^ito satasahassamhii^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato kumaarakassapattherassa apadaana.m. aya.m kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbatto vi~n~nuta.m patvaa ekadivasa.m satthu santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m cittakathikaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa sayampi ta.m .thaanantara.m patthento ^a^P0.0507^ea^ pa.nidhaana.m katvaa tadanuruupaani pu~n~naani karonto yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa tato cuto devamanussesu sa.msaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvaa kassapassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbatto tassa bhagavato saasane pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m katvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto dibbasukha.m maanusasukha~nca anubhavitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe ekissaa se.t.thidhiitaaya kucchimhi nibbatto. saa kira kumaarikaakaaleyeva pabbajitukaamaa maataapitaro yaacitvaa pabbajja.m alabhamaanaa patikula.m gantvaa gabbha.m ga.nhitvaa ta.m ajaanitvaa ``saamika.m aaraadhetvaa pabbajja.m anujaanaapessaamii''ti cintesi. saa saamika.m aaraadhentii, ayyaputta --
[21] ``sace imassa kaayassa, anto baahirako siyaa.
[22] da.n.da.m nuuna gahetvaana, kaake so.ne nivaaraye''ti.. (visuddhi0 1.122) --
[25] aadinaa sariirassa dosa.m dassentii ta.m aaraadhesi.

[03] saa ^a^M2.0231^ea^ saamikena anu~n~naataa gabbhinibhaava.m ajaanantii devadattapakkhiyaasu bhikkhuniisu pabbaji. tassaa gabbhinibhaava.m disvaa bhikkhuniyo devadatta.m pucchi.msu. so ``assama.nii''ti aaha. saa ``naaha.m devadatta.m uddissa pabbajitaa, bhagavanta.m uddissa pabbajitaa''ti bhagavato santika.m gantvaa dasabala.m pucchi. satthaa upaalitthera.m pa.ticchaapesi. thero saavatthinagaravaasiini kulaani visaakha~nca upaasika.m pakkosaapetvaa saraajikaaya parisaaya ta.m vinicchinanto ``pure laddho gabbho, arogaa pabbajjaa''ti aaha. ta.m sutvaa satthaa ``saadhu suvinicchita.m upaalinaa adhikara.na''nti therassa saadhukaara.m adaasi.

[03] saa bhikkhunii suva.n.nabimbasadisa.m putta.m vijaayi. ta.m raajaa pasenadi kosalo ``daarakaparihara.na.m bhikkhuniina.m palibodho''ti dhaatiina.m daapetvaa posaapesi, ^b^kassapo^eb^tissa naama.m kari.msu ^a^V2.0229^ea^. aparabhaage ala"nkaritvaa satthu santika.m netvaa pabbaajesi. kumaarakaale pabbajitattaa pana bhagavataa ``kassapa.m pakkosatha, ida.m phala.m vaa khaadaniiya.m vaa kassapassa dethaa''ti vutte ``katarakassapassaa''ti ``kumaarakassapassaa''ti eva.m gahitanaamattaa ra~n~naa posaavaniiyaputtattaa ca vuddhakaalepi ^b^kumaarakassapo^eb^tveva pa~n~naayittha.

[03] so pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya vipassanaaya kamma.m karoti, buddhavacana~nca ugga.nhaati. atha tena saddhi.m pabbatamatthake sama.nadhamma.m katvaa anaagaamii hutvaa suddhaavaase nibbattamahaabrahmaa ``vipassanaaya mukha.m dassetvaa ^a^P0.0508^ea^ maggaphaluppattiyaa upaaya.m karissaamii''ti pa~ncadasapa~nhe abhisa"nkharitvaa andhavane vasantassa therassa ``ime pa~nhe satthaara.m puccheyyaasii''ti aacikkhi. tato so te pa~nhe bhagavanta.m pucchi. bhagavaapissa vissajjesi. thero bhagavataa kathitaniyaameneva te ugga.nhitvaa vipassana.m gabbha.m gaahaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni.
