[03] cha.t.thaapadaane ^a^V2.0230^ea^ ^b^ito satasahassamhii^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato baahiyassa daaruciiriyattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbatto braahma.nasippesu nipphatti.m gantvaa veda"ngesu anavayo ekadivasa.m satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.nanto pasannamaanaso satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m khippaabhi~n~naana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa ta.m .thaana.m pattukaamo sattaaha.m buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m datvaa sattaahassa accayena bhagavato paadamuule nipanno ``bhagavaa, bhante, ito sattame divase ya.m bhikkhu.m khippaabhi~n~naana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi, so viya ahampi anaagate ekassa buddhassa saasane khippaabhi~n~naana.m aggo bhaveyya''nti patthana.m akaasi ^a^P0.0509^ea^. bhagavaa anaagata.msa~naa.nena oloketvaa samijjhanabhaava.m ~natvaa ``anaagate gotamassa bhagavato saasane pabbajitvaa khippaabhi~n~naana.m aggo bhavissatii''ti byaakaasi. so yaavataayuka.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato cuto devaloke nibbatto tattha cha kaamaavacarasampattiyo anubhavitvaa puna manussesu cakkavattiaadisampattiyo anekakappako.tisatesu anubhavitvaa kassapassa bhagavato kaale ekasmi.m kule nibbatto, bhagavati parinibbute pabbajito yadaa saasane osakkamaane satta bhikkhuu catunna.m parisaana.m ajjhaacaara.m ^a^M2.0233^ea^ disvaa sa.mvegappattaa ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa ``yaava saasanassa antaradhaana.m na hoti, taava attano pati.t.tha.m karissaamaa''ti suva.n.nacetiya.m vanditvaa tattha ara~n~ne eka.m pabbata.m disvaa ``jiivitasaalayaa nivattantu, niraalayaa ima.m pabbata.m abhiruhantuu''ti nisse.ni.m bandhitvaa sabbe ta.m pabbata.m abhiruyha nisse.ni.m paatetvaa sama.nadhamma.m kari.msu. tesu sa"nghatthero ekarattaatikkamena arahatta.m paapu.ni. so anotattadahe naagalataadantaka.t.tha.m khaaditvaa mukha.m dhovitvaa uttarakuruto pi.n.dapaata.m aaharitvaa te bhikkhuu aaha -- ``aavuso, ima.m pi.n.dapaata.m bhu~njathaa''ti. te aaha.msu -- ``ki.m, bhante, amhehi eva.m katikaa kataa `yo pa.thama.m arahatta.m paapu.naati, tenaabhata.m pi.n.dapaata.m avasesaa paribhu~njantuu'''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''ti. ``tena hi sace mayampi tumhe viya visesa.m nibbattessaama, saya.m aaharitvaa bhu~njissaamaa''ti na icchi.msu.

[03] dutiyadivase dutiyatthero anaagaamii hutvaa tatheva pi.n.dapaata.m aaharitvaa itare nimantesi. te evamaaha.msu -- ``ki.m panaavuso, katikaa kataa, `mahaatherena aabhata.m pi.n.dapaata.m abhu~njitvaa anutherena aabhata.m bhu~njissaamaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''ti. ``eva.m sante tumhe ^a^V2.0231^ea^ viya mayampi visesa.m nibbattetvaa attano attano purisakaarena bhu~njitu.m sakkontaa bhu~njissaamaa''ti na icchi.msu. tesu arahattappattatthero parinibbaayi, dutiyo anaagaamii brahmaloke nibbatti, itare pa~nca visesa.m nibbattetu.m asakkontaa sussitvaa sattame divase kaala.m katvaa devaloke nibbatti.msu. tattha dibbasukha.m anubhavitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade tato cavitvaa manussesu nibbatti.msu. tesu eko pukkusaati raajaa ahosi, eko gandhaarara.t.the takkasilaaya.m kumaarakassapo, eko baahiyo daaruciiriyo, eko dabbo mallaputto, eko sabhiyo paribbaajakoti. tesu ^a^P0.0510^ea^ aya.m baahiyo daaruciiriyo suppaarakapa.t.tane vaa.nijakule nibbatto vaa.nijakamme nipphatti.m gato mahaddhano mahaabhogo, so suva.n.nabhuumi.m gacchantehi vaa.nijehi saddhi.m naavamaaruyha videsa.m gacchanto katipaaha.m gantvaa bhinnaaya naavaaya sesesu macchakacchapabhakkhesu jaatesu ekoyeva avasi.t.tho eka.m phalaka.m gahetvaa vaayamanto sattame divase suppaarakapa.t.tanatiira.m okkami. tassa nivaasanapaarupana.m natthi, so a~n~na.m ki~nci apassanto sukkhaka.t.thada.n.dake vaakehi ^a^M2.0234^ea^ palive.thetvaa nivaasetvaa paarupitvaa ca devakulato kapaala.m gahetvaa suppaarakapa.t.tana.m agamaasi. manussaa ta.m disvaa yaagubhattaadiini datvaa ``aya.m eko arahaa''ti sambhaavesu.m. so vatthesu upaniitesu ``sacaaha.m nivaasemi, paarupaami vaa, laabhasakkaaro me parihaayissatii''ti taani pa.tikkhipitvaa daaruciiraaneva parihari.

[03] athassa ``arahaa, arahaa''ti bahuuhi sambhaaviyamaanassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi ``ye keci loke arahanto vaa arahattamagga.m vaa samaapannaa, aha.m tesa.m a~n~nataro''ti so tena niyaamena kuhanakammena jiivika.m kappeti.

[03] kassapadasabalassa saasane sattasu janesu pabbata.m aaruyha sama.nadhamma.m karontesu eko anaagaamii hutvaa suddhaavaasabrahmaloke nibbattitvaa attano brahmasampatti.m olokento aagata.t.thaana.m aavajjento pabbatamaaruyha sama.nadhamma.m kara.na.t.thaana.m disvaa sesaana.m nibbattana.t.thaana.m aavajjento ekassa parinibbutabhaava.m itaresa~nca pa~ncanna.m kaamaavacaradevaloke nibbattabhaava.m ~natvaa te kaalaanukaala.m aavajjesi ``imasmi.m pana kaale kaha.m nu kho te''ti aavajjento daaruciiriya.m suppaarakapa.t.tana.m nissaaya kuhanakammena jiivita.m kappenta.m disvaa ``na.t.tho vataaya.m baalo, pubbe sama.nadhamma.m karonto atiukka.t.thabhaavena arahataapi aabhata.m pi.n.dapaata.m aparibhu~njitvaa idaani udarahetu anaarahaava samaano arahatta.m pa.tijaanitvaa loka.m va~ncento vicarati, dasabalassa uppannabhaava.m na jaanaati, gacchaami na.m sa.mvejetvaa buddhuppaada.m jaanaapessaamii''ti kha.neneva brahmalokato otaritvaa suppaarakapa.t.tane rattibhaagasamanantare daaruciiriyassa sammukhe paaturahosi. so ^a^V2.0232^ea^ attano vasana.t.thaane obhaasa.m disvaa bahi nikkhamitvaa mahaabrahmaana.m disvaa a~njali.m paggayha ``ke tumhe''ti pucchi. ``aha.m tumhaaka.m poraa.nakasahaayo anaagaamiphala.m patvaa brahmaloke nibbatto, amhaaka.m sabbaje.t.thako arahaa hutvaa parinibbuto, tumhe pana pa~ncajanaa ^a^P0.0511^ea^ devaloke nibbattaa. svaaha.m daani ta.m imasmi.m .thaane kuhanakammena jiivika.m kappenta.m disvaa damitu.m aagato''ti vatvaa ida.m kaara.na.m aaha -- ``neva kho tva.m, baahiya, arahaa naapi arahattamagga.m vaa samaapanno, saapi te pa.tipadaa natthi, yaaya tva.m arahaa vaa assa arahattamagga.m vaa samaapanno''ti. athassa satthu uppannabhaava.m saavatthiya.m vasanabhaava~nca ^a^M2.0235^ea^ aacikkhitvaa ``satthu santika.m gacchaa''ti ta.m uyyojetvaa brahmalokameva agamaasi.

[03] baahiyo pana aakaase .thatvaa kathenta.m mahaabrahmaana.m oloketvaa cintesi -- ``aho bhaariya.m kamma.m mayaa kata.m, anaraha.m arahaa ahanti cintesi.m, aya~nca ma.m `na tva.m arahaa, naapi arahattamagga.m vaa samaapannaasii'ti vadati, atthi nu kho loke a~n~no arahaa''ti. atha na.m pucchi -- ``atha ke carahi sadevake loke arahanto vaa arahattamagga.m vaa samaapannaa''ti. athassa devataa aacikkhi -- ``atthi, baahiya, uttaresu janapadesu saavatthi naama nagara.m, tattha so bhagavaa etarahi viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho. so hi, baahiya, bhagavaa arahaa ceva arahattaaya ca dhamma.m desesii''ti. baahiyo rattibhaage devataaya katha.m sutvaa sa.mviggamaanaso ta.mkha.na.myeva suppaarakaa nikkhamitvaa ekarattivaasena saavatthi.m agamaasi, gacchanto ca pana devataanubhaavena buddhaanubhaavena ca viisayojanasatika.m magga.m atikkamitvaa saavatthi.m anuppatto, tasmi.m kha.ne satthaa saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tho hoti. so jetavana.m pavisitvaa abbhokaase ca"nkamante sambahule bhikkhuu pucchi -- ``kuhi.m etarahi satthaa''ti? bhikkhuu ``saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tho''ti vatvaa ``tva.m pana kuto aagatosii''ti pucchi.msu. ``suppaarakaa aagatomhii''ti. ``kadaa nikkhantosii''ti? ``hiyyo saayanhasamaye nikkhantomhii''ti. ``duuratopi aagato, nisiida taava paade dhovitvaa telena makkhetvaa thoka.m vissamaahi, aagatakaale satthaara.m dakkhissatii''ti aaha.msu. ``aha.m, bhante, satthu vaa attano vaa jiivitantaraaya.m na jaanaami, katthaci a.t.thatvaa anisiiditvaa ekaratteneva viisayojanasatika.m magga.m aagato, satthaara.m passitvaava vissamissaamii''ti aaha. so eva.m vatvaa taramaanaruupo saavatthi.m pavisitvaa bhagavanta.m anopamaaya buddhasiriyaa caranta.m disvaa ``cirassa.m vata me gotamo sammaasambuddho di.t.tho''ti di.t.tha.t.thaanato pa.t.thaaya ^a^P0.0512^ea^ onatasariiro gantvaa antaraviithiya.m pa~ncapati.t.thitena vanditvaa gopphakesu da.lha.m gahetvaa evamaaha -- ``desetu, bhante bhagavaa, dhamma.m, desetu ^a^V2.0233^ea^ sugato dhamma.m, ya.m mamassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. atha na.m satthaa ``akaalo kho taava, baahiya, antaraghara.m pavi.t.thamhaa pi.n.daayaa''ti pa.tikkhipi.

[03] ta.m ^a^M2.0236^ea^ sutvaa baahiyo, ``bhante, sa.msaare sa.msarantena kaba.liikaaraahaaro na aladdhapubbo, tumhaaka.m vaa mayha.m vaa jiivitantaraaya.m na jaanaami, desetu me, bhante bhagavaa, dhamma.m, desetu sugato dhamma''nti puna yaaci. satthaa dutiyampi tatheva pa.tikkhipi. eva.m kirassa ahosi -- ``imassa di.t.thakaalato pa.t.thaaya sakalasariira.m piitiyaa nirantara.m ajjhottha.ta.m hoti, balavapiitivego dhamma.m sutvaapi na sakkhissati pa.tivijjhitu.m, majjhattupekkhaaya taava ti.t.thatu, ekaratteneva viisayojanasatika.m magga.m aagatassapi cassa daratho balavaa sopi taava pa.tippassambhatuu''ti. tasmaa dvikkhattu.m pa.tikkhipitvaa tatiya.m yaacito antaraviithiya.m .thitova ``tasmaatiha te, baahiya, eva.m sikkhitabba.m, di.t.the di.t.thamatta.m bhavissatii''tiaadinaa (udaa0 10) nayena anekapariyaayena dhamma.m desesi. so satthu dhamma.m su.nantoyeva sabbaasave khepetvaa saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ so arahatta.m pattakkha.neyeva pubbakamma.m saritvaa sa~njaatasomanasso pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^ito satasahassamhii^eb^tiaadimaaha. ta.m he.t.thaa vuttanayattaa uttaanatthameva. anuttaanapadava.n.nanameva karissaama.
[03] 181^b^.^eb^ ^b^hasana.m paccavekkha.na^eb^nti paripu.n.nasomanassajaata.m paccavekkha.na.m, komaarava.n.na.m atikomalanti attho.

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ ^b^hemaya~n~nopacita"nga^eb^nti suva.n.nasuttaya~n~nopacitasuttaavayava.m sariira.m dehanti attho. ^b^palambabimbatambo.t.tha^eb^nti olambitabimbaphalasadisa.m rattava.n.na.m o.t.thadvayasamannaagatanti attho. ^b^setati.nhasama.m dija^eb^nti sunisitatikhi.naayalohagha.msanena gha.msitvaa sama.m kata.m viya samadantanti attho.
[03] 183^b^.^eb^ ^b^piitisamphullitaanana^eb^nti piitiyaa su.t.thu phullita.m vikasita.m aanana.m mukha.m aadaasatalasadisamukhavantanti attho.
[03] 184^b^.^eb^ ^b^khippaabhi~n~nassa bhikkhuno^eb^ti khippa.m desanaaya samugghaa.titakkha.neyeva abhivisesena ~naatu.m samatthassa bhikkhunoti attho.
[03] 186^b^.^eb^ ^b^sagga.m^eb^ ^a^P0.0513^ea^ ^a^V2.0234^ea^ ^b^aga.m sabhavana.m yathaa^eb^ti attano geha.m viya sagga.m loka.m agamaasinti attho.
[03] 196^b^.^eb^ ^b^na^eb^ ^a^M2.0237^ea^ ^b^tva.m upaayamagga~n~nuu^eb^ti tva.m nibbaanaadhigamuupaayabhuutamagga~n~nuu na ahosiiti attho.

[03] 200^b^.^eb^ ^b^satthuno sadaa jina^eb^nti sadaa sabbakaala.m jina.m jinanto paraajitakopo satthuno sammaasambuddhassa ^b^vimalaanana.m^eb^ aadaasatalasadisamukha.m ^b^passissaami^eb^ passitu.m nikkhamaamiiti yojanaa. ^b^dije apucchi.m kuhi.m lokanandano^eb^ti kuhi.m .thaane lokapasaadakaro satthaati dije braahma.ne aha.m bhikkhuu apucchinti attho.
[03] 201^b^.^eb^ ^b^sasova khippa.m munidassanussuko^eb^ti munidassane tathaagatadassane ussuko ussaahajaato saso iva khippa.m paapu.naatiiti attho.
[03] 202^b^.^eb^ ^b^tuva.ta.m gantvaa^eb^ti siigha.m gantvaa. ^b^pi.n.dattha.m apihaagidha^eb^nti pi.n.dapaata.m pa.ticca apiha.m apagatapiha.m agidha.m nitta.nha.m.

[03] 203^b^.^eb^ ^b^alolakkha^eb^nti ito cito ca anolokayamaana.m uttame saavatthinagare pi.n.daaya vicaranta.m adakkhinti sambandho. ^b^siriinilayasa"nkaasa^eb^nti siriyaa lakkha.naanubya~njanasobhaaya nilaya.m sa"nkaasa.m jalamaanatora.nasadisa.m. ^b^ravidittiharaanana^eb^nti vijjotamaanasuuriyama.n.dala.m viya vijjotamaanamukhama.n.dala.m.

[03] 204^b^.^eb^ ^b^kupathe vippana.t.thassaa^eb^ti kucchitapathe sopaddavamagge muu.lhassa micchaapa.tipannassa me ^b^sara.na.m hohi^eb^ pati.t.thaa hohi. ^b^gotamaa^eb^ti bhagavanta.m gottena aalapati.

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ ^b^na tattha sukkaa jotantii^eb^ti sukkapabhaasampannaa jotamaanaosadhitaarakaadayo na jotanti nappabhaasanti. sesa.m uttaanatthameva. so eva.m pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasetvaa taavadeva ca bhagavanta.m pabbajja.m yaaci. ``paripu.n.na.m te pattaciivara''nti ca pu.t.tho ``na paripu.n.na''nti aaha. atha na.m satthaa ``tena hi pattaciivara.m pariyesaahii''ti vatvaa pakkaami. so kira viisativassasahassaani sama.nadhamma.m karonto ``bhikkhunaa naama attanaa paccaye labhitvaa a~n~na.m anoloketvaa ^a^V2.0235^ea^ sayameva paribhu~njitu.m va.t.tatii''ti vatvaa ekabhikkhussaapi pattena vaa ciivarena vaa sa"ngaha.m naakaasi, ``na tenassa ^a^M2.0238^ea^ iddhimaya.m pattaciivara.m uppajjissatii''ti ~natvaa bhagavaa ehibhikkhubhaavena pabbajja.m naadaasi. tampi pattaciivara.m pariyesamaanameva sa"nkaara.t.thaanato co.lakkha.n.daani sa.mka.d.dhenta.m pubbaveriko amanusso ekissaa taru.navacchaaya gaaviyaa sariire adhimuccitvaa vaamauurumhi paharitvaa ^a^P0.0514^ea^ jiivitakkhaya.m paapesi. satthaa pi.n.daaya caritvaa katabhattakicco sambahulehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m nikkhamanto baahiyassa sariira.m sa"nkaara.t.thaane patita.m disvaa ``ga.nhatha, bhikkhave, eta.m baahiya.m daaruciiriyanti ekasmi.m gehadvaare .thatvaa ma~ncaka.m aaharaapetvaa ima.m sariira.m nagaradvaarato niiharitvaa jhaapetvaa dhaatuyo gahetvaa thuupa.m karothaa''ti bhikkhuu aa.naapesi.

[03] te bhikkhuu dhaatu.m mahaapathe thuupa.m kaaretvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa attano katakamma.m aarocesu.m. tato sa"nghamajjhe kathaa udapaadi -- ``tathaagato bhikkhusa"nghena sariirajhaapanakicca.m kaaresi, dhaatuyo ca gaahaapetvaa cetiya.m kaaraapesi, kataramaggo nu kho tena samadhigato, saama.nero nu kho so, bhikkhu nu kho''ti. satthaa ta.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa ``pati.t.thito, bhikkhave, baahiyo daaruciiriyo arahatto''ti upari dhammadesana.m va.d.dheti. tassa parinibbutabhaava~nca aacikkhitvaa ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m khippaabhi~n~naana.m yadida.m baahiyo daaruciiriyo''ti (a0 ni0 1.209, 216) etadagge .thapesi.

[03] atha na.m bhikkhuu pucchi.msu -- ``tumhe, bhante, `baahiyo daaruciiriyo arahatta.m patto'ti vadetha, kadaa so arahatta.m patto''ti? ``mama dhamma.m sutakaale, bhikkhave''ti. ``kadaa panassa, bhante, tumhehi dhammo kathito''ti? ``bhikkhaaya carantena antaraviithiya.m .thitenaa''ti. ``appamattako, bhante, tumhehi antaraviithiya.m .thatvaa kathitadhammo; katha.m so taavattakena visesa.m nibbattesii''ti? atha ne satthaa, ``bhikkhave, mama dhamma.m `appa.m' vaa `bahu.m vaa'ti maa cintayittha. anekaanipi hi anatthapadasa.mhitaani gaathaasahassaani na seyyo, atthanissita.m pana ekampi gaathaapada.m seyyo''ti vatvaa anusandhi.m gha.tetvaa dhamma.m desento ima.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``sahassamapi ce gaathaa, anatthapadasa.mhitaa.
[22] eka.m gaathaapada.m seyyo, ya.m sutvaa upasammatii''ti.. (dha0 pa0 101) --
[25] desanaapariyosaane ^a^M2.0239^ea^ ^a^V2.0236^ea^ caturaasiitiyaa paa.nasahassaana.m dhammaabhisamayo ahosiiti.
[06] baahiyattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] sattamaapadaane ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato mahaako.t.thikattherassa apadaana.m. kaa uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare mahaabhogakule ^a^P0.0515^ea^ nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto maataapituuna.m accayena ku.tumba.m sa.n.thapetvaa gharaavaasa.m vasanto ekadivasa.m padumuttarassa bhagavato dhammadesanaakaale ha.msavatiinagaravaasino gandhamaalaadihatthe yena buddho yena dhammo yena sa"ngho, tanninne tappo.ne tappabbhaare gacchante disvaa tehi saddhi.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa, satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m pa.tisambhidaappattaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa ``aya.m imasmi.m saasane pa.tisambhidaappattaana.m aggo, ya.mnuunaahampi ekassa buddhassa saasane aya.m viya pa.tisambhidaappattaana.m aggo bhaveyya''nti cintetvaa satthu desanaapariyosaane vu.t.thitaaya parisaaya bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa, ``bhante, sve mayha.m gehe bhikkha.m ga.nhathaa''ti nimantesi. satthaa adhivaasesi. so bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa sakanivesana.m gantvaa sabbaratti.m buddhassa ca bhikkhusa"nghassa ca nisajja.t.thaana.m gandhamaalaadiihi ala"nkaritvaa khaadaniiyabhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena sakanivesane bhikkhusatasahassaparivaara.m satthaara.m vividhayaagukhajjakaparivaara.m sasuupabya~njana.m gandhasaalibhojana.m bhojaapetvaa bhattakiccapariyosaane cintesi -- ``mahanta.m kho aha.m .thaanantara.m patthemi, na pana yutta.m mayaa ekadivasameva daana.m datvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetu.m, anupa.tipaa.tiyaa sattaaha.m daana.m datvaa patthessaamii''ti. so teneva niyaamena sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m datvaa bhattakiccapariyosaane dussako.t.thaagaara.m vivaraapetvaa uttama.m ticiivarappahonaka.m sukhumavattha.m buddhassa paadamuule .thapetvaa bhikkhusatasahassassa ca ticiivara.m datvaa tathaagata.m upasa"nkamitvaa, ``bhante, yo so bhikkhu tumhehi ito sattame divasamatthake ^a^M2.0240^ea^ pa.tisambhidaappattaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapito, ahampi so bhikkhu viya anaagate uppajjanakassa buddhassa saasane pabbajitvaa pa.tisambhidaappattaana.m aggo bhaveyya''nti satthu paadamuule nipajjitvaa patthana.m akaasi. satthaa tassa samijjhanabhaava.m ~natvaa ``anaagate ito kappasatasahassamatthake gotamo naama buddho loke uppajjissati, tassa saasane tava patthanaa samijjhissatii''ti ^a^V2.0237^ea^ byaakaasi. so tattha yaavataayuka.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato cuto devasampatti.m anubhavitvaa aparaapara.m devamanussesu paribbhami.

[03] eva.m so devamanussesu sa.msaranto tattha tattha bhave pu~n~na~naa.nasambhaare sambharanto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.namahaasaalakule ^a^P0.0516^ea^ nibbatti, ^b^ko.t.thiko^eb^tissa naama.m aka.msu. kasmaa maatuyaa vaa ayyakapayyakaadiina.m vaa naama.m aggahetvaa eva.m naama.m kari.msuuti ce? attano pa~n~navantataaya veda"ngesu satakkaparatakkesu sanigha.n.duke.tubhesu saakkharappabhedesu sakalabyaakara.nesu ca chekabhaavena ca di.t.thadi.t.the jane mukhasattiihi ko.t.thento pakko.t.thento vitudanto vicaratiiti anvatthanaama.m kari.msuuti veditabba.m. so vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvaa braahma.nasippe nipphatti.m patto ekadivasa.m satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa upasampannakaalato pa.t.thaaya vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m patvaa pa.tisambhidaasu ci.n.navasii hutvaa abhiito mahaathere upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m pucchantopi dasabala.m upasa"nkamitvaa pa.tisambhidaasuyeva pa~nha.m pucchi. evamaya.m thero tattha kataadhikaarataaya tattha ci.n.navasiibhaavena ca pa.tisambhidaappattaana.m aggo jaato. atha na.m satthaa mahaavedallasutta.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa pa.tisambhidaappattaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi, ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.tisambhidaappattaana.m yadida.m mahaako.t.thiko''ti (a0 ni0 1.209, 218).

[03] 221^b^.^eb^ so aparena samayena vimuttisukha.m pa.tisa.mvedento somanassajaato attano pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadimaaha. ta.m sabba.m he.t.thaa vuttanayattaa uttaanatthameva.
[03] ^b^ittha.m^eb^ ^a^M2.0241^ea^ ^b^sudamaayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko^eb^ti ettha ^b^suda^eb^nti nidassane nipaato. ^b^aayasmaa^eb^ti gaaravaadhivacana.m, yathaa ta.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaanoti.
[06] mahaako.t.thikattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] a.t.thamaapadaane ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato uruvelakassapattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi ^a^V2.0238^ea^ purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbatto vayappatto satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m mahaaparivaaraana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa sayampi ta.m .thaanantara.m patthento mahaadaana.m datvaa pa.nidhaana.m akaasi. bhagavaa cassa anantaraayata.m ^a^P0.0517^ea^ disvaa ``anaagate gotamabuddhassa saasane mahaaparivaaraana.m aggo bhavissatii''ti byaakaasi. so tattha yaavataayuka.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato cavitvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto ito dvenavutikappamatthake phussassa bhagavato vemaatikakani.t.thabhaataa hutvaa nibbatto, a~n~nepissa dve kani.t.thabhaataro ahesu.m. te tayo buddhappamukhabhikkhusa"ngha.m nimantetvaa paramaaya puujaaya puujetvaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m bhagavato uppattito puretarameva baaraa.nasiya.m braahma.nakule tayo bhaataro hutvaa nibbattaa gottavasena tayopi ^b^kassapaa^eb^ti eva.m naamakaa ahesu.m. te tayo vayappattaa tayo vede ugga.nhi.msu. tesa.m je.t.thabhaatikassa pa~ncamaa.navakasataani parivaaraa, majjhimassa tii.ni, kani.t.thassa dve, te attano ganthesu saara.m olokentaa di.t.thadhammikameva attha.m disvaa pabbajja.m rocesu.m. tesu je.t.thabhaataa attano parivaarena saddhi.m uruvela.m gantvaa isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ^b^uruvelakassapo^eb^ naama jaato, majjhimo ga"ngaanadiiva"nke pabbajito ^b^nadiikassapo^eb^ naama jaato, kani.t.tho gayaasiise pabbajito ^b^gayaakassapo^eb^ naama jaato. eva.m tesu isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa tattha tattha vasantesu bahuuna.m divasaana.m accayena amhaaka.m bodhisatto mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhamitvaa ^a^M2.0242^ea^ pa.tividdhasabba~n~nuta~n~naa.no anukkamena dhammacakka.m pavattetvaa pa~ncavaggiyatthere arahatte pati.t.thaapetvaa yasakulaputtappamukhe pa~ncapa~n~naasajane sahaayake vinetvaa sa.t.thi arahante ``caratha, bhikkhave, caarika''nti (mahaava0 32) vissajjetvaa ti.msabhaddavaggiye vinetvaa uruvelakassapassa vasana.t.thaana.m gantvaa vasanatthaaya agyaagaara.m pavisitvaa tattha gatanaagadamanaadiihi a.d.dhu.d.dhasahassehi paa.tihaariyehi uruvelakassapa.m saparivaara.m vinetvaa pabbaajesi. tassa pabbajjaavidhaana~nca iddhipaa.tihaariyakara.na~nca sabba.m nadiikassapassa apadaana.t.thakathaaya.m aavi bhavissati. tassa pabbajitabhaava.m sutvaa itarepi dve bhaataro saparisaa aagantvaa satthu santike pabbaji.msu. sabbeva te iddhimayapattaciivaradharaa ehibhikkhukaa ahesu.m. satthaa ta.m sama.nasahassa.m aadaaya gayaasiisa.m gantvaa pi.t.thipaasaa.ne nisinno aadittapariyaayadesanaaya (mahaava0 54) te sabbe arahatte pati.t.thaapesi.
[03] 251^b^.^eb^ so eva.m arahatta.m patvaa somanassajaato attano pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadimaaha. anuttaanapadameva ^a^P0.0518^ea^ va.n.nayissaama.

[03] 268^b^.^eb^ ^b^so^eb^ ^a^V2.0239^ea^ ^b^ca sabba.m tama.m hantvaa^eb^ti so phusso bhagavaa raagadosamohaadikilesandhakaara.m viddha.msetvaa. ^b^vija.tetvaa mahaaja.ta^eb^nti ta.nhaamaanaadiihi diya.d.dhasahassehi kilesaga.nehi mahaabyaakula.m ja.ta.m ^b^vija.tetvaa^eb^ padaaletvaa phaaletvaati attho. ^b^sadevaka.m^eb^ devalokasahita.m sakala.m lokasannivaasa.m^b^tappayanto^eb^ santappayanto pii.nento ^b^amata.m vu.t.thi.m^eb^ mahaanibbaanavu.t.thidhaara.m ^b^vassate^eb^ paggharaapetiiti yojanaa.

[03] 269^b^.^eb^ ^b^tadaa hi baaraa.nasiya^eb^nti ``baarasa manussaa''tiaadiisu viya baarasa dvaadasaraasii hutvaa puraa, himavantato isayo ca paccekamunisa"nkhaataa isayo ca gandhamaadanato aakaasenaagantvaa ettha gacchanti otaranti pavisantiiti baaraa.nasii, atha vaa sammaasambuddhasa"nkhaataana.m anekasatasahassaana.m dhammacakkapavattanatthaaya otara.t.thaana.m nagara.m li"ngavipallaasa.m katvaa itthili"ngavasena baaraa.nasiiti vuccati, tissa.m baaraa.nasiya.m.

[03] 273^b^.^eb^ ^b^nikkhittasattha.m^eb^ ^a^M2.0243^ea^ ^b^paccanta^eb^nti cha.d.ditasattha.m paatitaaavudha.m paccantajanapada.m nibbisevana.m ^b^katvaa punarupaccata^eb^nti punarapi ta.m nagara.m upecca upagamma sampattaati attho. sesa.m suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] uruvelakassapattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] 296^b^.^eb^ navamaapadaane ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato raadhattherassa apadaana.m. ta.m sabba.m paa.thaanusaarena nayaanucintanena vi~n~nuuhi suvi~n~neyyameva. kevala.m pu~n~nanaanattamevaati.
[06] raadhattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.
[06] dasama.m mogharaajattheraapadaana.m suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] catupa~n~naasamavaggava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] pa~ncapa~n~naasamavagge ^a^P0.0519^ea^ ^a^V2.0240^ea^ pa.thamaapadaane ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato laku.n.dakabhaddiyattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare mahaabhogakule nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto satthu dhamma.m su.nanto nisinno satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m ma~njussaraana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa sayampi ta.m .thaanantara.m patthento buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa sappisakkharaadimadhurarasasammissa.m mahaadaana.m datvaa ``ahampi, bhante, anaagate aya.m bhikkhu viya ekassa buddhassa saasane ma~njussaraana.m aggo bhaveyya''nti pa.nidhaana.m akaasi. bhagavaa tassa anantaraaya.m disvaa byaakaritvaa pakkaami.

[03] so ^a^M2.0244^ea^ yaavataayuka.m pu~n~naani katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvaa phussabhagavato kaale citrakokilo hutvaa nibbatto raajuyyaanato madhura.m ambaphala.m tu.n.denaadaaya gacchanto satthaara.m disvaa pasannamaanaso ``dassaami buddhassaa''ti citta.m uppaadesi. satthaa tassa cittaacaara.m ~natvaa patta.m gahetvaa nisiidi. kokilo dasabalassa patte ambapakka.m .thapesi. satthaa tassa somanassuppaadanattha.m tassa passantasseva ta.m paribhu~nji. atha so kokilo pasannamaanaso teneva piitisukhena sattaaha.m viitinaamesi. teneva pu~n~nakammena uppannuppannabhave ma~njussaro ahosi. kassapasammaasambuddhakaale va.d.dhakikule nibbattetvaa je.t.thakava.d.dhakii hutvaa paaka.to ahosi. parinibbute bhagavati tassa sariiradhaatuyo nidahitu.m sattayojanappamaa.ne thuupe aaraddhe so aaha -- ``yojanaava.t.ta.m yojanubbedha.m karomaa''ti. te sabbe tassa vacane a.t.tha.msu. iti appamaa.nassa buddhassa orappamaa.na.m cetiya.m kaaresi, tena kammena nibbatta.t.thaane a~n~nehi hiinappamaa.no ahosi. so amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa atirassataaya ca suva.n.napa.timaa viya sundarasariirataaya ca ^b^laku.n.dakabhaddiyo^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha. so aparabhaage satthu dhammadesana.m ^a^V2.0241^ea^ sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa bahussuto dhammakathiko hutvaa madhurena sarena paresa.m dhamma.m kathesi.

[03] athekasmi.m ussavadivase ekena braahma.nena saddhi.m rathena gacchantii ekaa ga.nikaa thera.m disvaa dantavida.msaka.m hasi. thero tassaa danta.t.thike nimitta.m gahetvaa jhaana.m uppaadetvaa ta.m paadaka.m katvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa anaagaamii ahosi, so abhi.nha.m kaayagataaya satiyaa viharanto ekadivasa.m ^a^P0.0520^ea^ aayasmataa dhammasenaapatinaa ovadiyamaano anusaasiyamaano arahatte pati.t.thahi. ekacce bhikkhuu ca saama.neraa ca tassa arahattappattabhaava.m ajaananto ka.n.nesu gahetvaa ka.d.dhanti, siise baahaaya hatthapaadaadiisu vaa gahetvaa caaletvaa kii.lantaa vihe.thesu.m. atha bhagavaa sutvaa -- ``maa, bhikkhave, mama putta.m vihe.thethaa''ti aaha. tato pa.t.thaaya ta.m ``arahaa''ti jaanitvaa na vihe.thesu.m.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ so ^a^M2.0245^ea^ arahaa hutvaa sa~njaatasomanasso attano pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadimaaha. ^b^ma~njunaabhinikuujaha^eb^nti madhurena pemaniyena sarena abhinikuuji.m sadda.m nicchaaresi.m ahanti attho. sesamettha suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] laku.n.dakabhaddiyattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ dutiyaapadaane ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato ka"nkhaarevatattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbatto, ta.m sabba.m paa.thaanusaarena suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] ka"nkhaarevatattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] tatiyaapadaane ^a^V2.0242^ea^ ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato siivalittherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbatto he.t.thaa vuttanayena vihaara.m gantvaa parisaaya pariyante .thito dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m laabhiina.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa ``mayaapi anaagate evaruupena bhavitu.m va.t.tatii''ti dasabala.m nimantetvaa sattaaha.m buddhappamukhassa bhikkhasa"nghassa mahaadaana.m datvaa, ``bhante, iminaa adhikaarakammena na a~n~na.m sampatti.m patthemi, anaagate pana ekassa buddhassa saasane ahampi tumhehi so etadagge .thapitabhikkhu viya laabhiina.m aggo bhaveyya''nti patthana.m akaasi. satthaa tassa anantaraayata.m disvaa ``aya.m te patthanaa anaagate gotamassa buddhassa santike samijjhissatii''ti byaakaritvaa pakkaami. so kulaputto yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvaa vipassissa ^a^M2.0246^ea^ bhagavato ^a^P0.0521^ea^ kaale bandhumatiinagarato aviduure ekasmi.m gaamake nibbatti, tasmi.m samaye bandhumatiinagaravaasino ra~n~naa saddhi.m saakacchitvaa dasabalassa daana.m ada.msu.

[03] ekadivasa.m sabbe ekato hutvaa daana.m dentaa ``ki.m nu kho amhaaka.m daanagge natthii''ti (a0 ni0 a.t.tha0 1.1.207; theragaa0 a.t.tha0 1.59 siivalittheragaathaava.n.nanaa) olokentaa madhu~nca gu.ladadhi~nca naaddasa.msu. te ``yato kutoci aaharissaamaa''ti janapadato nagarapavisanamaggesu purise .thapesu.m. tadaa esa kulaputto attano gaamato gu.ladadhivaaraka.m gahetvaa ``ki~ncideva aaharissaamii''ti nagara.m gacchanto ``mukha.m dhovitvaa dhotahatthapaado pavisissaamii''ti phaasuka.t.thaana.m olokento na"ngalasiisappamaa.na.m nimmakkhikada.n.dakamadhu.m disvaa ``pu~n~nena me ida.m uppanna''nti gahetvaa nagara.m paavisi. naagarehi .thapitapuriso ta.m disvaa, ``maarisa, kassa ima.m harasii''ti pucchi. ``na kassaci, saami, vikkaayika.m me ida''nti. ``tena hi ima.m kahaapa.na.m gahetvaa eta.m madhu~nca gu.ladadhi~nca dehii''ti.

[03] so cintesi -- ``ida.m me na bahu.m agghati, aya~nca ekappahaareneva bahu.m deti, viima.msissaamii''ti. tato na.m aaha -- ``naaha.m ekakahaapa.nena demii''ti. ``yadi eva.m dve kahaapa.ne gahetvaa dehii''ti. ``dviihipi na demii''ti. etenupaayena va.d.dhetvaa yaava sahassa.m paapu.ni, so cintesi -- ``atia~nchitu.m na va.t.tati, hotu taava iminaa kattabbakamma.m pucchissaamii''ti ^a^V2.0243^ea^. atha na.m aaha -- ``na ida.m bahuagghanaka.m, tva.m pana bahu.m desi, kena kammena ida.m ga.nhasii''ti. ``idha, bho, nagaravaasino ra~n~naa saddhi.m pa.tivirujjhitvaa vipassisammaasambuddhassa daana.m dentaa ida.m dvaya.m daanagge apassantaa ma.m pariyesaapenti. sace ida.m dvaya.m na labhissanti, naagaraana.m paraajayo bhavissati. tasmaa sahassa.m datvaa ga.nhaamii''ti. ``ki.m paneta.m naagaraana.m eva va.t.tati, udaahu a~n~nesampi daatu.m va.t.tatii''ti? ``yassa kassaci daatu.m avaaritameta''nti. ``atthi pana koci naagaraana.m daane ekadivasa.m sahassa.m daataa''ti? ``natthi, sammaa''ti. ``imesa.m me dvinna.m sahassagghanakabhaava.m jaanaasii''ti? ``aama, jaanaamii''ti. ``tena hi gaccha, naagaraana.m aarocehi -- `eko puriso imaani dve muulena na deti, tumhehi saddhi.m sahattheneva daatukaamo, tumhe imesa.m dvinna.m kaara.naa nibbitakkaa hothaa''ti. ``tva.m imasmi.m daane je.t.thakabhaagassa ^a^M2.0247^ea^ kaayasakkhii hohii''ti vatvaa gato. so pana kulaputto gaamato paribbayattha.m gahitakahaapa.nena pa~ncaka.tuka.m gahetvaa cu.n.na.m katvaa ^a^P0.0522^ea^ dadhito ka~nciya.m vaahetvaa tattha madhupa.tala.m pii.letvaa pa~ncaka.tukacu.n.nena yojetvaa paduminipatte pakkhipitvaa ta.m sa.mvidahitvaa aadaaya dasabalassa aviduure nisiidi. mahaajanehi aahariyamaanassa sakkaarassa antare attano pattavaara.m olokento okaasa.m ~natvaa satthu santika.m gantvaa, ``bhante, aya.m me duggatasakkaaro, ima.m me anukampa.m pa.ticca pa.tigga.nhathaa''ti. satthaa tassaanukampa.m pa.ticca catumahaaraajehi dattiyena selamayapattena ta.m pa.tiggahetvaa yathaa a.t.thasa.t.thiyaa bhikkhusatasahassassa diyyamaana.m na khiiyati, eva.m adhi.t.thaasi.

[03] so kulaputto ni.t.thitabhattakicca.m bhagavanta.m vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisinno aaha -- ``di.t.tho me, bhante bhagavaa, ajja bandhumatiinagaravaasiihi tumhaaka.m sakkaaro aahariyamaano, ahampi imassa nissandena nibbattanibbattabhave laabhaggayasaggappatto bhaveyya''nti. satthaa ``eva.m hotu kulaputtaa''ti vatvaa tassa ca nagaravaasiina~nca bhattaanumodana.m katvaa pakkaami. so kulaputto yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade suppavaasaaya raajadhiituyaa kucchimhi pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. tassa pa.tisandhiggaha.nakaalato pa.t.thaaya saaya.m paata~nca pa~ncapa.n.naakaarasataani suppavaasaaya upaniiyanti. athassa saa pu~n~naviima.msanattha.m hatthena biijapacchi.m phusaapentii a.t.thaasi. ekekabiijato salaakasata.m salaakasahassampi niggacchati, ekekakariisakhettato pa.n.naasampi sa.t.thipi saka.tapamaa.naani uppajjanti. ko.t.thapuura.nakaalepissaa ko.t.thadvaara.m hatthena phusantiyaa raajadhiitaaya pu~n~nena ga.nhantaana.m gahitagahita.m puna puurati. paripu.n.nabhattakumbhitopi ``raajadhiitaaya pu~n~na''nti vatvaa yassa kassaci dentaa na.m yaava na ukka.d.dhanti, na taava bhatta.m khiiyati. daarake kucchigateyeva satta vassaani atikkami.msu.

[03] gabbhe ^a^V2.0244^ea^ pana paripakke sattaaha.m mahaadukkha.m anubhosi. saa saamika.m aamantetvaa -- ``pure mara.naa jiivamaanaa daana.m dassaamii''ti satthu santika.m ^a^M2.0248^ea^ pesesi -- ``gaccha, saami, ima.m pavatti.m satthu aarocetvaa satthaara.m nimantehi, ya~nca satthaa vadati, ta.m saadhuka.m upalakkhetvaa aagantvaa mayha.m kathehii''ti. so gantvaa tassaa saasana.m satthu aarocesi -- ``satthu bhante, ko.liyadhiitaa paade vandatii''ti. satthaa tassaa anukampa.m pa.ticca -- ``sukhinii hotu suppavaasaa ko.liyadhiitaa arogaa, aroga.m putta.m vijaayatuu''ti aaha. so ta.m sutvaa bhagavanta.m vanditvaa attano gaamaabhimukho ^a^P0.0523^ea^ paayaasi. tassa pure aagamanaayeva suppavaasaaya kucchito dhammakara.nato udaka.m viya gabbho nikkhami, parivaaretvaa nisinnajano assumukho roditu.m aaraddho ha.t.thatu.t.thova tassaa saamikassa tu.t.thisaasana.m aarocetu.m agamaasi. so tesa.m i"ngita.m disvaa -- ``dasabalena kathitakathaa nipphannaa bhavissati ma~n~ne''ti cintesi. so aagantvaa satthu katha.m raajadhiitaaya kathesi. raajadhiitaa tayaa nimantita.m jiivabhattameva ma"ngalabhatta.m bhavissati, gaccha sattaaha.m dasabala.m nimantehiiti. so tathaa akaasi. sattaaha.m buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m pavattayi.msu. so daarako ~naatiina.m santattacitta.m nibbaapento siitalabhaava.m kurumaano jaatoti, ^b^siivali^eb^tveva naama.m kari.msu. so satta vassaani gabbhe vasitattaa jaatakaalato pa.t.thaaya sabbakammakkhamo ahosi. dhammasenaapati saariputtatthero sattame divase tena saddhi.m kathaasallaapamakaasi. satthaapi ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``yoma.m palipatha.m dugga.m, sa.msaara.m mohamaccagaa.
[27] ti.n.no paara"ngato jhaayii, anejo akatha.mkathii.
[22] anupaadaaya nibbuto, tamaha.m bruumi braahma.na''nti.. (dha0 pa0 414; su0 ni0 643).

[03] atha na.m thero evamaaha -- ``ki.m pana tayaa evaruupa.m dukkha.m anubhavitvaa pabbajitu.m na va.t.tatii''ti? ``labhanto pabbajeyya.m, bhante''ti. suppavaasaa ta.m therena saddhi.m kathenta.m disvaa -- ``ki.m nu kho me putto dhammasenaapatinaa kathetii''ti thera.m upasa"nkamitvaa pucchi -- ``mayha.m putto tumhehi saddhi.m ki.m katheti, bhante''ti? attanaa anubhuttagabbhavaasadukkha.m kathetvaa -- ``tumhehi anu~n~naato pabbajissaamii''ti vadatiiti. ``saadhu bhante, pabbaajetha na''nti. thero ta.m vihaara.m netvaa tacapa~ncakakamma.t.thaana.m datvaa pabbaajento, ``siivali ^a^M2.0249^ea^, tuyha.m a~n~nena ovaadena kamma.m natthi, tayaa satta vassaani anubhuttadukkhameva paccavekkhaahii''ti. ``bhante, pabbajjaayeva tumhaaka.m bhaaro, ya.m pana mayaa sakkaa kaatu.m, tamaha.m jaanissaamii''ti. so pana pa.thamakesava.t.tiyaa ^a^V2.0245^ea^ oropitakkha.neyeva sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaasi, dutiyaaya oropitakkha.ne sakadaagaamiphale, tatiyaaya anaagaamiphale pati.t.thaasi. sabbesa.myeva kesaana.m oropana~nca arahattaphalasacchikiriyaa ca apure apacchaa ahosi.

[03] atha ^a^P0.0524^ea^ bhikkhusa"nghe kathaa udapaadi -- ``aho eva.m pu~n~navaapi thero sattamaasaadhikaani satta sa.mvaccharaani maatugabbhe vasitvaa satta divasaani muu.lhagabbhe vasii''ti. satthaa aagantvaa -- ``kaaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa''ti pucchitvaa -- ``imaaya naamaa''ti vutte -- ``na, bhikkhave, iminaa kulaputtena imaaya jaatiyaa katakamma''nti vatvaa atiita.m aaharitvaa atiite, bhikkhave, buddhuppaadato puretarameva esa kulaputto baaraa.nasiya.m raajakule nibbatto, pitu accayena rajje pati.t.thaaya vibhavasampanno paaka.to ahosi. tadaa eko paccantaraajaa ``rajja.m ga.nhissaamii''ti aagantvaa nagara.m uparundhitvaa khandhaavaara.m kaaretvaa vihaasi. atha raajaa maatuyaa saddhi.m samaanacchando hutvaa sattaaha.m khandhaavaaranagare catuusu disaasu dvaara.m pidhaapesi, nikkhamantaana.m pavisantaana~nca dvaaramuu.lha.m ahosi. atha migadaayavihaare paccekabuddhaa ugghosesu.m. raajaa sutvaa dvaara.m vivaraapesiiti. paccantaraajaapi palaayi. so tena kammavipaakena narakaadiisu dukkhamanubhavitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajakule nibbattopi maatuyaa saddhi.m ima.m evaruupa.m dukkhamanubhavi. tassa pana pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya bhikkhusa"nghassa cattaaro paccayaa yadicchaka.m uppajjanti. eva.m ettha vatthu samu.t.thita.m.

[03] aparabhaage satthaa saavatthi.m agamaasi. thero bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa, ``bhante, mayha.m pu~n~nabala.m viima.msissaami, pa~ncabhikkhusataani dethaa''ti. ``ga.nha, siivalii''ti. so pa~ncasate bhikkhuu gahetvaa himavantaabhimukha.m gacchanto a.tavimagga.m gacchati. tassa pa.thama.m di.t.thanigrodhe adhivatthaa devataa satta divasaani daana.m adaasi. iti so --
[21] ``nigrodha.m pa.thama.m passi, dutiya.m pa.n.davapabbata.m.
[22] tatiya.m aciravatiya.m, catuttha.m varasaagara.m..
[21] ``pa~ncama.m ^a^M2.0250^ea^ himavanta.m so, cha.t.tha.m chaddantupaagami.
[22] sattama.m gandhamaadana.m, a.t.thama.m atha revata''nti.. (a0 ni0 a.t.tha0 1.1.207; theragaa0 a.t.tha0 1.59 siivalittheragaathaava.n.nanaa) --

[25] sabba.t.thaanesu ^a^V2.0246^ea^ satta satta divasaaneva daana.m ada.msu. gandhamaadanapabbate pana naagadattadevaraajaa sattasu divasesu ekadivasa.m khiirapi.n.dapaata.m adaasi, ekadivasa.m sappipi.n.dapaata.m adaasi. atha na.m ^a^P0.0525^ea^ bhikkhusa"ngho aaha -- ``aavuso, imassa devara~n~no neva dhenuyo duyhamaanaa pa~n~naayanti, na dadhinimmathana.m, kuto te, devaraaja, ida.m uppajjatii''ti? ``bhante, kassapadasabalassa kaale khiirasalaakabhattadaanasseta.m phala''nti devaraajaa aaha.

[03] aparabhaage satthaa khadiravaniyarevatattherassa paccuggamana.m akaasi. katha.m? athaayasmaa saariputto satthaara.m aaha -- ``bhante, mayha.m kira kani.t.thabhaataa revato pabbajito, so abhirameyya vaa na vaa, gantvaa na.m passissaamii''ti. bhagavaa revatassa aaraddhavipassakabhaava.m ~natvaa dve vaare pa.tikkhipitvaa tatiyavaare yaacito arahattappattabhaava.m ~natvaa -- saariputta, ahampi gamissaami bhikkhuuna.m aarocehiiti. thero bhikkhuu sannipaataapetvaa -- ``aavuso, satthaa caarika.m caritukaamo, gantukaamaa aagacchantuu''ti sabbesa.myeva aarocesi. dasabalassa caarikatthaaya gamanakaale ohiyyamaanakabhikkhuu naama appakaa honti, ``satthu suva.n.nava.n.na.m sariira.m passissaama, madhuradhammakatha.m vaa su.nissaamaa''ti yebhuyyena gantukaamaa bahutaraava honti. iti satthaa mahaabhikkhusa"nghaparivaaro ``revata.m passissaamaa''ti nikkhanto.

[03] athekasmi.m padese aanandatthero dvedhaapatha.m patvaa bhagavanta.m pucchi -- ``bhante, imasmi.m .thaane dvedhaapatho, kataramaggena bhikkhusa"ngho gacchatuu''ti? ``kataramaggo, aananda, ujuko''ti? ``bhante, ujumaggo ti.msayojaniko amanussapatho. parihaaramaggo pana sa.t.thiyojaniko khemo subhikkho''ti. ``aananda, siivali, amhehi saddhi.m aagato''ti? ``aama, bhante, aagato''ti. ``tena hi sa"ngho ujumaggameva gacchatu, siivalissa pu~n~na.m viima.msissaamaa''ti. satthaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivaaro siivalittherassa pu~n~naviima.msanattha.m ti.msayojanamagga.m abhiruhi (a0 ni0 a.t.tha0 1.1.203).

[03] magga.m ^a^M2.0251^ea^ abhiruhana.t.thaanato pa.t.thaaya devasa"ngho yojane yojane .thaane nagara.m maapetvaa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa vasanatthaaya vihaare pa.tiyaadesi. devaputtaa ra~n~naa pesitakammakaaraa viya hutvaa yaagukhajjakaadiini gahetvaa -- ``kaha.m, ayyo siivalii''ti pucchantaa gacchanti. thero sakkaarasammaana.m gaahaapetvaa satthu santika.m gacchati. satthaa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m paribhu~nji. iminaava niyaamena satthaa sakkaara.m anubhavanto devasika.m yojanaparama.m gantvaa ti.msayojanika.m kantaara.m atikkamma khadiravaniyarevatattherassa ^a^P0.0526^ea^ vasana.t.thaana.m patto, thero satthu aagamana.m ~natvaa attano ^a^V2.0247^ea^ vasana.t.thaane buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa pahonakavihaare dasabalassa gandhaku.ti.m ratti.t.thaanadivaa.t.thaanaani ca iddhiyaa maapetvaa tathaagatassa paccuggamana.m gato. satthaa ala"nkatapa.tiyattena maggena vihaara.m paavisi. atha tathaagate gandhaku.ti.m pavi.t.the bhikkhuu vassaggena pattasenaasanaani pavisi.msu. devataa ``akaalo aahaarassaa''ti a.t.thavidha.m paanaka.m aahari.msu. satthaa sa"nghena saddhi.m paanaka.m pivi. iminaa niyaameneva tathaagatassa sakkaarasammaana.m anubhavantasseva addhamaaso atikkanto.

[03] athekacce ukka.n.thitabhikkhuu ekasmi.m .thaane nisiiditvaa katha.m uppaadayi.msu -- ``dasabalo `mayha.m aggasaavakassa kani.t.thabhaataa'ti vatvaa evaruupa.m navakammika.m bhikkhu.m passitu.m aagato, imassa vihaarassa santike jetavanavihaaro vaa ve.luvanavihaaraadayo vaa ki.m karissanti? ayampi bhikkhu evaruupassa navakammassa kaarako, ki.m naama sama.nadhamma.m karissatii''ti? atha satthaa cintesi -- ``mayi idha cira.m vasante ida.m .thaana.m aaki.n.na.m bhavissati, aara~n~nakaa naama bhikkhuu pavivekatthikaa honti, revatassa phaasuvihaaro na bhavissatii''ti. tato therassa divaa.t.thaana.m gato. theropi ekakova ca"nkamanako.tiya.m aalambanaphalaka.m nissaaya paasaa.naphalake nisinno satthaara.m duuratova aagacchanta.m disvaa paccuggantvaa vandi.

[03] atha na.m satthaa pucchi -- ``revata, ida.m vaa.lamiga.t.thaana.m, ca.n.daana.m hatthiassaadiina.m sadda.m sutvaa ki.m karosii''ti? ``tesa.m me, bhante, sadda.m su.nato ara~n~napiiti naama uppannaa''ti. satthaa imasmi.m .thaane revatattherassa pa~ncahi gaathaasatehi ara~n~naanisa.msa.m naama kathetvaa punadivase aviduura.t.thaane pi.n.daaya ^a^M2.0252^ea^ caritvaa revatatthera.m aamantetvaa yehi bhikkhuuhi therassa ava.n.no kathito, tesa.m kattaraya.t.thiupaahanatelanaa.lichattaana.m pamussanabhaavamakaasi. te attano parikkhaaratthaaya nivattaa aagatamaggeneva gacchantaapi ta.m .thaana.m sallakkhetu.m na sakkonti. pa.thama~nhi te ala"nkatapa.tiyattena maggena gantvaa, ta.mdivasa.m pana visamamaggena gacchantaa tasmi.m tasmi.m .thaane ukku.tika.m nisiidantaa ja.n.nukehi gacchanti. te gumbe ca gacche ca ka.n.dake ca maddantaa attanaa vasitasabhaaga.t.thaana.m gantvaa tasmi.m tasmi.m khadirakhaa.nuke laggita.m attano chatta.m sa~njaananti, upaahana.m kattaraya.t.thi.m telanaa.li~nca sa~njaananti. te tasmi.m samaye ``iddhimaa aya.m ^a^P0.0527^ea^ bhikkhuu''ti ~natvaa attano parikkhaaramaadaaya ``dasabalassa pa.tiyattasakkaaro naama evaruupo hotii''ti vadantaa agama.msu.

[03] purato aagate bhikkhuu, visaakhaa upaasikaa, attano gehe nisinnakaale pucchi -- ``manaapa.m ^a^V2.0248^ea^ nu kho, bhante, revatassa vasana.t.thaana''nti? ``manaapa.m, upaasike, nandavanacittalataavanapa.tibhaaga.m ta.m senaasana''nti. atha tesa.m pacchato aagate bhikkhuu pucchi -- ``manaapa.m, ayyaa, revatassa vasana.t.thaana''nti? ``maa puccha, upaasike, kathetu.m ayutta.t.thaana.m, eta.m ujja"ngalasakkharapaasaa.navisamakhadiravana.m eva, tattha so bhikkhu vasatii''ti.

[03] visaakhaa purimaana.m pacchimaana~nca bhikkhuuna.m katha.m sutvaa, ``kesa.m nu kho kathaa saccaa''ti pacchaabhatta.m gandhamaala.m aadaaya dasabalassa upa.t.thaana.m gantvaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisinnaa satthaara.m pucchi -- ``bhante, revatattherassa vasana.t.thaana.m ekacce ayyaa va.n.nenti, ekacce nindanti, kimeta.m, bhante''ti? ``visaakhe, rama.niya.m vaa hotu maa vaa, yasmi.m .thaane ariyaana.m citta.m ramati, tadeva .thaana.m rama.niya.m naamaa''ti vatvaa ima.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``gaame vaa yadi vaara~n~ne, ninne vaa yadi vaa thale.
[22] yattha arahanto viharanti, ta.m bhuumiraama.neyyaka''nti.. (dha0 pa0 98; theragaa0 991; sa.m0 ni0 1.261).
[03] aparabhaage bhagavaa ariyaga.namajjhe nisinno thera.m ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m laabhiina.m yadida.m, siivalii''ti (a0 ni0 1.198, 207) etadagge .thapesi.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ athaayasmaa siivalitthero arahatta.m patvaa pattaetadagga.t.thaano attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassajaato pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^a^M2.0253^ea^ ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadimaaha. anuttaanatthapadava.n.nanameva karissaama.
[03] 55^b^.^eb^ ^b^siila.m tassa asa"nkheyya^eb^nti tassa padumuttarassa bhagavato siila.m asa"nkheyya.m.
[21] ``nava ko.tisahassaani, asiitisatako.tiyo.
[22] pa~n~naasasatasahassaani, chatti.msaa ca punaapare..
[21] ``ete sa.mvaravinayaa, sambuddhena pakaasitaa.
[22] peyyaalamukhena niddi.t.thaa, sikkhaavinayasa.mvare''ti.. (visuddhi0 1.20; pa.ti0 ma0 a.t.tha0 1.1.37) --

[25] eva.m vuttasikkhaapadaani bhikkhuuna.m saavakapa~n~nattivasena vuttaani. bhagavato pana siila.m ^b^asa"nkheyyameva^eb^ ^a^V2.0249^ea^ sa.mkhaatu.m ga.netu.m ^a^P0.0528^ea^ asakku.neyyanti attho. ^b^samaadhivajiruupamo^eb^ yathaa vajira.m indaniilama.nive.luriyama.niphalikamasaaragallaadiini ratanaani vijjhati chiddaavachidda.m karoti, evameva padumuttarassa bhagavato lokuttaramaggasamaadhi pa.tipakkhapaccaniikadhamme vijjhati bhindati samucchindatiiti attho. ^b^asa"nkheyya.m ~naa.navara.m^eb^ tassa buddhassa cattaari saccaani sattati.msabodhipakkhiyadhamme sa"nkhataasa"nkhatadhamme ca jaanitu.m pa.tivijjhitu.m samattha.m sayambhuu~naa.nasabba~n~nuta~n~naa.naadi~naa.nasamuuha.m ^b^asa"nkheyya.m,^eb^ atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaadibhedena sa.mkhaavirahitanti attho. ^b^vimutti ca anopamaa^eb^ti sa.mkilesehi vimuttattaa sotaapattiphalaadikaa catasso vimuttiyo anupamaa upamaarahitaa ``imaa viya bhuutaa''ti upametu.m na sakkaati attho. sesa.m uttaanatthamevaati.
[06] siivalittheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] catutthaapadaane ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato va"ngiisattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare mahaabhogakule nibbatto vuddhippatto dhamma.m sotu.m ^a^M2.0254^ea^ gacchantehi nagaravaasiihi saddhi.m vihaara.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m ekabhikkhu.m pa.tibhaanavantaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa satthu adhikaarakamma.m katvaa -- ``ahampi anaagate pa.tibhaanavantaana.m aggo bhaveyya''nti patthana.m katvaa satthaaraa byaakato yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu ubhayasampattiyo anubhavitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa maatu paribbaajikaabhaavena aparabhaage paribbaajakoti paaka.to ^b^va"ngiiso^eb^ti ca laddhanaamo tayo vede ugga.nhitvaa tato aacariya.m aaraadhetvaa chavasiisajaananamanta.m naama sikkhitvaa chavasiisa.m nakhena aako.tetvaa -- ``aya.m satto asukayoniya.m nibbatto''ti jaanaati.

[03] braahma.naa ``aya.m amhaaka.m jivikaaya maggo''ti va"ngiisa.m gahetvaa gaamanigamaraajadhaaniyo vicari.msu. va"ngiiso tivassamatthake mataanampi siisa.m aaharaapetvaa nakhena aako.tetvaa -- ``aya.m satto asukayoniya.m nibbatto''ti vatvaa mahaajanassa ka"nkhaacchedanattha.m te te jane aavaahetvaa attano ^a^V2.0250^ea^ attano gati.m kathaapeti. tena tasmi.m mahaajano ^a^P0.0529^ea^ abhippasiidati. so ta.m nissaaya mahaajanassa hatthato satampi sahassampi labhati. braahma.naa va"ngiisa.m aadaaya yathaaruci vicari.msu. va"ngiiso satthu gu.ne sutvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitukaamo ahosi. braahma.naa ``sama.no gotamo maayaaya ta.m aava.t.tessatii''ti pa.tikkhipi.msu.

[03] va"ngiiso tesa.m vacana.m anaadiyitvaa, satthu santika.m gantvaa, pa.tisanthaara.m katvaa, ekamanta.m nisiidi. satthaa ta.m pucchi -- ``va"ngiisa, ki~nci sippa.m jaanaatii''ti? ``aama, bho gotama, chavasiisamanta.m naameka.m jaanaami, tena tivassamatthake mataanampi siisa.m nakhena aako.tetvaa nibbatta.t.thaana.m jaanaamii''ti. atha satthaa tassa eka.m niraye nibbattassa siisa.m, eka.m manussesu, eka.m devesu, eka.m parinibbutassa siisa.m aaharaapetvaa dassesi. so pa.thamasiisa.m aako.tetvaa, ``bho gotama, aya.m satto niraye nibbatto''ti aaha. saadhu va"ngiisa, su.t.thu tayaa di.t.tha.m, ``aya.m satto kuhi.m nibbatto''ti pucchi. ``manussaloke''ti. ``aya.m kuhi''nti? ``devaloke''ti. ti.n.nannampi nibbatta.t.thaana.m kathesi. parinibbutassa pana siisa.m nakhena aako.tento neva ^a^M2.0255^ea^ anta.m na ko.ti.m passi. atha na.m satthaa ``na sakkosi, va"ngiisaa''ti pucchi. ``passatha, bho gotama, upaparikkhaami taavaati punappuna.m parivattetvaapi baahirakamantena khii.naasavassa siisa.m jaanitu.m na sakkoti. athassa matthakato sedo mucci. so lajjitvaa tu.nhii ahosi''. atha na.m satthaa ``kilamasi, va"ngiisaa''ti aaha. ``aama, bho gotama, imassa nibbatta.t.thaana.m jaanitu.m na sakkomi. sace tumhe jaanaatha, kathethaa''ti. ``va"ngiisa, aha.m etampi jaanaami, ito uttaripi jaanaamii''ti vatvaa --
[21] ``cuti.m yo vedi sattaana.m, upapatti~nca sabbaso.
[22] asatta.m sugata.m buddha.m, tamaha.m bruumi braahma.na.m..
[21] ``yassa gati.m na jaananti, devaa gandhabbamaanusaa.
[22] khii.naasava.m arahanta.m, tamaha.m bruumi braahma.na''nti.. (dha0 pa0 419-420; su0 ni0 648-649) --

[03] cha.t.thaapadaane ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato kaa.ludaayittherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbatto vi~n~nuta.m patto satthu dhammadesana.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m kulappasaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa tajja.m abhiniihaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi. satthaapi byaakaasi. so yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m bodhisattassa maatukucchiya.m pa.tisandhiggaha.nadivase devalokato cavitvaa kapilavatthusmi.myeva amaccakule pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. bodhisattena saha ekadivaseyeva ^a^V2.0253^ea^ jaato, ta.mdivasa.myeva na.m dukuulacumba.takena nipajjaapetvaa bodhisattassa upa.t.thaana.m nayi.msu. bodhisattena hi saddhi.m bodhirukkho, raahulamaataa, cattaaro nidhii ^a^P0.0532^ea^, aarohaniyahatthii, ka.n.dako, channo, kaa.ludaayiiti ime satta ekadivase jaatattaa sahajaataa naama ahesu.m. athassa naamaggaha.nadivase sakalanagarassa udaggacittadivase jaatattaa ^b^udaayii^eb^tveva naama.m kari.msu. thoka.m kaa.ladhaatukattaa pana kaa.ludaayiiti pa~n~naayittha. so bodhisattena saddhi.m kumaarakii.la.m kii.lanto vuddhi.m agamaasi.

[03] aparabhaage lokanaathe mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhamitvaa anukkamena sabba~n~nuta.m patvaa pavattitavaradhammacakke raajagaha.m upanissaaya ve.luvane viharante suddhodanamahaaraajaa ta.m pavatti.m sutvaa purisasahassaparivaara.m eka.m amacca.m ``putta.m me idhaanehii''ti pesesi. so satthu dhammadesanaavelaaya.m satthu santika.m gantvaa parisapariyante .thito dhamma.m sutvaa saparivaaro ^a^M2.0258^ea^ arahatta.m paapu.ni. atha ne satthaa ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti hattha.m pasaaresi. sabbe ta.mkha.na.myeva iddhimayapattaciivaradharaa vassasa.t.thikattheraa viya ahesu.m. arahattappattato pa.t.thaaya ariyaa naama majjhattaava honti, tasmaa ra~n~naa pesitasaasana.m dasabalassa naarocesi. raajaa neva gato aagacchati, na saasana.m suyyatiiti aparampi amacca.m purisasahassaparivaara.m pesesi. tasmimpi tathaa pa.tipanne aparampiiti etena nayena navapurisasahassaparivaare nava amacce pesesi. sabbe gantvaa arahatta.m patvaa tu.nhiibhuutaa ahesu.m.

[03] atha raajaa cintesi -- ``ettakaa janaa mayi sinehaabhaavena dasabalassa idhaagamanatthaaya na ki~nci kathayi.msu, aya.m kho pana udaayii dasabalena samavayo sahapa.msukii.liko, mayi ca sinehavaa, ima.m pesessaamii''ti. atha ta.m pakkosaapetvaa, ``taata, tva.m purisasahassaparivaaro gantvaa dasabala.m idhaanehii''ti vatvaa pesesi. so pana gacchanto ``sacaaha.m, deva, pabbajitu.m labhissaami, evaaha.m bhagavanta.m idhaanessaamii''ti vatvaa ra~n~naa ``pabbajitopi mama putta.m dassehii''ti vutto raajagaha.m gantvaa satthu dhammadesanaavelaaya parisapariyante .thito dhamma.m sutvaa saparivaaro arahatta.m patvaa ehibhikkhubhaave pati.t.thaasi. so arahatta.m patvaa -- ``na taavaaya.m dasabalassa kulanagara.m gantu.m kaalo, vassante pana upagate pabbatesu vanasa.n.desu haritati.nasa~nchannaaya bhuumiyaa gamanakaalo bhavissatii''ti gamanakaala.m aagamento vassante sampatte satthu kulanagara.m gantu.m gamanava.n.na.m sa.mva.n.nesi. vutta~nceta.m theragaathaaya (theragaa0 527-530) --
