[22] pitupitaa mayha.m tuva.msi sakka, dhammena me gotama ayyakosii''ti.. (theragaa0 536) -- gaathamaaha.

[03] tattha ^b^buddhassa puttomhii^eb^ti sabba~n~nubuddhassa ure vaayaamajanitaahi dhammadesanaahi jaatataaya orasaputto amhi. ^b^asayhasaahino^eb^ti abhisambodhito pubbe .thapetvaa mahaabodhisatta.m a~n~nehi sahitu.m asakku.neyyattaa asayhassa sakalabodhisambhaarassa, mahaakaru.naakarassa ca sahanato tato parampi a~n~nehi sahitu.m abhibhavitu.m asakku.neyyattaa asayhaana.m pa~ncanna.m maaraana.m sahanato abhibhavanato aasayaanusayacaritaadhimuttiaadivibhaagaavabodhena yathaaraha.m veneyyaana.m di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikaparamatthehi anusaasaniisa"nkhaatassa a~n~nehi asayhassa buddhakiccassa sahanato tattha vaa saadhukaariibhaavato asayhasaahino. ^b^a"ngiirasassaa^eb^ti a"ngiikatasiilaadisampattikassa. ``a"ngama"ngehi nicchara.nakaobhaasassaa''ti apare. keci pana ``a"ngiiraso siddhatthoti imaani dve naamaani pitaraayeva gahitaanii''ti vadanti. ^b^appa.timassaa^eb^ti anupamassa i.t.thaadiisu taadilakha.nasampattiyaa taadino. ^b^pitupitaa mayha.m tuva.msii^eb^ti ariyajaativasena mayha.m pitu sammaasambuddhassa lokavohaaravasena tva.m pitaa ^a^P0.0539^ea^ asi. ^b^sakkaa^eb^ti va.msena raajaana.m aalapati. ^b^dhammenaa^eb^ti sabhaavena ariyajaatilokiyajaatiihi dvinna.m jaatiina.m sabhaavasamodhaanena. ^b^gotamaa^eb^ti gottena raajaana.m aalapati. ^b^ayyakosii^eb^ti pitaamaho ahosi. ettha ca ``buddhassa puttomhii''tiaadi.m vadanto thero a~n~na.m byaakaasi.

[03] eva.m ^a^M2.0265^ea^ pana attaana.m jaanaapetvaa ha.t.thatu.t.thena ra~n~naa mahaarahe palla"nke nisiidaapetvaa attano pa.tiyaaditassa naanaggarasabhojanassa patta.m puuretvaa patte dinne gamanaakaara.m dassesi. ``kasmaa gantukaamattha, bhu~njathaa''ti vutte, satthu santika.m gantvaa bhu~njissaamiiti. kaha.m pana satthaati? viisatisahassabhikkhuparivaaro tumhaaka.m dassanatthaaya magga.m pa.tipannoti. tumhe ima.m pi.n.dapaata.m bhu~njatha, a~n~na.m bhagavato haratha. yaava ca mama putto ima.m nagara.m paapu.naati, taavassa itoyeva pi.n.dapaata.m harathaati. thero bhattakicca.m katvaa ra~n~no ca parisaaya ca dhamma.m desetvaa satthu aagamanato puretarameva raajanivesana.m ratanattayagu.nesu abhippasanna.m karonto sabbesa.m passantaana.myeva satthu aaharitabbabhattapu.n.na.m patta.m aakaase vissajjetvaa sayampi vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa ^a^V2.0261^ea^ pi.n.dapaata.m upanetvaa satthu hatthe .thapesi. satthaapi ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~nji. eva.m sa.t.thiyojana.m magga.m divase divase yojana.m gacchantassa bhagavato raajagehato bhatta.m aaharitvaa adaasi. bhagavaa kamena kapilavatthunagara.m patvaa punadivase raajaviithiya.m pi.n.daaya carati. ta.m sutvaa suddhodanamahaaraajaa tattha gantvaa, ``maa eva.m kattabba.m ma~n~ni, nayida.m raajava.msappave.nii''ti. ``aya.m tumhaaka.m, mahaaraaja, va.mso, iidiso amhaaka.m pana buddhava.mso''ti vatvaa --
[21] ``utti.t.the nappamajjeyya, dhamma.m sucarita.m care.
[22] dhammacaarii sukha.m seti, asmi.m loke paramhi ca..
[21] ``dhamma.m care sucarita.m, na na.m duccarita.m care.
[22] dhammacaarii sukha.m seti, asmi.m loke paramhi caa''ti.. (dha0 pa0 168-169) --

[25] dhamma.m desesi. raajaa sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi. tato raajaa buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m nimantetvaa sakamandire bhojetvaa sampavaaretvaa bhojanaavasaane ^b^dhammapaala^eb^jaataka.m (jaa0 1.10.92 aadayo) sutvaa sapariso anaagaamiphale pati.t.thahi. aparabhaage setacchattassa he.t.thaa nipannova arahatta.m patvaa parinibbaayi.

[03] tato bhagavaa raahulamaatuyaa bimbaadeviyaa paasaada.m gantvaa tassaa dhamma.m ^a^P0.0540^ea^ desetvaa soka.m vinodetvaa ^b^candakinnarii^eb^jaatakadesanaaya (jaa0 1.14.18 aadayo) pasaada.m janetvaa nigrodhaaraama.m agamaasi. atha bimbaadevii putta.m raahulakumaara.m aaha -- ``gaccha, tava pitu santaka.m dhana.m yaacaahii''ti. kumaaro ``daayajja.m ^a^M2.0266^ea^, me sama.na, dehii''ti vatvaa bhagavanta.m anubandhitvaa, ``sukhaa, te sama.na, chaayaa''ti vadanto gacchati. ta.m bhagavaa nigrodhaaraama.m netvaa ``lokutaradaayajja.m ga.nhaahii''ti vatvaa pabbaajesi. atha bhagavaa ariyaga.namajjhe nisinno ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m kulappasaadakaana.m yadida.m kaa.ludaayii''ti (a0 ni0 1.219, 225) thera.m etadagge .thapesi.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ thero pattaetadagga.t.thaano attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassajaato pubbacaritaapadaana.m ^a^V2.0262^ea^ pakaasento ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadigaathaayo abhaasi. tattha anuttaanapadameva va.n.nayissaama.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ ^b^gu.naagu.naviduu^eb^ti gu.na~nca agu.na~nca gu.naagu.na.m, va.n.naava.n.na.m, kusalaakusala.m vaa ta.m jaanaatiiti gu.naagu.naviduu. ^b^kata~n~nuu^eb^ti a~n~nehi katagu.na.m jaanaatiiti kata~n~nuu, ekadivasampi bhattadaanaadinaa katuupakaarassa rajjampi daatu.m samatthattaa kata~n~nuu. ^b^katavedii^eb^ti kata.m vindati anubhavati sampa.ticchatiiti katavedii. ^b^titthe yojeti paa.nine^eb^ti sabbasatte nibbaanapavesanupaaye kusalapathe magge dhammadesanaaya yojeti sampayojeti pati.t.thaapetiiti attho. sesa.m uttaanatthameva. gamanava.n.nanagaathaanamattho theragaathaaya.m vuttoyevaati.
[06] kaa.ludaayittheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] sattamaapadaane ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato abhayattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimajinavaresu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave vipa.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale ha.msavatiinagare braahma.nakule nibbatto. so vuddhimanvaaya veda"ngapaarago sakaparasamayakusalo ekadivasa.m satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa pasannamaanaso bhagavanta.m gaathaahi thomesi. so tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa pu~n~naani katvaa tato cuto devaloke nibbatto aparaapara.m sugatiisuyeva.m ^a^M2.0267^ea^ sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe bimbisaarara~n~no putto hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^abhayo^eb^tvevassa naama.m kari.msu. so vayappatto niga.n.thehi saddhi.m ^a^P0.0541^ea^ vissaasiko hutvaa caranto ekadivasa.m niga.n.thena naa.taputtena satthu vaadaaropanatthaaya pesito nipu.napa~nha.m pucchitvaa nipu.nabyaakara.na.m sutvaa pasanno satthu santike pabbajitvaa kamma.t.thaanaanuruupa.m ~naa.na.m pesetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni.
[03] 195^b^.^eb^ so arahatta.m patvaa attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassajaato pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^padumuttaro naama jino^eb^tiaadimaaha. ta.m sabba.m suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] abhayattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] a.t.thamaapadaane ^a^V2.0263^ea^ ^b^imamhi bhaddake kappe^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato lomasaka"ngiyattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto kassapassa bhagavato kaale braahma.nakule nibbatto saddho pasanno ahosi. aparo candano naama tassa sahaayo caasi. te dvepi satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa pasannamaanasaa pabbajitvaa yaavajiiva.m siila.m rakkhitvaa suparisuddhasiilaa tato cutaa devaloke nibbattitvaa eka.m buddhantara.m dibbasukha.m anubhavi.msu. tesu aya.m imasmi.m buddhuppaade saakiyakule nibbattitvaa aparo candano devaputto hutvaa taavati.msabhavane nibbatti. atha so sakyakulappasaadakena kaa.ludaayinaa aaraadhitena bhagavataa sakyaraajuuna.m maanamaddanaaya kata.m ^b^vessantaradhammadesanaaya.m^eb^ (jaa0 2.22.1655 aadayo) pokkharavassaiddhipaa.tihaariya.m disvaa pasannamaanaso pabbajitvaa majjhimanikaaye vutta.m ^b^bhaddekaratta^eb^suttantadesana.m sutvaa ara~n~navaasa.m vasanto bhaddekarattasuttantadesanaanusaasana.m (ma0 ni0 3.286 aadayo) saritvaa tadanusaarena ~naa.na.m pesetvaa kamma.t.thaana.m manasi karitvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ arahatta.m ^a^M2.0268^ea^ patvaa attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa sa~njaatasomanasso pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^imamhi bhaddake kappe^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha kappo taava catubbidho -- saarakappo, varakappo, ma.n.dakappo, bhaddakappoti. tesu yasmi.m kappe eko buddho uppajjati, aya.m ^b^saarakappo^eb^ naama. yasmi.m dve vaa tayo vaa buddhaa uppajjanti, aya.m ^b^varakappo^eb^ naama. yasmi.m cattaaro buddhaa uppajjanti, aya.m ^b^ma.n.dakappo^eb^ naama. yasmi.m pa~nca buddhaa uppajjanti, aya.m ^b^bhaddakappo^eb^ naama. a~n~nattha pana --
[21] ``saarakappo ^a^P0.0542^ea^ ma.n.dakappo, saarama.n.dakappo tathaa.
[22] varakappo bhaddakappo, kappaa pa~ncavidhaa siyu.m..
[21] ``eko dve tayo cattaaro, pa~nca buddhaa yathaakkama.m.
[22] etesu pa~ncakappesu, uppajjanti vinaayakaa''ti.. --
[25] eva.m ^a^V2.0264^ea^ pa~nca kappaa vuttaa. tesu aya.m kappo ``kakusandho ko.naagamano kassapo gotamo metteyyo''ti pa~ncabuddhapa.tima.n.ditattaa bhaddakappo naama jaato.
[03] tasmaa imasmi.m bhaddakappamhi kassapo naayako uppajjiiti sambandho. sesa.m uttaanatthamevaati.
[06] lomasaka"ngiyattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[01] navamaapadaane ^b^imamhi bhaddake kappe^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato vanavacchattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto kassapassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbatto vi~n~nuta.m patvaa satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa saddhaajaato pabbajitvaa parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m caritvaa tato cuto devaloke nibbatto, tato cuto ara~n~naayatane bhikkhuuna.m samiipe kapotayoniya.m nibbatto. tesu mettacitto dhamma.m sutvaa tato cuto devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kapilavatthusmi.m braahma.nakule nibbatti. tassa maatukucchigatakaaleyeva maatu doha.lo udapaadi vane vasitu.m vane vijaayitu.m ^a^M2.0269^ea^. tato icchaanuruupavasena vane vasantiyaa gabbhavu.t.thaana.m ahosi. gabbhato nikkhanta~nca na.m kaasaavakha.n.dena pa.tiggahesu.m. tadaa bodhisattassa uppannakaalo, raajaa ta.m kumaara.m aaharaapetvaa saheva posesi. atha bodhisatto mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhamitvaa pabbajitvaa chabbasaani dukkarakaarika.m katvaa buddhe jaate so mahaakassapassa santika.m gantvaa tassovaade pasanno tassa santikaa buddhuppaadabhaava.m sutvaa satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m sutvaa pabbajitvaa nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no arahaa ahosi.

[03] 251^b^.^eb^ so arahatta.m patvaa attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassajaato pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^imamhi bhaddake kappe^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^brahmabandhu mahaayaso^eb^ti ettha braahma.naana.m bandhu ~naatakoti braahma.nabandhuuti vattabbe gaathaabandhasukhattha.m ``brahmabandhuu''ti ^a^P0.0543^ea^ vuttanti veditabba.m. lokattayabyaapakayasattaa mahaayaso. sesa.m sabba.m suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] vanavacchattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] dasamaapadaane ^a^V2.0265^ea^ ^b^imamhi bhaddake kappe^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato sugandhattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto kassapasammaasambuddhakaale baaraa.nasiya.m vibhavasampanne kule nibbatto vi~n~nuta.m patvaa satthu santike dhamma.m sutvaa sabbadaa namassamaano mahaadaana.m dadamaano maasassa sattakkhattu.m bhagavato gandhaku.tiyaa catujjaatigandhena vilimpesi. ``mama nibbattanibbatta.t.thaane sariirato sugandhagandho nibbattatuu''ti patthana.m akaasi. bhagavaa ta.m byaakaasi. so yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa pu~n~naani karonto tato cuto devaloke nibbatto kaamaavacaraloka.m sariiragandhena sugandha.m kurumaano ^b^sugandhadevaputto^eb^ti paaka.to ahosi. so devalokasampattiyo anubhavitvaa tato cuto imasmi.m buddhuppaade mahaabhogakule ^a^M2.0270^ea^ nibbatti, tassa maatukucchigatasseva maatuyaa sariiragandhena sakalageha.m sakalanagara~nca sugandhena ekagandha.m ahosi, jaatakkha.ne sakala.m saavatthinagara.m sugandhakara.n.dako viya ahosi, tenassa ^b^sugandho^eb^ti naama.m kari.msu. so vuddhi.m agamaasi. tadaa satthaa saavatthiya.m patvaa jetavanamahaavihaara.m pa.tiggahesi, ta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso bhagavato santike pabbajitvaa nacirasseva saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni. tassa uppannadivasato pa.t.thaaya yaava parinibbaanaa etthantare nipanna.t.thaanaadiisu sugandhameva vaayi. devaapi dibbacu.n.nadibbagandhapupphaani okiranti.

[03] 272^b^.^eb^ sopi thero arahatta.m patvaa attano pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassajaato pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^imamhi bhaddake kappe^eb^tiaadimaaha. ta.m sabba.m he.t.thaa vuttanayattaa uttaanatthattaa ca suvi~n~neyyameva, kevala.m pu~n~nanaanatta.m naamanaanatta~nca viseso.
[06] cuu.lasugandhattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.
[06] pa~ncapa~n~naasamavaggava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] chappa~n~naasame ^a^P0.0544^ea^ ^a^V2.0266^ea^ vagge pa.thamaapadaane ^b^mahaasamudda.m oggayhaa^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato yasattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kaale mahaanubhaavo naagaraajaa hutvaa buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m attano bhavana.m netvaa mahaadaana.m pavattesi, bhagavanta.m mahagghena ticiivarena acchaadesi, ekeka~nca bhikkhu.m mahaggheneva paccekadussayugena sabbena ca sama.naparikkhaarena. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale se.t.thiputto hutvaa mahaabodhima.n.dala.m sattahi ratanehi puujesi. kassapassa bhagavato kaale saasane pabbajitvaa sama.nadhamma.m akaasi. eva.m so sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto amhaaka.m bhagavato kaale baaraa.nasiya.m mahaavibhavassa se.t.thino putto ^a^M2.0271^ea^ hutvaa sujaataaya bhagavato khiirapaayaasa.m dinnaaya se.t.thidhiitaaya kucchimhi nibbatti, ^b^yaso^eb^ naama naamena paramasukhumaalo. tassa tayo paasaadaa honti -- eko hemantiko, eko gimhiko, eko vassikoti. so vassike paasaade vassike cattaaro maase nippurisehi tuuriyehi paricaarayamaano vasati, he.t.thaapaasaada.m na otarati. hemantike paasaade cattaaro maase suphusitavaatapaanakavaa.te tattheva pa.tivasati. gimhike paasaade bahukavaa.tavaatapaanajaalaahi sampanne tattheva vasati. hatthapaadaana.m sukhumaalataaya bhuumiya.m nisajjaadikicca.m natthi. simbalitulaadipu.n.nasabhaave attharitvaa tattha upadhaanaani kiccaani karoti. eva.m devaloke devakumaaro viya pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitassa sama"ngiibhuutassa paricaarayamaanassa pa.tikacceva niddaa okkami, parijanassaapi niddaa okkami, sabbarattiyo ca telapadiipo jhaayati. atha kho yaso kulaputto pa.tikacceva pabujjhitvaa addasa saka.m parijana.m supanta.m a~n~nissaa kacche vii.na.m, a~n~nissaa ka.n.the mudi"nga.m, a~n~nissaa kacche aa.lambara.m, a~n~na.m vikesika.m, vikkhe.lika.m, a~n~naa vippalapantiyo hatthapatta.m susaana.m ma~n~ne, disvaanassa aadiinavo paaturahosi, nibbidaaya citta.m sa.n.thaasi. atha kho yaso kulaputto udaana.m udaanesi -- ``upadduta.m vata bho, upassa.t.tha.m vata bho''ti.

[03] atha ^a^V2.0267^ea^ kho yaso kulaputto suva.n.napaadukaayo aarohitvaa yena nivesanadvaara.m tenupasa"nkami, amanussaa dvaara.m vivari.msu -- ``maa yasassa kulaputtassa ^a^P0.0545^ea^ koci antaraayamakaasi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. atha kho yaso kulaputto yena nagaradvaara.m tenupasa"nkami, amanussaa dvaara.m vivari.msu -- ``maa yasassa kulaputtassa koci antaraayamakaasi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaayaa''ti. atha kho yaso kulaputto yena isipatana.m migadaayo tenupasa"nkami.

[03] tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya ajjhokaase ca"nkamati, addasaa kho bhagavaa yasa.m kulaputta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m, disvaana ca"nkamaa orohitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho yaso kulaputto bhagavato aviduure udaana.m udaanesi -- ``upadduta.m vata bho, upassa.t.tha.m vata bho''ti. atha kho bhagavaa yasa.m kulaputta.m ^a^M2.0272^ea^ etadavoca -- ``ida.m kho, yasa, anupadduta.m, ida.m anupassa.t.tha.m, ehi, yasa, nisiida, dhamma.m te desessaamii''ti. atha kho yaso kulaputto, ``ida.m kira anupadduta.m, ida.m anupassa.t.tha''nti ha.t.tho udaggo suva.n.napaadukaahi orohitvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi, ekamanta.m nisinnassa kho yasassa kulaputtassa bhagavaa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, seyyathida.m, daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa bhagavaa a~n~naasi yasa.m kulaputta.m kallacitta.m muducitta.m viniivara.nacitta.m udaggacitta.m pasannacitta.m, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa, ta.m pakaasesi dukkha.m samudaya.m nirodha.m magga.m. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya, evameva yasassa kulaputtassa tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti.

[03] atha kho yasassa kulaputtassa maataa paasaada.m abhiruhitvaa yasa.m kulaputta.m apassantii yena se.t.thi gahapati tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa se.t.thi.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``putto te gahapati yaso na dissatii''ti. atha kho, se.t.thi gahapati, catuddisaa assaduute uyyojetvaa saama.myeva yena isipatana.m migadaayo tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho, se.t.thi gahapati, suva.n.napaadukaana.m nikkhepa.m, disvaana ta.myeva anugamaasi. addasaa kho bhagavaa se.t.thi.m gahapati.m duuratova aagacchanta.m, disvaana bhagavato etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkhareyya.m, yathaa se.t.thi gahapati idha nisinno idha nisinna.m yasa.m kulaputta.m na passeyyaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharesi. atha kho se.t.thi gahapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^P0.0546^ea^ ^a^V2.0268^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``api, bhante, bhagavaa yasa.m kulaputta.m passeyyaa''ti. tena hi gahapati nisiida, appeva naama idha nisinno idha nisinna.m yasa.m kulaputta.m passeyyaasiiti. atha kho se.t.thi gahapati ``idheva kiraaha.m nisinno idha nisinna.m yasa.m kulaputta.m passissaamii''ti ha.t.tho udaggo bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi, ekamanta.m nisinnassa kho se.t.thissa gahapatissa bhagavaa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi...pe0... aparappaccayo atthu saasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m bhante, abhikkanta.m bhante, seyyathaapi ^a^M2.0273^ea^, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti, evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca, upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. sova loke pa.thama.m upaasako ahosi tevaaciko.

[03] atha kho yasassa kulaputtassa pituno dhamme desiyamaane yathaadi.t.tha.m yathaavidita.m bhuumi.m paccavekkhantassa anupaadaaya aayavehi citta.m vimucci. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``yasassa kho kulaputtassa pituno dhamme desiyamaane yathaadi.t.tha.m yathaavidita.m bhuumi.m paccavekkhantassa anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta.m, abhabbo kho yaso kulaputto hiinaayaavattitvaa kaame paribhu~njitu.m, seyyathaapi pubbe agaarikabhuuto, ya.mnuunaaha.m ta.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m pa.tippassambheyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa ta.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m pa.tippassambhesi. addasaa kho se.t.thi gahapati yasa.m kulaputta.m nisinna.m, disvaana yasa.m kulaputta.m etadavoca -- ``maataa te taata, yasa, paridevasokasamaapannaa, dehi maatuyaa jiivita''nti. atha kho yaso kulaputto bhagavanta.m ullokesi. atha kho bhagavaa se.t.thi.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gahapati, yassa sekkhena ~naa.nena sekkhena dassanena dhammo di.t.tho vidito seyyathaapi tayaa, tassa yathaadi.t.tha.m yathaavidita.m bhuumi.m paccavekkhantassa anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta.m, bhabbo nu kho so, gahapati, hiinaayaavattitvaa kaame paribhu~njitu.m seyyathaapi pubbe agaarikabhuuto''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``yasassa kho, gahapati, kulaputtassa sekkhena ~naa.nena sekkhena dassanena dhammo di.t.tho vidito seyyathaapi tayaa, tassa yathaadi.t.tha.m yathaavidita.m bhuumi.m paccavekkhantassa anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta.m, abhabbo kho, gahapati, yaso kulaputto hiinaayaavattitvaa kaame paribhu~njitu.m seyyathaapi pubbe agaarikabhuuto''ti. ``laabhaa, bhante, yasassa kulaputtassa, suladdha.m, bhante, yasassa kulaputtassa ^a^P0.0547^ea^, yathaa yasassa kulaputtassa anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta.m, adhivaasetu me, bhante bhagavaa, ajjatanaaya bhatta.m yasena kulaputtena pacchaasama.nenaa''ti ^a^V2.0269^ea^. ``adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena''. atha kho se.t.thi gahapati ^a^M2.0274^ea^, bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho yaso kulaputto acirapakkante se.t.thimhi gahapatimhi bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti. ``ehi bhikkhuu''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``svaakkhaato dhammo, cara brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti, saava tassa aayasmato upasampadaa ahosi.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ arahaa pana hutvaa somanassajaato attano pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^mahaasamudda.m oggayhaa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^samudda^eb^nti a"ngulimuddaaya sa.m su.t.thu dassetabbato samuddo, atha vaa sa.m su.t.thu udiyati khobhiyati pasodhiyati ghosana.m karonto aalu.liyatiiti samuddo, mahanto ca so samuddo caati mahaasamuddo, ta.m mahaasamudda.m. ^b^oggayhaa^eb^ti ajjhogaahetvaa abbhantara.m pavisitvaa tassa mahaasamuddassa anto pavisitvaa, saamyatthe ceta.m upayogavacananti da.t.thabba.m. ^b^bhavana.m me sumaapita^eb^nti ettha bhavanti nibbattanti nivasanti catuuhi iriyaapathehi vaasa.m kappenti etthaati bhavana.m, mayha.m ta.m bhavana.m ta.m vimaana.m ta.m paasaada.m pa~ncapaakaarakuu.taagaarehi sa.m su.t.thu maapita.m nagara.m, attano balena su.t.thu nimmitanti attho. ^b^sunimmitaa pokkhara.nii^eb^ti sumahantaa hutvaa bhuutaa itaa gataa pavattaa kha.nitaa kataati pokkhara.nii, macchakacchapapupphapulinatitthamadhurodakaadiihi su.t.thu nibbattaa nimmitaati attho. ^b^cakkavaakuupakuujitaa^eb^ti cakkavaakakukku.taha.msaadiihi kuujitaa ghositaa naaditaa saa pokkhara.niiti sambandho. ito para.m nadiivanadvipadacatuppadapaadapapakkhiina.m va.n.na~nca sumedhassa bhagavato dassana~nca nimantetvaa sumedhassa bhagavato daanakkama~nca suvi~n~neyyameva.

[03] ^b^lokaahutipa.tiggaha^eb^nti ettha loke aahuti lokaahuti, kaamaruupaaruupasa"nkhaatassa lokassa aahuti.m puujaasakkaara.m pa.tigga.nhaatiiti lokaahutipa.tiggaha.m, sumedha.m bhagavantanti attho. sesa.m byaakara.nadaana~nca arahattappattaphala~nca suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] yasattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] dutiyaapadaane ^a^M2.0275^ea^ ^a^P0.0548^ea^ ^a^V2.0270^ea^ ^b^padumuttarassa bhagavato^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato nadiikassapattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m satthaara.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso attanaa ropitassa ambarukkhassa pa.thamuppanna.m manosilaava.n.na.m eka.m ambaphala.m adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade magadhara.t.the braahma.nakule uruvelakassapassa bhaataa hutvaa nibbatto vayappatto nissara.najjhaasayataaya gharaavaasa.m anicchanto taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa tiihi taapasasatehi saddhi.m nera~njaraaya nadiyaa tiire assama.m maapetvaa viharati. nadiitiire vasanato kassapagottataaya ca ^b^nadiikassapo^eb^ti sama~n~naa ahosi. tassa bhagavaa saparisassa ehibhikkhubhaavena upasampada.m adaasi. so bhagavato gayaasiise ^b^aadittapariyaaya desanaaya^eb^ (mahaava0 54; sa.m0 ni0 4.28) arahatte pati.t.thaasi.

[03] tatraaya.m anupubbikathaa -- satthaa yasa.m kulaputta.m pabbaajetvaa uruvelaaya.m tayo bhaatikaja.tile dametu.m yena uruvelaa tadavasari. tena kho pana samayena uruvelaaya.m tayo ja.tilaa pa.tivasanti uruvelakassapo nadiikassapo gayaakassapoti, tesu uruvelakassapo ja.tilo pa~ncanna.m ja.tilasataana.m naayako hoti vinaayako aggo pamukho paamokkho, nadiikassapo ja.tilo ti.n.na.m ja.tilasataana.m naayako hoti vinaayako aggo pamukho paamokkho, gayaakassapo ja.tilo dvinna.m ja.tilasataana.m naayako hoti vinaayako aggo pamukho paamokkho. atha kho bhagavaa yena uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa assamo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m etadavoca -- ``sace te, kassapa, agaru, vaseyyaama ekaratta.m agyaagaare''ti. na kho me, mahaasama.na, garu, ca.n.dettha naagaraajaa iddhimaa aasiviso ghoraviso, so ta.m maa vihe.thesiiti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m etadavoca...pe0... tatiyampi...pe0... so ta.m maa vihe.thesiiti. appeva ma.m na vihe.theyya, i"ngha tva.m, kassapa, anujaanaahi agyaagaaranti ^a^M2.0276^ea^. vihara, mahaasama.na, yathaasukhanti. atha kho bhagavaa agyaagaara.m pavisitvaa ti.nasanthaaraka.m pa~n~napetvaa nisiidi palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa.

[03] addasaa kho so naago bhagavanta.m pavi.t.tha.m, disvaa dummano padhuupaayi. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi ^a^V2.0271^ea^ -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m imassa naagassa anupahacca chavi~nca camma~nca ^a^P0.0549^ea^ ma.msa~nca nhaaru~nca a.t.thi~nca a.t.thimi~nja~nca tejasaa teja.m pariyaadiyeyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharitvaa padhuupaayi. atha kho so naago makkha.m asahamaano pajjali. bhagavaapi tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitvaa pajjali. ubhinna.m sajotibhuutaana.m agyaagaara.m aaditta.m viya hoti sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m. atha kho te ja.tilaa agyaagaara.m parivaaretvaa evamaaha.msu -- ``abhiruupo vata, bho, mahaasama.no naagena vihe.thiyatii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena tassa naagassa anupahacca chavi~nca camma~nca ma.msa~nca nhaaru~nca a.t.thi~nca a.t.thimi~nja~nca tejasaa teja.m pariyaadiyitvaa patte pakkhipitvaa uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa dassesi -- ``aya.m te, kassapa, naago pariyaadinno assa tejasaa tejo''ti. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama ca.n.dassa naagaraajassa iddhimato aasivisassa ghoravisassa tejasaa teja.m pariyaadiyissati, na tveva kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti.
[21] ``nera~njaraaya.m bhagavaa, uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m avoca.
[22] sace te kassapa agaru, viharemu ajja.nho aggisaalamhii''ti..
[21] ``na kho me mahaasama.na garu, phaasukaamova ta.m nivaaremi.
[27] ca.n.dettha naagaraajaa, iddhimaa aasiviso ghoraviso.
[22] so ta.m maa vihe.thesii''ti..
[21] ``appeva ^a^M2.0277^ea^ ma.m na vihe.theyya, i"ngha tva.m kassapa anujaanaahi agyaagaaranti.
[22] dinnanti na.m viditvaa, abhiito paavisi bhayamatiito..
[21] ``disvaa isi.m pavi.t.tha.m, ahinaago dummano padhuupaayi.
[22] sumanamanaso adhimano, manussanaagopi tattha padhuupaayi..
[21] ``makkha~nca asahamaano, ahinaago paavakova pajjali.
[22] tejodhaatusukusalo, manussanaagopi tattha pajjali..
[21] ``ubhinna.m ^a^V2.0272^ea^ sajotibhuutaana.m,
[27] agyaagaara.m aaditta.m hoti sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m.
[26] udicchare ja.tilaa, abhiruupo vata bho mahaasama.no.
[22] naagena vihe.thiyatiiti bha.nanti..
[21] ``atha tassaa rattiyaa accayena, hataa naagassa acciyo honti.
[22] iddhimato pana .thitaa, anekava.n.naa acciyo honti..
[21] ``niilaa atha lohitikaa, ma~nji.t.thaa piitakaa phalikava.n.naayo.
[22] a"ngiirasassa kaaye, anekava.n.naa acciyo honti..
[21] ``pattamhi odahitvaa, ahinaaga.m braahma.nassa dassesi.
[22] aya.m te kassapa naago, pariyaadinno assa tejasaa tejo''ti..
[03] atha ^a^M2.0278^ea^ kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo bhagavato iminaa iddhipaa.tihaariyena abhippasanno bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idheva, mahaasama.na, vihara, aha.m te dhuvabhattenaa''ti.
[06] pa.thama.m paa.tihaariya.m.

[03] atha ^a^P0.0550^ea^ kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa assamassa aviduure a~n~natarasmi.m vanasa.n.de vihaasi. atha kho cattaaro mahaaraajaano abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m vanasa.n.da.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa catuddisaa a.t.tha.msu seyyathaapi mahantaa aggikkhandhaa. atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo tassaa rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kaalo, mahaasama.na, ni.t.thita.m bhatta.m, te nu kho te, mahaasama.na, abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m vanasa.n.da.m obhaasetvaa yena tva.m tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m abhivaadetvaa catuddisaa a.t.tha.msu seyyathaapi mahantaa aggikkhandhaa''ti. ete kho, kassapa, cattaaro mahaaraajaano yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami.msu dhammassavanaayaati. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama cattaaropi mahaaraajaano upasa"nkamissanti dhammassavanaaya, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti ^a^V2.0273^ea^. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa bhatta.m bhu~njitvaa tasmi.myeva vanasa.n.de vihaasi.
[06] dutiya.m paa.tihaariya.m.

[03] atha kho sakko devaanamindo abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m vanasa.n.da.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi seyyathaapi mahaaaggikkhandho purimaahi va.n.nanibhaahi abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro ca. atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo tassaa rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kaalo, mahaasama.na, ni.t.thita.m bhatta.m, ko nu kho so, mahaasama.na, abhikkantaaya ^a^M2.0279^ea^ rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m vanasa.n.da.m obhaasetvaa yena tva.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi seyyathaapi mahaaaggikkhandho purimaahi va.n.nanibhaahi abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti. eso kho, kassapa, sakko devaanamindo yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami dhammassavanaayaati. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama sakkopi devaanamindo upasa"nkamissati dhammassavanaaya, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti ^a^P0.0551^ea^. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa bhatta.m bhu~njitvaa tasmi.myeva vanasa.n.de vihaasi.
[06] tatiya.m paa.tihaariya.m.

[03] atha kho brahmaa sahampati abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m vanasa.n.da.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi seyyathaapi mahaaaggikkhandho purimaahi va.n.nanibhaahi abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro ca. atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo tassaa rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kaalo, mahaasama.na, ni.t.thita.m bhatta.m, ko nu kho so, mahaasama.na, abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m vanasa.n.da.m obhaasetvaa yena tva.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi seyyathaapi mahaaaggikkhandho purimaahi va.n.nanibhaahi abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti. eso kho, kassapa, brahmaa sahampati yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami dhammassavanaayaati. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama brahmaapi sahampati upasa"nkamissati ^a^V2.0274^ea^ dhammassavanaaya, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa bhatta.m bhu~njitvaa tasmi.myeva vanasa.n.de vihaasi.
[06] catuttha.m paa.tihaariya.m.

[03] tena kho pana samayena uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa mahaaya~n~no paccupa.t.thito hoti, kevalakappaa ca a"ngamagadhaa pahuuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m ^a^M2.0280^ea^ aadaaya abhikkamitukaamaa honti. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``etarahi kho me mahaaya~n~no paccupa.t.thito, kevalakappaa ca a"ngamagadhaa pahuuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m aadaaya abhikkamissanti, sace mahaasama.no mahaajanakaaye iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissati, mahaasama.nassa laabhasakkaaro abhiva.d.dhissati, mama laabhasakkaaro parihaayissati, aho nuuna mahaasama.no svaatanaaya naagaccheyyaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya uttarakuru.m gantvaa tato pi.n.dapaata.m aaharitvaa anotattadahe paribhu~njitvaa tattheva divaavihaara.m akaasi. atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo tassaa rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kaalo, mahaasama.na, ni.t.thita.m bhatta.m, ki.m nu kho, mahaasama.na, hiyyo naagamaasi, apica maya.m ta.m saraama, `ki.m nu kho mahaasama.no naagacchatii'ti, khaadaniiyassa ca bhojaniiyassa ^a^P0.0552^ea^ ca te pa.tiviiso .thapito''ti. nanu te, kassapa, etadahosi -- ``etarahi kho me mahaaya~n~no paccupa.t.thito kevalakappaa ca a"ngamagadhaa pahuuta.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m aadaaya abhikkamissanti, sace mahaasama.no mahaajanakaaye iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissati, mahaasama.nassa laabhasakkaaro abhiva.d.dhissati, mama laabhasakkaaro parihaayissati, aho nuuna mahaasama.no svaatanaaya naagaccheyyaa''ti, so kho aha.m, kassapa, tava cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya uttarakuru.m gantvaa tato pi.n.dapaata.m aaharitvaa anotattadahe paribhu~njitvaa tattheva divaavihaara.m akaasinti. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama cetasaapi citta.m pajaanissati, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa bhatta.m bhu~njitvaa tasmi.myeva vanasa.n.de vihaasi.
[06] pa~ncama.m paa.tihaariya.m.

[03] tena ^a^V2.0275^ea^ kho pana samayena bhagavato pa.msukuula.m uppanna.m hoti. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``kattha nu kho aha.m pa.msukuula.m dhoveyya''nti? atha kho sakko devaanamindo bhagavato cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya ^a^M2.0281^ea^ paa.ninaa pokkhara.ni.m kha.nitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idha, bhante bhagavaa, pa.msukuula.m dhovatuu''ti. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``kimhi nu kho aha.m pa.msukuula.m parimaddeyya''nti? atha kho sakko devaanamindo bhagavato cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya mahati.m sila.m upanikkhipi -- ``idha, bhante bhagavaa, pa.msukuula.m parimaddatuu''ti. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``kimhi nu kho aha.m aalambitvaa uttareyya''nti? atha kho kakudhe adhivatthaa devataa bhagavato cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya saakha.m onaamesi -- ``idha, bhante bhagavaa, aalambitvaa uttaratuu''ti. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``kimhi nu kho aha.m pa.msukuula.m vissajjeyya''nti? atha kho sakko devaanamindo bhagavato cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya mahati.m sila.m upanikkhipi -- ``idha, bhante bhagavaa, pa.msukuula.m vissajjetuu''ti. atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo tassaa rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kaalo, mahaasama.na, ni.t.thita.m bhatta.m, ki.m nu kho, mahaasama.na, naaya.m pubbe idha pokkhara.nii saaya.m idha pokkhara.nii, nayimaa silaa pubbe upanikkhittaa, kenimaa silaa upanikkhittaa, nayimassa kakudhassa pubbe saakhaa onataa, saaya.m saakhaa onataa''ti? idha me, kassapa, pa.msukuula.m uppanna.m ^a^P0.0553^ea^ ahosi, tassa mayha.m, kassapa, etadahosi -- ``kattha nu kho aha.m pa.msukuula.m dhoveyya''nti? atha kho, kassapa, sakko devaanamindo mama cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya paa.ninaa pokkhara.ni.m kha.nitvaa ma.m etadavoca -- ``idha, bhante bhagavaa, pa.msukuula.m dhovatuu''ti. saaya.m, kassapa, amanussena paa.ninaa kha.nitaa pokkhara.nii. tassa mayha.m, kassapa, etadahosi -- ``kimhi nu kho aha.m pa.msukuula.m parimaddeyya''nti? atha kho, kassapa, sakko devaanamindo mama cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya mahati.m sila.m upanikkhipi -- ``idha, bhante bhagavaa, pa.msukuula.m parimaddatuu''ti? saaya.m, kassapa, amanussena upanikkhittaa silaa. tassa mayha.m, kassapa, etadahosi -- ``kimhi nu kho aha.m aalambitvaa uttareyya''nti? atha kho, kassapa, kakudhe adhivatthaa devataa mama cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya saakha.m onaamesi -- ``idha, bhante bhagavaa, aalambitvaa uttaratuu''ti? svaaya.m aaharahattho kakudho. tassa mayha.m, kassapa, etadahosi -- ``kimhi nu kho aha.m pa.msukuula.m vissajjeyya''nti? atha kho, kassapa, sakko devaanamindo mama cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya ^a^M2.0282^ea^ mahati.m sila.m upanikkhipi -- ``idha, bhante bhagavaa, pa.msukuula.m vissajjetuu''ti? saaya.m, kassapa, amanussena upanikkhittaa silaati. atha kho uruvelakassapassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo ^a^V2.0276^ea^, yatra hi naama sakkopi devaanamindo veyyaavacca.m karissati, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa bhatta.m bhu~njitvaa tasmi.myeva vanasa.n.de vihaasi.

[03] atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo tassaa rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocesi -- ``kaalo, mahaasama.na, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. ``gaccha tva.m, kassapa, aayaamaha''nti uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m uyyojetvaa yaaya jambuyaa jambudiipo pa~n~naayati, tato phala.m gahetvaa pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa agyaagaare nisiidi. addasaa kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo bhagavanta.m agyaagaare nisinna.m, disvaana bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``katamena tva.m, mahaasama.na, maggena aagato, aha.m tayaa pa.thamatara.m pakkanto, so tva.m pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa agyaagaare nisinno''ti? ``idhaaha.m, kassapa, ta.m uyyojetvaa yaaya jambuyaa jambudiipo pa~n~naayati, tato phala.m gahetvaa pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa agyaagaare nisinno. ida.m kho, kassapa, jambuphala.m va.n.nasampanna.m gandhasampanna.m rasasampanna.m, sace aaka"nkhasi paribhu~njaa''ti. ``ala.m, mahaasama.na, tva.myeva ta.m arahasi, tva.myeva ta.m paribhu~njaa''ti. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama ma.m pa.thamatara.m uyyojetvaa yaaya jambuyaa ^a^P0.0554^ea^ jambudiipo pa~n~naayati, tato phala.m gahetvaa pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa agyaagaare nisiidissati, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa bhatta.m bhu~njitvaa tasmi.myeva vanasa.n.de vihaasi.

[03] atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo tassaa rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocesi -- ``kaalo, mahaasama.na, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. ``gaccha tva.m, kassapa, aayaamaha''nti uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m uyyojetvaa yaaya jambuyaa jambudiipo pa~n~naayati, tassaa aviduure ambo...pe0... tassaa aviduure aamalakii...pe0... ^a^M2.0283^ea^ tassaa aviduure hariitakii...pe0... taavati.msa.m gantvaa paaricchattakapuppha.m gahetvaa pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa agyaagaare nisiidi. addasaa kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo bhagavanta.m agyaagaare nisinna.m, disvaana bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``katamena tva.m, mahaasama.na, maggena aagato, aha.m tayaa pa.thamatara.m pakkanto, so tva.m pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa agyaagaare nisinno''ti? ``idhaaha.m, kassapa, ta.m uyyojetvaa taavati.msa.m gantvaa paaricchattakapuppha.m gahetvaa pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa agyaagaare nisinno. ida.m kho, kassapa, paaricchattakapuppha.m va.n.nasampanna.m gandhasampanna.m, sace aaka"nkhasi ga.nhaa''ti ^a^V2.0277^ea^. ``ala.m, mahaasama.na, tva.myeva ta.m arahasi, tva.myeva ta.m ga.nhaa''ti. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama ma.m pa.thamatara.m uyyojetvaa taavati.msa.m gantvaa paaricchattakapuppha.m gahetvaa pa.thamatara.m aagantvaa agyaagaare nisiidissati, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena te ja.tilaa aggi.m paricaritukaamaa na sakkonti ka.t.thaani phaaletu.m. atha kho tesa.m ja.tilaana.m etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho mahaasama.nassa iddhaanubhaavo yathaa maya.m na sakkoma ka.t.thaani phaaletu''nti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapa.m ^a^P0.0555^ea^ ja.tila.m etadavoca -- ``phaaliyantu, kassapa, ka.t.thaanii''ti. ``phaaliyantu, mahaasama.naa''ti. sakideva pa~nca ka.t.thasataani phaaliyi.msu. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama ka.t.thaanipi phaaliyissanti, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena te ja.tilaa aggi.m paricaritukaamaa na sakkonti aggi.m ujjaletu.m. atha kho tesa.m ja.tilaana.m etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho mahaasama.nassa iddhaanubhaavo yathaa maya.m na sakkoma aggi.m ujjaletu''nti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m etadavoca -- ``ujjaliyantu, kassapa, aggii''ti. ``ujjaliyantu, mahaasama.naa''ti. sakideva pa~nca aggisataani ujjaliyi.msu. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama aggiipi ujjaliyissanti, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti.

[03] tena ^a^M2.0284^ea^ kho pana samayena te ja.tilaa aggi.m paricaritvaa na sakkonti aggi.m vijjhaapetu.m. atha kho tesa.m ja.tilaana.m etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho mahaasama.nassa iddhaanubhaavo yathaa maya.m na sakkoma aggi.m vijjhaapetu''nti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m etadavoca -- ``vijjhaayantu, kassapa, aggii''ti. ``vijjhaayantu, mahaasama.naa''ti. sakideva pa~nca aggisataani vijjhaayi.msu. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama aggiipi vijjhaayissanti, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena te ja.tilaa siitaasu hemantikaasu rattiisu antara.t.thakaasu himapaatasamaye ^a^V2.0278^ea^ najjaa nera~njaraaya ummujjantipi nimujjantipi ummujjananimujjanampi karonti. atha kho bhagavaa pa~ncamattaani mandaamukhisataani abhinimmini yattha te ja.tilaa uttaritvaa visibbesu.m. atha kho tesa.m ja.tilaana.m etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho mahaasama.nassa iddhaanubhaavo yathayimaa mandaamukhiyo nimmitaa''ti. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, yatra hi naama taava bahuu mandaamukhiyopi abhinimminissati, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena mahaa akaalamegho paavassi, mahaa udakavaahako sa~njaayi, yasmi.m padese bhagavaa viharati so padeso udakena na ottha.to hoti. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m samantaa udaka.m ussaaretvaa majjhe re.nuhataaya bhuumiyaa ca"nkameyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa samantaa udaka.m ussaaretvaa majjhe re.nuhataaya bhuumiyaa ca"nkami. atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo ``maaheva kho mahaasama.no udakena vuu.lho ahosii''ti naavaaya sambahulehi ja.tilehi saddhi.m yasmi.m padese bhagavaa viharati, ta.m padesa.m agamaasi. addasaa kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo bhagavanta.m ^a^P0.0556^ea^ samantaa udaka.m ussaaretvaa majjhe re.nuhataaya bhuumiyaa ca"nkamanta.m, disvaana bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m nu tva.m, mahaasama.naa''ti. ``ayamahamasmi, kassapaa''ti bhagavaa vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa naavaaya paccu.t.thaasi. atha kho uruvelakassapassa ja.tilassa etadahosi -- ``mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo ^a^M2.0285^ea^, yatra hi naama udakampi na pavaahissati, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha''nti.

[03] atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``cirampi kho imassa moghapurisassa eva.m bhavissati `mahiddhiko kho mahaasama.no mahaanubhaavo, na tveva ca kho arahaa yathaa aha'nti, ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m ja.tila.m sa.mvejeyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa uruvelakassapa.m ja.tila.m etadavoca -- ``neva ca kho tva.m, kassapa, arahaa, naapi arahattamaggasamaapanno, saapi te pa.tipadaa natthi, yaaya tva.m arahaa vaa assasi arahattamagga.m vaa samaapanno''ti. atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti. ``tva.m khosi, kassapa, pa~ncanna.m ja.tilasataana.m naayako vinaayako aggo pamukho paamokkho, tepi taava apalokehi, yathaa te ma~n~nissanti, tathaa te karissantii''ti. atha kho uruvelakassapo ja.tilo yena te ja.tilaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te ja.tile etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, bho, mahaasama.ne brahmacariya.m caritu.m, yathaa bhavanto ma~n~nanti tathaa karontuu''ti. ``cirapa.tikaa maya.m, bho, mahaasama.ne abhippasannaa, sace bhava.m ^a^V2.0279^ea^ mahaasama.ne brahmacariya.m carissati, sabbeva maya.m mahaasama.ne brahmacariya.m carissaamaa''ti. atha kho te ja.tilaa kesamissa.m ja.taamissa.m khaarikaajamissa.m aggihutamissa.m udake pavaahetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``labheyyaama maya.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyyaama upasampada''nti. ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``svaakkhaato dhammo, caratha brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. saava tesa.m aayasmantaana.m upasampadaa ahosi.

[03] addasaa kho nadiikassapo ja.tilo kesamissa.m ja.taamissa.m khaarikaajamissa.m aggihutamissa.m udake vuyhamaane, disvaanassa etadahosi -- ``maaheva me bhaatuno upasaggo ahosii''ti, ja.tile paahesi -- ``gacchatha me bhaatara.m jaanaathaa''ti, saama~nca tiihi ja.tilasatehi saddhi.m yenaayasmaa uruvelakassapo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m ^a^P0.0557^ea^ uruvelakassapa.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m nu kho, kassapa, seyyo''ti? ``aamaavuso, ida.m seyyo''ti. atha kho te ja.tilaa kesamissa.m ja.taamissa.m khaarikaajamissa.m aggihutamissa.m ^a^M2.0286^ea^ udake pavaahetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``labheyyaama maya.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyyaama upasampada''nti. ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``svaakkhaato dhammo, caratha brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. saava tesa.m aayasmantaana.m upasampadaa ahosi.

[03] addasaa kho gayaakassapo ja.tilo kesamissa.m ja.taamissa.m khaarikaajamissa.m aggihutamissa.m udake vuyhamaane, disvaanassa etadahosi -- ``maaheva me bhaatuuna.m upasaggo ahosii''ti, ja.tile paahesi -- ``gacchatha me bhaataro jaanaathaa''ti, saama~nca dviihi ja.tilasatehi saddhi.m yenaayasmaa uruvelakassapo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m uruvelakassapa.m etadavoca -- ``ida.m nu kho, kassapa, seyyo''ti? ``aamaavuso, ida.m seyyo''ti. atha kho te ja.tilaa kesamissa.m ja.taamissa.m khaarikaajamissa.m aggihutamissa.m udake pavaahetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``labheyyaama maya.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyyaama upasampada''nti. ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti, bhagavaa avoca -- ``svaakkhaato dhammo, caratha brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. saava tesa.m aayasmantaana.m upasampadaa ahosi.

[02] ``bhagavato ^a^V2.0280^ea^ adhi.t.thaanena pa~nca ka.t.thasataani na phaaliyi.msu, phaaliyi.msu, aggii na ujjaliyi.msu, ujjaliyi.msu, na vijjhaayi.msu, vijjhaayi.msu, pa~nca mandaamukhisataani abhinimmini, etena nayena a.d.dhu.d.dhapaa.tihaariyasahassaani honti.

[02] ``atha kho bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena gayaasiisa.m tena caarika.m pakkaami mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m sahassena sabbeheva puraa.naja.tilehi. tatra suda.m bhagavaa gayaaya.m viharati gayaasiise saddhi.m bhikkhusahassena. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhu aamantesi (sa.m0 ni0 4.28) -- `sabba.m, bhikkhave, aaditta.m, ki~nca, bhikkhave, sabba.m aaditta.m, cakkhu, bhikkhave, aaditta.m, ruupaa aadittaa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m ^a^M2.0287^ea^ aaditta.m, cakkhusamphasso aaditto, yamida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi ^a^P0.0558^ea^ aaditta.m. kena aaditta.m, raagagginaa dosagginaa mohagginaa aaditta.m, jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi aadittanti vadaami? sota.m aaditta.m, saddaa aadittaa...pe0... ghaana.m aaditta.m, gandhaa aadittaa...pe0... jivhaa aadittaa, rasaa aadittaa...pe0... kaayo aaditto, pho.t.thabbaa aadittaa...pe0... mano aaditto, dhammaa aadittaa, manovi~n~naa.na.m aaditta.m, manosamphasso aaditto, yamida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aaditta.m. kena aaditta.m, raagagginaa dosagginaa mohagginaa aaditta.m, jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi aaditta'''nti vadaami.

[02] ``eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, ruupesupi nibbindati, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati, yamida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tasmimpi nibbindati. sotasmimpi nibbindati, saddesupi nibbindati...pe0... ghaanasmimpi nibbindati, gandhesupi nibbindati...pe0... jivhaayapi nibbindati, rasesupi nibbindati...pe0... kaayasmimpi nibbindati, pho.t.thabbesupi nibbindati...pe0... manasmimpi nibbindati, dhammesupi nibbindati, manovi~n~naa.nepi nibbindati, manosamphassepi nibbindati, yamida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tasmimpi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati ^a^V2.0281^ea^, viraagaa vimuccati, vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti, `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti.
[03] imasmi~nca pana veyyaakara.nasmi.m bha~n~namaane tassa bhikkhusahassassa anupaadaaya aasavehi cittaani vimucci.msu.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ eva.m aadittapariyaayadesana.m sutvaa saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m sampatto nadiikassapo thero somanassajaato attano pubbacaritaapadaana.m ^a^M2.0288^ea^ pakaasento ^b^padumuttarassa bhagavato^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^aggaphala^eb^nti uttamaphala.m, attanaa ropitaambarukkhassa aadimhi gahitaphala.m vaa. sesa.m suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] nadiikassapattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] tatiyaapadaane ^a^P0.0559^ea^ ^b^ajinacammavatthoha^eb^ntiaadika.m aayasmato gayaakassapattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m kusala.m upacinanto ito ekati.msakappe sikhissa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbatto vi~n~nuta.m patto nissara.najjhaasayataaya gharaavaasa.m pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa ara~n~naayatane assama.m maapetvaa vanamuulaphalaahaaro vasati. tena ca samayena bhagavaa eko adutiyo tassa assamasamiipenaagacchi, so bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m .thito vela.m olokento manoharaani kolaphalaani satthu upanesi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto nissara.najjhaasayataaya gharaavaasa.m pahaaya taapasapabbajja.m pabbajitvaa dviihi taapasasatehi saddhi.m gayaaya viharati. gayaaya vasanato hissa kassapagottataaya ca ^b^gayaakassapo^eb^ti sama~n~naa ahosi. so bhagavato saddhi.m parisaaya ehibhikkhuupasampada.m datvaa nadiikassapassa vuttanayena aadittapariyaaya desanaaya ovadiyamaano arahatte pati.t.thaasi.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ so arahatta.m patvaa somanassajaato attano pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^ajinacammavatthoha^eb^ntiaadimaaha ^a^V2.0282^ea^. tattha ^b^ajinacammavattho^eb^ti taapasapabbajitattaa ajinacammanivaasanapaavura.noti attho. ^b^khaaribhaaradharo^eb^ti taapasakaale taapasaparikkhaaraparipu.n.nakaajadharoti attho. khaarikataapasaparikkhaare puuretvaa. ^b^kola.m ahaasi assama^eb^nti kolaphala.m assame puuretvaa assame nisinnoti attho. ^b^agopayi^eb^nti ^a^M2.0289^ea^ paa.the kolaphala.m pariyesitvaa assama.m gopesi.m rakkhinti attho. sesa.m sabba.m uttaanatthamevaati.
[06] gayaakassapattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] catutthaapadaane ^b^nibbute kakusandhamhii^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato kimilattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto kakusandhassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vi~n~nuta.m patto parinibbute satthari ^a^P0.0560^ea^ tassa dhaatuyo uddissa salalamaalaahi ma.n.dapa.m kaaretvaa puuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena taavati.msesu uppajjitvaa aparaapara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kapilavatthunagare sakyaraajakule nibbattitvaa ^b^kimilo^eb^ti tassa naama.m akaasi. so vayappatto bhogasampattiyaa pamatto viharati. tassa ~naa.naparipaaka.m ~natvaa sa.mvegajananattha.m anupiyaaya.m viharanto satthaa pa.thamayobbane .thita.m rama.niiya.m itthiruupa.m abhinimminitvaa purato dassetvaa puna anukkamena yathaa jaraarogavipattiihi abhibhuutaa dissati, tathaa akaasi. ta.m disvaa kimilakumaaro ativiya sa.mvegajaato attano sa.mvega.m pakaasento bhagavato paaka.ta.m katvaa laddhaanusaasano arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ so arahatta.m patvaa somanassajaato attano pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^nibbute kakusandhamhii^eb^tiaadimaaha. ^b^braahma.namhi vusiimatii^eb^ti pa~ncahi vasitaahi vasippattamhi bhagavati. braahma.nassa sabbagu.naga.nehi ma.n.ditattaa abhivuu.lhiitattaa braahma.namhi kakusandhe bhagavati parinibbuteti attho. sesa.m sabba.m uttaanamevaati.
[06] kimilattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] ^b^sahassara.msii^eb^ ^a^M2.0290^ea^ ^a^V2.0283^ea^ ^b^bhagavaa^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato vajjiputtattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissaya.m pu~n~na.m upacinanto ito catunavutikappe eka.m paccekabuddha.m bhikkhaaya gacchanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso kadaliphalaani adaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade vesaaliya.m licchaviraajakumaaro hutvaa nibbatti, vajjiraajaputtattaa ^b^vajjiputto^eb^tvevassa sama~n~naa. so daharo hutvaa hatthisippaadisikkhanakaalepi hetusampannataaya nissara.najjhaasayova hutvaa vicaranto satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho satthu santike pabbajitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m katvaa nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa aparabhaage aciraparinibbute satthari dhamma.m sa"ngaayitu.m sa"nketa.m katvaa mahaatheresu tattha tattha viharantesu ekadivasa.m aayasmanta.m aananda.m sekha.myeva samaana.m mahatiyaa parisaaya parivuta.m dhamma.m desenta.m disvaa tassa uparimaggaadhigamaaya ussaaha.m janento --
[21] ``rukkhamuulagahana.m ^a^P0.0561^ea^ pasakkiya, nibbaana.m hadayasmi.m opiya.
[22] jhaaya gotama maa ca pamaado, ki.m te bi.libi.likaa karissatii''ti.. (theragaa0 119) -- gaatha.m abhaasi.

[03] tattha ^b^rukkhamuulagahana^eb^nti rukkhamuulabhuuta.m gahana.m, gahana~nhi atthi, na rukkhamuula.m, rukkhamuula~nca atthi, na gahana.m, tesu rukkhamuulaggaha.nena .thaanassa chaayaaya sampannataaya vaataatapaparissayaabhaava.m diipeti, gahanaggaha.nena nivaatabhaavena vaataparissayaabhaava.m janasambaadhaabhaava~nca dasseti, tadubhayena ca bhaavanaayogyata.m. ^b^pasakkiyaa^eb^ti upagantvaa. ^b^nibbaana.m hadayasmi.m opiyaa^eb^ti ``eva.m mayaa pa.tipajjitvaa nibbaana.m adhigantabba''nti nibbuti.m hadaye .thapetvaa citte katvaa. ^b^jhaayaa^eb^ti tilakkha.nuupanijjhaanena jhaaya, vipassanaabhaavanaasahita.m maggabhaavana.m bhaavehi. ^b^gotamaa^eb^ti dhammabha.n.daagaarika.m gottenaalapati. ^b^maa ca pamaado^eb^ti adhikusalesu dhammesu maa pamaada.m aapajji. idaani yaadiso ^a^M2.0291^ea^ therassa pamaado, ta.m pa.tikkhepavasena dassento ^b^``ki.m te bi.libi.likaa karissatii''^eb^ti aaha. tattha ^b^bi.libi.likaa^eb^ti bi.libi.likiriyaa, bi.libi.litisaddapavatti yathaa niratthakaa, eva.m bi.libi.likaasadisaa janapa~n~natti. ^b^ki.m te karissatii^eb^ti kiidisa.m attha.m tuyha.m saadhessati, tasmaa janapa~n~natti.m pahaaya sadatthapasuto hohiiti ovaada.m adaasi.

[03] ta.m ^a^V2.0284^ea^ sutvaa a~n~nehi vuttena vissagandhavaayanavacanena sa.mvegajaato bahudeva ratti.m ca"nkamena viitinaamento vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa senaasana.m pavisitvaa ma~ncake nisinnamattova ``ki~nci sayaamii''ti siisa.m bimbohanamasampatta.m paada.m bhuumito uggata.m sariirassa aakaasagatakkha.neyeva arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ vajjiputtatthero aparabhaage somanassajaato attano pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^sahassara.msii bhagavaa^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha ^b^sahassara.msii^eb^ti ettha ``anekasatasahassara.msii''ti vattabbe gaathaabandhasukhattha.m ``sahassara.msii''ti vuttanti veditabba.m. sesa.m suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] vajjiputtattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] cha.t.thaapadaane ^b^sumedho naama sambuddho^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato uttarasaama.nerassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro ^a^P0.0562^ea^ tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kaale vijjaadharo hutvaa aakaasena vicarati. tena ca samayena satthaa tasseva anugga.nhanattha.m vanantare a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiidi chabba.n.nabuddhara.msiyo vissajjento. so antalikkhena gacchanto bhagavanta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso aakaasato oruyha suvisuddhehi vipulehi ka.nikaarapupphehi bhagavanta.m puujesi, pupphaani buddhaanubhaavena satthu upari chattaakaarena a.t.tha.msu, so tena bhiyyosomattaaya pasannacitto hutvaa aparabhaage kaala.m katvaa taavati.msesu nibbattitvaa dibbasampatti.m anubhavanto yaavataayuka.m tattha .thatvaa tato cuto devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahe braahma.namahaasaalassa putto hutvaa ^a^M2.0292^ea^ nibbatti, ^b^uttaro^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so vi~n~nuta.m patto braahma.navijjaasu nipphatti.m gantvaa jaatiyaa ruupena vijjaaya vayena siilaacaarena ca lokassa sambhaavaniiyo jaato.

[03] tassa ta.m sampatti.m disvaa vassakaaro magadhamahaamatto attano dhiitara.m daatukaamo hutvaa attano adhippaaya.m pavedesi. so nissara.najjhaasayataaya ta.m pa.tikkhipitvaa kaalena kaala.m dhammasenaapati.m payirupaasanto tassa santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vattasampanno hutvaa thera.m upa.t.thahati.

[03] tena ^a^V2.0285^ea^ ca samayena therassa a~n~nataro aabaadho uppanno, tassa bhesajjatthaaya uttaro saama.nero paatova pattaciivaramaadaaya vihaarato nikkhanto antaraamagge ta.laakassa samiipe patta.m .thapetvaa udakasamiipa.m gantvaa mukha.m dhovati. atha a~n~nataro uma"ngacoro katakammo aarakkhapurisehi anubaddho aggamaggena nagarato nikkhamitvaa palaayanto attanaa gahita.m ratanabha.n.dita.m saama.nerassa patte pakkhipitvaa palaayi. saama.neropi pattasamiipa.m upagato. cora.m anubandhantaa raajapurisaa saama.nerassa patte bha.n.dika.m disvaa ``aya.m coro, iminaa coriya.m kata''nti saama.nera.m pacchaabaaha.m bandhitvaa vassakaarassa braahma.nassa dassesu.m. vassakaaro ca tadaa ra~n~no vinicchaye niyutto hutvaa chejjabhejja.m anusaasati, so ``pubbe mama vacana.m naadiyi, suddhapaasa.n.diyesu pabbajii''ti (theragaa0 a.t.tha0 1.uttarattheragaathaava.n.nanaa) kamma.m asodhetvaa ghaatukaamattaava jiivantameva ta.m suule uttaasesi.

[03] athassa bhagavaa ~naa.naparipaaka.m oloketvaa ta.m .thaana.m gantvaa vipphurantahatthanakhama.nimayuukhasambhinnasitaabhataaya paggharantajaatihi"ngulakasuva.n.narasadhaara.m viya jaalaagu.n.thitamudutalunadiigha"ngulihattha.m uttarassa siise .thapetvaa ``uttara, ida.m te purimakammassa ^a^P0.0563^ea^ phala.m uppanna.m, tattha tayaa paccavekkha.nabalena adhivaasanaa kaatabbaa''ti vatvaa ajjhaasayaanuruupa.m dhamma.m desesi. uttaro amataabhisekasadisena satthu hatthasamphassena sa~njaatappasaadasomanassataaya u.laarapiitipaamojja.m pa.tilabhitvaa yathaaparicita.m vipassanaamagga.m samaaruu.lho ~naa.nassa paripaaka.m gatattaa satthu ca desanaavilaasena taavadeva maggapa.tipaa.tiyaa sabbe kilese khepetvaa cha.labhi~n~no ^a^M2.0293^ea^ ahosi. cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa suulato u.t.thahitvaa paraanuddayaaya aakaase .thatvaa paa.tihaariya.m dassesi. mahaajano acchariyabbhutacittajaato ahosi. taavadevassa va.no sa.mruu.lhi, so bhikkhuuhi, ``aavuso, taadisadukkha.m anubhavanto katha.m tva.m vipassana.m anuyu~njitu.m asakkhii''ti pu.t.tho, ``pageva me, aavuso, sa.msaare aadiinavo, sa"nkhaaraana~nca sabhaavo sudi.t.tho, evaaha.m taadisa.m dukkha.m anubhavantopi asakkhi.m vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa visesa.m adhigantu''nti aaha. ``pubbajaatiyaa daharakaale makkhika.m gahetvaa nimbasuulaka.m gahetvaa suulaaropanakii.la.m pa.ticca eva.m anekajaatisatesu suulaaropanadukkhamanubhavitvaa imaaya pariyosaanajaatiyaa evaruupa.m dukkhamanubhuuta''nti aaha.
[03] 55^b^.^eb^ atha aparabhaage pubbakamma.m saritvaa somanassajaato pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^sumedho naama sambuddho^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha anuttaanapadava.n.nanameva karissaama.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ ^b^vijjaadharo tadaa aasi^eb^nti baahirakamantaadivijjaasiddhiyaa aakaasagaamisamattho hutvaa cara.navasena ta.m vijja.m rakkhitvaa avinaasetvaa parihara.navasena vijjaadharayoni aasi.m ahosinti ^a^V2.0286^ea^ attho. ^b^antalikkhacaro aha^eb^nti anta.m pariyosaana.m ko.ti.m likhate sa.mkarissatiiti antalikkha.m. atha vaa anta.m pariyosaana.m likhyate olokiyate etenaati antalikkha.m, tasmi.m antalikkhe, aakaase cara.nasiilo ahanti attho. ^b^tisuula.m sukata.m gayhaa^eb^ti tikhi.na.m suula.m, agga.m aavudha.m. tisuula.m sundara.m kata.m, ko.t.tanagha.msanamaddanapahara.navasena su.t.thu kata.m suulaavudha.m gayha gahetvaa ambarato gacchaamiiti attho. sesa.m sabba.m he.t.thaa vuttanayattaava nayaanuyogena suvi~n~neyyamevaati.
[06] uttarattheraapadaanava.n.nanaa samattaa.

[03] sattamaapadaane ^a^M2.0294^ea^ ^b^nibbute lokanaathamhii^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato aparassa uttarattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu ^a^P0.0564^ea^ kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto ito catunnavutikappe siddhatthassa bhagavato kaale kulagehe nibbattitvaa vayappatto vi~n~nuta.m patvaa saasane laddhappasaado hutvaa upaasakatta.m nivedesi. so satthari parinibbute attano ~naatake sannipaatetvaa bahupuujaasakkaara.m sa.mharitvaa dhaatupuuja.m akaasi. so tena pu~n~nakammena devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saakete braahma.nakule nibbattitvaa ^b^uttaro^eb^ti laddhanaamo vayappatto kenacideva kara.niiyena saavatthi.m gato ka.n.dambamuule kata.m yamakapaa.tihaariya.m disvaa pasiiditvaa puna kaa.lakaaraamasuttadesanaaya abhiva.d.dhamaanasaddho pabbajitvaa satthaaraa saddhi.m raajagaha.m gantvaa upasampada.m labhitvaa tatheva caranto vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~no ahosi. cha.labhi~n~no pana hutvaa satthari saavatthiya.m viharante buddhupa.t.thaanattha.m raajagahato saavatthi.m upagato bhikkhuuhi -- ``ki.m, aavuso, pabbajjaakicca.m tayaa matthaka.m paapita''nti pu.t.tho a~n~na.m byaakaasi.
[03] 93^b^.^eb^ arahatta.m pana patvaa somanassajaato attano pubbacaritaapadaana.m pakaasento ^b^nibbute lokanaathamhii^eb^tiaadimaaha. ta.m sabba.m he.t.thaa vuttanayattaa uttaanatthamevaati.

[03] eva.m bahu.m kusala.m ^a^P0.0565^ea^ katvaa devaloke nibbatti. tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa tato cavitvaa manussalokesu uppanno buddhasu~n~ne loke pa~nca paccekabuddhasataani catuuhi paccayehi upa.t.thahitvaa tato cuto raajakule nibbattitvaa rajja.m anusaasanto attano putta.m paccekabodhi.m adhigantvaa .thita.m upa.t.thahitvaa tassa parinibbutassa dhaatuyo gahetvaa cetiya.m katvaa puujesi. eva.m tattha tattha taani taani pu~n~naani katvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade bhaddiyanagare asiitiko.tivibhavassa bhaddiyase.t.thissa ekaputtako hutvaa nibbatti, ^b^bhaddajii^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. tassa kira issariyabhogaparivaarasampatti carimabhave bodhisattassa viya ahosi.

[03] tadaa satthaa saavatthiya.m vasitvaa bhaddajikumaara.m sa"nga.nhanatthaaya mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m bhaddiyanagara.m gantvaa jaatiyaavane vasi tassa ~naa.naparipaaka.m aagamayamaano. sopi uparipaasaade nisinno siihapa~njara.m vivaritvaa olokento bhagavato santike dhamma.m sotu.m gacchanta.m mahaajana.m disvaa, ``katthaaya.m mahaajano gacchatii''ti pucchitvaa ta.m kaara.na.m sutvaa sayampi mahataa parivaarena satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.nanto sabbaabhara.napa.tima.n.ditova sabbakilese khepetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. arahatte pana tena adhigate satthaa bhaddiyase.t.thi.m aamantesi -- ``tava putto ala"nkatapa.tiyatto dhamma.m su.nanto arahatte pati.t.thaasi, tenassa idaaneva pabbajitu.m yutta.m, no ce pabbajissati, parinibbaayissatii''ti. se.t.thi ``na mayha.m puttassa daharasseva sato parinibbaanena kicca.m ^a^V2.0288^ea^ atthi, pabbaajetha na''nti aaha. ta.m satthaa pabbaajetvaa upasampaadetvaa tattha sattaaha.m vasitvaa ko.tigaama.m paapu.ni, so ca gaamo ga"ngaatiire ahosi ^a^M2.0296^ea^. ko.tigaamavaasino ca buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m pavattesu.m. bhaddajitthero satthaaraa anumodanaaya aaraddhamattaaya bahigaama.m gantvaa ``ga"ngaatiire maggasamiipe satthu aagatakaale vu.t.thahissaamii''ti kaalapariccheda.m katvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule samaapatti.m samaapajjitvaa nisiidi. mahaatheresu aagacchantesupi avu.t.thahitvaa satthu aagatakaaleyeva vu.t.thaasi. puthujjanaa bhikkhuu -- ``aya.m adhunaa pabbajito, mahaatheresu aagacchantesu maanathaddho hutvaa na vu.t.thaasii''ti ujjhaayi.msu.

[03] ko.tigaamavaasino satthu bhikkhusa"nghassa ca bahuu naavaasa"nghaa.te bandhi.msu. satthaa ``bhaddajissaanubhaava.m pakaasemii''ti naavaaya .thatvaa ``kaha.m bhaddajii''ti pucchi. bhaddajitthero -- ``soha.m, bhante''ti satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa a~njali.m katvaa a.t.thaasi. satthaa ``ehi, bhaddaji, amhehi saddhi.m ekanaava.m abhiruhaa''ti. so uppatitvaa satthu .thitanaavaaya.m a.t.thaasi. satthaa ga"ngaaya majjhe gatakaale, ``bhaddaji, tayaa mahaapanaadakaale ajjhaavu.t.tharatanapaasaado ^a^P0.0566^ea^ kaha''nti aaha. ``imasmi.m .thaane nimuggo, bhante''ti. ``tena hi, bhaddaji, sabrahmacaariina.m ka"nkha.m chindaa''ti. tasmi.m kha.ne thero satthaara.m vanditvaa iddhibalena gantvaa paasaadathuupika.m paada"ngulantarena sannirujjhitvaa pa~ncaviisatiyojana.m paasaada.m gahetvaa aakaase uppati, uppatanto ca pa~n~naasayojanaani ukkhipi. athassa purimabhave ~naatakaa paasaadagatena lobhena macchakacchapama.n.duukaa hutvaa nibbattaa tasmi.m paasaade u.t.thahante parivattitvaa pati.msu. satthaa te sampatante disvaa ``~naatakaa te, bhaddaji, kilamantii''ti aaha. thero satthu vacanena paasaada.m vissajjesi. paasaado yathaa.thaaneyeva pati.t.thahi. satthaa paara"ngato bhikkhuuhi -- ``kadaa, bhante, bhaddajittherena aya.m paasaado ajjhaavu.t.tho''ti pu.t.tho ^b^mahaapanaadajaataka.m^eb^ (jaa0 1.3.40 aadayo) kathetvaa bahujana.m dhammaamata.m paayesi.

[03] ekaadasamaapadaane ^a^V2.0292^ea^ ^b^padumuttarassa bhagavato^eb^tiaadika.m aayasmato ra.t.thapaalattherassa apadaana.m. ayampi purimabuddhesu kataadhikaaro tattha tattha bhave viva.t.tuupanissayaani pu~n~naani upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kaale tassa uppattito puretarameva ha.msavatiinagare gahapatimahaasaalakule nibbattitvaa vayappatto pitu accayena gharaavaase pati.t.thito ratanako.t.thaagaarakammikena dassita.m aparimaa.na.m kulava.msaanugata.m dhana.m disvaa ``ima.m ettaka.m dhanaraasi.m mayha.m ayyakapayyakaadayo attanaa saddhi.m gahetvaa gantu.m naasakkhi.msu, mayaa pana gahetvaa gantu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa kapa.naddhikaadiina.m mahaadaana.m deti. so abhi~n~naalaabhi.m eka.m taapasa.m upa.t.thahanto tena devalokaadhipacce uyyojito yaavajiiva.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato cuto devo hutvaa nibbatti. so tattha devaloke devarajja.m karonto yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa tato cuto manussaloke bhinna.m ra.t.tha.m sandhaaretu.m samatthassa kulassa ekaputto hutvaa nibbatti. tena ca samayena padumuttaro naama bhagavaa loke uppajjitvaa pavattitavaradhammacakko veneyyasatta.m nibbaanamahaanagarasa"nkhaatakhemantabhuumi.m sampaapesi. atha so kulaputto anukkamena vi~n~nuta.m patto ekadivasa.m upaasakehi ^a^M2.0301^ea^ saddhi.m vihaara.m gato satthaara.m dhamma.m desenta.m disvaa pasannacitto parisapariyante nisiidi.

[03] tena ca samayena satthaa eka.m bhikkhu.m saddhaapabbajitaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi, ta.m disvaa pasannamaanaso tadatthaaya citta.m .thapetvaa satasahassabhikkhuparivaarassa bhagavato mahataa sakkaarena sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m pavattetvaa pa.nidhaana.m akaasi. satthaa tassa anantaraayena ^a^P0.0570^ea^ ijjhanabhaava.m disvaa ``anaagate gotamassa naama sammaasambuddhassa saasane saddhaapabbajitaana.m aggo bhavissatii''ti byaakaasi. so satthaara.m bhikkhusa"ngha~nca vanditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. so tattha yaavataayuka.m pu~n~naani katvaa tato cavitvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto ito dvaanavutikappe phussassa bhagavato kaale satthu vemaatikabhaatikesu tiisu raajaputtesu satthaara.m upa.t.thahantesu tesa.m pu~n~nakiriyaaya sahaayakicca.m akaasi. eva.m tattha tattha bhave ta.m ta.m bahu.m kusala.m upacinitvaa sugatiisuyeva sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kurura.t.the thullako.t.thikanigame ra.t.thapaalase.t.thigehe nibbatti, tassa bhinna.m ra.t.tha.m sandhaaretu.m samatthe kule nibbattattaa ^b^ra.t.thapaalo^eb^ti va.msaanugatameva naama.m ahosi. so mahataa parivaarena va.d.dhanto anukkamena yobbana.m patto maataapituuhi patiruupena daarena sa.myojetvaa mahante ca yase pati.t.thaapito dibbasampattisadisa.m sampatti.m paccanubhoti. atha bhagavaa kurura.t.the janapadacaarika.m caranto thullako.t.thika.m anupaapu.ni. ta.m sutvaa ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa satthu santike ^a^V2.0293^ea^ dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho sattavaare bhattacchede katvaa kicchena kasirena maataapitaro anujaanaapetvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaacitvaa satthu aa.nattiyaa a~n~natarassa therassa santike pabbajitvaa yonisomanasikaarena kamma.m karonto vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni.
